item.name: Blue Dragon Mask
entries: 这个光亮的天蓝色面具的边缘有尖刺，中间有一个脊状的角。面具可以重新塑形，以适应与之相适应的佩戴者。当你戴着这个面具并与之相适应时，你可以获得以下属性。

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: 你拥有对雷电伤害的抵抗力。如果你已经拥有对其他来源的雷电伤害的抗性，你反而拥有对雷电伤害的免疫力。如果你已经对其他来源的雷电伤害有免疫力，每当你受到雷电伤害时，你不会受到任何伤害，并恢复相当于该类型伤害一半的命中率。

entries.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: 当你没有穿戴盔甲时，你可以将你的魅力值加到你的盔甲等级上。

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: 如果你有一个需要休息才能充能的呼吸武器，它获得的充能是6。

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense darkvision} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense blindsight} out to 30 feet for 5 minutes.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: 你能说并听懂德拉科尼亚语。在你对蓝龙进行的任何魅力检查中，你也有优势。

entries.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: (1/天)如果你的拯救动作失败，你可以选择成功代替。

entries.name: Lingering Shock
entries: 如果你对一个生物造成闪电伤害，它在下一回合之前不能做出反应。

item.name: Blue Dragon Scale Mail
entries: 龙鳞邮件是由一种龙的鳞片制成的。有时，龙会收集它们遗弃的鳞片并将它们赠送给人类。其他时候，猎人会小心翼翼地剥下死龙的皮并加以保存。在这两种情况下，龙鳞甲都有很高的价值。当你穿上这件盔甲时，你会获得一个+1的交流奖励，在面对龙的恐怖存在和呼吸武器时，你在蓄力时有优势，并且你对雷电伤害有抵抗力。
此外，你可以集中你的感官作为一个行动，以魔法方式辨别距离你30英里内最近的蓝龙的距离和方向。这个特殊动作在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Blue Quartz
entries: 一种透明的淡蓝色宝石。

item.name: Blue Sapphire
entries: 一种透明的蓝白色至中蓝色宝石。

item.name: Blue Spinel
entries: 一种透明的深蓝色宝石。

item.name: Bob
entries: This +1 battleaxe floats on water and other liquids, and grants its bearer advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to swim.

item.name: Bobbing Lily Pad
entries: 这种神奇的交通工具是一片直径10英尺的叶子，漂浮在水上。它的卷须可以推动它穿过陆地和水面（但不是水下），也可以在空中飞行。它的行走、飞行和游泳速度为20英尺，并且可以悬停。当你骑着它时，它会根据你所说的方向移动。
百合花可以毫无阻碍地运送300磅的东西。它最多可以运载这个重量的两倍，但如果它运载的重量超过其正常容量，它就会以半速移动。

item.name: Bomb
entries: 作为一个动作，一个角色可以点燃这个炸弹并将它扔到60英尺以外的地方。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在DC12灵巧救赎中成功，否则会受到{@damage 3d6}的火力伤害。

item.name: Bombard
entries: 轰炸机是由Giff建造的。每艘船的主要特征是一门巨大的大炮，发射巨大的炮弹，能够将其他船只炸成碎片。(大炮包括在船的成本中。)一艘轰炸机可以携带多达14个巨大的炮弹，每个炮弹重达10吨。这些炮弹占了全船货物的大部分重量。一个安装在船尾甲板上的绞盘被用来将炮弹装上船。
轰炸机可以在水上漂浮和航行，但它不能安全地降落在地面上（它的龙骨会导致它侧翻）。

item.name: Bonecounter
entries: 这把武器是一把名为Bonecounter的神奇的+2长矛。每当这把武器被用来消灭一个不死生物时，持枪者的口袋里就会出现一块银子。

item.name: Book
entries: A book might contain poetry, historical accounts, information pertaining to a particular field of lore, diagrams and notes on gnomish contraptions, or just about anything else that can be represented using text or pictures. A book of spells is a {@item spellbook|phb}.

item.name: Book of Exalted Deeds
item.reqAttune: by a creature of good alignment
entries: 作为关于多元宇宙中所有善的权威性论文，传说中的《高尚契约书》在许多宗教中占据了重要地位。该书的不同作者并不是专门为某一特定信仰而写的经文，而是用他们自己对真正美德的看法来填充书页，为战胜邪恶提供指导。
崇高事迹之书很少在一个地方停留。一旦这本书被阅读，它就会消失在多元宇宙的其他角落，在那里它的道德指导可以为黑暗的世界带来光明。虽然有人试图复制这部作品，但这样做的努力未能捕捉到它的神奇本质，也未能翻译出它为那些心灵纯洁、目标坚定的人提供的好处。

A heavy clasp, wrought to look like angel wings, keeps the book's contents secure. Only a creature of good alignment that is attuned to the book can release the clasp that holds it shut. Once the book is opened, the attuned creature must spend 80 hours reading and studying the book to digest its contents and gain its benefits. Other creatures that peruse the book's open pages can read the text but glean no deeper meaning and reap no benefits. An evil creature that tries to read from the book takes {@damage 24d6} radiant damage. This damage ignores resistance and immunity, and can't be reduced or avoided by any means. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage disappears in a blinding flash and is destroyed, leaving its possessions behind.
只要你努力行善，高尚行为之书授予的好处就会持续。如果你在10天内没有做出至少一次仁慈或慷慨的行为，或者你自愿做出邪恶的行为，你就会失去这本书所授予的所有好处。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: 高贵的契约书有以下随机属性。

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial properties}

entries.name: Increased Wisdom
entries: 在你花了必要的时间阅读和研究这本书后，你的智慧值会增加2，最高可达24。你不能多次从这本书中获得这种好处。

entries.name: Enlightened Magic
entries: 一旦你阅读并研究了这本书，你为施展牧师或圣骑士的法术而消耗的任何法术槽都算作高一个等级的法术槽。

entries.name: Halo
entries: Once you've read and studied the book, you gain a protective halo. This halo sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. You can dismiss or manifest the halo as a bonus action. While present, the halo gives you advantage on Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks made to interact with good creatures and Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks made to interact with evil creatures. In addition, fiends and undead within the halo's bright light make attack rolls against you with disadvantage.

entries.name: Destroying the Book
entries: 有传言说，只要多元宇宙中存在着善，超凡契约之书就不会被摧毁。然而，将这本书淹没在冥河中，会清除书页上的所有文字和图像，并使这本书在{@dice 1d100}年内失去力量。

item.name: Book of Vile Darkness
entries: 这本肮脏的邪恶手稿的内容是那些被邪恶所控制的人的食物和饮料。任何凡人都不应该知道它所包含的秘密，这些知识如此可怕，甚至瞥见潦草的书页都会引起疯狂。
大多数人都相信，《卑鄙的黑暗之书》是蜥蜴神韦克纳撰写的。他在书中记录了每一个病态的想法，每一个不正常的思想，以及他遇到的或设计的每一个最黑的魔法的例子。维克纳涵盖了他所能涉及的每一个卑鄙的话题，使这本书成为所有凡人错误的可怕目录。
其他邪恶的从业者也持有这本书，并将他们自己的意见添加到它的卑鄙知识目录中。他们的补充很清楚，因为后来作品的作者把他们写的东西都缝进了这本巨著，或者在某些情况下，对现有的文字做了注释和补充。有些地方的书页缺失、撕裂，或者完全被墨水、血迹和划痕覆盖，以至于无法辨认原文。
大自然无法忍受这本书的存在。普通植物在它面前会枯萎，动物不愿意接近它，书会逐渐破坏它所接触的东西。如果书在上面停留足够长的时间，甚至石头也会开裂，变成粉末。
一个与这本书相适应的生物必须花80个小时来阅读和研究它，以消化它的内容并获得它的好处。然后，该生物可以自由地修改书中的内容，只要这些修改能推进邪恶并扩展书中已经包含的传说。
每当一个非邪恶的生物适应卑鄙的黑暗之书时，该生物必须做一个DC17的魅力拯救动作。拯救失败后，该生物的取向将变为中性邪恶。
只要你努力在这个世界上作恶，卑鄙的黑暗之书就会留在你身边。如果你在10天内没有做出至少一个邪恶的行为，或者你自愿做出一个好的行为，这本书就会消失。如果你在收听这本书的时候死亡，一个巨大的邪恶实体会夺走你的灵魂。在你的灵魂被囚禁期间，你无法通过任何方式恢复生命。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: 卑鄙的黑暗之书有以下随机属性。

items: 3 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
3 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental properties}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental properties}

entries.name: Adjusted Ability Scores
entries: 在你花了必要的时间阅读和研究这本书后，你选择的一项能力得分会增加2分，最多到24分。你选择的另一项能力得分会减少2分，最低为3分，这本书不能再调整你的能力得分。

entries.name: Mark of Darkness
entries: After you spend the requisite amount of time reading and studying the book, you acquire a physical disfigurement as a hideous sign of your devotion to vile darkness. An evil rune might appear on your face, your eyes might become glossy black, or horns might sprout from your forehead. Or you might become wizened and hideous, lose all facial features, gain a forked tongue, or some other feature the DM chooses. The mark of darkness grants you advantage on Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) checks made to interact with evil creatures and Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks made to interact with non-evil creatures.

entries.name: Command Evil
entries: While you are attuned to the book and holding it, you can use an action to cast the {@spell dominate monster} spell on an evil target (save DC 18). You can't use this property again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Dark Lore
entries: 每当你进行智力检定时，你可以参考《卑鄙的黑暗之书》来回忆关于邪恶的某方面的信息，比如关于恶魔的传说。当你这样做的时候，你在该检查中的熟练度加成是双倍的。

entries.name: Dark Speech
entries: While you carry the Book of Vile Darkness and are attuned to it, you can use an action to recite words from its pages in a foul language known as Dark Speech. Each time you do so, you take {@damage 1d12} psychic damage, and each non-evil creature within 15 feet of you takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage.

entries.name: Destroying the Book
entries: 卑鄙的黑暗之书允许被撕掉几页，但这些页面上包含的任何邪恶传说最终都会回到书中，通常是在新的作者向这本巨著添加页面时。
如果一个{@creature solar}把书撕成两半，书就会被毁掉{@dice 1d100}年，之后它就会在多元宇宙的某个黑暗角落里重生。

A creature attuned to the book for one hundred years can unearth a phrase hidden in the original text that, when translated to Celestial and spoken aloud, destroys both the speaker and the book in a blinding flash of radiance. However, as long as evil exists in the multiverse, the book reforms {@dice 1d10 × 100} years later.
如果多元宇宙中的所有邪恶都被消灭了，这本书就会变成灰尘，永远被销毁。

items: The Book of Vile Darkness has the following properties:

items.name: Circle of Death
entries: While attuned to the book, you can cast {@spell circle of death} (save DC 20) from it as an action. After you cast the spell, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1-5, you can't use this property again until the next dawn.

items.name: Condition Immunities
entries: While attuned to the book, you can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

items.name: Evil Presence
entries: The book houses an evil spirit that is hostile toward you. When you become attuned to the book, the spirit tries to leave the book and enter your body. If you fail a DC 20 Charisma saving throw, it succeeds, and you become an NPC under the DM's control until the intruding spirit is banished using magic such as the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell. The banished spirit returns to the book.

item.name: Bookmark
entries: This +3 dagger belongs to {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}. While you have the dagger drawn, you can use a bonus action to activate one of the following properties:

items: 使镶嵌在匕首柄上的蓝色宝石在20英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外20英尺范围内发出暗光，或者使宝石变暗。
把匕首变成一个指南针，放在手掌上时，指向北方。
Cast {@spell dimension door} from the dagger. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

Cast {@spell compulsion} (save DC 15) from the dagger. The range of the spell increases to 90 feet but it targets only spiders that are beasts. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Boomerang Shield
entries: You can make a ranged weapon attack with this magic shield. It has a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet, and it uses your Strength or Dexterity for the attack roll (your choice). If you're proficient with shields, you are proficient with attacks made using this shield. On a hit, it deals {@damage 1d6} slashing damage. If you throw the shield, it reappears in your hand the instant after it hits or misses a target.

item.name: Boots of Elvenkind
entries: While you wear these boots, your steps make no sound, regardless of the surface you are moving across. You also have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks that rely on moving silently.

item.name: Boots of False Tracks
entries: 只有人形动物才能穿这种靴子。在穿着这双靴子的时候，你可以选择让它们留下像另一种与你体型相同的人形物体的足迹。

item.name: Boots of Haste
entries: While you wear these boots, you can click your heels together to cast the {@spell haste} spell on yourself as a bonus action. You don't suffer from lethargy when the spell ends when cast using these boots. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until next dawn.

item.name: Boots of Levitation
entries: While you wear these boots, you can use an action to cast the {@spell levitate} spell on yourself at will.

item.name: Boots of Speed
entries: 当你穿上这双靴子时，你可以使用一个额外的动作，将靴子的鞋跟放在一起。如果你这样做，靴子会使你的行走速度加倍，任何对你进行机会攻击的生物在攻击卷上都处于劣势。如果你再次将你的脚跟点在一起，你就会结束这个效果。
当靴子的属性总共使用了10分钟后，魔法就会停止运作，直到你完成长时间的休息。

item.name: Boots of Striding and Springing
entries: 当你穿上这双靴子时，你的行走速度会变成30英尺，除非你的行走速度更高，如果你有负重或穿着重甲，你的速度不会降低。此外，你可以跳出正常距离的三倍，尽管你不能跳得比你剩余的移动量所允许的更远。

item.name: Boots of the Vigilant
entries: While you wear these boots, you can sense impending danger. After you roll initiative, you can choose to roll a {@dice d8} and add it to your initiative roll. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Boots of the Winterlands
entries: 这些毛皮靴很贴身，感觉相当温暖。当你穿上它们时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。
You ignore {@quickref difficult terrain||3} created by ice or snow.
你可以忍受低至华氏50度的温度，不需要任何额外的保护。如果你穿上厚衣服，你可以忍受低至华氏100度的温度。

item.name: Borealus
entries: This legendary artifact was created by a powerful wizard, crafted from the finger of a towering, ancient elemental aspect of frost. It is so cold to the touch that it numbs any skin it comes into contact with, although an attuned character is immune to this effect.

entries.name: Gifts of the Rime
entries: As long as you are attuned to the Borealus, you gain the following benefits:

items: You are resistant to fire damage
You are immune to cold damage
You learn the {@spell ray of frost} cantrip

entries.name: Breath of Winter
entries: While holding the staff you can use your action to unleash an icy-cold blizzard from your open mouth. A 100-foot-cone of hoarfrost blasts forth in a direction of your choice, dealing {@dice 9d8} cold damage to all creatures within the cone if they fail a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, or half as much on a success. You can't use this property again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Glacial Prison
entries: By using your action to touch the staff to a surface, you can cause a barrier of ice to spring into existence from a point you can see along this surface within 200 feet of you. This effect is otherwise identical to a {@spell wall of ice} spell cast at 6th level, with a DC 18 for all saving throws related to the effect. You can't use this property again until 3 days have passed.

entries.name: Cruel Winds
entries: Wherever the staff goes, a bitterly cold boreal wind accompanies it. The wind gusts intermittently within 30 feet of the attuned character and extinguishes all non-magical flames it comes into contact with.

entries.name: Destroying the Staff
entries: The staff can be destroyed through exposure to flames from a fire elemental of equal power to the being it was crafted from. After centuries of exposure, it will melt away into nothing.

item.name: Boros Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Boros, allows you to cast {@spell heroism}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Boros' recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Boros Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Boros guild
entries: Carved from red sandstone with white granite elements to resemble a member of the Boros Legion, this keyrune can become a {@creature veteran} (human) for up to 8 hours. In addition to fighting on your behalf, this {@creature veteran} cheerfully offers tactical advice, which is usually sound. Anyone who talks with the transformed keyrune or examines it closely can easily recognize that it is an artificial human.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature veteran} (human). If there isn't enough space for the {@creature veteran}, the keyrune doesn't transform.
该生物对你、你的同伴和你的公会的其他成员都很友好（除非那些公会成员对你有敌意）。它能听懂你的语言并服从你的口头命令。如果你没有发出任何命令，该生物会采取{@action Dodge}的行动并移动以避免危险。
在持续时间结束时，该生物会恢复到它的钥匙形状。如果它的生命值下降到0，或者你在接触它的时候使用行动再次说出命令词，它就会提前恢复。当该生物恢复到它的钥匙孔形态时，它不能再变身，直到36小时后。

item.name: Bottle of Boundless Coffee
entries: 这个金属瓶承载着美味、温暖的咖啡。瓶子上有一个塞子，通过一个小链子连接到瓶子上。即使在打开时，瓶子也不会接受它所生产的咖啡以外的任何液体。里面的咖啡始终是舒适的温暖，而且通过瓶子也感觉不到任何热量。

Each time you drink the coffee, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the bottle refuses to dispense coffee for the next hour. If you pour coffee from the bottle, rather than drinking from it, the coffee vanishes the moment it leaves the bottle.

item.name: Bottle stopper cork embossed with gold leaf and set with amethysts
Bottled Breath
entries: 这个瓶子里有一口元素空气。当你吸入它时，你要么呼出它，要么保持它。

If you exhale the breath, you gain the effect of the {@spell gust of wind} spell. If you hold the breath, you don't need to breathe for 1 hour, though you can end this benefit early (for example, to speak). Ending it early doesn't give you the benefit of exhaling the breath.

item.name: Bottled Comet
entries: This spherical glass orb contains an ignited delerium shard hovering gently within. Electrical currents of yellow, green, and purple energy streak from the crystal and cascade along the glass, rendering it warm to the touch.

As an action you can throw the orb up to 30 feet. It shatters on impact, releasing a 20-foot-radius burst of contaminated energy. Creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution save or take ({@dice 8d6}) necrotic damage, and take one {@adventure level of contamination|DoDk|12}. In addition, an arcane anomaly (see Dungeons of Drakkenheim) occurs, centred on the point of impact.

item.name: Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals
entries: While this bowl is filled with water, you can use an action to speak the bowl's command word and summon a {@creature water elemental}, as if you had cast the {@spell conjure elemental} spell. The bowl can't be used this way again until the next dawn.
碗的直径约为1英尺，深度为一半。它重3磅，可容纳约3加仑。

item.name: Bracelet of Rock Magic
entries: While you wear this gold bracelet, it grants you immunity to being {@condition petrified}, and it allows you to cast {@spell flesh to stone} (save DC 15) as an action. Once the spell has been cast three times, the bracelet can no longer cast it. Thereafter, you can cast {@spell stone shape} as an action. After you have done this thirteen times, the bracelet loses its magic and turns from gold to lead.

entries.name: Curse
entries: 手镯与土的亲和力表现为一种不寻常的诅咒。与土和石有密切关系的肉体生物，如石巨人和矮人，在对抗手镯施放的{@spell flesh to stone}咒语时有优势。如果这样的生物救治成功，手镯就会打破你对它的适应性，并对你施放咒语。你以劣势进行救赎，如果救赎失败，你会被瞬间击倒。

item.name: Bracer of Flying Daggers
entries: This armband appears to have thin {@item dagger|phb|daggers} strapped to it. As an action, you can pull up to two magic daggers from the bracer and immediately hurl them, making a ranged attack with each dagger. A dagger vanishes if you don't hurl it right away, and the daggers disappear right after they hit or miss. The bracer never runs out of daggers.

item.name: Bracers of Archery
entries: 在佩戴这些手镯时，你可以熟练使用长弓和短弓，并且在使用这些武器进行远程攻击时，你可以获得+2的伤害卷奖励。

item.name: Bracers of Asmodeus
entries: You have a +2 bonus to AC while wearing these bracers, if you do not wear armor or use a shield at the same time.

entries.name: Curse
entries: While attuned to the bracers, you become obsessed with plotting, scheming, and manipulation. You always barter for better deals, often using secrets or leveraging other offers in the process. If you ever decline an opportunity to better yourself financially at another's expense, you immediately take {@damage 3d10} necrotic damage. Only the {@spell Remove Curse} spell allows you to end attunement to this item.

entries.name: Corrupting
entries: This item corrupts. See the "{@adventure Infernal Item Corruption|CoA|16|Infernal Item Corruption}" section.

item.name: Bracers of Celerity
entries: This pair of lightweight bronze bracers is lined with soft, purple velvet and engraved with swirling designs.
While you're wearing these bracers, all your speeds increase by 10 feet, and you have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the paralyzed or restrained condition on yourself.

item.name: Bracers of Defense
entries: 在佩戴这些手镯时，如果你没有穿戴盔甲，也没有使用盾牌，你会获得+2的交流奖励。

item.name: Brass Dragon Scale Mail
entries: 龙鳞邮件是由一种龙的鳞片制成的。有时，龙会收集它们遗弃的鳞片并将它们赠送给人类。其他时候，猎人会小心翼翼地剥下死龙的皮并加以保存。在这两种情况下，龙鳞甲都有很高的价值。当你穿上这件盔甲时，你会获得一个+1的交流奖励，在面对龙的恐怖存在和呼吸武器时，你在蓄力时有优势，并且你对火焰伤害有抵抗力。
此外，你可以集中你的感官作为一个行动，以魔法方式辨别距离你30英里内最近的铜龙的距离和方向。这个特殊动作在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Brazen Armor
entries: This armor, fashioned from the body of an {@creature Empyrean brazen bull|GHLoE}, gleams brightly in direct sunlight. While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. In addition, you have resistance to fire and radiant damage.

Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

item.name: Brazier of Commanding Fire Elementals
entries: While a fire burns in this brass brazier, you can use an action to speak the brazier's command word and summon a {@creature fire elemental}, as if you had cast the {@spell conjure elemental} spell. The brazier can't be used this way again until the next dawn.
炉子有5磅重。

item.name: Breastplate of Balance
entries: This burnished copper breastplate looks as if it were made of interlocking gears. Merchant's scales are emblazoned across the chest.
The armor has 4 charges. You can use the charges in the following ways while wearing the armor:

items.name: Equalize
entries: When you or a creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself is about to roll a {@dice d20} with advantage or disadvantage, you can expend 1 charge and take a reaction to prevent the roll from being affected by advantage or disadvantage.

items.name: Expunge Imbalance
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend 2 charges to cast the {@spell Lesser Restoration} spell from the armor.
The armor regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn.

This armor consists of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather. Although it leaves the legs and arms relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered.

item.name: Breathing Bubble
entries: 这个半透明的气泡状球体的外表面略带粘性，你只有在像头盔一样把它戴在头上时才能获得该物品的好处。
泡泡里有1小时的可呼吸空气。气泡每天在黎明时分重新获得所有消耗的空气。

item.name: Brewer's Supplies
additionalEntries: Brewing is the art of producing beer. Not only does beer serve as an alcoholic beverage, but the process of brewing purifies water. Crafting beer takes weeks of fermentation, but only a few hours of work.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 酿酒师的用品包括一个大玻璃壶、一定数量的啤酒花、一个虹吸管和几英尺的管子。

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: 熟练掌握酿酒用品能使你在涉及酒精的事件中获得额外的情报({@skill History})检查洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: Medicine
entries: 当你治疗任何遭受酒精中毒的人时，或者当你可以用酒精来减轻疼痛时，这个工具的熟练程度会给予额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: Persuasion
entries: 一杯烈酒可以帮助软化最坚硬的心。你对酿酒用品的熟练程度可以帮助你向别人灌酒，给他们提供足够的酒精，使他们的情绪变得温和。

additionalEntries.name: Potable Water
entries: 你的酿酒知识使你能够净化原本无法饮用的水。作为长期休息的一部分，你最多可以净化6加仑的水，或者作为短期休息的一部分净化1加仑。

additionalEntries.caption: Brewer's Supplies
rows: 检测饮料中的毒物或杂质
识别酒精
无视酒精的影响

item.name: Bridle of Capturing
entries: 这条精致的皮革辔头在第一次握住的时候会拽住手，好像它渴望向附近的野兽伸出手来。当你握住缰绳的一端时，你可以使用一个动作说出它的命令语，使另一端向你20英尺范围内你能看到的野兽发出攻击。目标必须在DC17的魅力救赎中成功，或者让缰绳绑在它的脖子上，然后像受到{@spell dominate beast}法术的影响一样在你的指挥下倒下。一旦目标受到影响，你不需要握住缰绳的另一端来指挥它。如果救赎成功，目标就会对缰绳的力量产生免疫，直到下一个黎明。
被缰绳控制的生物可以被束缚它的生物释放，作为一个额外动作。被缰绳控制的生物可以在每天黎明时分进行DC17魅力检查。如果成功，该生物就不再受缰绳的影响。

item.name: Bronze Dragon Scale Mail
entries: 龙鳞邮件是由一种龙的鳞片制成的。有时，龙会收集它们遗弃的鳞片并将它们赠送给人类。其他时候，猎人会小心翼翼地剥下死龙的皮并加以保存。在这两种情况下，龙鳞甲都有很高的价值。当你穿上这件盔甲时，你会获得一个+1的交流奖励，在面对龙的恐怖存在和呼吸武器时，你在蓄力时有优势，并且你对雷电伤害有抵抗力。
此外，你可以集中你的感官作为一个行动，以魔法方式辨别距离你30英里内最近的铜龙的距离和方向。这个特殊动作在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Brooch of Living Essence
entries: 在佩戴这枚不显眼的胸针时，法术和其他任何可以检测或显示你的生物类型的东西都将你视为人形，而那些可以显示你的排列方式的东西则将其视为中性。

item.name: Brooch of Shielding
entries: 佩戴此胸针时，你对武力伤害有抵抗力，对{@spell magic missile}法术的伤害有免疫力。

item.name: Broom of Flying
entries: 这种木制扫帚重3磅，功能与普通扫帚一样，直到你站在它的脚下，说出它的命令词。然后它在你身下盘旋，可以在空中骑行。它的飞行速度为50英尺。它最多可以携带400磅，但在携带超过200磅时，其飞行速度变为30英尺。当你降落时，扫帚停止盘旋。
如果你说出命令词，说出地点，并且熟悉那个地方，你就可以让扫帚独自前往离你1英里内的目的地。当你说出另一个命令词时，扫帚会回到你身边，前提是扫帚仍在你1英里范围内。

item.name: Bucket
entries: 一个桶可容纳3加仑液体或半立方英尺的固体。

item.name: Bullseye Lantern
entries: 牛眼灯在60英尺的锥形范围内发出亮光，在另外的60英尺范围内发出暗光。一旦点燃，它可以用一壶（1品脱）的油燃烧6小时。

item.name: Burglar's Pack
entries: 包括。

items: a {@item backpack|phb}
a {@item Ball Bearings (Bag of 1,000)|phb|bag of 1,000 ball bearings}
10英尺的绳子
a {@item bell|phb}
5 {@item candle|phb|candles}
a {@item crowbar|phb}
a {@item hammer|phb}
10 {@item piton|phb|pitons}
a {@item hooded lantern|phb}
2 {@item Oil (flask)|phb|flasks of oil}
5 days {@item Rations (1 day)|phb|rations}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
a {@item waterskin|phb}
{@item Hempen Rope (50 feet)|phb|50 feet of hempen rope}

item.name: Burnt Othur Fumes
entries: 中了这种毒的生物必须在DC13宪法救赎中成功，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的毒伤害，并且必须在它的每个回合开始时重复救赎动作。在每次连续的救赎失败后，该角色会受到3({@damage 1d6})的中毒伤害。在三次救赎成功后，中毒结束。

item.name: Butcher's Bib
entries: 这条黑皮围裙永远被血覆盖，即使被洗掉后也是如此。穿着这条围裙时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 每一回合，当你为一个武器的近战攻击掷出伤害时，你可以重新掷出武器的伤害骰子。如果你这样做，你必须使用第二个总数。
Your weapon attacks that deal slashing damage score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When Cabal's Ruin reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: You have {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} against spells and other magical effects while wearing this cloak.
The cloak has 6 charges and it regains {@dice 1d4 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn.
When you use the cloak to absorb a spell, you gain resistance to one type of damage dealt by the spell (your choice). This resistance then lasts until the end of your next turn.

item.name: Cabal's Ruin (Dormant)
entries: This cloak is made of heavy dark cloth trimmed with golden patterns, and occasionally shimmers with sparks of arcane energy. It was once worn by the famed gunslinger {@creature Percival de Rolo|TDCSR|Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III of Whitestone}.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While Cabal's Ruin is in a dormant state, the cloak has 4 charges and it regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges daily at dawn. When you hit with an attack, you can expend any number of charges from the cloak, with the attack dealing an extra {@damage 1d6} lightning damage per charge expended. If your attack strikes multiple targets, you choose one target that takes this extra damage.

When you are targeted by an enemy's spell, you can use your reaction to absorb a portion of the spell's energy into the cloak. The spell affects you normally, but the cloak regains a number of charges equal to the level of the spell. This property can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When Cabal's Ruin reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefit:

items: The cloak has 10 charges and it regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Calligrapher's Supplies
additionalEntries: Calligraphy treats writing as a delicate, beautiful art. Calligraphers produce text that is pleasing to the eye, using a style that is difficult to forge. Their supplies also give them some ability to examine scripts and determine if they are legitimate, since a calligrapher's training involves long hours of studying writing and attempting to replicate its style and design.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 书法家的用品包括墨水、一打羊皮纸和三支羽毛笔。

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: 虽然书法对破译魔法著作的内容帮助不大，但对这些用品的熟练掌握可以帮助识别谁写了具有魔法性质的文字。

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: 这个工具的熟练程度可以增加分析或研究古代文字、卷轴或其他文本的成功检查的益处，包括刻在石头上的符文或壁画或其他展示物中的信息。

additionalEntries.name: Decipher Treasure Map
entries: 这个工具的熟练程度赋予你检查地图的专长。你可以通过智力检查来确定地图的年龄，地图是否包含任何隐藏的信息，或类似的事实。

additionalEntries.caption: Calligrapher's Supplies
rows: 确定非魔幻剧本的作者
确定作家的心理状态
发现伪造的文本
伪造签名

item.name: Caltrop
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以将一袋卡尔特鲁斯散开，覆盖一个5英尺见方的区域。任何进入该区域的生物都必须在DC15的灵巧救赎中获得成功，否则将停止移动并受到1次穿刺伤害。在该生物恢复至少1点生命值之前，它的行走速度会降低10英尺。以半速移动通过该区域的生物不需要做蓄力动作。

item.name: Caltrops (bag of 20)
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以将一袋卡尔特鲁斯散开，覆盖一个5英尺见方的区域。任何进入该区域的生物都必须在DC15的灵巧救赎中获得成功，否则将停止移动并受到1次穿刺伤害。在该生物恢复至少1点生命值之前，它的行走速度会降低10英尺。以半速移动通过该区域的生物不需要做蓄力动作。

item.name: Candle
entries: 在1小时内，蜡烛在5英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外5英尺范围内发出暗光。

item.name: Candle Mace
entries: 你使用此魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷轴都有+1的加成。此法器的头部在5英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外5英尺范围内发出暗光。当你挥舞这把矛时，你可以作为一个动作来熄灭或点燃它的光芒。

item.name: Candle of Invocation
entries: 这个细长的锥子是献给一个神灵的，并与该神灵保持一致。蜡烛的排列方式可以通过{@spell detect evil and good}法术来检测。DM选择神灵和相关的排列组合，或者随机决定排列组合。

rows: 混乱的邪恶
混乱的中性
混乱的好
中立邪恶
中性
中性良好
合法的邪恶
合法中立
合法良好

entries: 蜡烛的魔法在点燃时被激活，这需要一个动作。燃烧4小时后，蜡烛会被销毁。你可以提前把它掐灭，以便在以后使用。从蜡烛的总燃烧时间中以1分钟为单位扣除它燃烧的时间。
点燃后，蜡烛会在30英尺的范围内发出昏暗的光。光线范围内的任何生物，如果其排列方式与蜡烛的排列方式一致，则在攻击卷轴、蓄力和能力检查方面具有优势。此外，在光线中的牧师或德鲁伊，如果其排列方式与蜡烛的排列方式一致，可以在不消耗法术槽的情况下施放他或她准备的一级法术，虽然法术的效果就像用一级法术槽施放一样。
另外，当你第一次点燃蜡烛时，你可以用它来施展{@spell gate}法术。这样做会毁掉蜡烛。

item.name: Candle of the Deep
entries: 这种蜡烛的火焰在浸入水中时不会熄灭。它像普通的蜡烛一样发出光和热。

item.name: Canian Fork
entries: You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition, you can make one additional attack with it as a bonus action on each of your turns.

entries.name: Curse
entries: You're unwilling to part with this weapon while attuned to it. You're also vulnerable to radiant damage and each time you receive magical healing, you must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw.
On a failed save, the healing has no effect. Only the {@spell Remove Curse} spell allows you to end attunement to this item.

entries.name: Corrupting
entries: This item corrupts. See the "{@adventure Infernal Item Corruption|CoA|16|Infernal Item Corruption}" section.

item.name: Canoe
entries: 一艘独木舟可以在尼安扎鲁港以50金币购买。它最多可容纳六个中型生物，最大速度为2英里/小时。其他方面与{@item rowboat}相同。

item.name: Cap of Water Breathing
entries: 在水下戴着这顶帽子时，你可以把它的命令词作为一个动作说出来，在你的头部周围产生一个空气泡。它允许你在水下正常呼吸。这个气泡会一直伴随着你，直到你再次说出命令语，帽子被取下，或者你不再在水下。

item.name: Cape of Enlargement
entries: Ancient runes are stitched in silver thread along the hem of this grayish-purple cape.
The cape has 3 charges. As a bonus action while wearing the cape, you can expend 1 of its charges to enlarge yourself, granting yourself the following benefits:

items: Your size increases by one category—from Medium to Large, for example. If there isn't enough room for your size to increase by one category, you instead become the maximum possible size in the space available.
你在力量检查和力量投掷方面具有优势。
When you hit with an attack roll using a weapon or an unarmed strike, you can add your proficiency bonus to the attack's damage.

entries: These benefits last for 10 minutes or until you use another bonus action to dismiss them. The cape regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Cape of the Mountebank
entries: 这件披风有淡淡的硫磺味。穿着它时，你可以用它来施展{@spell dimension door}的法术，作为一个动作。斗篷的这一属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。
当你消失时，你会留下一团烟雾，而你会在你的目的地出现在一团类似的烟雾中。烟雾轻微地遮蔽了你离开的空间和你出现的空间，并在你下一个回合结束时消散。轻微或较强的风会驱散烟雾。

item.name: Card Sharp's Deck
entries: The cards of this deck shimmer around the edges. While holding this deck, you can use the following properties:

items.name: Deadly Deal
entries: As an action, you can use this deck to make a ranged spell attack by throwing a spectral card and using Dexterity for the attack roll. The card has a range of 120 feet and deals {@damage 1d8} force damage on a hit.

items.name: Spray of Cards
entries: As an action, you can shuffle the deck and cast the {@spell Spray of Cards|BMT} spell at 3rd level from the deck (spell save DC 15). Once the deck has cast the spell, it can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Carnelian
entries: 一种不透明的橙色至红棕色的宝石。

item.name: Carpenter's Tools
additionalEntries: Skill at carpentry enables a character to construct wooden structures. A carpenter can build a house, a shack, a wooden cabinet, or similar items.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 木匠的工具包括锯子、锤子、钉子、斧子、方块、尺子、锛子、刨子和凿子。

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: 这个工具熟练地帮助你识别木制建筑和其他大型木制物体的用途和来源。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: 在检查木质结构内的区域时，你会获得更多的洞察力，因为你知道建筑的技巧，可以隐藏一些不被发现的区域。

additionalEntries.name: Perception
entries: 你可以发现木墙或地板的不规则之处，从而更容易找到陷阱门和秘密通道。

additionalEntries.name: Stealth
entries: 你可以快速评估木质地板的薄弱环节，从而更容易避免那些被踩踏时发出吱吱声和呻吟的地方。

additionalEntries.name: Fortify
entries: 通过1分钟的工作和原材料，你可以使一扇门或窗户更难被强行打开。打开它所需的DC增加5。

additionalEntries.name: Temporary Shelter
entries: As part of a long rest, you can construct a lean-to or a similar shelter to keep your group dry and in the shade for the duration of the rest. Because it was fashioned quickly from whatever wood was available, the shelter collapses {@dice 1d3} days after being assembled.

additionalEntries.caption: Carpenter's Tools
rows: 建造一个简单的木质结构
设计一个复杂的木质结构
找到木墙的薄弱点
撬开一扇门

item.name: Carpet of Flying, 3 ft. × 5 ft.
entries: 你可以说出地毯的指令词作为一个动作，使地毯盘旋和飞行。只要你在它的30英尺范围内，它就会按照你所说的方向移动。
一块3英尺×5英尺的地毯可以承载200磅，飞行速度为80英尺。一块地毯最多可以承载这个重量的两倍，但如果它承载的重量超过其正常容量，它的飞行速度就会减半。

item.name: Carpet of Flying, 4 ft. × 6 ft.
entries: 你可以说出地毯的指令词作为一个动作，使地毯盘旋和飞行。只要你在它的30英尺范围内，它就会按照你所说的方向移动。
一张4英尺×6英尺的地毯可以承载400磅，飞行速度为60英尺。一块地毯最多可以承载这个重量的两倍，但如果它承载的重量超过其正常容量，它的飞行速度就会减半。

item.name: Carpet of Flying, 5 ft. × 7 ft.
entries: 你可以说出地毯的指令词作为一个动作，使地毯盘旋和飞行。只要你在它的30英尺范围内，它就会按照你所说的方向移动。
一张5英尺 × 7英尺的地毯可以承载600磅，飞行速度为40英尺。一块地毯最多可以承载这个重量的两倍，但如果它承载的重量超过其正常容量，它的飞行速度就会减半。

item.name: Carpet of Flying, 6 ft. × 9 ft.
entries: 你可以说出地毯的指令词作为一个动作，使地毯盘旋和飞行。只要你在它的30英尺范围内，它就会按照你所说的方向移动。
一块6英尺×9英尺的地毯可以承载800磅，飞行速度为30英尺。一块地毯最多可以承载这个重量的两倍，但如果它承载的重量超过其正常容量，它的飞行速度就会减半。

item.name: Carrion Crawler Mucus
entries: This poison must be harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitated} {@creature carrion crawler}. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition paralyzed}. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Map of Shortcuts
entries: At rank 3, your map case becomes a common magic item. In addition to storing normal maps, your cartographer's map case can be used to generate a special map identifying a shortcut. You can use your action to make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, with a success revealing a map buried in your cartographer's map case noting a relevant shortcut. Your travel time is reduced by half while you follow that route. If you succeed at the check by 5 or more, the map includes notes on the terrain, granting you advantage on the next ability check you make to travel through the mapped area in the next hour. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Map of the Moment
entries: 从等级3开始，你可以使用一个行动来进行DC15智慧（{@skill Perception}）检查，并搜索你的制图师的地图箱，以找到一张与你当前任务相关的地图或启发一个新的任务。如果成功，你会找到一张有突出地标的地图。地图上有关于该地标一英里内的自然地形的信息。一旦你使用这个功能，在七天后的黎明前，你不能再使用它。

entries.caption: Possible Map Mission Landmarks
rows: 杰拉尔德-史密斯的古代石棺
一棵标有 "这棵树 "的树
"我富有的兄弟最后的安息之地，也是一个熊洞"
被称为 "轻微摇晃的尖顶 "的一系列山峰
在茫茫人海中，有一个不断流动的、非魔幻的纯净清澈的水龙头
充满了尖叫的生物发光虫的山洞
任何方向十英里范围内最闹鬼的森林
一堆巨大的岩石，视线范围内没有其他岩石

item.name: Cartographer's Tools
additionalEntries: Using cartographer's tools, you can create accurate maps to make travel easier for yourself and those who come after you. These maps can range from large-scale depictions of mountain ranges to diagrams that show the layout of a dungeon level.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 制图师的工具包括羽毛笔、墨水、羊皮纸、一副罗盘、卡尺和一把尺子。

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History, Religion
entries: 当你使用这些技能时，你可以利用你对地图和地点的知识来发掘更详细的信息。例如，你可以发现地图中隐藏的信息，确定地图的制作时间，以确定地理特征自那时起是否发生了变化，等等。

additionalEntries.name: Nature
entries: 你对自然地理的熟悉使你更容易回答问题或解决与你周围地形有关的问题。

additionalEntries.name: Survival
entries: 你对地理的理解使你更容易找到通往文明的道路，预测可能发现村庄或城镇的地区，并避免迷路。你已经研究了这么多地图，以至于常见的模式，如贸易路线如何演变，定居点在哪里出现与地理位置有关，你都很熟悉。

additionalEntries.name: Craft a Map
entries: 在旅行中，除了从事其他活动外，你可以边走边画地图。

additionalEntries.caption: Cartographer's Tools
rows: 确定地图的年龄和起源
估计方向和与地标的距离
识别地图是假的
填补地图上缺失的部分

item.name: Carved harp of exotic wood with ivory inlay and zircon gems
Cataclysm Bolts
entries: These steel {@item crossbow bolt|PHB|crossbow bolts} were first created by the Jaggenstrike Clan during the {@book Scattered War|TDCSR|1|The Scattered War}, and the secret to crafting them remains well guarded by the {@book Houses of Kraghammer|TDCSR|2|Houses of Kraghammer}. Cataclysm bolts are usually kept in sets of ten, though anyone who holds even one can feel it thrumming with magical power. When you hit with an attack using a cataclysm bolt, the attack deals normal damage. Then roll a {@dice d6} on the following table to determine its additional effect.

entries.caption: Cataclysm Bolt Effects
rows: The bolt explodes in a blast of fire, dealing {@damage 3d8} fire damage to the target and each creature within 5 feet of it.

The bolt freezes the air around the target into jagged ice. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or take {@damage 1d10} cold damage and be {@condition restrained} until the end of your next turn.

The bolt releases a pulse of necrotic energy. The target takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or be {@condition stunned} until the end of your next turn.
The bolt shatters to unleash a burst of shrapnel. Make six additional ranged attacks against the target, each of which has a {@hit 7} attack bonus and deals {@damage 1d6} piercing damage on a hit.

entries: Once the bolt hits, the enchantment ends and it becomes a normal piece of ammunition.

item.name: Catapult Munition
entries: 一种弹射弹药，大小和重量与炮弹差不多。
弹药可以被扔到30英尺以外，并在撞击时爆炸。在以撞击点为中心的15英尺半径范围内的任何生物都必须做一个DC14的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到35({@damage 10d6})的火焰伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。此外，该区域内每个没有被穿戴或携带的物体都会受到35({@damage 10d6})的火焰伤害。

item.name: Cauldron of Plenty
entries: 这个大锅是由厚厚的铜制成的，随着时间的推移已经变成绿色。它宽4英尺，口子直径3英尺半，重50磅，可容纳30加仑的液体。在其隆起的侧面压印着萨提尔和仙女的图像，她们正静静地拿着勺子。大锅有一个盖子，侧面有把手。它坐落在五个小爪子的脚上，使它不会翻倒。
如果把水倒入大锅并搅拌1分钟，就会变成丰盛的热炖品，每加仑可以为四个人提供一顿营养餐。炖品在大锅里时保持高温，取出后自然冷却。尽管炖肉很热，但大锅的外部仍然可以安全触摸。
大锅可以创造三次炖肉。然后它就停止运作，直到下一个黎明，它才会恢复所有的用途。

item.name: Cauldron of Rebirth
entries: This Tiny pot bears relief scenes of heroes on its cast iron sides. You can use the cauldron as a spellcasting focus for your spells, and it functions as a suitable component for the {@spell scrying} spell. When you finish a long rest, you can use the cauldron to create a {@item potion of greater healing}. The potion lasts for 24 hours, then loses its magic if not consumed.
作为一个行动，你可以使大锅变大，足以让一个中型生物蹲在里面。你可以通过行动使大锅恢复到正常大小，无害地将无法放入的东西分流到最近的无人空间。

If you place the corpse of a humanoid into the cauldron and cover the corpse with 200 pounds of salt (which costs 10 gp) for at least 8 hours, the salt is consumed and the creature returns to life as if by {@spell raise dead} at the next dawn. Once used, this property can't be used again for 7 days.

item.name: Censer of Controlling Air Elementals
entries: 当香在这个香炉中燃烧时，你可以用一个动作说出香炉的指令词，并召唤一个{@creature air elemental}，就像你施展了{@spell conjure elemental}的法术一样。在下一个黎明之前，该香炉不能再以这种方式使用。
这个6英寸宽、1英尺高的容器类似于一个带装饰盖的圣杯。它重达1磅。

item.name: Ceremonial electrum dagger with a black pearl in the pommel
Ceremonial silver dagger with gold pommel and black pearl (Legion of Dusk)
Chain (10 feet)
entries: 一条链子有10个打击点。它可以通过成功的DC20力量检查而爆裂。

item.name: Chalcedony
entries: 一种不透明的白色宝石。

item.name: Chancellor's Crest
entries: While wearing this amulet, you can read all writing, and speak and understand any language.

You can use an action to cast one of the following spells: {@spell detect thoughts}, {@spell sending}, or {@spell Rary's telepathic bond}. Once the amulet has been used to cast one of these spells, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. You can choose your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score as the spellcasting ability for casting these spells, and use your proficiency bonus to determine their attack bonus and saving throw DC.

entries.name: Crown Authority
entries: A character cannot attune to more than one Seal of Drakkenheim. Guardian constructs in Drakkenheim such as {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk|wall gargoyles} and {@creature tower dragon|DoDk|tower dragons} do not attack you while you are attuned to one of the Seals of Drakkenheim. An individual guardian ignores this effect for 24 hours if you attack it or cast a spell upon it.

As an action, you may present a Seal of Drakkenheim to rebuke the guardians. You make an opposed Charisma ability check against each {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk} or {@creature tower dragon|DoDk} that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you. If you win the contest, the creature is rebuked for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A rebuked creature doesn't move, and can't take actions or reactions. A creature who wins the contest is immune to your rebuke for 24 hours.

additionalEntries.name: Chariots
entries: 战车和拉动它们的生物的工作方式与受控坐骑一样，如{@book Player's Handbook|PHB|9|Mounted Combat}中的骑战规则所述，但有以下区别。

items: 装上或卸下战车需要花费你5英尺的移动距离，而不是相当于你速度一半的英尺数。
骑在战车上可以获得一半的掩护。
战车的速度等于拉动它的最慢生物的速度。
如果多个生物拉着战车，它们都在同一主动权上行动，而且它们在自己的回合中必须采取相同的行动。

item.name: Charlatan's Die
entries: 每当你掷出这个六面骰子时，你可以控制它掷出哪个数字。

item.name: Charm of Plant Command
entries: 这个拳头大小的吊饰是由一捆干枯的植物茎用银线缠绕而成的。挂在皮绳上，通常戴在脖子上或系在皮带上。

This charm has 3 charges. While you bear the charm, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell speak with plants} spell. For the duration of the spell, you also have advantage on Charisma checks made to influence the behavior, demeanor, and attitude of plants. The charm regains all expended charges at dawn each day.

entries.items: Each time you expend a charge from this wand, there is a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance that nothing happens and the charge is wasted.

item.name: Chest
entries: 一个箱子可以容纳12立方英尺或300磅的装备。

item.name: Chest of Preserving
entries: 食物和其他易腐物品在保鲜箱内不会老化或腐烂。箱子长2.5英尺，宽1.5英尺，高1英尺，有一个半桶的盖子。箱子有一把锁，可以用{@item thieves' tools|PHB}和成功的DC15灵巧检查来撬开它。砸碎锁或箱子的任何其他部分会使它失去魔力。

item.name: Chime of Opening
entries: 这个空心金属管长约1英尺，重1磅。你可以把它作为一个动作来敲击，把它指向你周围120英尺内可以打开的物体，如门、盖子或锁。报时器会发出清晰的音调，物体上的一个锁或插销就会打开，除非声音无法到达物体。如果没有锁或门闩，物体本身就会打开。
报时器可以使用十次。在第十次之后，它就会出现裂缝，变得毫无用处。

item.name: Chip of Creation
entries: 这块坚实的、手掌大小的岩石片是{@item Stone of Creation|AitFR-AVT}的一个小块，包含了它的一部分力量。

entries.name: Linked Room
entries: 根据{@spell demiplane}法术，每个创造芯片都与它自己的半平面房间有着千丝万缕的联系。只要这个芯片和创造之石都存在，这个房间就会存在。通往房间的门只有在使用{@spell demiplane}法术创造时才会存在，无论在施法时是否使用了创造之芯片。

entries.name: Demiplane
entries: While attuned to a chip of creation, you can cast {@spell demiplane} at will but only to reach the demiplanar room associated with that chip of creation or another demiplane that you know the nature and contents of, and only if the target demiplane was created by another piece of the {@item Stone of Creation|AitFR-AVT}.

entries.name: Destroying a Chip
entries: 创造的芯片本身就是一件神器，不受大多数伤害的影响，但是一个{@spell disintegrate}的咒语就足以摧毁它。在它被调整过一次后，一个芯片如果没有被调整过{@dice 1d4 + 1}天，就会变成一个惰性的、无力的岩石。
如果{@item Stone of Creation|AitFR-AVT}被摧毁，它的所有芯片都会打破调和，失去所有的魔法属性，并且链接的半平面房间会立刻停止存在。房间内的生物或物体会被瞬间驱逐到被摧毁的芯片附近。
如果它达到了混沌元素，或者被与混沌元素相适应的分叉的金属棒击中（如{@spell plane shift}法术），就会有一个芯片被摧毁。

item.name: Chronolometer
entries: 当你适应这个装置时，你有一个+1的智力救赎奖励。在你第一次与计时仪相调和时，你选择一种你不知道的语言。随后，当你与这个装置相适应时，你会知道这种语言。

entries.name: Time Bandit
entries: 在你的回合开始时，掷一个{@dice d6}（不需要行动）。在1-3时，你会减慢时间，在你的回合中获得一个额外的行动，并在回合结束前将你的速度加倍。在4-6时，你会在时间上前进，以警告自己将要发生的事情。下次你的蓄力、攻击卷或能力检查失败时，你可以重新进行检查，并接受其中一个结果。一旦你使用了计时仪的这一功能，在下一个黎明前就不能再使用了。

entries.name: Fate Swap
entries: 当你能看到的30英尺内的生物受到伤害时，作为反应，如果是该生物的回合，该生物会获得一个额外的行动，或者即使不是该生物的回合，也可以立即采取一个行动。一旦你使用了计时仪的这一特性，在下一个黎明之前不能再次使用。

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: 虽然这个组件没有安装在{@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}，但它的魔法可能会零星地发挥作用，或者有不可预知的副作用，这由DM决定。

item.name: Chrysoberyl
entries: 一种透明的黄绿色至淡绿色的宝石。

item.name: Chrysoprase
entries: 一种半透明的绿色宝石。

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Circlet of Barbed Vision reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: You have resistance to poison damage, and you are immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition.
Your ability to gain a bonus to an attack roll can be used twice between rests.

item.name: Circlet of Barbed Vision (Dormant)
item.reqAttune: by a creature of non-good alignment
entries: When you don this circlet of gnarled onyx, black barbs dig into your head, imparting power to you as the circlet twists your appearance to amuse {@deity The Spider Queen|Exandria|TDCSR}. The current resting place of the Circlet of Barbed Vision is unknown, but rumor has it that a spectral assassin known as {@creature Jourrael, the Caedogeist|TDCSR|the Inevitable End} seeks this relic.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While the Circlet of Barbed Vision is in a dormant state, you have {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on initiative rolls while you wear it, but your Charisma score decreases by 2. Your Charisma score returns to normal if you remove the circlet, but you take {@damage 4d6} psychic damage when you do so.

Additionally, when you make an attack roll, you can use your reaction to gain a +5 bonus to the roll. You make this choice after you see the roll, but before the GM says whether the attack hits or misses. You can't use this property again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Circlet of Barbed Vision reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: You are immune to poison damage.
You have {@sense truesight} out to a range of 60 feet.
Your ability to gain a bonus to an attack roll can be used three times between rests.

item.name: Circlet of Blasting
entries: 戴上这个环形物时，你可以用一个动作来用它施展{@spell scorching ray}的法术。当你进行该法术的攻击时，你会获得{@hit 5}的攻击奖励。在下一个黎明之前，这个环状物不能再以这种方式使用。

item.name: Circlet of Human Perfection
entries: 人类完美圆环将其佩戴者转变为一个具有吸引力的普通身高和体重的人。圆环选择形态的物理特征，如年龄、性别、皮肤颜色、头发颜色和声音。除了体型，佩戴者的统计数据和种族特征不会改变，佩戴者佩戴或携带的物品也不会改变。移除环形物后，效果结束。

item.name: Circlet of Wisdom
entries: {@note Worn by {@creature Keyleth, Voice of the Tempest|TDCSR}, increases her Wisdom score by +2.}

item.name: Citrine
entries: 一种透明的淡黄褐色宝石。

item.name: Claw of the Wyrm Rune
entries: 这只龙的爪子上覆盖着一层熔银，上面刻有wyrm（龙）的符文。这只爪子有以下特性。

entries.name: Wyrmslayer
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以将爪子指向你30英尺内的龙。然后，龙必须在DC15的宪法救赎中成功，否则就会获得对所有伤害类型的脆弱性，直到你的下一个回合结束。这个属性可以使用三次。在下一个黎明时分，爪子会重新获得所有已消耗的使用权。

entries.name: Wyrm Shield
entries: 当爪子显示在你身上时，你对任何龙的呼吸武器造成的伤害都有抵抗力。

entries.name: Wyrm Ward
entries: 你可以将爪子的魔力转移到一个地方，方法是用你的手指在地上描画巫妖符文。你所描画的点会成为一个球形魔法区域的中心，该区域的半径为100英尺，并被固定在该地方。转移需要8个小时的工作，需要爪子在你的5英尺范围内。在结束时，爪子被摧毁，而该区域获得以下属性。
当在100英尺半径的范围内，任何龙在救赎时都处于劣势，并且飞行速度不高于10英尺。

item.name: Claws of the Umber Hulk
entries: These heavy gauntlets of brown iron are forged in the shape of an {@creature umber hulk||umber hulk's} claws, and they fit the wearer's hands and forearms all the way up to the elbow. While wearing both claws, you gain a burrowing speed of 20 feet, and you can tunnel through solid rock at a rate of 1 foot per round.
你可以在佩戴时将爪子作为近战武器使用。你可以熟练地使用它，并且在击中时造成{@damage 1d8}的斩击伤害（你的力量修改器适用于攻击和伤害卷轴，如常）。
在佩戴爪子时，你不能操纵物体或施展带有体质成分的法术。

item.name: Cleansing Stone
entries: 净化石是一个直径1英尺的球体，上面刻有神秘的符号。当接触到石头时，你可以使用一个动作来激活它，并清除你衣服和你身上的污垢。
这样的石头经常被嵌在昂代尔公共广场的基座上，或者嵌在高端的加兰达旅馆里。

item.name: Climber's Kit
entries: 攀岩者的装备包括特殊的岩钉、靴尖、手套和安全带。你可以使用攀岩装备作为一个动作来固定自己；当你这样做时，你不能从你固定自己的地方跌落超过25英尺，而且你不能从该点爬出超过25英尺而不解除固定。

item.name: Cloak of Arachnida
entries: 这件精美的衣服是由黑色的丝绸与微弱的银色线交织而成。穿着它时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你对毒药伤害有抵抗力。
你的爬升速度等于你的步行速度。
你可以向上、向下、在垂直表面上移动，并沿着天花板倒立，同时让你的双手保持自由。
你不能被任何形式的网所困，并且可以像{@quickref difficult terrain||3}一样在网中移动。
你可以用一个动作来施展{@spell web}的法术（保存DC13）。咒语产生的网会填满其正常区域的两倍。一旦使用，斗篷的这一属性在下一个黎明前无法再次使用。

item.name: Cloak of Billowing
entries: 穿着这件斗篷时，你可以使用一个额外的动作来使它大幅飘动。

item.name: Cloak of Displacement
entries: 当你穿上这件斗篷时，它会投射出一个幻象，使你看起来是站在你实际位置附近的地方，导致任何生物在对你的攻击卷中处于不利地位。如果你受到伤害，该属性将停止作用，直到你下一回合开始。当你在{@condition incapacitated}、{@condition restrained}或无法移动时，这个属性会被抑制。

item.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
entries: 当你穿上这件斗篷时，用智慧（{@skill Perception}）检查看你是不利的，而用灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查隐藏是有利的，因为斗篷的颜色会改变来伪装你。拉起或放下头巾需要一个动作。

item.name: Cloak of Invisibility
entries: While wearing this cloak, you can pull its hood over your head to cause yourself to become {@condition invisible}. While you are {@condition invisible}, anything you are carrying or wearing is {@condition invisible} with you. You become visible when you cease wearing the hood. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.
从斗篷的最大持续时间2小时中扣除你的隐身时间，以1分钟为增量。使用2小时后，斗篷不再起作用。斗篷每不间断的使用12小时，就会恢复1小时的持续时间。

item.name: Cloak of Many Fashions
entries: 穿着这件斗篷时，你可以使用一个额外动作来改变衣服的样式、颜色和明显的质量。斗篷的重量不会改变。不管它的外观如何，这件斗篷除了是一件斗篷外，不可能是任何东西。虽然它可以复制其他魔法斗篷的外观，但它不会获得它们的魔法属性。

item.name: Cloak of Protection
entries: 当你穿上这件斗篷的时候，你获得了一个+1的额外AC和拯救动作的奖励。

item.name: Cloak of the Bat
entries: While wearing this cloak, you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks. In an area of dim light or darkness, you can grip the edges of the cloak with both hands and use it to fly at a speed of 40 feet. If you ever fail to grip the cloak's edges while flying in this way, or if you are no longer in dim light or darkness, you lose this flying speed.

While wearing the cloak in an area of dim light or darkness, you can use your action to cast {@spell polymorph} on yourself, transforming into a {@creature bat}. While you are in the form of the {@creature bat}, you retain your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. The cloak can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

item.name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
entries: 当穿着这件斗篷的头巾时，你可以在水下呼吸，而且你的游泳速度为60英尺。拉起或放下头巾需要一个动作。

item.name: Clockwork Amulet
entries: 这个铜制护身符包含微小的互锁齿轮，由来自Mechanus的魔法驱动，Mechanus是一个可预测的钟表平面。将耳朵贴在护身符上的生物可以听到里面传来的微弱的滴答声和呼呼声。
当你戴着护身符做攻击卷时，你可以放弃掷出{@dice d20}，在模具上得到10。一旦使用，这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Clockwork Dog
entries: 这只由铜和锡制成的小发条狗配有一把铜制的发条钥匙。作为一个动作，你可以用钥匙给狗上发条，之后它将跟随你12小时。在该时间结束时，发条狗会停止，直到再次上弦。这只狗有5点攻击力，1点命中率，行走速度为30英尺。

item.name: Clothes of Mending
entries: 这套优雅的旅行者服装可以神奇地自我修复，以抵消日常的磨损和撕裂。衣服上被破坏的部分不能以这种方式修复。

item.name: Clothing, cold weather
entries: 这套装备包括一件厚重的毛皮大衣或斗篷，套在多层羊毛衣服上，以及一顶毛皮帽子或兜帽，护目镜和毛皮靴子和手套。
As long as cold weather clothing remains dry, its wearer automatically succeeds on saving throws against the effects of {@hazard extreme cold}.

item.name: Coat of Lies
entries: This coat made of the severed tongues of a {@creature Harvester of Lies|GHLoE|harvester}'s victims provides a +1 bonus to your AC, and you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) checks.

Additionally, as a bonus action three times per day, you can activate the magic of the cloak. If you do, the next spell you cast before the start of your next turn can be cast without any somatic or verbal components.

item.name: Coat of the Crest
entries: This exquisite brocade coat is cut in a long, high-collared style popular among nobles of the Clovis Concord—a nation on the west coast of {@book Wildemount|TDCSR|3|Wildemount} whose stylish fashion is often mimicked in Tal'Dorei. Its shimmering lining hints at its magical properties. You gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this coat, which can be worn over light armor.

Additionally, the coat has 3 charges and regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. When you are the target of an attack while wearing this coat, you can spend 1 charge as a reaction to gain resistance to one type of damage from the triggering attack. This resistance is effective against the triggering attack and lasts until the start of your next turn.

item.name: Cobbler's Tools
additionalEntries: Although the cobbler's trade might seem too humble for an adventurer, a good pair of boots will see a character across rugged wilderness and through deadly dungeons.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 鞋匠的工具包括一把锤子、一把锥子、一把刀、一个鞋架、一把切割器、备用皮革和线。

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History
entries: 你对鞋子的了解可以帮助你识别被施了魔法的靴子的魔法属性或这类物品的历史。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: 鞋类拥有令人惊讶的秘密。你可以通过检查鞋子上的磨损和积累的污垢了解某人最近去过的地方。你在修鞋方面的经验使你更容易识别损坏可能来自哪里。

additionalEntries.name: Maintain Shoes
entries: As part of a long rest, you can repair your companions' shoes. For the next 24 hours, up to six creatures of your choice who wear shoes you worked on can travel up to 10 hours a day without making saving throws to avoid {@condition exhaustion}.

additionalEntries.name: Craft Hidden Compartment
entries: With 8 hours of work, you can add a hidden compartment to a pair of shoes. The compartment can hold an object up to 3 inches long and 1 inch wide and deep. You make an Intelligence check using your tool proficiency to determine the Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check DC needed to find the compartment.

additionalEntries.caption: Cobbler's Tools
rows: 确定一只鞋的年龄和来源
在靴子的鞋跟处找到一个隐藏的隔间

item.name: Coiling Grasp Tattoo
entries: 这种神奇的纹身由特殊的针制作而成，有长长的交织图案。

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: 为了适应这个项目，你把针放在你希望出现纹身的皮肤上，在整个适应过程中按下针。当调和完成后，针会变成墨水，成为纹身，出现在皮肤上。
如果你对纹身的调和结束，纹身就会消失，而针会重新出现在你的空间。

entries.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: While the tattoo is on your skin, you can, as an action, cause the tattoo to extrude into inky tendrils, which reach for a creature you can see within 15 feet of you. The creature must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} force damage and be {@condition grappled} by you. As an action, the creature can escape the grapple by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. The grapple also ends if you halt it (no action required), if the creature is ever more than 15 feet away from you, or if you use this tattoo on a different creature.

item.name: Coin of Decisionry
entries: 从等级2开始，你的决定性硬币会变成一个普通的魔法物品。当你翻转硬币时，它总是以收购公司的标志朝下落地，并且在 "反面 "上出现一条信息。在下面的表格中掷出{@dice d4}来决定该信息。

rows: 有利可图
品牌吸引力
不确定的
毁灭的

entries: The coin has absolutely no divination abilities, and its results when you use it are random. But nobody else knows that. When a creature within 10 feet of you flips the coin (after having had its powerful prognostication powers dutifully explained), you can exert your will to control its operation as a bonus action, choosing the result that appears after it lands as a means of gently coercing the user toward a specific course of action. The creature flipping the coin can detect your manipulation with a successful DC 13 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

entries.name: Better Odds
entries: When you reach rank 3, your coin of decisionry gains a measure of actual divination power and becomes an uncommon magic item. In addition to its normal function, you can use an action to flip the coin of decisionry twice while pondering a specific plan or objective, noting both random results. If you succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check, you learn which of the two results is more applicable to the course of action. This property of the coin can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Coin of Delving
entries: 这枚闪烁的铜币在5英尺的范围内发出昏暗的光。如果掉落的距离超过5英尺，铜币碰到表面时会发出悠扬的响声。任何能听到铃声的生物都能根据音调来判断硬币掉落的距离。

item.name: Cold Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Comet Card
entries: As an action, you can hold this card aloft and call down a fiery meteor to a point you can see within 120 feet of yourself. Each creature within a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 6d6} bludgeoning damage and {@damage 6d6} fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Common Glamerweave
entries: Glamerweave是被灌注了无害的虚幻魔法的衣服。当你穿着这些衣服的普通版本时，你可以使用一个额外的动作在布内创造一个移动的虚幻图案。

item.name: Component Pouch
entries: 元素袋是一个不漏水的小皮带袋，里面有一些隔间，可以容纳你施法所需的所有材料成分和其他特殊物品，但那些有特定费用的成分除外（如在法术描述中标明）。

item.name: Concertina
entries: 手风琴是一种不太迷人的手风琴。
除了敲出杀手波尔卡，演奏协奏曲的生物还可以使用一个动作，使一个直径30英尺、深6英寸的雾或水区域结成冰。
一旦使用，协奏曲的这一功能在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

Any creatures touching the floor must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the ice. As an action, a {@condition restrained} creature can attempt to free itself or another creature within its reach from the ice, doing so with a successful DC 20 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. A character freed from the ice is no longer {@condition restrained} by it. The ice melts in an hour.

item.name: Conch of Safe Rest
entries: 你可以用一个动作来吹这个珍珠色的海螺，就像{@item horn|PHB}一样，创造一个与{@spell Leomund's tiny hut}法术相同的效果。一旦法术生效，海螺就会消失。如果你离开咒语的范围，效果就会结束。

item.name: Conch of Teleportation
entries: 这件物品是一个普通的海螺壳，尽管相当大，但却被刻上了uvar符文。该海螺长2.5英尺，重20磅。
作为一个动作，你可以通过向外壳吹气来施展{@spell teleport}法术。目的地是固定的，而且没有任何误伤或咒语偏离目标的可能性。任何被海螺传送的人都会出现在物品创造者在海螺上刻下uvar符文时指定的特定地点。它不允许传送到任何其他目的地。一旦它的咒语被施放，海螺就不能再被使用，直到下一个黎明。

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When Condemner reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+2。
The extra poison damage dealt by the weapon increases to {@dice 1d6}.
You gain an additional effect that can be triggered in place of dealing damage when you hit with an attack:
You cast {@spell hold person} on the target (save {@dc 15}).
This effect can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

item.name: Condemner (Dormant)
entries: This shadow-touched {@item heavy crossbow|phb} once served as the weapon of choice for the legendary assassin Todora. Though few know this, Condemner is now in the possession of an equally infamous assassin named {@book Ixrattu Khar|TDCSR|2|Ixrattu Khar}.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: When Condemner is in a dormant state, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d4} poison damage.
Additionally, if you hit with an attack using this weapon, you can activate one of the following effects instead of dealing damage:

items: You cast {@spell fog cloud} centered on the target's space.
You cast {@spell silence} centered on the target's space.

entries: When an effect is used, it can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When Condemner reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+3。
The extra poison damage dealt by the weapon increases to {@dice 1d8}.
The save DC for the weapon's hold person spell increases to 17.
You gain an additional effect that can be triggered in place of damage when you hit with an attack:
You cast the {@spell blight} spell on the target (save {@dc 17}).

entries: This effect can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

item.name: Condensed Order
entries: Condensed Order is a silvery powder that can be extracted from those of a lawful persuasion. Devils bound for the warfronts of Avernus take flasks and snuff boxes of the stuff to fortify themselves against exposure to the raw chaos of demons. Taking the substance requires an action and makes you immune to the flesh warping feature of demonic ichor. It also gives you advantage on saving throws against any effect from a demonic source. These benefits last for 8 hours.

item.name: Constantori's Portrait
entries: This painting by famed artist Dkesii Kwan depicts Constantori, a beautiful courtier, who was paid a staggering sum to be Dkesii's model. Whether Constantori's actual appearance matches the painting remains a subject of debate. The portrait is one of several paintings commissioned by the late Daiyani Grysthorn, a crime lord who frequently gave magical paintings as gifts to her most esteemed associates.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Constantori's Portrait is a sentient, lawful evil item with an Intelligence score of 14, a Wisdom score of 12, and a Charisma score of 8. It can hear within a range of 120 feet and has {@sense darkvision} within a range of 60 feet, but it can't see anything behind itself.

The painting can converse in Common, Draconic, and Elvish as if it were a living person, though Constantori's mouth doesn't move. Whenever conversation occurs within the portrait's auditory range, the painting eagerly gathers secrets, the names of secret tellers, significant events, or any political conversations.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Constantori's Portrait is demanding, condescending, and vain. It doesn't like being covered or placed out of sight, and it loudly condemns anyone who tries to remove it from its gold-leaf frame.

entries.name: Wealth of Information
entries: The painting's primary purpose is to observe and recall conversations. Over the past few decades, Constantori's Portrait has quietly observed countless conversations and now possesses an unquantifiable amount of lore—everything from criminal conspiracies to secret passwords. The DM decides what the painting knows and what it doesn't.

While attuned to the painting, you can take an action to telepathically contact it over any distance, provided you and the painting are on the same plane of existence. The painting can't telepathically contact you, however. Maintaining telepathic contact with the painting requires your {@status concentration} (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

entries.name: Guardian Portrait
entries: While you are attuned to the painting, you can command it to guard its location against one or more creatures you identify as the painting's enemies. The painting performs this function until you command it to stop or until your attunement to the painting ends.

The painting has 3 charges. When a creature the painting identifies as its enemy starts its turn in a space the painting can see, the painting expends 1 of its charges to cast {@spell magic missile} (3 missiles), targeting that creature. The painting regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
这幅画是一个小型物体，AC值为12，命中率为20，对毒药伤害免疫。在其金箔框架中，这幅画有15磅重。如果这幅画至少有1个命中点，并且被一个{@spell mending}的法术所攻击，它就会恢复{@dice 2d6}的命中点，如果没有的话。

item.name: Cook's Utensils
additionalEntries: Adventuring is a hard life. With a cook along on the journey, your meals will be much better than the typical mix of hardtack and dried fruit.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 厨师的用具包括一个金属锅、刀、叉、搅拌勺和勺子。

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: 你对烹饪技术的了解使你能够评估一种文化的饮食习惯中所涉及的社会模式。

additionalEntries.name: Medicine
entries: 在进行治疗时，你可以将苦味或酸味的药物转化为令人愉悦的调料。

additionalEntries.name: Survival
entries: 觅食时，你可以用你搜刮到的、别人无法转化为营养餐的原料来做。

additionalEntries.name: Prepare Meals
entries: 作为短暂休息的一部分，你可以准备一顿美味的食物，帮助你的同伴们恢复体力。你和你选择的最多五个生物在短暂休息期间每消耗一个命中率就能恢复一个额外的命中率，前提是你能使用你的厨具和足够的食物。

additionalEntries.caption: Cook's Utensils
rows: 创建一个典型的膳食
复制一餐
发现食物中的毒物或杂质
创造一个美食餐

item.name: Copper (cp)
entries: 普通硬币根据其制成的金属的相对价值，有几种不同的面值。最常见的三种硬币是金币（gp）、银币（sp）和铜币（cp）。
用一个金币，一个角色可以买一个腰包，50英尺的好绳子，或者一只山羊。一个熟练的（但不是特殊的）工匠每天可以赚取一块金币。金币是衡量财富的标准单位，即使钱币本身并不常用。当商人讨论涉及价值数百或数千金币的商品或服务的交易时，交易通常不涉及单个金币的交换。相反，金币是一种标准的价值衡量标准，实际的交换是以金条、信用证或有价值的货物进行的。
一块金币价值十块银币，是平民中最普遍的硬币。一枚银币可以买到一个工人一天的工作，一壶灯油，或者在一个贫穷的旅馆里休息一晚。
一块银币值十个铜币，这在劳动者和乞丐中很常见。一个铜块可以买到一支蜡烛、一个火把或一支粉笔。
此外，由其他贵金属制成的不寻常的硬币有时会出现在宝藏中。电子币（ep）和铂金币（pp）起源于没落的帝国和失落的王国，它们在交易中使用时有时会引起怀疑和疑虑。一块银币价值5个银币，一块铂金价值10个金币。
一枚标准硬币的重量约为一盎司的三分之一，因此50枚硬币的重量为一磅。

item.name: Copper Dragon Scale Mail
entries: 龙鳞邮件是由一种龙的鳞片制成的。有时，龙会收集它们遗弃的鳞片并将它们赠送给人类。其他时候，猎人会小心翼翼地剥下死龙的皮并加以保存。在这两种情况下，龙鳞甲都有很高的价值。当你穿上这件盔甲时，你将获得+1的攻击力加成，在面对龙的恐怖存在和呼吸武器时，你将有优势，并且你对酸性伤害有抵抗力。
此外，你可以集中你的感官作为一个行动，以魔法方式辨别距离你30英里内最近的铜龙的距离和方向。这个特殊动作在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Copper stein with silver filigree (Brazen Coalition)
Coral
entries: 一种不透明的深红色宝石。

item.name: Corecut Dagger
entries: This dark metal blade bends in a wicked, hooked curve. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, you can spend 1 Hit Die to deal an extra {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This weapon is cursed, a fact that is revealed only when an {@spell identify} spell is cast on the weapon or you attune to it. Attuning to the dagger curses you until you are targeted by the {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic; disposing of the dagger fails to end the curse. While cursed, whenever you receive magical healing, you must spend 1 Hit Die to regain any hit points. If you spend all your Hit Dice at any point, you die.

item.name: Cracked Driftglobe
entries: This small sphere of thick glass weighs 1 pound. If you are within 60 feet of it, you can speak its command word and cause it to emanate the {@spell light} spell.

item.name: Crampons
entries: 板鞋是一块带刺的金属板，绑在靴子的底部。穿着板鞋的生物在穿越{@hazard slippery ice}时不会跌倒{@condition prone}。

item.name: Crook of Rao
entries: 很久以前，宁静的拉奥神创造了一个工具，以保护他的新生信徒免受下层世界的邪恶之害。然而，随着岁月的流逝，凡人开发了他们自己的方法来处理存在的威胁，这把钩子基本上被遗忘了。不过，在最近的年代里，拉奥的钩子被重新发现，并被用来对付巫婆女王伊格威夫（巫师塔莎的名字之一）的崛起。虽然她被打败了，但伊格威夫在战斗中设法损坏了羊角，使其感染了一个阴险的诅咒--以及未来胜利的可能性。事后，这把钩子再次丢失。偶尔它也会重新出现，但这个著名的神器已经不是原来的样子了。无论神器的持有者是否意识到它的全部威胁，很少有人冒险使用拉奥古克--可能是最后一次。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The artifact has the following random properties, which you can determine by rolling on the tables in the "Artifacts" section of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial}属性
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} 财产
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} 财产

entries.name: Spells
entries: 这把钩子有6个电荷。在持有它的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个或多个电荷，从它身上施放以下一个法术（保存DC18）。{@spell aura of life} (2个电荷), {@spell aura of purity} (2个电荷), {@spell banishment} (1个电荷), {@spell beacon of hope} (1个电荷), {@spell mass cure wounds} (3个电荷) 。骗子每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6}已消耗的费用。

entries.name: Absolute Banishment
entries: 当你与这把钩子相合并持有它时，你可以花10分钟时间驱逐你周围1英里内除最强大的魔物外的所有魔物。任何挑战等级为19或更高的魔物都不会受到影响。每个被放逐的魔物都会被送回它的主位面，并且在100年内不能再回到被Crook of Rao放逐的位面。

entries.name: Failing Matrix
entries: 每当饶舌者的绝对放逐属性被使用时，或者当它的最后一次充能被消耗时，在星外反转表上滚动。任何因这个效果而产生的生物都会出现在你周围60英尺内随机的无人空间，并且不受你控制。

entries.name: Iggwilv's Curse
entries: When the Crook was last used against Iggwilv, the Witch Queen lashed out at the artifact, infecting its magical matrix. Over the years, this curse has spread within the crook, threatening to violently pervert its ancient magic. If this occurs, the Crook of Rao, as it is currently known, is destroyed, its magical matrix inverting and exploding into a 50-foot-diameter portal. This portal functions as a permanent {@spell gate} spell cast by Iggwilv. The gate then, once per round on initiative count 20, audibly speaks a fiend's name in Iggwilv's voice, doing so until the gate calls on every fiend ever banished by the Crook of Rao. If the fiend still exists, it is drawn through the gate. This process takes eighteen years to complete, at the end of which the gate becomes a permanent portal to Pazunia, the first layer of the Abyss.

entries.caption: Extraplanar Reversal
rows: 一个通往随机平面的传送门打开。5分钟后，传送门关闭。
{@dice 2d4} {@creature imp||imps}和{@dice 2d4} {@creature quasit||quasits}出现。
{@dice 1d8} {@creature succubus||succubi}/{@creature incubus||incubi}出现。
{@dice 1d10} {@creature barbed devil||barbed devils}和{@dice 1d10} {@creature vrock||vrocks}出现。
1 {@creature arcanaloth}, 1 {@creature night hag}, and 1 {@creature rakshasa} appear.
1 {@creature ice devil} and 1 {@creature marilith} appear.
1 {@creature balor} and 1 {@creature pit fiend} appear. At the DM's discretion, a portal opens into the presence of an archdevil or demon lord instead, then closes after 5 minutes.
Iggwilv的诅咒（见Iggwilv的诅咒属性）。

entries.name: Destroying or Repairing the Crook
entries: 饶舌者可以被摧毁，也可以通过前往天神山，从永恒宁静的饶舌者那里获得一滴眼泪来修复。让这个没有感情的神哭泣的方法之一是让拉奥与他的第一个崇拜者的灵魂重聚，这个崇拜者很久以前就在寻求多元宇宙之外的启示。如果在神的眼泪中浸泡一年零一天，克鲁克就会溶解。如果每天在神的眼泪中清洗30天，Crook将失去其失败矩阵的特性。

item.name: Crossbow Bolt Case
entries: 这个木箱可以容纳二十个{@item crossbow bolt|phb|crossbow bolts}。

item.name: Crowbar
entries: 使用撬棍时，在可以运用撬棍的杠杆作用的地方，对力量检查有优势。

item.name: Crown of the Forest
entries: 当戴上这个冠冕时，一个角色为了看穿一个幻象而进行的任何智力（{@skill Investigation}）检查都会自动失败。一个被触及的幻象仍然会显示出它的真实性质。然而，戴着王冠的人物有一种强烈的感觉，认为幻觉是真实的，以至于他们可能不知道该相信哪种感官。

If this crown is closely examined by a character who succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Nature}) or Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, or with a {@spell detect magic} spell cast using a 3rd-level or higher spell slot, the nature of its magic is discovered.

item.name: Crown of the Wrath Bringer
entries: This jagged iron circlet bears ornaments in the shape of the enemy rune. When worn, the crown glows with pale light as it draws upon the wearer's fury to strike opponents with vicious terror.

When you make an attack roll against a creature and hit it while wearing this crown, you can spend and roll one of your unspent Hit Dice. The creature takes extra psychic damage equal to the number rolled.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: As an action, you can invoke the crown's rune to cast the {@spell fear} spell (save DC 15) with it; the spell has a duration of 1 minute and doesn't require {@status concentration}. Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Crown of Westemär
entries: A character may only attune to the Crown of Westemär by performing a special one hour ceremony with six other characters who are each attuned to a different Seal of Drakkenheim. See the "Developments" section in Chapter 9: Castle Drakken for details on this ritual.
The crown has 3 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast the {@spell wish} spell from it. The crown regains one expended charge every ten years.

The {@creature ancient bronze dragon} Minazorond, the {@creature tower dragon|DoDk|tower dragons}, and the {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk|wall gargoyles} are under your control and obey your spoken commands while you wear the crown.

While wearing the crown and seated on the Throne of Drakkenheim in Castle Drakken, you may use an action to communicate telepathically with one dragon or twelve gargoyles so long as they are within 100 miles of Castle Drakken. When you do, you can issue commands to those creatures, see through one of the creature's eyes, and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the creature has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

entries.name: Crown Authority
entries: A character cannot attune to more than one Seal of Drakkenheim. Guardian constructs in Drakkenheim such as {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk|wall gargoyles} and {@creature tower dragon|DoDk|tower dragons} do not attack you while you are attuned to one of the Seals of Drakkenheim. An individual guardian ignores this effect for 24 hours if you attack it or cast a spell upon it.

As an action, you may present a Seal of Drakkenheim to rebuke the guardians. You make an opposed Charisma ability check against each {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk} or {@creature tower dragon|DoDk} that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you. If you win the contest, the creature is rebuked for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A rebuked creature doesn't move, and can't take actions or reactions. A creature who wins the contest is immune to your rebuke for 24 hours.

item.name: Crown of Whirling Comets
entries: This delicate silver tiara is decorated with stellar iconography. While you wear the crown, the gems on the tiara's points detach and closely orbit your head.
The crown has 6 charges for the following properties, which you can use while wearing the crown:

items.name: Star Flight
entries: As a bonus action, you can spend 1 charge to gain the power of flight for 10 minutes. For the duration, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed, and you can hover. While flying, you glow faintly with starlight.

items.name: Starlight Strike
entries: As an action, you can spend any number of charges to launch bolts of frigid starlight. You launch a number of bolts equal to the number of charges spent, and you can direct the bolts to target one creature or several, so long as all creatures are within 120 feet of you and you can see them. The bolts automatically strike their targets, and each bolt deals {@damage 2d4} cold damage.

items.name: Whirling Hail
entries: As an action, you can spend 3 charges and cast the {@spell Ice Storm} spell (save DC 16).
The crown regains {@dice 1d6} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Crystal Ball
entries: This crystal ball is about 6 inches in diameter. While touching it, you can cast the {@spell scrying} spell (save DC 17) with it.

item.name: Crystal Ball of Mind Reading
entries: This {@item crystal ball} is about 6 inches in diameter. While touching it, you can cast the {@spell scrying} spell (save DC 17) with it.

You can use an action to cast the {@spell detect thoughts} spell (save DC 17) while you are {@spell scrying} with the {@item crystal ball}, targeting creatures you can see within 30 feet of the spell's sensor. You don't need to concentrate on this {@spell detect thoughts} to maintain it during its duration, but it ends if {@spell scrying} ends.

item.name: Crystal Ball of Telepathy
entries: This {@item crystal ball} is about 6 inches in diameter. While touching it, you can cast the {@spell scrying} spell (save DC 17) with it.

While {@spell scrying} with the {@item crystal ball}, you can communicate telepathically with creatures you can see within 30 feet of the spell's sensor. You can also use an action to cast the {@spell suggestion} spell (save DC 17) through the sensor on one of those creatures. You don't need to concentrate on this suggestion to maintain it during its duration, but it ends if {@spell scrying} ends. Once used, the suggestion power of the {@item crystal ball} can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Crystal Ball of True Seeing
entries: This {@item crystal ball} is about 6 inches in diameter. While touching it, you can cast the {@spell scrying} spell (save DC 17) with it.
在使用{@item crystal ball}的时候，你有{@sense truesight}，半径为120英尺，以法术的传感器为中心。

item.name: Crystalline Chronicle
entries: 一个柚子大小的蚀刻水晶球发出微弱的嗡嗡声，并伴随着不规则的内部光线的闪烁而跳动。当你触摸水晶时，你可以以阅读和写作的速度在水晶内检索和储存信息和咒语。当被发现时，水晶包含以下法术。{@spell detect thoughts}, {@spell intellect fortress|TCE}, {@spell Rary's telepathic bond}, {@spell sending}, {@spell telekinesis}, {@spell Tasha's mind whip|TCE}, 和{@spell Tenser's floating disk}。它的功能是为你提供一本法术书，其中的法术和其他文字都是精神编码的。

While you are holding the crystal, you can use it as a spellcasting focus for your wizard spells, and you know the {@spell mage hand}, {@spell mind sliver|TCE} (appears in this book), and {@spell message} cantrips if you don't already know them.
水晶有3个电荷，每天黎明时分可以恢复{@dice 1d3}已消耗的电荷。在持有它的时候，你可以通过以下方式使用电荷。

items: 如果你花1分钟研究水晶内的信息，你可以花费1个电荷，用书中不同的法术替换你准备的一个巫师法术。
当你施展巫师法术时，你可以消耗1个电荷来施展没有语言、身体或物质成分的法术，价值不超过100gp。

item.name: Cube of Force
entries: This cube is about an inch across. Each face has a distinct marking on it that can be pressed. The cube starts with 36 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d20} expended charges daily at dawn.

你可以使用一个动作来按下立方体的一个面，根据所选择的面消耗一定数量的电荷，如力之立方体面表所示。每个面都有不同的效果。如果立方体的剩余电量不足，就不会发生任何事情。否则，一个由{@condition invisible}力组成的屏障就会出现，形成一个边长为15英尺的立方体。屏障以你为中心，与你一起移动，并持续1分钟，直到你使用动作按下立方体的第六个面，或者立方体的电荷用尽。你可以通过按压立方体的不同面来改变屏障的效果，并消耗必要的电量，重新设定持续时间。如果你的移动导致屏障接触到一个不能通过立方体的固体物体，只要屏障还在，你就不能再靠近那个物体了。

entries.caption: Cube of Force Faces
rows: 气体、风和雾都不能通过屏障。
非生物物质不能通过屏障。墙壁、地板和天花板可以通过，由你决定。
生物物质不能通过屏障。
法术效果不能通过屏障。
没有东西可以通过屏障。墙壁、地板和天花板可以通过，由你决定。
屏障停用。

entries: 当屏障被某些法术瞄准或接触到某些法术或魔法物品的效果时，立方体会失去电荷，如下表所示。

rows: {@spell Disintegrate}
{@dice 1d12}
{@item Horn of blasting}
{@dice 1d10}
{@spell Passwall}
{@dice 1d6}
{@spell Prismatic spray}
{@dice 1d20}
{@spell Wall of fire}
{@dice 1d4}

item.name: Cubic Gate
entries: 这个立方体有3英寸宽，散发着可触摸的魔法能量。立方体的六个面分别与一个不同的存在平面相连，其中一个是物质平面。其他的面则与DM决定的平面相连。

You can use an action to press one side of the cube to cast the {@spell gate} spell with it, opening a portal to the plane keyed to that side. Alternatively, if you use an action to press one side twice, you can cast the {@spell plane shift} spell (save DC 17) with the cube and transport the targets to the plane keyed to that side.
这个立方体有3个电荷。每次使用魔方都要消耗1个电荷。魔方每天在黎明时分会重新获得{@dice 1d3}已消耗的电荷。

item.name: Cuddly Strixhaven Mascot
entries: 这个柔软的、微小的、神奇的玩具代表了Strixhaven的吉祥物之一，是拥抱的最佳选择。如果你把它按在你的手臂、肩膀或腿上作为一个动作，这个玩具会保持在那里1小时，或者直到你用一个动作把它拿开。

The toy can also be used to fight off fear. When you make a saving throw to avoid or end the {@condition frightened} condition on yourself, you can give yourself advantage on the roll if the toy is on your person. You must decide to do so before rolling the {@dice d20}. If the save succeeds, you can't use the toy in this way until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Cursed Luckstone
entries: 这块扁平的灰黑色河石上刻着一个未知的奥术符号，摸起来很凉。在携带这块石头时，你可以在你选择的一项能力检查中获得优势。在下一个黎明之前，这块石头不能再被这样使用。

entries.name: Curse
entries: 这个物品是被诅咒的。与它相配会使你受到诅咒，直到你被一个{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法击中。只要你还被诅咒，你就不能丢弃这块石头，它会立即传送回你的口袋或背包中。在你使用石头的魔法后，你接下来的两次能力检查都是以劣势进行的。

item.name: Daern's Instant Fortress
entries: 你可以使用一个动作将这个1英寸的金属立方体放在地上，并说出它的命令语。这个立方体会迅速成长为一个堡垒，直到你使用行动说出命令语将其解散，这只在堡垒是空的情况下有效。
该堡垒是一个方形的塔，边长20英尺，高30英尺，四面都有箭缝，顶部有一个垛口。它的内部被分为两层。有一个梯子沿着一面墙连接它们。梯子的尽头是一个通往屋顶的活板门。激活后，塔楼在面对你的一侧有一扇小门。这扇门只有在你的命令下才会打开，你可以把它作为一个额外的动作说出来。它对{@spell knock}法术和类似的魔法免疫，例如{@item chime of opening}的魔法。
堡垒出现的区域内的每个生物都必须做一个DC15的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到{@damage 10d10}的打击伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。在任何一种情况下，该生物都会被推到堡垒外面但旁边的一个无人空间。该区域内没有被穿戴或携带的物体会受到这种伤害并被自动推到。
这座塔是由金刚砂制成的，它的魔法可以防止它被翻倒。屋顶、门和墙都有100点命中率，对除攻城武器以外的非魔法武器的伤害免疫，并对所有其他伤害有抵抗力。只有{@spell wish}的法术可以修复堡垒（这种法术的使用算作复制8级或以下的法术）。每次施展{@spell wish}会使屋顶、门或一面墙重新获得50点命中率。

item.name: Dagger of Blindsight
entries: 这个稀有的魔法物品需要调和。与之相适应的生物在30英尺范围内获得{@sense blindsight}。匕首有一个锯齿状的边缘，鞍座上嵌有一颗黑色的珍珠。

item.name: Dagger of Denial
entries: This silver stiletto blade bears intricate grooves that spiral from its tip to its ivory hilt and handle. You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

As an action, you can place the point of the blade into any keyhole and seal it shut. A keyhole sealed in this way can't be unlocked until this dagger is placed into that keyhole once more (though a sealed door or container can still be broken, bypassing the lock). Sealing a keyhole unseals any keyholes previously sealed with this weapon.

item.name: Dagger of Guitar Solos
entries: 这把乌鸦制造的匕首上有银色的网状花纹装饰。当它被击打或用来打击敌人时，会神奇地弹出一段吉他独奏的片段。

item.name: Dagger of Venom
entries: 你在使用该魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。
你可以使用一个动作来使厚重的黑色毒药覆盖在刀刃上。这种毒药会持续1分钟，或者直到使用此武器的攻击击中一个生物。该生物必须在DC15宪法救赎中成功，否则会受到{@damage 2d10}的毒药伤害，并在1分钟内变得{@condition poisoned}。匕首不能再以这种方式使用，直到下一个黎明。

item.name: Damselfly Ship
entries: 这艘迅速但狭窄的船主要由金属制成。它不能漂浮在水面上，但它的腿使它能够安全地降落在地面上。在机翼后面有一个滑动的舱门，可以进入该船的锰炮塔。这艘船的货舱可以很容易地被改造成船员舱或另一个武器甲板。
Damselfly船通常被用作信使船和装甲运输船。探险家和海盗喜欢它们，因为它们快速而坚固。军事领导人出于同样的原因将它们作为指挥舰。
豆娘船主是个骄傲的人，他们喜欢把自己的船涂成五颜六色的图案，并为自己的船定制特殊的设备。豆娘船主的大型私人聚会并不罕见；他们利用这些聚会来炫耀他们的船，并在小行星带和其他障碍物中相互竞赛，以获得奖励或吹嘘的权利。

item.name: Dancing Monkey Fruit
entries: This rare magical fruit produces enough juice to fill a vial. Any humanoid that eats a dancing monkey fruit or drinks its juice must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or begin a comic dance that lasts for 1 minute. Humanoids that can't be {@condition poisoned} are immune to this magical effect.

The dancer must use all its movement to dance without leaving its space and has disadvantage on attack rolls and Dexterity saving throws, and other creatures have advantage on attack rolls against it. Each time it takes damage, the dancer can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. When the dancing effect ends, the humanoid suffers the {@condition poisoned} condition for 1 hour.

items.name: Awakened
entries: 当达诺特的面罩达到觉醒状态时，它将获得以下属性。

items: You see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects within 60 feet of you as if they were visible, and you can see into the Ethereal Plane. Ethereal creatures and objects appear ghostly and translucent.

As a bonus action, you can speak a command word and use the goggles to see into and through solid matter. This vision has a radius of 60 feet and lasts for 1 minute. To you, solid objects within that radius appear transparent. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, or up to 3 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block the vision, as does a thin sheet of lead. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

As a bonus action, you can speak a command word to switch the goggles into spyglass mode. While in this mode, creatures and objects viewed through the goggles are magnified to twice their size. Speaking the command word again reverts the goggles to their normal operation.

item.name: Danoth's Visor (Dormant)
entries: 这些带有透明钻石镜片的米塔尔框架护目镜被唤醒者达诺特-奥罗用来发现{@condition invisible}敌人并从远处侦察区域。

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While wearing the goggles in their dormant state, you can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 60 feet. Additionally, you have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

items.name: Exalted
entries: 当达诺特的面罩达到高尚的状态时，它将获得以下属性。

items: 你会自动检测到你能看到的幻觉，并自动成功地对它们进行拯救。此外，你会在任何非真实形态的生物周围看到一个明亮的光环。
