As an action, you can cast the {@spell antimagic field} spell from the visor. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Dark Shard Amulet
entries: 这个护身符是由一块来自你的术士守护者领域的弹性星外材料碎片制成的。当你佩戴它时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你可以用这个护身符作为你的术士法术的施法重点。

You can try to cast a cantrip that you don't know. The cantrip must be on the warlock spell list, and you must make a DC 10 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check. If the check succeeds, you cast the spell. If the check fails, so does the spell, and the action used to cast the spell is wasted. In either case, you can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Dawnbringer
item.reqAttune: by a creature of non-evil alignment
entries: 失落在暗黑世界中多年的黎明使者，看起来是一个镀金的长剑柄。当你握住剑柄时，你可以使用一个额外的动作来使一把纯正的光芒之剑从剑柄上弹出，或者使剑身消失。当剑刃存在的时候，这把魔法长剑就有了精巧的属性。如果你精通{@item shortsword|phb|shortswords}或{@item longsword|phb|longswords}，你就会精通 "曙光之刃"。

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with it, that target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.
剑的夜光刃在15英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外15英尺范围内发出暗光。这种光是太阳光。当剑身持续存在时，你可以使用一个动作来扩大或缩小它的亮光和暗光的半径，各增加5英尺，最大为30英尺，最小为10英尺。

While holding the weapon, you can use an action to touch a creature with the blade and cast {@spell lesser restoration} on that creature. Once used, this ability can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Dawnbringer is a sentient neutral good weapon with an Intelligence of 12, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 14. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这把剑能说、能读、能听懂普通话，并能与持剑者进行心灵感应。它的声音很亲切，很有女人味。它知道你所知道的每一种语言，同时与它相适应。

entries.name: Personality
entries: 由古老的太阳崇拜者锻造的黎明使者，旨在将光明带入黑暗，并与黑暗生物作战。它对有需要的人来说是仁慈和同情的，但对它的敌人则是凶猛和破坏性的。
在黑暗中迷失的漫长岁月使黎明使者对黑暗和遗弃都感到恐惧。它更喜欢它的刀刃总是在黑暗的地方闪烁着光芒，而且它强烈抵制在任何时间内与它的持刀人分开。

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Deathwalker's Ward reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: 盔甲的AC奖励增加到+2。

While wearing the armor, you have resistance to one of the following damage types of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, or poison. You can change the damage type when you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short rest}.

item.name: Deathwalker's Ward (Dormant)
entries: This beautiful black leather armor is covered in intricate scrollwork, and has a mantle bearing the black feathers of {@deity The Matron of Ravens|Exandria|TDCSR}. Legends say that it has been worn by a number of that deity's champions over the centuries—most recently, {@creature Champion of Ravens|TDCSR|Vax'ildan of Vox Machina}.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: When the Deathwalker's Ward is in a dormant state, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and you have {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on death {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} while wearing the armor.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Deathwalker's Ward reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: 盔甲的AC奖励增加到+3。

As a bonus action, you grow large black raven wings that grant you a flying speed of 60 feet and last for 1 hour. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|long rest}.

item.name: Decanter of Endless Water
entries: 这个有塞子的酒瓶在摇晃的时候会滑动，就像里面有水一样。该醒酒器重达2磅。
你可以使用一个动作来移除瓶塞，并说出三个命令词中的一个，这样一来，一定量的淡水或盐水（你选择）就会从瓶子里涌出来。水在你的下一个回合开始时停止倾泻。从以下选项中选择。

items: "流 "产生1加仑的水。
"喷泉 "产生5加仑的水。
"间歇泉 "产生30加仑的水，在一个30英尺长、1英尺宽的间歇泉中喷涌而出。拿着酒壶的时候，作为一个额外动作，你可以将间歇泉对准你周围30英尺内你能看到的生物。目标必须在DC13力量救赎中成功，否则会受到{@damage 1d4}重击伤害并跌落{@condition prone}。你可以用一个没有穿戴或携带、重量不超过200磅的物体代替生物。该物体要么被打翻，要么被推到离你最远的15英尺处。

item.name: Deck of Dimensions
entries: The backs of the cards in this deck are decorated with intricate designs representing different planes of existence. The deck has 6 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 or more of its charges to use the following properties:

items.name: Marked Card
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend 1 charge to draw a card from the deck and place it in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you. The card then becomes marked with an invisible sigil. Once within the next 24 hours, as an action, you can speak the marked card's name and teleport to the card's location, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, appearing in the closest unoccupied space to the card. After you teleport in this way, or after 8 hours, the card returns to the deck, and the mark on it fades.

items.name: Riffling Portal
entries: As an action, you can expend 3 charges to cast the {@spell Arcane Gate} spell from the deck. The deck vanishes, and fluttering cards create the spell's portal rings. When the spell ends, the deck reappears in your possession.

items.name: Shuffling Stride
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend 1 charge to throw a card from the deck to an unoccupied space within 60 feet of yourself and teleport, along with any equipment you're wearing or carrying, to that space. The card then vanishes and returns to the deck.
The deck regains {@dice 1d6} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Deck of Illusions
entries: 这个盒子包含一套羊皮纸牌。一副完整的牌有34张。一副作为宝藏被发现的牌通常缺少{@dice 1d20 - 1}张牌。
这副牌的魔力只有在随机抽出的情况下才能发挥作用（你可以用一副经过改造的扑克牌来模拟这副牌）。你可以使用一个动作从牌组中随机抽出一张牌，并将它扔到离你30英尺以内的地方。

An illusion of one or more creatures forms over the thrown card and remains until dispelled. An illusory creature appears real, of the appropriate size, and behaves as if it were a real creature, except that it can do no harm. While you are within 120 feet of the illusory creature and can see it, you can use an action to move it magically anywhere within 30 feet of its card. Any physical interaction with the illusory creature reveals it to be an illusion, because objects pass through it. Someone who uses an action to visually inspect the creature identifies it as illusory with a successful DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check. The creature then appears translucent.
幻象持续到其牌被移动或幻象被驱散。幻象结束时，其牌上的图像消失，该牌不能再次使用。

item.name: Deck of Many More Things
entries: Over the centuries since the first Deck of Many Things was created, many have sought and failed to replicate it. But some have created new cards. These forty-four additional cards are known collectively as the Deck of Many More Things. (More information on creating new cards for this deck appears in chapter 2.)

Like the Deck of Many Things, the Deck of Many More Things manifests differently on various worlds. While it can include fewer or different cards, it frequently appears with a Deck of Many Things as part of a combined deck of sixty-six illuminated cards. The combined deck is usually protected by a box or pouch. The forty-four cards of the Deck of Many More Things bear similar imagery to those in the Deck of Many Things and have potent magical effects, which are detailed later in this description. Notably, cards from the Deck of Many More Things are more likely to be beneficial, though about a third of them are still dangerous.

Before you draw a card, you must declare how many cards you intend to draw and then draw them randomly. Unless a card allows you to draw additional cards, any cards drawn exceeding this number have no effect.

As soon as you draw a card, its magic takes effect. You must draw each card you declared no more than 1 hour after the previous draw. Unless a card states otherwise, if you fail to draw the chosen number, the remaining number of cards fly from the deck and take effect simultaneously.
Unless it is the Fool or the Jester card, a drawn card immediately takes effect, fades from existence, and reappears in the deck, making it possible to draw the same card multiple times.

The DM can use the physical cards provided in The Deck of Many Things card set to build a combined Deck of Many Things and Deck of Many More Things, including whichever cards they desire. Alternatively, roll on the Deck of Many More Things table below to randomly determine what cards are drawn.

entries.name: Aberration
entries: You gain telepathy within a range of 90 feet.

entries.name: Beast
entries: You immediately transform into a {@filter random Beast with a CR of 5 or lower|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&5]|type=beast}. Your game statistics—including your ability scores, hit points, and possible actions—are replaced by the Beast's game statistics, and any nonmagical equipment you're wearing or carrying melds into your new form and can't be used. Any magic items you're carrying drop in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of your new form.

You remain transformed in this way for {@dice 2d12} days; nothing can alter your form while you're under the effects of this card, but the {@spell Wish} spell can end the transformation early. When you revert to your normal form, you return to the same state you were in when you initially transformed.

entries.name: Book
entries: You gain the ability to speak, read, and write {@dice 1d6 + 2} languages of your choice.

entries.name: Bridge
entries: You gain the ability to cast the {@spell Time Stop} spell {@dice 1d3} times. Use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability (your choice).

entries.name: Campfire
entries: You immediately gain the benefits of finishing a long rest.

entries.name: Cavern
entries: You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed. You also gain the ability to move up, down, across vertical surfaces, and along ceilings, while leaving your hands free.

entries.name: Celestial
entries: You sprout a pair of softly luminescent, feathered wings from your back and gain a flying speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Construct
entries: A {@creature homunculus} appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you. The appearance of the homunculus is determined by the DM, and the homunculus treats you as its creator.

entries.name: Corpse
entries: You immediately drop to 0 hit points, have the {@condition unconscious} condition, and must begin making death saving throws. Spells and other magical effects that restore hit points have no effect on you until you are stabilized. If you fail three death saving throws, you die and can be resurrected only by the {@spell Wish} spell.

entries.name: Crossroads
entries: Roll a {@dice d20}. If the roll is even, you age {@dice 1d10} years. If the roll is odd, you become younger by {@dice 1d10} years, to a minimum of 1 year. This effect can be undone only by the {@spell Wish} spell, divine intervention, or similar magic.

entries.name: Door
entries: You gain the ability to cast the {@spell Gate} spell {@dice 1d4} times, requiring no material components. Use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability (your choice).

entries.name: Dragon
entries: A dragon egg appears at your feet and immediately hatches into a dragon wyrmling. The type of dragon is chosen by the DM. The wyrmling views you as its parent and is staunchly loyal to you and your allies.

entries.name: Elemental
entries: You become immune to one of the following damage types (choose immediately upon drawing this card): acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

entries.name: Expert
entries: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22.

entries.name: Fey
entries: A fey crossing opens into the Feywild, and you're immediately pulled through it, disappearing in a flash of rainbow-colored light. You draw no more cards.

The fey crossing appears as a shimmering fractal of light above the deck, and it remains open for 1 minute after the card is drawn. The precise location in the Feywild to which the fey crossing leads is determined by the DM.

entries.name: Fiend
entries: A powerful Fiend appears in a nearby unoccupied space and offers you a deal. The precise nature of this deal is up to the DM, but usually the Fiend offers some material reward in exchange for you and your allies completing a task for the Fiend. The Fiend is indifferent to you and can be bargained with; it keeps its side of any bargain it makes, though it might twist the wording of any agreement to suit its purposes. If attacked, or if negotiations fail and you refuse the Fiend's offer, it returns to its home plane.

entries.name: Giant
entries: You immediately grow {@dice 2d10} inches in height, and your hit point maximum and current hit points both increase by 20.

entries.name: Humanoid
entries: You can immediately choose to stop drawing from the deck, regardless of how many cards you initially declared.

entries.name: Lance
entries: All your ability scores increase by 1, to a maximum of 20.

entries.name: Mage
entries: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22.

entries.name: Map
entries: At any time you choose within 1 year of drawing this card, you can mentally name or describe an object or individual that is familiar to you. You immediately know the location of the object or individual, as well as the distance between you and the object or individual, even if the object or individual is on a different plane of existence. If you named an individual, you know if they are alive and any conditions they have. If you named an object, you know if it is broken or not. If you named a magic item that has charges, you know how many charges it has remaining.

entries.name: Maze
entries: You gain {@dice 1d3} levels of {@condition exhaustion}.

entries.name: Mine
entries: A pile of {@dice 2d6} gems (each worth 5,000 gp) and {@dice 1d10} chunks of precious ore (each worth 2,500 gp) appears at your feet.

entries.name: Monstrosity
entries: A {@filter Large or larger Monstrosity with a challenge rating of 10 or less|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&10]|type=monstrosity|size=l;h;g} (chosen by the DM) appears in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of you. The creature is hostile toward you and attacks immediately. The creature disappears when it is killed or when you are reduced to 0 hit points. If there isn't enough space for a Large or larger creature to appear, this card has no effect.

entries.name: Ooze
entries: A {@creature gelatinous cube} immediately appears in your space and engulfs you. The gelatinous cube is hostile and remains until it is destroyed. If there isn't enough space for the gelatinous cube to appear, this card has no effect.

entries.name: Path
entries: Your walking speed increases by 10 feet.

entries.name: Pit
entries: A pit opens beneath you. You plummet {@damage 3d6 × 10} feet, take damage from the fall, and have the {@condition prone} condition.

entries.name: Plant
entries: You gain the ability to cast {@spell Speak with Plants} without using a spell slot; you must finish a long rest before you can cast it this way again. If you have spell slots of 3rd level or higher, you can cast this spell using them. Use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability (your choice).

entries.name: Priest
entries: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22.

entries.name: Prisoner
entries: Glowing chains made of magical force appear and wrap around you. You have the {@condition restrained} condition until the chains are destroyed or you are freed. While you have this condition, you can't cast spells, and any magic items you're wearing or carrying have their properties suppressed. You draw no more cards. The chains are immune to damage and can't be dispelled using the {@spell Dispel Magic} spell or similar magic. However, a {@spell Disintegrate} spell destroys the chains instantly, freeing you. Another creature can also free you by succeeding on a {@dc 30} Dexterity check using {@item thieves' tools|PHB}.

entries.name: Ring
entries: A {@filter rare or rarer magic ring|items|source=|type=ring|rarity=rare;very rare;legendary;artifact|category=} appears on your finger. If you have the attunement slots available, you're automatically attuned to the ring when it appears. The DM chooses the ring.

entries.name: Shield
entries: A {@filter rare or rarer suit of magic armor|items|source=|type=light armor;heavy armor;medium armor|rarity=rare;very rare;legendary;artifact|category=} that you are proficient with appears in your hands. The DM chooses the armor. If you lack proficiency with any armor, your base AC instead now equals 12 + your Dexterity modifier while you aren't wearing armor.

entries.name: Ship
entries: You gain proficiency in three skills chosen by the DM.

entries.name: Staff
entries: A {@filter rare or rarer magic rod, staff, or wand|items|source=|type=rod;wand;staff|rarity=rare;very rare;legendary;artifact|category=} appears in your hands. The DM chooses the item.

entries.name: Stairway
entries: You can choose to either decrease your number of declared draws by two or receive a {@filter rare or rarer wondrous item|items|source=|type=wondrous item|rarity=rare;very rare;legendary;artifact|category=}, which appears in your hands. The DM chooses the item.

entries.name: Statue
entries: You immediately have the {@condition petrified} condition as your body is transformed into marble. The petrification lasts until you are freed with the {@spell Greater Restoration} spell or similar magic.

entries.name: Tavern
entries: Your Charisma score increases by 2 to a maximum of 22.

entries.name: Temple
entries: A deity or entity of similar power becomes bound to aid you. At any point in time between drawing the card and when you die, you can use your action to call on this entity for divine intervention, and the entity is bound to answer. The parameters and nature of this intervention are chosen by the DM. If you die without having used this intervention, the deity fulfills its obligation by casting the {@spell Resurrection} spell on you. Once the entity has answered your call for divine intervention or resurrected you, the entity is no longer bound to aid you.

entries.name: Tomb
entries: At any time you choose within 1 year of drawing this card, you can cast the {@spell True Resurrection} spell once without expending a spell slot or requiring material components. Use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability (your choice).

entries.name: Tower
entries: Draw two additional cards beyond your declared number of draws. The magic of these cards doesn't immediately take effect; instead, choose one of the two additional cards to keep, returning the other to the deck. The magic of the card you keep takes effect immediately thereafter.

entries.name: Tree
entries: Your skin immediately becomes rough, like tree bark. Your base AC now equals 15 + your Dexterity modifier while you aren't wearing armor, but you have vulnerability to fire damage. This transformation can be undone only by the {@spell Wish} spell, divine intervention, or similar magic.

entries.name: Undead
entries: Somewhere on the Material Plane, a {@creature revenant} rises. This revenant blames you for its existence and relentlessly hunts you to exact its revenge. The revenant exists until either 1 year passes, the revenant kills you, or you use a {@spell Wish} spell to banish it permanently to the afterlife.

entries.name: Warrior
entries: Your Strength score increases by 2 to a maximum of 22.

entries.name: Well
entries: You learn three cantrips of your choice from any spell list.

item.name: Deck of Many Things
entries: A {@item Deck of Many Things} typically appears not as individual cards, but as a collection of cards characters can draw from. But this doesn't have to be true; you can give each card a property as a standalone item, so characters who find only one card can still enjoy this famed item and use the card on adventures.

This approach is particularly useful if you make a {@item Deck of Many Things} the object of a quest; as the characters explore, each card they find grants them a magical ability they can use in subsequent adventures to find the cards that remain. Eventually the heroes assemble the entire deck, which they can then use in the traditional manner, drawing transformative cards from it in a fitting climax to the campaign.
{@note This deck item comprises the following individual cards:}

item.name: Deck of Many Things
entries: Usually found in a box or pouch, this deck contains a number of cards made of ivory or vellum. Most ({@chance 75|75 percent}) of these decks have only thirteen cards, but the rest have twenty-two.
在你抽牌之前，你必须声明你打算抽多少张牌，然后随机抽牌（你可以用一副改变过的扑克牌来模拟这副牌）。任何超过这个数字的抽出的牌都没有效果。否则，只要你从牌组中抽出一张牌，它的魔法就会生效。你必须在上一次抽牌后1小时内抽出每张牌。如果你没能抽到所选的数字，剩下的牌就会自行从牌组中飞出，并一次性生效。
一旦抽出一张牌，它就会消逝，不再存在。除非这张牌是{@card Fool|Deck of Many Things}或{@card Jester|Deck of Many Things}，否则这张牌会重新出现在牌组中，这样就有可能抽到同一张牌两次。

entries.name: A Question of Enmity
entries: 在一副由许多东西组成的牌中，有两张牌可以让一个角色赢得另一个生命的敌意。有了火焰牌，这种敌意是公开的。角色应该在多个场合体验到魔鬼的恶毒努力。寻找恶魔不应该是一个简单的任务，冒险者应该在能够面对恶魔本身之前与恶魔的盟友和追随者发生几次冲突。
在{@card Rogue|Deck of Many Things}牌的情况下，敌意是秘密的，应该来自被认为是朋友或盟友的人。作为地下城主，你应该等待一个戏剧性的适当时机来揭示这种敌意，让冒险者猜测谁有可能成为背叛者。

entries.name: Vizier
entries: 在抽到这张牌的一年内，你可以在任何时候选择在冥想中提出一个问题，并在精神上得到这个问题的真实答案。除了信息，这个答案还能帮助你解决一个令人困惑的问题或其他困境。换句话说，知识是伴随着如何应用它的智慧而来。

entries.name: Sun
entries: 你获得了50,000 XP，一个奇妙的物品（由DM随机决定）出现在你的手中。

entries.name: Moon
entries: 你被赋予施展{@spell wish}法术{@dice 1d3}的能力。

entries.name: Star
entries: 将你的一项能力得分提高2分，该得分可以超过20分，但不能超过24分。

entries.name: Comet
entries: 如果你单枪匹马击败了你遇到的下一个敌对怪物或怪物群，你获得的经验值足以获得一个等级。否则，这张牌没有任何效果。

entries.name: The Fates
entries: 现实的结构解开并重新旋转，让你避免或抹去一个事件，就像它从未发生过一样。你可以在抽到这张牌后立即使用这张牌的魔法，或者在你死亡前的任何其他时间使用。

entries.name: Throne
entries: 你获得了对{@skill Persuasion}技能的熟练度，并且在使用该技能进行检查时，你的熟练度加成翻倍。此外，你还获得了世界上某个地方的一个小城堡的合法所有权。然而，这个堡垒目前在怪物的手中，你必须在宣称这个堡垒是你的之前清除这些怪物。

entries.name: Key
entries: 一件你精通的稀有或更稀有的魔法武器出现在你手中。由DM选择武器。

entries.name: Knight
entries: 你获得一个四级战士的服务，他出现在你选择的30英尺内的空间。该战士与你同属一个种族，并忠诚地服务于你，直到死亡，相信命运已经把他或她吸引到你身边。你控制这个角色。

entries.name: Gem
entries: 在你脚下出现25件各价值2000金币的珠宝或50个各价值1000金币的宝石。

entries.name: Talons
entries: 你佩戴或携带的每件魔法物品都会瓦解。你所拥有的神器不会被摧毁，但会消失。

entries.name: The Void
entries: This black card spells disaster. Your soul is drawn from your body and contained in an object in a place of the DM's choice. One or more powerful beings guard the place. While your soul is trapped in this way, your body is {@condition incapacitated}. A {@spell wish} spell can't restore your soul, but the spell reveals the location of the object that holds it. You draw no more cards.

entries.name: Flames
entries: 一个强大的魔鬼成为你的敌人。魔鬼寻求你的毁灭，困扰你的生活，在试图杀死你之前品尝你的痛苦。这种敌意一直持续到你或魔鬼死亡。

entries.name: Skull
entries: You summon an {@creature avatar of death|DMG}—a ghostly humanoid skeleton clad in a tattered black robe and carrying a spectral scythe. It appears in a space of the DM's choice within 10 feet of you and attacks you, warning all others that you must win the battle alone. The avatar fights until you die or it drops to 0 hit points, whereupon it disappears. If anyone tries to help you, the helper summons its own {@creature avatar of death|DMG}. A creature slain by an {@creature avatar of death|DMG} can't be restored to life.

entries.name: Idiot
entries: Permanently reduce your Intelligence by {@dice 1d4 + 1} (to a minimum score of 1). You can draw one additional card beyond your declared draws.

entries.name: Donjon
entries: 你消失了，并在一个维度外的球体中以悬浮的状态被埋葬。你所穿戴和携带的一切都留在你消失时占据的空间里。你一直被囚禁着，直到你被找到并从球体中移除。你无法被任何占卜魔法找到，但一个{@spell wish}的法术可以揭示你的监狱位置。你不会再抽牌。

entries.name: Ruin
entries: 你所携带或拥有的所有形式的财富，除了魔法物品之外，都会对你造成损失。便携式财产消失了。你所拥有的企业、建筑和土地会以最不改变现实的方式消失。任何能证明你应该拥有的东西在这张牌面前消失的文件也会消失。

entries.name: Euryale
entries: The card's {@creature medusa}-like visage curses you. You take a −2 penalty on saving throws while cursed in this way. Only a god or the magic of {@card The Fates|Deck of Many Things} card can end this curse.

entries.name: Rogue
entries: 一个由DM选择的非玩家角色对你产生了敌意。你的新敌人的身份是不知道的，直到该NPC或其他人揭示它。没有什么比一个{@spell wish}的法术或神灵的干预更能结束这个NPC对你的敌意。

entries.name: Balance
entries: 你的心智遭受了巨大的改变，导致你的取向发生变化。合法的变成混乱的，善良的变成邪恶的，反之亦然。如果你是真正的中立者或不结盟者，这张牌对你没有影响。

entries.name: Fool
entries: 你失去10,000XP，丢弃这张牌，然后再次从牌组中抽牌，两次抽牌都算作你的一次申报抽牌。如果失去这么多XP会导致你失去一个等级，你反而会失去一个数额，让你的XP刚好够保持你的等级。

entries.name: Jester
entries: 你获得10,000XP，或者你可以在你宣布的抽牌之外再抽两张牌。

entries: This wooden box contains a set of thirty-two parchment cards.

entries: The face of each card bears an illustration of a different item or set of items. As an action, you can draw a card of your choice from the deck and throw it to the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of yourself. When the card hits the ground, the card permanently transforms into the item or set of items depicted on its face. An altered deck of real-world playing cards can simulate the deck, as shown on the Deck of Miscellany table.

item.name: Deck of Oracles
entries: The illustrations on this deck of oracle cards move or change subtly when viewed indirectly. When you finish a long rest, you can spend 10 minutes consulting the cards for an omen of the coming day. Roll a {@dice d20} and record the number rolled. Once in the next 8 hours, immediately after a creature within 60 feet of you makes an ability check, an attack roll, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to discard the {@dice d20} roll; the creature must use the number you rolled in place of its roll.
Additionally, while holding the cards, you can cast {@spell Divination} from them. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Deck of Several Things
entries: 这副独特的牌存放在一个皮袋里，包含二十二张彩色卡片，由某种坚固但不知名的金属制成，每张卡片上的图案都印成了凸起的点状马赛克。在你抽牌之前，你必须声明你打算抽多少张牌，然后随机抽出它们（你可以用一副改变过的扑克牌来模拟这副牌）。任何超过这个数字的抽出的牌都没有效果。否则，只要你从牌组中抽出一张牌，它的魔法就会生效。你必须在上一次抽牌后1小时内抽出每张牌。如果你没能抽到所选的数字，剩下的牌就会自行从牌组中飞出，并一次性生效。
一旦抽出一张牌，它就会逐渐消失。除非这张牌是{@card Fool|Deck of Several Things|LLK}或{@card Jester|Deck of Several Things|LLK}，否则这张牌会重新出现在牌组中，这样就有可能抽到同一张牌两次。

entries.name: Balance
entries: 你的心智遭受了巨大的改变，导致你的取向在冒险的过程中发生变化。合法的变成混乱的，善良的变成邪恶的，反之亦然。如果你是真正的中立者或不结盟者，这张牌对你没有影响。

entries.name: Comet
entries: 如果你单枪匹马地击败了你遇到的下一个敌对的怪物或怪物群，那么在冒险的持续时间内，你在使用你选择的一个技能进行能力检查时具有优势。否则，这张卡没有任何效果。

entries.name: Donjon
entries: 你会被瞬间传送到并被禁锢在 "痛苦之躯 "修道院的监狱里（M6区）。你所穿戴和携带的一切都留在你消失时的空间里。你不能再抽牌。

entries.name: Euryale
entries: 这张卡的冥王面孔会诅咒你。在冒险过程中，你的拯救动作会受到-1的惩罚。

entries.name: The Fates
entries: 现实的结构解开并重新旋转，让你避免或抹去一个事件，就像它从未发生过一样。你可以在抽到这张卡时或在冒险过程中的任何时候使用这张卡的魔法。

entries.name: Flames
entries: 苦行僧院的大法师成为你的敌人。骨魔寻求你的毁灭，在试图杀死你之前品尝你的痛苦。如果大法师已经被击败，你将获得{@creature Garret Levistusson|LLK|Garret Levistusson's}赞助人的敌意--一个同样强大的魔鬼。

entries.name: Fool
entries: 在冒险的持续时间内，你将失去一项技能的熟练度，或者在用一项技能进行的所有检查中获得劣势（技能和惩罚由DM决定）。丢弃这张牌，再次从牌组中抽牌，两次抽牌都算作你宣布的抽牌之一。

entries.name: Gem
entries: 荒野奇遇表（见附录A）中的小妖精的1000金币囤积物出现在你脚下。如果该宝物已经被人认领，你将获得一个同等的囤积物。

entries.name: Idiot
entries: 在冒险过程中，将你的智力降低{@dice 1d4 + 1}（最低分值为1）。你可以在你声明的抽牌之外再抽一张牌。

entries.name: Jester
entries: 你在冒险期间获得你选择的一项技能的熟练度，或者你可以在你声明的抽牌之外再抽两张牌。

entries.name: Key
entries: A common or uncommon magic weapon with which you are proficient, or a {@item spell scroll} featuring a spell of a level you can cast, appears in your hands. The DM chooses the weapon or spell, which you possess for the duration of this adventure.

entries.name: Knight
entries: 你获得了"{@book Hirelings|phb|5|services} "部分中任何一个目前不在队伍中的NPC的服务，他出现在你选择的距离你30英尺以内的空间。该NPC在冒险过程中忠诚地服务于你，相信是命运将他们吸引到你身边。你控制这个角色。

entries.name: Moon
entries: You are granted the ability to cast any spell of 5th level or lower, and can use that ability {@dice 1d3} times for the duration of the adventure.

entries.name: Rogue
entries: 一个由DM选择的NPC会秘密地对你产生敌意。你的新敌人的身份并不为人所知，直到该NPC或其他人揭露它。任何对该NPC施展的6级或以上的魔法都可以结束该NPC对你的敌意。

entries.name: Ruin
entries: 你所携带或拥有的所有形式的财富，除了魔法物品之外，都会对你造成损失。这些财富可以在窘迫之躯修道院的库房（M10区）或Daoine Gloine的Kwalish实验室（O7区）中找回，以冒险中的后期为准。

entries.name: Skull
entries: 你召唤了一个死亡化身--一个身穿破烂黑袍的机械骷髅（使用骨纳加的统计资料）。它出现在DM选择的距离你10英尺以内的空间，并攻击你，警告所有其他人，你必须独自赢得这场战斗。这个化身一直战斗到你死亡或者它的生命值降到0，然后它就会消失。如果有人试图帮助你，帮助者会召唤自己的死亡化身。被死亡化身杀死的生物无法恢复生命。

entries.name: Star
entries: 在冒险的过程中，你的一项能力得分增加1分。该分数可以超过20，但不能超过24。

entries.name: Sun
entries: 你在冒险过程中获得对你选择的技能的熟练度。此外，一个普通或不普通的奇妙物品出现在你的手中。DM选择了这个物品，你在这个冒险过程中拥有它。

entries.name: Talons
entries: 你所穿戴或携带的每件魔法物品都会对你造成损失。这些物品可以在窘迫之躯修道院的库房（M10区）或道恩-格洛因的夸里什实验室（O7区）中找回，以冒险中的后期为准。

entries.name: Throne
entries: 你获得了对{@skill Persuasion}技能的熟练度，并且在冒险期间，你对用该技能进行的检查的熟练度加成翻倍。此外，苦难之躯修道院的大脑在此后将你视为修道院的合法主人。你必须打败或以其他方式清除大法师和它的仆人，然后才能将寺院据为己有。

entries.name: Vizier
entries: 在冒险过程中你选择的任何一个时间，你都可以在冥想中提出一个问题，并在精神上得到这个问题的真实答案。除了信息之外，这个答案还能帮助你解决一个令人费解的问题或其他困境。换句话说，知识是伴随着如何应用它的智慧而来。

entries.name: The Void
entries: This black card spells disaster. Your soul is drawn from your body and held within machinery in either the control room of the Monastery of the Distressed Body (area M8) or Kwalish's lab in Daoine Gloine (area O7), whichever comes later in the adventure. While your soul is trapped in this way, your body is {@condition incapacitated}. {@spell Divination}, {@spell contact other plane}, or a similar spell of 4th level or higher reveals the location of the machinery that holds your soul. You draw no more cards.

entries.name: Using the Deck of Several Things
entries: The special nature of this deck (carried by {@creature Mary Greymalkin|LLK} if she is used as an NPC) means that many of its effects operate only within and with respect to this specific adventure. This typically covers any time the characters spend between setting out for the Barrier Peaks and the resolution of whatever events transpire in Kwalish's lab (area O7).

For cards that effectively remove a character from play for a period of time ({@card Donjon|Deck of Several Things|LLK} and {@card the Void|Deck of Several Things|LLK}), you can allow a player to take on the role of one of the party's NPC hirelings, or introduce a temporary character as an NPC met during the party's journey. Alternatively, you can decide that only some aspect of the character's will disappears and is imprisoned, leaving the character to operate in a robotic state until freed.

item.name: Deck of Wild Cards
entries: This deck of heavy vellum cards hums with the magic of the Elemental Chaos.

The magic of the deck functions only if cards are drawn at random (a deck of real-world playing cards can simulate the deck). As an action, you can draw a random card from this deck and throw it to make a ranged spell attack, using Dexterity for the attack roll. The card has a range of 30 feet. On a hit, it deals {@damage 1d4} slashing damage and imposes a magical effect determined by its suit, as detailed in the Deck of Wild Cards table. The card immediately returns to the deck after it hits or misses a target.

entries.caption: Deck of Wild Cards
rows: ♣ (Rods)
The card explodes in a burst of fire. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} fire damage.
{@color ♦|#ff0000} (Coins)

The card shoots streaks of lightning. The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the blinded condition until the end of your next turn, and each creature within 10 feet of the target takes {@damage 1d6} lightning damage.
{@color ♥|#ff0000} (Cups)

The card covers the target in a thick layer of ice. The target takes {@damage 1d10} cold damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the restrained condition until the end of your next turn.
♠ (Swords)

The card unleashes a sharp, concussive blast. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it take {@damage 1d6} force damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

item.name: Deck of Wonder
entries: Created in the image of the Deck of Many Things, this deck of ivory or vellum cards bestows an assortment of minor benefits and penalties on those who draw from it. Most (75 percent) of these decks have only thirteen cards, but the rest have twenty-two.

Before you draw a card, you must declare how many cards you intend to draw, then draw them randomly. Any additional cards drawn have no effect. Unless a card states otherwise, as soon as you draw a card from the deck, its magic takes effect. You must draw each card you declared no more than 1 hour after the previous draw. If you fail to draw the chosen number, the remaining number of cards fly from the deck and take effect simultaneously.
Unless it is the Mystery card, a drawn card immediately takes effect, fades from existence, and reappears in the deck, making it possible to draw the same card multiple times.
You can use an altered deck of playing cards to simulate the deck, as shown in the Deck of Wonder table.

entries.name: Beginning
entries: Your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 2d10}. Your hit point maximum remains increased in this way for the next 8 hours.

entries.name: Champion
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to weapon attack and damage rolls. This bonus lasts for 8 hours.

entries.name: Chancellor
entries: Within 8 hours of drawing this card, you can cast {@spell Augury} once as an action, requiring no material components. Use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability (your choice).

entries.name: Chaos
entries: You gain resistance to one of the following damage types (chosen by the DM): acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. This resistance lasts for {@dice 1d12} days.

entries.name: Coin
entries: Five pieces of jewelry, each worth 100 gp, or ten gemstones, each worth 50 gp, appear at your feet.

entries.name: Crown
entries: You learn the {@spell Friends} cantrip. Use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability (your choice). If you already know this cantrip, the card has no effect.

entries.name: Dawn
entries: This card invigorates you. For the next 8 hours, you can add your proficiency bonus to your initiative rolls.

entries.name: Day
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to saving throws. This benefit lasts until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Destiny
entries: This card protects you against an untimely demise. The first time after drawing this card that you would drop to 0 hit points from taking damage, you instead drop to 1 hit point.

entries.name: Dusk
entries: This card supernaturally saps your energy. You have disadvantage on initiative rolls. This effect lasts until you finish a long rest, but it can be ended early by a {@spell Remove Curse} spell or similar magic.

entries.name: End
entries: This card is an omen of death. You take {@damage 2d10} necrotic damage, and your hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This effect can't reduce your hit point maximum below 10 hit points. This reduction lasts until you finish a long rest, but it can be ended early by a {@spell Remove Curse} spell or similar magic.

entries.name: Isolation
entries: You disappear, along with anything you are wearing or carrying, and become trapped in a harmless extradimensional space for {@dice 1d4} minutes. You draw no more cards. You then reappear in the space you left or the nearest unoccupied space. When you reappear, you must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 hour as your body reels from the extradimensional travel.

entries.name: Justice
entries: You momentarily gain the ability to balance the scales of fate. For the next 8 hours, whenever you or a creature within 60 feet of you is about to roll a {@dice d20} with advantage or disadvantage, you can use your reaction to prevent the roll from being affected by advantage or disadvantage.

entries.name: Knife
entries: An uncommon magic weapon you're proficient with appears in your hands. The DM chooses the weapon.

entries.name: Lock
entries: You gain the ability to cast {@spell Knock} {@dice 1d3} times. Use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability (your choice).

entries.name: Mischief
entries: You receive an uncommon wondrous item (chosen by the DM), or you can draw two additional cards beyond your declared draws.

entries.name: Monster
entries: This card's monstrous visage curses you. While cursed in this way, whenever you make a saving throw, you must roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the total. The curse lasts until you finish a long rest, but it can be ended early with a {@spell Remove Curse} spell or similar magic.

entries.name: Mystery
entries: You have disadvantage on Intelligence saving throws for 1 hour. Discard this card and draw from the deck again; together, the two draws count as one of your declared draws.

entries.name: Night
entries: You gain {@sense darkvision} within a range of 300 feet. This {@sense darkvision} lasts for 8 hours.

entries.name: Order
entries: You gain resistance to one of the following damage types (chosen by the DM): force, necrotic, poison, psychic, or radiant. This resistance lasts for {@dice 1d12} days.

entries.name: Student
entries: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intelligence or Charisma saving throws (your choice).

entries.name: Vulture
entries: One nonmagical item or piece of equipment in your possession (chosen by the DM) disappears. The item remains nearby but concealed for a short time, so it can be found with a successful DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check. If the item isn't recovered within 1 hour, it disappears forever.

item.name: Dekella, Bident of Thassa
entries: 瑟瑟挥舞着德凯拉，这是珀弗罗斯赠予她的双管齐下的武器。当海神将她的武器赐予一个凡人时，往往是为了让他们在远离海洋的地方实现她的意志，纠正一些影响到她不愿伤害的人的错误，或者让一个凡人看到她可怕的责任。

entries.name: Bident of the Deep
entries: Thassa's signature weapon thrums with the icy currents of the deep ocean. This weapon functions as a trident that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using the bident, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d10} cold damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Deep
entries: 如果你是塔萨的崇拜者，你会获得以下所有你有必要的虔诚的好处。

items.name: Piety 10+
items.entry: 你可以在水下呼吸，并获得60英尺的游泳速度。

items.name: Piety 25+
items.entry: The bident has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+
items.entry: The bident has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Thassa, the bident has 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property and 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} property, both randomly determined.
关于随机确定的属性，请参见《地下城管理员指南》第七章的 "神器"。

entries.name: Command the Deep
entries: Bident拥有指挥海浪和其生物的力量。作为一个行动，你可以改变你周围1英里内的海面状况，制造强风和大雨，引起猛烈的海浪（见《地下城主指南》第5章的 "海上天气"）或平息风暴。无论哪种情况，非自然天气都会持续1小时，然后恢复正常。一旦使用后，在下一个黄昏之前不能再次使用这把弯刀的属性。

Additionally, you can cast the {@spell dominate monster} spell (save DC 18) from the bident, but only on beasts and monstrosities that have an innate swimming speed. Once used, this property of the bident can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Aquatic Metamorphosis
entries: You can cast the {@spell true polymorph} spell (save DC 18) from the bident, but you must cast it on a creature to turn it into a kind of creature that has an innate swimming speed. Once used, this property of the bident can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Destroying the Bident
entries: 要想毁掉这根棍子，必须用一个{@creature ancient red dragon}的呼吸将其加热，然后趁热将其浸入塔提克斯河。

item.name: Delerium Crystal Focus
entries: This focus is made from a refined delerium crystal encased in a glass orb. While holding it, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells. In addition, you can use the crystal as a spellcasting focus.

Once per day when you cast a spell of 5th level or lower, you may draw on the energy stored within the crystal to do so without expending a spell slot. If you do, you trigger a random arcane anomaly (see Dungeons of Drakkenheim).

item.name: Delver's Claws
entries: The back of this weatherworn leather glove is adorned with three large metal hooks shaped like a mole's claws. Stitched into the glove's palm is the mountain rune.

The glove is considered a simple melee weapon with the finesse and light properties, and it deals {@damage 1d4} slashing damage on a hit. While attuned to the glove, you gain a burrowing speed equal to your walking speed and {@sense blindsight} to 15 feet.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: As an action, you can invoke the glove's rune to bolster yourself with the sturdiness of the earth. Spend and roll a number of your unspent Hit Dice up to a maximum equal to your proficiency bonus. You then regain a number of hit points equal to the total roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Demon Armor
entries: While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC, and you can understand and speak Abyssal. In addition, the armor's clawed gauntlets turn unarmed strikes with your hands into magic weapons that deal slashing damage, with a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls and a damage die of {@dice 1d8}.

entries.name: Curse
entries: 一旦你穿上这件被诅咒的盔甲，你就无法脱下它，除非你被{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法锁定。当你穿上这套盔甲时，你对恶魔的攻击卷轴以及对他们的法术和特殊能力的蓄力攻击都处于劣势。

item.name: Demonomicon of Iggwilv
entries: Iggwilv的Demonomicon是一部记录深渊的无限层次和居民的庞大论文，是多元宇宙中最彻底和最亵渎的恶魔学巨著。这部巨著记述了深渊和恶魔最古老和最新的亵渎行为。恶魔们试图对文本进行审查，虽然有些部分被从书脊上撕下，但一般的章节仍然存在，不断揭示恶魔的秘密。而这本书中的内容不仅仅是亵渎神明的东西。笼罩在剧本后面的是深渊本身的一个秘密部分，它使这本书保持最新，不管有多少页被删除，它渴望成为不仅仅是参考材料。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The artifact has the following random properties, which you can determine by rolling on the tables in the "Artifacts" section of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial}属性
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} 财产
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} 财产

entries.name: Spells
entries: 该书有8个电荷。它每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d8}已消耗的电荷。当你拿着它时，你可以用一个动作从它那里施放（1%），或者消耗它的一个或多个能量，从它那里施放以下法术（保存DC 20）。{@spell magic circle} (1次充电), {@spell magic jar} (3次充电), {@spell planar ally} (3次充电), {@spell planar binding} (2次充电), {@spell plane shift} (仅对深渊层；3次充电), {@spell summon fiend|TCE} (3次充电)。

entries.name: Abyssal Reference
entries: You can reference the {@i Demonomicon} whenever you make an Intelligence check to discern information about demons or a Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check related to the Abyss. When you do so, you can add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

entries.name: Fiendish Scourging
entries: 你的魔法会给魔族带来痛苦。在携带这本书的时候，当你对魔族施展的法术进行伤害卷时，你使用最大可能的结果而不是滚动。

entries.name: Ensnarement
entries: 在携带此书时，每当你施放只指名恶魔的{@spell magic circle}法术，或针对恶魔的{@spell planar binding}法术时，该法术会以9级施放，不管你使用的是哪一级的法术槽，如果有的话。此外，魔族在对该法术的救赎上有劣势。

entries.name: Containment
entries: {@i Demonomicon}的前10页是空白的。当你拿着这本书的时候，你可以瞄准一个你能看到的被困在{@spell magic circle}内的魔物。该魔物必须在DC20的魅力救赎中成功，否则就会被困于{@i Demonomicon's}的空白页中，而空白页上写满了被困生物广为人知的名字和劣迹。这个动作一旦使用，直到下一个黎明前都不能再使用。

When you finish a long rest, if you and the {@i Demonomicon} are on the same plane of existence, the trapped creature of the highest challenge rating within the book can attempt to possess you. You must make a DC 20 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, you are possessed by the creature, which controls you like a puppet. The possessing creature can release you as an action, appearing in the closest unoccupied space. On a successful save, the fiend can't try to possess you again for 7 days.
当这本巨著被发现时，它的书页上有{@dice 1d4}恶魔占据，通常是各种各样的恶魔。

entries.name: Destroying the Demonomicon
entries: To destroy the book, six different demon lords must each tear out a sixth of the book's pages. If this occurs, the pages reappear after 24 hours. Before all those hours pass, anyone who opens the book's remaining binding is transported to a nascent layer of the Abyss that lies hidden within the book. At the heart of this deadly, semi-sentient domain lies a long-lost artifact, {@i Fraz-Urb'luu's Staff}. If the staff is dragged from the pocket plane, the tome is reduced to a mundane and quite out-of-date copy of the {@i Tome of Zyx}, the work that served as the foundation for the {@i Demonomicon}. Once the staff emerges, the demon lord Fraz-Urb'luu instantly knows.

item.name: Devastation Orb of Air
entries: 破坏性球体是一种元素炸弹，可以通过使用元素武器的仪式在元素节点的位置创建。创建的球体类型取决于所使用的节点。例如，一个空气节点可以创造一个空气的破坏性球体。仪式需要1小时来完成，需要价值2000金币的特殊部件，这些部件会被消耗掉。
一个破坏性球体的直径为12英寸，重量为10磅，有一个坚固的外壳。球体在创建后的几个小时内就会被引爆，释放出它所包含的元素能量。球体不会向外透露它还有多少时间才会引爆。诸如{@spell identify}和{@spell divination}的法术可以用来确定球体何时会爆炸。一个球体有AC10，15点命中率，对毒药和精神伤害免疫。将它的命中率降至0会使它立即爆炸。

A special container can be crafted to contain a devastation orb and prevent it from detonating. The container must be inscribed with symbols of the orb's opposing element. For example, a case inscribed with earth symbols can be used to contain a devastation orb of air and keep it from detonating. While in the container, the orb thrums. If it is removed from the container after the time when it was supposed to detonate, it explodes {@dice 1d6} rounds later, unless it is returned to the container.
Regardless of the type of orb, its effect is contained within a sphere with a 1 mile radius. The orb is the sphere's point of origin. The orb is destroyed after one use.

entries.name: Air Orb
entries: 当这个球体被引爆时，它会产生一个持续1小时的强大风暴。每当一个生物在风中结束它的回合时，该生物必须在DC18宪法救赎中成功，否则就会受到{@damage 1d4}重击伤害，因为风和碎石会对它造成打击。风力强大到足以将弱小的树木连根拔起，并在至少暴露10分钟后摧毁轻型建筑。否则，适用（1%）的规则，详见《地下城主指南》第五章。

item.name: Devastation Orb of Earth
entries: A devastation orb is an elemental bomb that can be created at the site of an elemental node by performing a ritual with an elemental weapon. The type of orb created depends on the node used. For example, an air node creates a {@item devastation orb of air|PotA}. The ritual takes 1 hour to complete and requires 2,000 gp worth of special components, which are consumed.
一个破坏性球体的直径为12英寸，重量为10磅，有一个坚固的外壳。球体在创建后的几个小时内就会被引爆，释放出它所包含的元素能量。球体不会向外透露它还有多少时间才会引爆。诸如{@spell identify}和{@spell divination}的法术可以用来确定球体何时会爆炸。一个球体有AC10，15点命中率，对毒药和精神伤害免疫。将它的命中率降至0会使它立即爆炸。
可以制作一个特殊的容器来容纳一个破坏性的球体，防止它被引爆。容器上必须刻有球体的对立元素的符号。例如，一个刻有土的符号的箱子可以用来装一个{@item devastation orb of air|PotA}，并防止它被引爆。在容器中时，球体会发出颤动。如果它在应该引爆的时间之后被从容器中移出，它将在{@dice 1d6}轮之后爆炸，除非它被放回容器中。
Regardless of the type of orb, its effect is contained within a sphere with a 1 mile radius. The orb is the sphere's point of origin. The orb is destroyed after one use.

entries.name: Earth Orb
entries: 当这个球体引爆时，它使该区域在1分钟内受到{@spell earthquake}法术的影响（法术保存DC 18）。就该法术的效果而言，该法术是在球体爆炸的那一回合施放的。

item.name: Devastation Orb of Fire

For example, an air node creates a {@item devastation orb of air|PotA}. The ritual takes 1 hour to complete and requires 2,000 gp worth of special components, which are consumed.

Regardless of the type of orb, its effect is contained within a sphere with a 1 mile radius. The orb is the sphere's point of origin. The orb is destroyed after one use.

entries.name: Fire Orb
entries: When this orb detonates, it creates a dry heat wave that lasts for 24 hours. Within the area of effect, the rules for {@hazard extreme heat} apply, as detailed in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide. At the end of each hour, there is a ten percent chance that the heat wave starts a wildfire in a random location within the area of effect. The wildfire covers a 10-foot-square area initially but expands to fill another 10-foot square each round until the fire is extinguished or burns itself out. A creature that comes within 10 feet of a wildfire for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes {@damage 3d6} fire damage.

item.name: Devastation Orb of Water
entries: A devastation orb is an elemental bomb that can be created at the site of an elemental node by performing a ritual with an elemental weapon. The type of orb created depends on the node used. For example, an air node creates a {@item devastation orb of air|PotA}. The ritual takes 1 hour to complete and requires 2,000 gp worth of special components, which are consumed.
