Regardless of the type of orb, its effect is contained within a sphere with a 1 mile radius. The orb is the sphere's point of origin. The orb is destroyed after one use.

entries.name: Water Orb
entries: When this orb detonates, it creates a torrential rainstorm that lasts for 24 hours. Within the area of effect, the rules for {@hazard heavy precipitation} apply, as detailed in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide. If there is a substantial body of water in the area, it floods after {@dice 2d10} hours of heavy rain, rising 10 feet above its banks and inundating the surrounding area. The flood advances at a rate of 100 feet per round, moving away from the body of water where it began until it reaches the edge of the area of effect: at that point, the water flows downhill (and possibly recedes back to its origin). Light structures collapse and wash away. Any Large or smaller creature caught in the flood's path is swept away. The flooding destroys crops and might trigger mudslides, depending on the terrain.

entries.items: If you attune to this staff, you transform into a goat-humanoid hybrid over the course of 3 days. Tieflings are immune to this curse. Throughout the first day, shaggy fur begins to grow all over your body. After 24 hours, your eyes become goat-like, and stumpy horns sprout from your brow. On the last day, your fingers and toes meld into double digits, and the horns grow to full length. This transformation doesn't prevent you from wielding weapons or casting spells. {@spell Remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or any other effect that ends a curse restores your original appearance, but only a {@spell wish} spell can rid the staff of its power to transform those who attune to it.

item.name: Devotee's Censer
entries: The rounded head of this flail is perforated with tiny holes, arranged in symbols and patterns. The flail counts as a holy symbol for you. When you hit with an attack using this magic flail, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.
作为一个额外的动作，你可以说出命令语，使连枷发出一团薄薄的香云，范围为10英尺，持续1分钟。在你每个回合开始时，你和在香云中的任何其他生物都会各自恢复{@dice 1d4}的打击点数。这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Diamond
entries: 一种透明的蓝白色、金丝雀色、粉红色、棕色或蓝色宝石。

item.name: Dimensional Loop
entries: 当你适应这个装置时，你有一个+1的力量储蓄奖励，并且你有{@sense darkvision}到60英尺的范围。如果你已经拥有（1%），其范围会增加30英尺。

entries.name: Dimensional Cloak
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你可以让你的身体与物质世界脱节1分钟，使你在灵巧({@skill Stealth})的检查中获得优势，并在针对你的攻击卷中施加劣势。一旦你使用了维度循环的这一特性，在下一个黎明之前不能再次使用。

entries.name: Fold Space
entries: 选择一个你在60英尺内可以看到的空间（不需要行动）。在你的回合结束前，你将该空间视为在你5英尺之内。这允许你立即移动到该空间而不引起机会攻击，或者与该空间的物体或生物互动，就像它们在你旁边一样（包括允许你向该空间进行近战攻击）。一旦你使用了这个维度循环的功能，在下一个黎明之前就不能再次使用。

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: 虽然这个组件没有安装在{@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}，但它的魔法可能会零星地发挥作用，或者有不可预知的副作用，这由DM决定。

item.name: Dimensional Shackles
entries: You can use an action to place these shackles on an {@condition incapacitated} creature. The shackles adjust to fit a creature of Small to Large size. In addition to serving as mundane manacles, the shackles prevent a creature bound by them from using any method of extradimensional movement, including teleportation or travel to a different plane of existence. They don't prevent the creature from passing-through an interdimensional portal.

You and any creature you designate when you use the shackles can use an action to remove them. Once every 30 days, the bound creature can make a DC 30 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. On a success, the creature breaks free and destroys the shackles.

item.name: Dimir Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Dimir, allows you to cast {@spell disguise self}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Dimir's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Dimir Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Dimir guild
entries: This keyrune, carved from black stone accented with steel, resembles a stylized horror. On command, it transforms into an {@creature intellect devourer} that resembles the Dimir guild symbol, with six bladelike legs. The creature exists for up to 24 hours. During that time, it pursues only a single mission you give it—usually an assignment to take over someone's body, either to impersonate that person for a brief time or to extract secrets from their mind. When the mission is complete, the creature returns to you, reports its success, and reverts to its keyrune form.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature intellect devourer}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.
该生物对你、你的同伴和你的公会的其他成员都很友好（除非那些公会成员对你有敌意）。它能听懂你的语言并服从你的口头命令。如果你没有发出任何命令，该生物会采取{@action Dodge}的行动并移动以避免危险。
在持续时间结束时，该生物会恢复到它的钥匙形状。如果它的生命值下降到0，或者你在接触它的时候使用行动再次说出命令词，它就会提前恢复。当该生物恢复到它的钥匙孔形态时，它不能再变身，直到36小时后。

item.name: Diplomat's Pack
entries: 包括。

items: a {@item chest|phb}
2 {@item Map or Scroll Case|phb|cases for maps and scrolls}
一套{@item fine clothes|phb}
a {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|phb|bottle of ink}
an {@item ink pen|phb}
a {@item lamp|phb}
2 {@item Oil (flask)|phb|flasks of oil}
5 {@item Paper (one sheet)|phb|sheets of paper}
a {@item Perfume (vial)|phb|vial of perfume}
{@item sealing wax|phb}
{@item soap|phb}

item.name: Disguise Kit
entries: 这个装有化妆品、染发剂和小道具的袋子可以让你创造出改变你外表的伪装。熟练掌握这套工具后，你可以将你的熟练度加到你为创造视觉伪装而进行的任何能力检查中。
additionalEntries: The perfect tool for anyone who wants to engage in trickery, a disguise kit enables its owner to adopt a false identity.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 伪装包包括化妆品、染发剂、小道具和几件衣服。

additionalEntries.name: Deception
entries: 在某些情况下，伪装可以提高你编造令人信服的谎言的能力。

additionalEntries.name: Intimidation
entries: 正确的伪装可以使你看起来更可怕，无论你是想通过冒充瘟疫受害者来吓跑别人，还是通过以恶霸的形象来恐吓一帮暴徒。

additionalEntries.name: Performance
entries: 狡猾的伪装可以提高观众对表演的喜爱程度，只要伪装设计得当，能唤起观众的预期反应。

additionalEntries.name: Persuasion
entries: 民众倾向于相信穿制服的人。如果你把自己伪装成一个权威人物，你说服别人的努力往往会更有效。

additionalEntries.name: Create Disguise
entries: 作为长期休息的一部分，你可以创造一个伪装。一旦你创造了这样的伪装，你需要花1分钟来穿上它。你每次只能携带一件这样的伪装品而不会引起不必要的注意，除非你有一个手提袋或类似的方法来隐藏它们。每个伪装的重量为1磅。
在其他时候，制作一个涉及适度改变外观的伪装需要10分钟，而需要更广泛改变的伪装则需要30分钟。

additionalEntries.caption: Disguise Kit
rows: 遮盖伤痕或识别标志
发现别人使用的伪装手段
复制一个人形物体的外观

item.name: Dispelling Stone
entries: 这块光滑的、彩虹色的、蛋形的石头可以被扔到30英尺以外，并在撞击时爆炸出一个半径为10英尺的魔法能量球，摧毁石头。任何在球体中的五级或更低级的有效法术都会结束。

item.name: Docent
entries: 导师是一个小金属球，直径约2英寸，上面镶有龙形碎片。要与道士相合，你必须将该物品嵌入你身体的某处，例如你的胸口或眼窝。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: 讲解员是一种有生命的物品，其智力为16，智慧为14，魅力为14，可以通过你的感官感知世界。它能与你进行心灵感应，并能说、读和理解它所知道的任何语言（见下文 "随机属性"）。

entries.name: Life Support
entries: 每当你以0点生命值结束你的回合时，讲解员可以用+6的奖励进行智慧（{@skill Medicine}）检查。如果该检定成功，讲解员会稳定你。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: 讲解员具有以下特性。

{@b Languages}. The docent knows Common, Giant, and {@dice 1d4} additional languages chosen by the DM. If a docent knows fewer than six languages, it can learn a new language after it hears or reads the language through your senses.
{@b Skills}. The docent has a +7 bonus to one of the following skills (roll a {@dice d4}): (1) {@skill Arcana}, (2) {@skill History}, (3) {@skill Investigation}, or (4) {@skill Nature}.

{@b Spells}. The docent knows one of the following spells and can cast it at will, requiring no components (roll a {@dice d6}): (1–2) {@spell detect evil and good} or (3–6) {@spell detect magic}. The docent decides when to cast the spell.

entries.name: Personality
entries: 导师的目的是为它所依附的战神提供建议和帮助。讲解员的一个简单功能是充当翻译。讲解员的属性由其控制，如果你和你的讲解员关系不好，它可能会拒绝协助你。

item.name: Documancy Satchel
entries: 在等级2中，你的文件袋成为一个普通的魔法物品，允许你通过一个特殊的袋子神奇地发送和接收文件到总部。在你的要求下，你的文件袋可以神奇地产生预先写好的、可以签字的合同，涵盖大多数常见的合同需求。它还会偶尔产生印有总部有用信息和励志语录的便条。

entries.name: Satchel of Holding
entries: At rank 3, your documancy satchel gains additional features and becomes an uncommon magic item. One of the satchel's pouches now functions as a {@item bag of holding}.

Additionally, you can use an action to draw forth from the documancy satchel a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell comprehend languages}. The scroll vanishes when used, or ten minutes after it appears. This property of the bag can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Scroll Humidor
entries: At rank 4, your documancy satchel gains additional power and becomes a rare magic item. Within the satchel, a dedicated extradimensional space can hold up to thirty documents or {@item spell scroll||spell scrolls}. Placing a single document into the scroll humidor is an action. Drawing forth a desired scroll is a bonus action.

item.name: Dodecahedron of Doom
entries: 这个十二面体的金属模具有12英寸宽，五边形的边上刻有数字1到12。十二面体包含神秘的钟表装置，每当铸模时都会发出呼呼的响声。
十二面体可以作为一个动作被投掷到60英尺。当骰子在地面上滚动了至少10英尺后停下来，就会发生一个随机的魔法效果。如果一个效果需要一个目标，而范围内没有符合条件的目标，则什么也不会发生。十二面体施放的法术不需要任何组件。掷出{@dice d12}并参考下表来确定效果。

rows: 十二面体会爆炸并被摧毁。爆炸的骰子周围20英尺内的每个生物都必须做一个DC13的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到40({@damage 9d8})的力量伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。
十二面体对自己施放{@spell light}。该效果持续到有生物触及骰子为止。
The dodecahedron casts {@spell ray of frost} (+5 to hit), targeting a random creature within 60 feet of it that doesn't have total cover against the attack.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell shocking grasp} (+5 to hit) on the next creature that touches it.
The dodecahedron casts {@spell darkness} on itself. The effect has a duration of 10 minutes.
下一个接触到十二面体的生物会获得{@dice 1d10}临时命中率，持续1小时。

item.name: Dogsled
entries: 一个空的雪橇要花20戈比，重300磅，后面有空间可以容纳一个司机。

item.name: Donjon Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card at one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw, or it vanishes, transported to a prison on another plane of existence. After 1 minute, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Donjon's Sundering Sphere
entries: This marble-size crystal sphere glows with extraplanar energy.

As part of attuning to this item, you press the crystal sphere to the hilt of a nonmagical melee weapon of your choice, magically attaching the sphere to the weapon. The weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls. While wielding this weapon, you gain the following benefits:

items.name: Dimensional Anchor
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against spells or effects that would send you to an extradimensional space, a demiplane, or another plane of existence against your will.

items.name: Isolating Smite
entries: When you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force the creature to make a DC 16 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is banished to a harmless demiplane until the end of its next turn. When the banished creature returns, it reappears in the space it left or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
When you end your attunement to the sphere, the sphere harmlessly detaches from the weapon, and the weapon reverts to a nonmagical piece of equipment.

item.name: Doublet of Dramatic Demise
entries: This striking satin jacket allows you to make the most of your dying moments. When you drop to 0 hit points while wearing this doublet, you do not fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, you are {@condition incapacitated} and your speed becomes 0, but you can speak and communicate.
You make death {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} as normal, but if you roll a 1 on the {@dice d20}, you swoon with a loud gasp and die instantly.

item.name: Dowsing Dagger
entries: A curved jade blade fashioned by the River Heralds, this {@item +1 dagger} can detect the presence of fresh water within 200 feet of the wielder.

item.name: Draakhorn
entries: Draakhorn是{@creature Tiamat|RoT}在龙与巨人的战争中的礼物。它曾经是她的{@creature ancient red dragon}妃子Ephelomon的角，她把它送给龙族，帮助他们与巨人作战。Draakhorn是一个信号装置，它是如此之大，以至于需要两个中型生物（或一个大型或更大）来持有它，而第三个生物发出声音，使大地对它的呼唤产生共鸣。号角被火烧成暗黑的色调，并被青铜带包裹着，上面的龙卷风符文发出紫色的长生火的光芒。
Draakhorn低沉的呻吟声使几英里内的正常动物感到不安，它提醒两千英里内的所有龙上升并保持警惕，因为巨大的危险就在眼前。编码爆炸曾经被用来传递特定的信息。关于这些代码的知识已经随着时间的流逝而消失了。
了解德拉霍恩历史的人都知道，它最初是为了向半身龙发出危险信号而建造的--这是龙之崇拜的目的，它被腐蚀成召唤半身龙从北方的龙之井里出来。
在任何吹响号角的封闭空间的50英尺内，空气开始因声音而闪烁。任何在封闭空间入口处20英尺范围内的角色都必须在DC12力量检查中成功，以继续对抗声音的压力。如果失败，表示该角色不能再向入口处前进。

For any character entering the enclosed space, the sound fades to silence—because any creature that enters the enclosed space is temporarily {@condition deafened} and must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. Success indicates the deafness ends 2 minutes after the Draakhorn ceases to sound. Failure indicates the character remains {@condition deafened} for 1 hour after the Draakhorn ceases to sound.

While the horn is sounding, a creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw the first time on a turn the creature enters a 150-foot cone in front of the horn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

item.name: Draconic Longsword
entries: 这把长剑有一个龙形的剑柄。当你带着它时，你会获得说和理解龙语的能力。

item.name: Dragon
entries: Gold coin, half again as large as a {@item nib|wdh} (1 dragon = 100 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Dragon Sensing Longsword
entries: 这把+1长剑由龙骨制成，并配有龙皮握柄。它的鞍座和剑柄上有红宝石。当剑在龙的120英尺范围内时，剑会变暖，红宝石会微微发光。

item.name: Dragon Thighbone Club
entries: 这条红龙的大腿骨有14英尺长，250磅，被旧皮革包裹着，表明它曾经被用作巨人的大棒。
When you hit a creature of the dragon type with this weapon, it deals an extra {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage.
如果你对大棒进行调整，它就会神奇地缩小到你可以有效挥舞的大小。

item.name: Dragon's Blood
entries: Introduced into Sharn by Daask, dragon's blood is a potent and highly addictive stimulant. In addition to inducing euphoria, it can enhance spellcasting ability or even temporarily imbue a user with the ability to cast sorcerer spells. The drug's effects are potentially dangerous and always unpredictable. This isn't something a player character should want to use; adventurers are more likely to interfere with Daask smugglers or deal with an addict who accidentally casts a {@spell fireball} in a crowded street. The specific effects of dragon's blood are up to you, but you can take inspiration from the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}.

item.name: Dragongleam
entries: 这把长矛被灌注了10个{@spell daylight}的法术，可以在黄昏或黑暗的森林草丛中使用。命令语是 "提亚马特的眼睛会发光"，用德拉贡符文写在长矛的十字护手上。

item.name: Dragonguard
entries: 穿着这件盔甲时，你有一个+1的交流奖励。
这个+1的胸甲在设计上有一个金龙图案。它是为永夜的人类英雄Tergon设计的，它使穿戴者在面对龙型生物的呼吸武器时有优势。

item.name: Dragonguard
entries: 穿着这件盔甲时，你有一个+1的交流奖励。

This breastplate has a gold dragon motif worked into its design. Created for a human hero of old Neverwinter named Tergon, it grants its wearer advantage on saving throws against the breath weapons of Dragons.

This armor consists of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather. Although it leaves the legs and arms relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered.

item.name: Dragonstaff of Ahghairon
entries: 在持有阿格海龙的龙杖时，你对龙的法术和呼吸武器，以及其他龙类生物（如龙龟）的呼吸武器的蓄力攻击具有优势。
你用法杖触碰的龙类生物可以在水底城中移动，无视阿格海隆的向龙术（见导论中的 "阿格海隆的向龙术"）。这个效果一直持续到该生物再次被法杖触碰为止，或者到你宣布的赋予该利益的时间为止。

The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell command} spell. If you target a dragon with this casting, the dragon has disadvantage on its saving throw. The staff regains {@dice 1d10} charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Dragontooth Dagger
entries: 一把用龙的牙齿做成的匕首。虽然刀刃明显是獠牙或食肉动物的牙齿，但刀柄是包裹着牙根的皮革，而且没有护手。
你在使用此武器的攻击和伤害卷上获得+1的加成。使用此武器命中时，目标会受到额外的{@damage 1d6}酸性伤害。

entries.name: Draconic Potency
entries: Against enemies of the Cult of the Dragon, the dagger's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to 2, and the extra acid damage increases to {@dice 2d6}.

item.name: Dread Helm
entries: 这个可怕的钢制头盔在你戴上它的时候会让你的眼睛发出红色的光芒。

item.name: Dreamlily
entries: A psychoactive liquid that smells and tastes like your favorite beverage, essence of dreamlily is a Sarlonan opiate. First imported to help manage pain during the Last War, it's now the most commonly abused substance in Sharn. Though dreamlily isn't illegal if used for medicinal purposes, it's heavily taxed, and thus most dreamlily is smuggled in and sold on the black market. Dreamlily dens can be found across the lower wards. Consuming dreamlily causes disorienting euphoria and brings about remarkable resistance to pain. A creature under the effects of dreamlily is {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature is immune to fear, and the first time it drops to 0 hit points without being killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead. A dose of dreamlily costs around 1 gp, or up to ten times that if purchased through legal channels. There are many varieties of the drug, however, and the duration or the price might vary accordingly.

item.name: Driftglobe
entries: This small sphere of thick glass weighs 1 pound. If you are within 60 feet of it, you can speak its command word and cause it to emanate the {@spell light} or {@spell daylight} spell. Once used, the {@spell daylight} effect can't be used again until the next dawn.
你可以说另一个命令词作为行动，让发光的地球升到空中，漂浮在离地面不超过5英尺的地方。球体以这种方式悬停，直到你或其他生物抓住它。如果你从悬停的地球上移动超过60英尺，它就会跟着你，直到它在你的60英尺范围内。它采取最短的路线来做到这一点。如果被阻止移动，地球就会轻轻地沉到地面上，变得不活跃，它的光也会熄灭。

item.name: Drow Poison
entries: This poison is typically made only by the {@creature drow}, and only in a place far removed from sunlight. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

item.name: Drown
entries: 淹没是一把钢制的三叉戟，戟柄上部装饰有青铜藤壶，在戟尖下方有一颗海绿色的宝石，在戟柄末端有一个银色的贝壳。如果掉到水面上，它就会浮在水面上，如果在水下释放，它就会浮在原地。三叉戟的触感总是很凉爽，而且它对任何因暴露在水中而造成的伤害都是免疫的。淹没包含一个{@creature Olhydra|pota}的火花，邪恶之水的公主。
你在使用此魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。当你用它击中目标时，目标会受到额外的{@damage 1d8}寒冷伤害。

entries.name: Water Mastery
entries: 当你持有溺水时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你能说流利的阿奎安语。
你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。
你可以对一个{@creature water elemental}的人施放{@spell dominate monster}(保存DC17)。一旦你这么做了，在下一个黎明之前，溺水不能再以这种方式使用。

entries.name: Tears of Endless Anguish
entries: While inside a water node, you can perform a ritual called the Tears of Endless Anguish, using Drown to create a {@item devastation orb of water|PotA}. Once you perform the ritual, Drown can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Flaw
entries: 淹没使其持有者产生觊觎之心。当你与该武器相适应时，你会获得以下缺陷："我要求并应得最大份额的战利品，我拒绝放弃任何属于我的东西。" 此外，如果你连续24小时与 "淹没 "相适应，你的皮肤上会形成藤壶。藤壶可以用{@spell greater restoration}法术或类似的魔法去除，但在你与武器相适应的时候不能去除。

item.name: Dungeoneer's Pack
entries: 包括。

items: a {@item backpack|phb}
a {@item crowbar|phb}
a {@item hammer|phb}
10 {@item piton|phb|pitons}
10 {@item torch|phb|torches}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
10天的{@item Rations (1 day)|phb|rations}
a {@item waterskin|phb}
{@item Hempen Rope (50 feet)|phb|50 feet of hempen rope}

item.name: Duplicitous Manuscript
entries: 对你来说，这本书是一本神奇的法术书。对其他任何人来说，这本书似乎是一卷冗长的浪漫小说。作为一个行动，你可以改变这本书的外观，并改变浪漫小说的情节。

当找到时，这本书包含以下的咒语。{@spell hallucinatory terrain}, {@spell major image}, {@spell mirror image}, {@spell mislead}, {@spell Nystul's magic aura}, {@spell phantasmal force}, 和 {@spell silent image}。它的功能是为你提供一本法术书。
当你拿着这本书时，你可以把它作为你的巫师法术的施法重点。
The book has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: 如果你花了1分钟研究这本书，你可以花费1个电荷，用书中不同的法术来替换你准备好的一个巫师法术。新的法术必须是幻术流派的。

When a creature you can see makes an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern the true nature of an illusion spell you cast, or makes a saving throw against an illusion spell you cast, you can use your reaction and expend 1 charge to impose disadvantage on the roll.

item.name: Duskcrusher
entries: This item takes the form of a leather-wrapped metal rod emblazoned with the symbol of Pelor, the Dawn Father. While grasping the rod, you can use a bonus action to cause a warhammer head of crackling radiance to spring into existence. The warhammer's radiant head emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. You can use an action to make the radiant head disappear.

While the radiant head is active, you gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, and attacks with the weapon deal radiant damage instead of bludgeoning damage. An undead creature hit by the weapon takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.

While you are holding Duskcrusher and its radiant head is active, you can use an action to cast the {@spell sunbeam} spell (save DC 15) from the weapon, and this action can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Dust of Corrosion
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以把这些灰尘扔到空中，填满一个从你身上延伸出去的10英尺的立方体。该区域内由非魔法铁金属制成的表面和物体会立即被腐蚀并变成灰尘，变得无用且无法修复。该区域内任何全部或部分由黑色金属制成的生物都必须进行DC13宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到{@damage 4d8}坏死伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。
这种粉尘装在一个小包里，是由细小的铁锈怪物触角研磨而成。每包粉尘足够使用一次。

item.name: Dust of Deliciousness
entries: 这种红棕色的粉尘可以洒在任何可食用的物质上，大大改善其味道。这种粉尘也会使食用者的感官变得迟钝：任何食用经这种粉尘处理过的食物的人，在1小时内对智慧能力检查和智慧救赎都有劣势。足够的粉尘可以为六份食物调味。

item.name: Dust of Disappearance
entries: Found in a small packet, this powder resembles very fine sand. There is enough of it for one use. When you use an action to throw the dust into the air, you and each creature and object within 10 feet of you become {@condition invisible} for {@dice 2d4} minutes. The duration is the same for all subjects, and the dust is consumed when its magic takes effect. If a creature affected by the dust attacks or casts a spell, the invisibility ends for that creature.

item.name: Dust of Dryness
entries: 这一小包含有{@dice 1d6 + 4}小撮灰尘。你可以用一个动作在水面上洒下一撮它。灰尘会将一个边长为15英尺的水立方变成一个弹珠大小的小球，它漂浮在或停留在洒下灰尘的地方。小丸子的重量可以忽略不计。
有人可以用一个动作将小球砸向坚硬的表面，使小球破碎并释放灰尘吸收的水。这样做就会结束这个小球的魔法。
一个主要由水组成的元素暴露在一撮尘埃中时，必须做一个DC13的宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到{@damage 10d6}坏死性的伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。

item.name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
entries: 在一个小容器中发现的，这种粉末类似于非常细的沙子。它看起来是{@item dust of disappearance}，而一个{@spell identify}的法术显示它是这样的。它的数量足够使用一次。

When you use an action to throw a handful of the dust into the air, you and each creature that needs to breathe within 30 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become unable to breathe while sneezing uncontrollably. A creature affected in this way is {@condition incapacitated} and suffocating. As long as it is conscious, a creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on it on a success. The {@spell lesser restoration} spell can also end the effect on a creature.

item.name: Dust of the Mummy
entries: This poison is created during a mummy's embalming process, distilled from the dead creature's removed organs. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed creature can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the creature's hit point maximum to 0, the creature dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic.

item.name: Dwarven Plate
entries: 穿着这件盔甲时，你会获得一个+2的AC奖励。此外，如果一个效果使你违背你的意愿沿着地面移动，你可以使用你的反应来减少你被移动的距离，最多10英尺。

item.name: Dwarven Thrower
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged attack using this weapon, it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage or, if the target is a giant, {@damage 2d8} damage. Immediately after the attack, the weapon flies back to your hand.

item.name: Dynamite
entries: This bundle of explosives can be lit and thrown up to 30 feet as an action. It explodes at the start of your next turn. Creatures and objects within 20 feet of it must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}, taking {@damage 6d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Dynamite (stick)
entries: 作为一个动作，一个生物可以点燃一根炸药棒并将其扔向60英尺以外的地方。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须做一个DC12的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到{@damage 3d6}的重击伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。
一个角色可以把炸药棒绑在一起，使它们同时爆炸。每根额外的炸药棒都会增加{@damage 1d6}的伤害（最大为{@damage 10d6}），爆炸半径增加5英尺（最大为20英尺）。
炸药可以用较长的引信，在设定的时间后爆炸，通常是1到6个回合。掷出炸药的主动权。在设定的回合数过后，炸药就会主动爆炸。

item.name: Dyrrn's Tentacle Whip
entries: 这条长长的、像鞭子一样的坚韧肌肉链的一端有一根锋利的刺。为了适应这种共生武器，你要在整个适应期间将鞭子缠在手腕上，在此期间，鞭子会痛苦地将其卷须嵌入你的手臂。

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic whip, but attack rolls made against aberrations with this weapon have disadvantage. A creature hit by this weapon takes an extra {@damage 1d6} psychic damage. When you roll a 20 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll with this weapon, the target is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
作为一个额外的动作，你可以通过使鞭子缩进你的手臂而使其入鞘，或者再次将鞭子从你的手臂中抽出。

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: 当你与鞭子相合时，鞭子不能从你身上移开，你也不能主动结束与它的相合。如果你被一个结束诅咒的咒语所针对，你对鞭子的依附就会结束，它就会从你身上脱离。

item.name: Eagle Whistle
entries: 当你连续吹响鹰笛时，你的飞行速度是你步行速度的两倍。你可以连续吹响哨子，吹响的回合数等于5+5倍你的体质修正值（最少1回合），或者直到你说话，屏住呼吸，或者开始窒息。如果你着陆，哨子的使用也会结束。如果你停止吹响哨子时是在高空，你就会坠落。哨子有三次使用权。它每天在黎明时分重新获得消耗的使用权。

item.name: Ear Horn of Hearing
entries: 当举起你的耳朵时，这个喇叭可以抑制{@condition deafened}条件对你的影响，使你能够正常听闻。

item.name: Earring of Message
entries: 这款耳环的蓝色水晶被精致的铜线包裹着。这枚耳环有5个电荷。在佩戴它的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗1个电荷并施放{@spell message}的咒语。耳环每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d4 + 1}已消耗的电荷。

item.name: Earthboard
entries: An earthboard is a slab of granite about three inches thick, nine feet long, and two feet wide, with smooth, tapered ends. However, its mundane appearance belies its unique elemental power, which reduces its weight to 40 pounds while a creature is attuned to it. {@book The Earth Ashari of Terrah|TDCSR|3|Terrah} can often be seen with these stone boards upon their backs as they trek into the crags of the {@book Cliffkeep Mountains|TDCSR|3|Cliffkeep Mountains}.
While standing on an earthboard, you gain the following benefits:

items: Your speed increases to 60 feet as the board skims across solid ground (but not liquid surfaces).

If you ramp off a surface of solid earth, you can {@quickref jumping|PHB|4|0|long jump} up to 60 feet. When you end this {@quickref jumping|PHB|4|0|jump}, you can choose to slam into the ground, creating a shockwave. Each creature standing on the ground within 20 feet of you must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or fall {@condition prone}.

You have a burrowing speed of 20 feet that allows you to tunnel through earth or solid rock, leaving a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in your wake. As an action, you can increase this burrowing speed to 60 feet until the start of your next turn.
The earthboard always moves with you until you decide to dismount it (no action required).

entries: These benefits last until you end your turn not standing on the earthboard.

item.name: Earworm
entries: 要适应这种共生体，你必须在整个适应期内把它顶在耳后的皮肤上，这时它就会钻进你的脑袋里，与你的头骨结合在一起。当耳虫在你体内时，你可以说、读、写深层语言。

entries.name: Spells
entries: 耳蜗有4次充电。你可以用它来施展以下的法术，消耗必要的电荷量（法术伤害DC15）。{@spell detect thoughts} (2次充电) 或 {@spell dissonant whispers} (1次充电)。每次你用耳虫施展{@spell detect thoughts}的法术时，它都会将收集到的信息发送给最近的daelkyr，或发送给下一个最近的耳虫，直到它到达一个daelkyr。
蠼螋每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d4}已消耗的电荷。

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: 当你与之相适应时，耳虫无法从你身上移开，你也无法主动结束与之相适应的状态。如果你被一个结束诅咒的咒语所针对，你对耳虫的感应就会结束，它也会离开你的身体。

item.name: Echo Stone
entries: This dull-blue river stone is soft to the touch, and makes remarkably little sound if dropped. When an echo stone is squeezed as an action, it glows faintly for 1 minute. The stone records all sound made within 15 feet of it while glowing, then repeats that recorded sound at an equal volume once every 5 minutes. This cycle of repetition continues until the stone is squeezed again as an action, which silences it. Squeezing the stone twice in quick succession as an action causes it to play the sounds it has most recently recorded, rather than recording new sounds.

item.name: Efreeti Bottle
entries: This painted brass bottle weighs 1 pound. When you use an action to remove the stopper, a cloud of thick smoke flows out of the bottle. At the end of your turn, the smoke disappears with a flash of harmless fire, and an {@creature efreeti} appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you.
第一次开瓶时，由DM掷骰子决定发生什么。

rows: {@creature efreeti} 攻击你。战斗5个回合后，{@creature efreeti}会消失，瓶子也会失去魔法。
{@creature efreeti}为你服务一小时，按你的命令行事。然后(1%)回到瓶子里，一个新的塞子装着它。这个塞子在24小时内不能被移除。接下来两次打开瓶子，也会出现同样的效果。如果瓶子第四次被打开，{@creature efreeti}就会逃脱并消失，瓶子也就失去了魔力。
{@creature efreeti}可以为你施展{@spell wish}的法术三次。当它实现最后一个愿望或1小时后，它就会消失，瓶子也会失去魔力。

item.name: Efreeti Chain
entries: 穿着这件盔甲时，你会获得+3的AC值加成，你对火灾伤害免疫，你能理解并说原始语。此外，你可以站在熔岩上，也可以在熔岩上行走，就像它是固体地面一样。

item.name: Elder Cartographer's Glossography
entries: 当你达到等级4时，你会获得一本小册子，这是一个不常见的魔法物品。老年制图师的词汇表在与地理特征或地点有关的智力或智慧检查中给予优势。

item.name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
entries: 由一种特殊的针头制作，这种神奇的纹身描绘了爪状的形式和其他锯齿状的形状。

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: 为了适应这个项目，你把针放在你希望出现纹身的皮肤上，在整个适应过程中按下针。当调和完成后，针会变成墨水，成为纹身，出现在皮肤上。
如果你对纹身的调和结束，纹身就会消失，而针会重新出现在你的空间。

entries.name: Magical Strikes
entries: 当纹身在你的皮肤上时，你的徒手攻击被认为是有魔力的，以克服对非魔力攻击的免疫和抵抗，并且你在徒手攻击的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。

entries.name: Eldritch Maul
entries: As a bonus action, you can empower the tattoo for 1 minute. For the duration, each of your melee attacks with a weapon or an unarmed strike can reach a target up to 15 feet away from you, as inky tendrils launch toward the target. In addition, your melee attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage on a hit. Once used, this bonus action can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Eldritch Staff
entries: 这根法杖可以作为魔法四分法杖挥舞，对使用它的攻击和伤害卷给予+1的奖励。
该法杖有10个电荷，每天在黎明时分恢复{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了最后的电荷，掷出{@dice d20}。在1的情况下，法杖会在一个无害的超自然能量爆发中被摧毁。

entries.name: Eldritch Attack
entries: When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can expend up to 3 of its charges. For each charge you expend, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} lightning damage.

entries.name: Eldritch Escape
entries: If you take damage while holding the staff, you can use your reaction to expend 3 of the staff's charges, whereupon you turn {@condition invisible} and teleport yourself, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see. You remain {@condition invisible} until the start of your next turn or until you attack, cast a spell, or deal damage.

item.name: Electrum (ep)
entries: 普通硬币根据其制成的金属的相对价值，有几种不同的面值。最常见的三种硬币是金币（gp）、银币（sp）和铜币（cp）。
用一个金币，一个角色可以买一个腰包，50英尺的好绳子，或者一只山羊。一个熟练的（但不是特殊的）工匠每天可以赚取一块金币。金币是衡量财富的标准单位，即使钱币本身并不常用。当商人讨论涉及价值数百或数千金币的商品或服务的交易时，交易通常不涉及单个金币的交换。相反，金币是一种标准的价值衡量标准，实际的交换是以金条、信用证或有价值的货物进行的。
一块金币价值十块银币，是平民中最普遍的硬币。一枚银币可以买到一个工人一天的工作，一壶灯油，或者在一个贫穷的旅馆里休息一晚。
一块银币值十个铜币，这在劳动者和乞丐中很常见。一个铜块可以买到一支蜡烛、一个火把或一支粉笔。
此外，由其他贵金属制成的不寻常的硬币有时会出现在宝藏中。电子币（ep）和铂金币（pp）起源于没落的帝国和失落的王国，它们在交易中使用时有时会引起怀疑和疑虑。一块银币价值5个银币，一块铂金价值10个金币。
一枚标准硬币的重量约为一盎司的三分之一，因此50枚硬币的重量为一磅。

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard
entries: 这块噼里啪啦的水晶含有一个元素界的精华。作为一个动作，你可以将这个碎片附在一个微小的物体上（如武器或珠宝），或者将它分离。如果你对它的调和结束，它就会脱落。当你持有或佩戴它时，你可以把它作为施法的焦点。
掷一个{@dice d4}，并参考元素精华碎片表来确定碎片的本质和属性。当你在持有或佩戴该碎片时，在法术上使用元神选项，你可以使用该属性。

entries.caption: Elemental Essence Shards
rows: Air
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Air)|TCE}
地球
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Earth)|TCE}
Fire
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Fire)|TCE}
水
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Water)|TCE}

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Air)
entries: 这块噼里啪啦的水晶含有一个元素界的精华。作为一个动作，你可以将这个碎片附在一个微小的物体上（如武器或珠宝），或者将它分离。如果你对它的调和结束，它就会脱落。当你持有或佩戴它时，你可以把它作为施法的焦点。
当你在持有或佩戴碎片时，在咒语上使用元神选项，你可以使用以下属性。

entries.name: Property
entries: 你可以立即飞到60英尺而不引起机会攻击。

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Earth)
entries: 这块噼里啪啦的水晶含有一个元素界的精华。作为一个动作，你可以将这个碎片附在一个微小的物体上（如武器或珠宝），或者将它分离。如果你对它的调和结束，它就会脱落。当你持有或佩戴它时，你可以把它作为施法的焦点。
当你在持有或佩戴碎片时，在咒语上使用元神选项，你可以使用以下属性。

entries.name: Property
entries: 你获得对你选择的一种伤害类型的抗性，直到你下一回合开始。

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Fire)
entries: 这块噼里啪啦的水晶含有一个元素界的精华。作为一个动作，你可以将这个碎片附在一个微小的物体上（如武器或珠宝），或者将它分离。如果你对它的调和结束，它就会脱落。当你持有或佩戴它时，你可以把它作为施法的焦点。
当你在持有或佩戴碎片时，在咒语上使用元神选项，你可以使用以下属性。

entries.name: Property
entries: 你能看到的该法术的一个目标会着火。燃烧的目标在其下一回合开始时受到{@damage 2d10}的火焰伤害，然后火焰熄灭。

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Water)
entries: 这块噼里啪啦的水晶含有一个元素界的精华。作为一个动作，你可以将这个碎片附在一个微小的物体上（如武器或珠宝），或者将它分离。如果你对它的调和结束，它就会脱落。当你持有或佩戴它时，你可以把它作为施法的焦点。
当你在持有或佩戴碎片时，在咒语上使用元神选项，你可以使用以下属性。

entries.name: Property
entries: 你创造一个水浪，从你身上迸发出来，半径为10英尺。在该区域内，你所选择的每个生物都会受到{@damage 2d6}的寒冷伤害，并且必须对你的法术救赎DC进行力量救赎成功，否则就会被推到离你10英尺远的地方并摔倒{@condition prone}。

item.name: Elemental Gem, Blue Sapphire
entries: 这颗宝石包含一个元素能量的小球。当你使用行动打破宝石时，一个{@creature air elemental}会被召唤出来，就像你施展了{@spell conjure elemental}的法术一样，而宝石的魔力会消失。

item.name: Elemental Gem, Emerald
entries: 这颗宝石包含一个元素能量的小球。当你使用行动打破宝石时，一个{@creature water elemental}会被召唤出来，就像你施展了{@spell conjure elemental}的法术一样，而宝石的魔力会消失。

item.name: Elemental Gem, Red Corundum
entries: 这颗宝石包含一个元素能量的小球。当你使用行动打破宝石时，一个{@creature fire elemental}会被召唤出来，就像你施展了{@spell conjure elemental}的法术一样，而宝石的魔力会消失。

item.name: Elemental Gem, Yellow Diamond
entries: 这颗宝石包含一个元素能量的小球。当你使用行动打破宝石时，一个{@creature earth elemental}会被召唤出来，就像你施展了{@spell conjure elemental}的法术一样，而宝石的魔力会消失。

item.name: Elixir of Health
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，它能治愈折磨你的任何疾病，并能消除{@condition blinded}、{@condition deafened}、{@condition paralyzed}和{@condition poisoned}的状况。透明的红色液体里有微小的光泡。

item.name: Elven Chain
entries: 当你穿上这件盔甲时，你会获得一个+1的交流奖励。即使你缺乏对中型盔甲的熟练度，你也被认为精通此盔甲。

item.name: Elven Thrower
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged attack using this weapon, it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage or, if the target is a Giant, {@damage 2d8} damage. Immediately after the attack, the weapon flies back to your hand.

rows: 一个小笔记本，写在上面的东西1小时后就会消失。
由象牙和黄金制成的水晶透镜，使通过它观察到的任何东西看起来都被五彩缤纷的光斑所包围。
一个刻有精灵符号的小金字塔，大约有核桃大小
用搪瓷制成的蝴蝶形状的斗篷别针；当你取下别针时，它会变成一只真正的蝴蝶，当你准备重新穿上斗篷时，它又会回来。
一个金色的罗盘，指向10英里内最近的通往仙境的入口
一个银色的小陀螺，当它旋转时，会无休止地旋转，直到被打断。
一只由珐琅、金丝和宝石制成的小鸣鸟；用精灵语说出鸣鸟的名字，饰品就会发出该鸟的鸟鸣。
一朵小的珐琅花，插在人的头发上时，会有生命力，把佩戴者的头发绑在有花的活藤上；从这根藤上摘下一朵花，就会恢复到无生命的状态。

item.name: Embroidered glove set with jewel chips
Embroidered silk and velvet mantle set with numerous moonstones
Emerald
entries: 一种透明的深亮绿色宝石。

item.name: Emerald Pen
entries: This pen is tipped with an emerald nib and requires no ink to write. While holding this pen, you can cast {@spell illusory script} at will, requiring no material components.

entries.items: One card in this deck is enchanted to appear as whatever specific card its owner commands. This magic works only 25 percent of the time, but the deck is worth 500 gp to any serious gambler who doesn't mind the risk—or who isn't told about it.

item.name: Enduring Spellbook
entries: 这本法术书，以及写在书页上的任何东西，都不会被火或水浸泡而损坏。此外，这本法术书不会随着时间的推移而变质。

item.name: Entertainer's Pack
entries: 包括。

items: a {@item backpack|phb}
a {@item bedroll|phb}
2 {@item Costume Clothes|phb|costumes}
5 {@item candle|phb|candles}
5天的{@item Rations (1 day)|phb|rations}
a {@item waterskin|phb}
a {@item disguise kit|phb}

item.name: Ephixis, Bow of Nylea
entries: Nylea使用短弓Ephixis，这把弓的箭预示着季节的转变。Nylea很乐意让她的追随者借用她的弓，特别是当他们打算用它来完成伟大的事迹，结束邪恶的生物，或者击倒傲慢的人。

entries.name: Bow of the Wild
entries: 这把神器包括一把短弓和一个装有四支箭的箭筒，每支箭都与四季中的一个季节相联系。你在使用此弓的攻击和伤害卷中获得+3的加成，并且在武器的远距离攻击时不会受到不利影响。此外，Ephixis在19或20的{@dice d20}卷中可以获得关键打击。

entries.name: Blessing of the Wild
entries: 如果你是奈拉的崇拜者，你会获得以下所有你有必要虔诚度的好处。

items.name: Piety 10+
items.entry: The bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+
items.entry: The bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Nylea, the bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} property.
关于随机确定的属性，请参见《地下城管理员指南》第七章的 "神器"。

entries.name: Arrows of the Seasons
entries: 这张弓上的四支箭--每支都与一个季节有关--只能用它发射。每支箭在使用后立即消失，并在下一个黄昏时重新出现在箭筒中。对用箭施法的救赎DC是18。每支箭都有一个独特的属性。

entries.name: Spring
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow, targeting a beast or a plant creature you can see within 320 feet of you. On a hit, the arrow deals no damage, and the target gains the benefits of the {@spell awaken} spell for 8 hours.

entries.name: Summer
entries: 作为一个行动，你可以向你能看到的320英尺范围内地面上的一个无人空间发射此箭，不需要攻击卷。一只Nyxborn猞猁会被召唤到那个空间里（使用第六章的{@creature tiger}与{@book Nyxborn traits|MOT|6|Nyxborn Creatures}的状态块）。猞猁能听懂你的口头命令，并尽其所能服从命令，它在你的命令之后立即进行轮回。特使在消逝前会停留1小时。

entries.name: Autumn
entries: As an action, you can fire this arrow at a space on the ground that you can see within 320 feet of you, no attack roll required, casting the {@spell wall of thorns} spell there.

entries.name: Winter
entries: 作为一个行动，你可以向你周围320英尺内你能看到的空间发射这支箭，不需要攻击卷，在那里施放{@spell ice storm}法术。

entries.name: Destroying the Bow
entries: 如果不先毁掉所有的箭，就不能毁掉这把弓。冬箭必须在冬至日喂给地狱犬。春天的箭必须在春分时种在阿斯波德黑橡树的根部。夏天的箭必须在夏至日被一个海巨人折断。然后，秋箭必须在秋分日射入九头蛇的尸体。当所有的四支箭都被摧毁时，弓和箭筒就会化为尘土。

item.name: Ersatz Eye
entries: 这种人造眼睛取代了丢失或被切除的真实眼睛。虽然人造眼球被嵌入你的眼窝，但除了你之外，任何人都无法将其取出，而且你可以通过这个小球看东西，就像它是一个正常的眼睛一样。

item.name: Essence of Ether
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 8 hours. The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition unconscious}. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

item.name: Euryale Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card at one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself and attempt to turn it to stone. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and has the {@condition restrained} condition. The affected target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends on the target. On a failed save, the target has the {@condition petrified} condition (instead of the {@condition restrained} condition) until it is removed by the {@spell Greater Restoration} spell or similar magic. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Euryale's Aegis
entries: This gleaming brass shield bears a relief of the legendary medusa druid {@creature Euryale|BMT}.
While wielding this shield, you gain the following benefits:

items.name: Blessing of Euryale
entries: You have resistance to poison damage and are immune to the {@condition petrified} condition.

items.name: Petrifying Heraldry
entries: As a bonus action, you can make the front of the shield flare with a medusa's petrifying magic, causing the relief's eyes to glow brightly. Choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The creature must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw, or it has the {@condition restrained} condition as its body turns to stone. The {@condition restrained} creature must make another DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the start of its next turn. On a failed save, the creature has the {@condition petrified} condition for 24 hours. On a successful save, the {@condition restrained} condition ends. Once this bonus action is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

items.name: Spellcasting
entries: While wielding the shield, you can use an action to cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell Lesser Restoration}, {@spell Locate Creature}, {@spell Transport via Plants}. Once you use the shield to cast a spell, the shield can't cast that spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Everbright Lantern
entries: 这个牛眼灯包含一个Eberron龙石，它发出的光可以与{@spell continual flame}的法术产生的光相媲美。一个常亮的灯笼在120英尺的范围内发光；最近的60英尺是亮光，最远的60英尺是暗光。

item.name: Eversmoking Bottle
entries: 烟雾从这个重达1磅的铜瓶的铅制瓶塞口中漏出。当你使用行动移除瓶塞时，一团浓烟从瓶子的60英尺半径范围内涌出。云的区域被严重遮蔽。瓶子每打开一分钟，在云雾中，半径就会增加10英尺，直到达到最大半径120英尺。
只要瓶子还开着，云就会一直存在。关闭瓶子需要你说出它的命令词作为行动。一旦瓶子关闭，10分钟后云就会散去。中等风力（每小时11至20英里）也可以在1分钟后驱散烟雾，强风（每小时21英里以上）可以在1轮后驱散。

item.name: Exotic Saddle
entries: 骑任何水生或飞行坐骑都需要一个异国情调的马鞍。

item.name: Explorer's Pack
entries: 包括。

items: a {@item backpack|phb}
a {@item bedroll|phb}
a {@item mess kit|phb}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
10 {@item torch|phb|torches}
10天的{@item Rations (1 day)|phb|rations}
a {@item waterskin|phb}
{@item Hempen Rope (50 feet)|phb|50 feet of hempen rope}

item.name: Explosive Seed
entries: 这个橡子大小的黄铜球体含有少量的爆破火药和一个发条触发器。一个爆炸性的种子可以作为一个动作被扔到30英尺外，在撞击时引爆。每个在爆炸种子5英尺范围内的生物都必须做一个DC10的灵巧救赎，如果救赎失败会受到{@damage 1d8}重击伤害，如果救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。

item.name: Eye Agate
entries: 灰色、白色、棕色、蓝色或绿色的半透明圈状宝石。

item.name: Eye of Vecna
entries: 很少有人提到Vecna的名字，除非是用沙哑的声音。维克纳在他的时代，是所有巫师中最强大的一个。通过黑暗魔法和征服，他建立了一个可怕的帝国。尽管他有如此强大的力量，韦克纳却无法逃避自己的死亡。他开始害怕死亡，并采取措施防止自己的末日到来。
{@creature Orcus|MTF}，不死的恶魔王子，教给韦克纳一个仪式，让他作为一个{@creature lich}继续生存。在死亡之外，他成为所有地衣中最伟大的一个。尽管他的身体逐渐枯萎和腐烂，Vecna继续扩大他的邪恶统治。他的脾气是如此的可怕和狰狞，以至于他的臣民都害怕说出他的名字。他是低语者，是蜘蛛王座的主人，是不死的国王，是腐烂之塔的主人。
有人说Vecna的副手Kas觊觎蜘蛛王座，或者说他的主人为他制作的剑引诱他反叛。不管是什么原因，卡斯在一场可怕的战斗中结束了不朽之王的统治，使韦克纳的塔成为一堆灰烬。维克纳只剩下一只手和一只眼睛，这些可怕的神器仍然试图在这个世界上实现低语者的意志。
维克纳之眼和{@item Hand of Vecna}可能一起或分开找到。这只眼睛看起来像一个从眼眶中撕裂出来的血色器官。手是一个木乃伊化的、干瘪的左肢。
要适应这只眼睛，你必须挖出自己的眼睛，并将神器压入空洞的眼窝。这只眼睛会自己移植到你的头上，并留在那里直到你死亡。一旦到位，这只眼睛就会变成一只金色的眼睛，瞳孔有一条缝，很像猫的眼睛。如果这只眼睛被摘除，你就会死亡。
为了适应这只手，你必须从手腕处砍掉你的左手，并将神器压在残肢上。这只手会自己移植到你的手臂上，并成为一个正常的附属物。如果这只手被移除，你就会死亡。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: 维克纳之眼和{@item Hand of Vecna}各自具有以下随机属性。

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}

entries.name: Properties of the Eye
entries: 你的排列组合变为中性邪恶，你获得以下好处。

items: 你有{@sense truesight}。
You can use an action to see as if you were wearing a {@item ring of X-ray vision}. You can end this effect as a bonus action.

这只眼睛有8个电荷。你可以使用一个动作并消耗1个或更多的电荷，用它来施展以下的法术（保存DC18）。{@spell clairvoyance} (2次充电), {@spell crown of madness} (1次充电), {@spell disintegrate} (4次充电), {@spell dominate monster} (5次充电), 或 {@spell eyebite} (4次充电)。眼睛每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d4 + 4}已消耗的能量。每次你用这只眼睛施法时，有百分之六的机会让维可娜把你的灵魂从你的身体上撕下来，吞噬它，然后像木偶一样控制你的身体。如果发生这种情况，你就会成为DM控制下的一个NPC。

entries.name: Properties of the Eye and Hand
entries: 如果你同时与手和眼相适应，你会获得以下额外的好处。

items: 你对疾病和毒药有免疫力。
Using the eye's X-ray vision never causes you to suffer {@condition exhaustion}.
你体验到危险的预感，除非你是{@condition incapacitated}，否则不可能是{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}。
如果你在开始回合时至少有1点命中率，你会恢复{@dice 1d10}的命中率。
如果一个生物有骨架，你可以尝试用{@item Hand of Vecna}的触觉将其骨头变成果冻。你可以通过使用一个动作对你能触及的生物进行近战攻击，使用你选择的武器或法术的近战攻击加成。一旦命中，目标必须在DC18宪法救赎中成功，否则命中率下降到0。
You can use an action to cast {@spell wish}. This property can't be used again until 30 days have passed.

entries.name: Destroying the Eye and Hand
entries: 如果Vecna之眼和{@item Hand of Vecna}都附着在同一个生物身上，而该生物被{@item Sword of Kas}杀死，那么眼睛和手都会燃起火焰，变成灰烬，并被永远摧毁。任何其他摧毁眼睛或手的尝试似乎都会奏效，但该神器会重新出现在Vecna的许多隐藏的地下室中，在那里等待着被重新发现。

item.name: Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone
Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone (Brazen Coalition)
Eyes of Charming
entries: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. They have 3 charges. While wearing them, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell charm person} spell (save DC 13) on a humanoid within 30 feet of you, provided that you and the target can see each other. The lenses regain all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Eyes of Minute Seeing
entries: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you can see much better than normal out to a range of 1 foot. You have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) checks that rely on sight while searching an area or studying an object within that range.

item.name: Eyes of the Eagle
entries: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight. In conditions of clear visibility, you can make out details of even extremely distant creatures and objects as small as 2 feet across.

item.name: Fabulist Gem
entries: This glittering red gem is commonly found embedded in a ring or brooch.
While wearing the gem, you gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Counterfeit Coins
entries: You can use your action to magically create a pile of coins, worth no more than 100 gp total, in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of yourself. The pile must appear on a surface that can support it. After 1 hour, the coins vanish, regardless of where they are. Once this action is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Illusory Fashion
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically change the appearance of your clothing and armor. You can change the style, color, and apparent quality of what you're wearing, or you can make it appear as if you were wearing different garments entirely. In either case, the changes wrought by this magic fail to pass physical inspection.

item.name: Faerie Dust
entries: 一撮这种粉尘可以代替任何3级或更低级的魔法的材料成分。如果一撮精灵尘洒在一个生物身上，请掷百分数骰子并参考精灵尘表来决定效果。

entries.caption: Faerie Dust
rows: 洒上尘土的生物获得60英尺的飞行速度，持续10分钟。

The creature sprinkled with dust must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The creature awakens if it takes damage or if it is shaken or slapped as an action.
被洒上灰尘的生物必须在DC11智慧救赎中成功，否则就会被一个{@spell confusion}的法术影响。

The creature sprinkled with dust becomes {@condition invisible} for 1 hour. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} as long as it is on the creature's person. The effect on the creature ends if it attacks, deals any damage, or casts a spell.

item.name: Failed Experiment Wand
entries: This wand has 2 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast either a green-flamed {@spell fireball} or a blue {@spell lightning bolt} at random from it (save DC 15).
For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Falkir's Helm of Pigheadedness
entries: 这个钢制头盔的形状像野猪的头。一旦你戴上头盔，在你死亡之前，或者在对它施以{@spell remove curse}的法术或类似的魔法之前，它都不能被摘除。如果你戴上头盔并且是一个人形生物，你会获得以下缺陷，直到头盔被移除。"我非常固执，认为自己一直是对的。" (这个缺陷取代了任何冲突的缺陷）。

item.name: Fane-Eater
item.reqAttune: by an evil cleric or paladin
entries: Fane-Eater is a battleaxe belonging to {@creature Arkhan the Cruel|BGDIA}.
你在使用食扇者的攻击和伤害卷上获得+3的奖励。如果你用此武器攻击一个生物，并在攻击卷上掷出20分，该生物会受到额外的{@damage 2d8}坏死伤害，并且你会恢复与所受坏死伤害相等的命中率。

item.name: Far Gear
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Charisma saving throws, and you have advantage on Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) checks.

entries.name: Aberrant Ally
entries: 你可以从多元宇宙的混沌中变出一个反常的生物来为你服务。这个功能与{@spell conjure celestial}法术一样（不需要{@status concentration}），只是你召唤的生物是挑战等级4或更低的畸形生物。一旦你使用了远处装备的这一功能，在下一个黎明之前不能再次使用。

entries.name: Unnatural Bane
entries: You can cast the {@spell bane} spell (save DC 15), which affects any number of creatures within range for 1 minute. Once you use this feature of the far gear, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: 虽然这个组件没有安装在{@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}，但它的魔法可能会零星地发挥作用，或者有不可预知的副作用，这由DM决定。

item.name: Far Realm Shard
entries: 这块蠕动的水晶浸透了远界扭曲的精华。作为一个动作，你可以将这个碎片附在一个微小的物体上（如武器或珠宝），或者将它分离。如果你对它的调和结束，它就会脱落。当你持有或佩戴它时，你可以将碎片作为施法的焦点。
当你在持有或佩戴这个碎片的时候，对一个法术使用元神选项时，你可以使一个粘稠的触手撕开现实的结构，攻击你周围30英尺内你能看到的一个生物。该生物必须对你的法术救赎DC的魅力救赎成功，否则会受到{@damage 3d6}的精神伤害，并成为你的{@condition frightened}，直到你下一回合开始。

item.name: Fargab
entries: 这些背包大小的装置是成对制造的，上面刻有匹配的数字，并允许使用无线电频率进行远距离通信。在佩戴法格布时，你可以使用一个动作，对着设备的口罩说话，并向另一个佩戴相匹配的法格布的生物发送一条25字以内的短信息，而该生物就在你18英里以内。信息从设备的扬声器发出，在离设备10英尺的地方都能听到。如果没有生物戴着法格布，扬声器会发出静态的声音。

item.name: Fate Cutter Shears
entries: The blades of these pruning shears bear many nicks and dents but still cut cleanly. The shears function as a magic dagger. The weapon has the following properties:

items.name: Ever Sharp
entries: When you hit with an attack using the shears, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage.

items.name: Sever Threads
entries: When you hit a creature with the shears, you can cut that creature's fate. Until the target finishes a long rest, attack rolls against it score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Fates Card
entries: As a bonus action, you can brandish this card at one willing creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself, granting the creature a brief glimpse of the future. Until the start of your next turn, the creature has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. Additionally, other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target for the duration. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Feather of Diatryma Summoning
entries: This bright plume is made from the feather of a {@creature diatryma|wdh} (pronounced dee-ah-TRY-mah), a Large, colorful, flightless bird native to the Underdark. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the feather into a Large unoccupied space on the ground within 5 feet of you, the feather becomes a living diatryma for up to 6 hours, after which it reverts to its feather form. It reverts to feather form early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching the bird.
当二维码恢复到羽毛形态时，在7天过后才能再次使用羽毛的魔法。
diatryma使用{@creature axe beak}的统计数据，除了它的喙会造成穿刺伤害而不是砍击伤害。这种生物对你和你的同伴都很友好，它可以被当作坐骑使用。它能听懂你的语言，并服从你的口头命令。如果你没有发出任何命令，迪亚特里玛会自我防御，但不会采取其他行动。

item.name: Feather Token
entries: 这个小金属盘上刻有羽毛的图案。当令牌在你身上时，当你坠落至少20英尺时，你每回合下降60英尺，并且不会受到坠落的伤害。令牌的魔力在你落地后会被消耗掉，这时圆盘会变得没有魔力。

item.name: Feathered Helm
entries: The helm itself is simple leather, hide, scale, or plate, but the magic imbued into it comes from the feather. The birdfolk races of Humblewood consider the giving of a feather to be one of the highest honors one can bestow, and it represents an eternal bond or deep appreciation.
The helm has 3 charges that, while wearing it, you can use to activate its abilities. The helm has different properties based on the race of the birdfolk who gifted the feather.

entries.name: Corvum
entries: You can use a charge to cast {@spell Tasha's hideous laughter} (save DC 16) and two charges to cast {@spell detect thoughts} (save DC 16).

entries.name: Gallus
entries: You can use a charge to cast {@spell bless} and two charges to cast {@spell aid}.

entries.name: Luma
entries: You can use a charge to cast a random 1st-level spell from the {@filter sorcerer spell list|spells|level=1|class=sorcerer}, then roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 20, you may use this ability again without expending a charge. On a roll of 1, the spell also targets you, unless you are its only target, in which case the spell fizzles to no effect. Any spell cast using this helm that requires a saving throw has a save DC of 16.

entries.name: Raptor
entries: You can use a charge to cast {@spell hunter's mark} and two charges to cast {@spell magic weapon}.

entries.name: Strig
entries: You can use a charge to cast {@spell divine favor} and two charges to cast {@spell pass without trace}.
The helm regains {@dice 1d3} charges each day at dawn.

entries.name: A True Gift
entries: Whether you are playing through the Humblewood adventure, or playing your own campaign in the Wood, look for organic relationships between a character and the races of birdfolk. If one stands out, use that to decide what type of feather is offered to the player in this helm.

Additionally, a player whose character is a birdfolk may want to make this gift themselves. Make sure to create a narrative bond between this character and who they share a feather with—the gift of a feather is not something which should be given lightly.

item.name: Feathered mantle with emerald clasp (Sun Empire)

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When Fenthras reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2. Additionally, when you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d4} lightning damage.

When you hit with an attack using this weapon, you can declare it a bramble shot. The attack deals an extra {@damage 3d8} piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or become {@condition restrained} by steely brambles that burst from the arrow. A {@condition restrained} target can repeat the {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

item.name: Fenthras (Dormant)
entries: This gorgeous {@item longbow|phb} made of everbark from the Fey Realm flexes and shifts like a living entity. It is said to have been wielded by the legendary ranger {@creature Vex'ahlia|TDCSR} against great evils.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While Fenthras is in a dormant state, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

When you make an attack with Fenthras, you can declare it an oracle shot, allowing you to experience the area around the arrow using your normal senses for 10 minutes. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

Additionally, when a creature is killed by an attack using this weapon, a six-foot-tall tree rapidly grows out of the corpse over the next minute. The tree is rooted in the ground to make the body difficult to move, but does not permanently damage the corpse or its organs.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When Fenthras reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+3。
The extra lightning damage dealt by attacks using the bow increases to {@dice 1d6}.
You can declare a bramble shot twice between rests, and the {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} DC increases to 17.

item.name: Feywild Shard
entries: 这块温暖的水晶闪烁着翡冷翠天空的夕阳色彩，唤起情感记忆的低语。作为一个动作，你可以将碎片附着在一个微小的物体上（如武器或珠宝），或将其分离。如果你对它的调和结束，它就会脱落。当你持有或佩戴它时，你可以使用碎片作为施法的焦点。

When you use a Metamagic option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}. If the result is a spell, it is too wild to be affected by your Metamagic, and if it normally requires {@status concentration}, it doesn't require {@status concentration} in this case; the spell lasts for its full duration.
If you don't have the Wild Magic Sorcerous Origin, once this property is used to roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Feywild Trinket
entries: 下面的 "仙界饰品 "表提供了适合于仙界主题冒险的饰品选择，比如本篇。角色具有Feylost或Witchlight手牌背景的玩家可以在这张表格上掷骰子，而不是在{@book Player's Handbook|PHB}中的{@book Trinkets|PHB|5|Trinkets}表格上掷骰子，以决定他们的角色拥有什么饰品。这场冒险包括一些需要你在表格上掷骰子以决定角色在关键地点找到什么随机饰品的遭遇。

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Bronze Griffon
entries: 神奇力量的雕像是一个小到可以装进口袋的野兽雕像。如果你用一个动作说出命令语，并将小雕像扔到你周围60英尺内的地面上，小雕像就会变成一个活物。如果这个生物会出现的空间被其他生物或物体占据，或者没有足够的空间容纳这个生物，那么这个小雕像就不会成为一个生物。
该生物对你和你的同伴都很友好。它能听懂你的语言，并服从你的口头命令。如果你不发出任何命令，该生物会自我防御，但不采取其他行动。
该生物存在于每个小雕像的特定期限内。在持续时间结束时，该生物会恢复到它的雕像形态。如果它的命中率下降到0，或者你在接触它的时候使用行动再次说出命令词，它就会提前恢复成小雕像。当生物再次变成小雕时，它的属性不能再次被使用，直到过了一定的时间，如小雕的描述中规定的那样。

entries.name: {@creature griffon||Bronze Griffon}
entries: 这个青铜雕像是一个{@creature griffon}横行的雕像。它可以变成{@creature griffon}，最长6小时。一旦它被使用，直到5天之后才可以再次使用。

entries.name: {@creature riding horse||Ivory Goats}
entries: 这些山羊的象牙雕像总是以三件套的形式创作。每只山羊看起来都很独特，功能也与其他的不同。它们的特性如下。

items: The goat of traveling can become a Large goat with the same statistics as a {@creature riding horse}. It has 24 charges, and each hour or portion thereof it spends in beast form costs 1 charge. While it has charges, you can use it as often as you wish. When it runs out of charges, it reverts to a figurine and can't be used again until 7 days have passed, when it regains all its charges.
The goat of travail becomes a {@creature giant goat} for up to 3 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 30 days have passed.

恐怖的山羊变成了{@creature giant goat}，最多持续3小时。山羊不能攻击，但你可以取下它的角，把它们当作武器使用。一个角成为+1长枪，另一个角成为+2长剑。取下一个角需要一个动作，当山羊恢复到雕像形态时，武器会消失，角会恢复。此外，当你骑着山羊时，山羊会散发出一个半径为30英尺的恐怖光环。任何对你有敌意的生物在光环中开始行动时，必须在DC15智慧救赎中成功，否则在1分钟内会被山羊的{@condition frightened}攻击，或者直到山羊恢复成雕像形态。2%）的生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。一旦成功救治，生物在接下来的24小时内将对山羊的光环免疫。一旦小雕像被使用，在15天过去之前不能再次使用。

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant
entries: 神奇力量的雕像是一个小到可以装进口袋的野兽雕像。如果你用一个动作说出命令语，并将小雕像扔到你周围60英尺内的地面上，小雕像就会变成一个活物。如果这个生物会出现的空间被其他生物或物体占据，或者没有足够的空间容纳这个生物，那么这个小雕像就不会成为一个生物。
该生物对你和你的同伴都很友好。它能听懂你的语言，并服从你的口头命令。如果你不发出任何命令，该生物会自我防御，但不采取其他行动。
该生物存在于每个小雕像的特定期限内。在持续时间结束时，该生物会恢复到它的雕像形态。如果它的命中率下降到0，或者你在接触它的时候使用行动再次说出命令词，它就会提前恢复成小雕像。当生物再次变成小雕时，它的属性不能再次被使用，直到过了一定的时间，如小雕的描述中规定的那样。

entries.name: {@creature elephant||Marble Elephant}
entries: 这个大理石雕像大约有4英寸高和长。它可以成为一个{@creature elephant}，时间长达24小时。一旦它被使用，在7天过去之前不能再次使用。

entries.name: {@creature nightmare||Obsidian Steed}
entries: 这匹打磨过的黑曜石马可以变成{@creature nightmare}，长达24小时。{@creature nightmare}的战斗只为了保护自己。一旦它被使用过，在5天过后才能再次使用。
如果你有一个好的排列组合，这个小雕像在你每次使用它时都有{@chance 10}的机会无视你的命令，包括恢复小雕像形态的命令。如果你在它无视你的命令时骑上它，你和{@creature nightmare}会被瞬间传送到哈迪斯平面上的一个随机位置，在那里{@creature nightmare}会恢复成小雕像的形态。

entries.name: {@creature mastiff||Onyx Dog}
entries: 这只狗的玛瑙雕像可以变成{@creature mastiff}，时间长达6小时。它的智力为8，可以说普通话。它在60英尺范围内有{@sense darkvision}的能力，并能看到{@condition invisible}该范围内的生物和物体。一旦它被使用，在7天内不能再次使用。

entries.name: {@creature giant owl||Serpentine Owl}
entries: This serpentine statuette of an owl can become a {@creature giant owl} for up to 8 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 2 days have passed. The owl can telepathically communicate with you at any range if you and it are on the same plane of existence.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Silver Raven
entries: 神奇力量的雕像是一个小到可以装进口袋的野兽雕像。如果你用一个动作说出命令语，并将小雕像扔到你周围60英尺内的地面上，小雕像就会变成一个活物。如果这个生物会出现的空间被其他生物或物体占据，或者没有足够的空间容纳这个生物，那么这个小雕像就不会成为一个生物。

entries.name: {@creature raven||Silver Raven}
entries: This silver statuette of a raven can become a raven for up to 12 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 2 days have passed. While in raven form, the figurine allows you to cast the {@spell animal messenger} spell on it at will.

item.name: Finder's Goggles
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Mark of Finding
entries: 这些花哨的护目镜的镜片是由西伯利亚的龙石雕刻而成。在佩戴这些镜片时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 当你进行智慧({@skill Insight})检查时，你可以掷出{@dice d4}，并将掷出的数字加入检查。

As an action, you can use the goggles to examine an object to identify the aura of the last creature that touched it. Make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check against a DC of 13 + the number of days since the last contact occurred. On a success, you learn the creature's type and can immediately use the goggles to cast {@spell locate creature} to find that creature. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Fine gold chain set with a fire opal
Fine gold chain with fire opals (Legion of Dusk)
Fine robe with dinosaur feathers and silver embroidery (Sun Empire)
Fine steel rapier with gold filigree hilt (Legion of Dusk)
Fire Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Fire Opal
entries: 一种半透明的火红色宝石。

item.name: Fish Suit
entries: 这种笨重的衣服完全包裹着你的头部和身体，穿脱需要1分钟。穿上后，它能使你在无空气的环境中呼吸，并使你对周围的任何气体的有害影响免疫。这套衣服还能让你在水下拥有与你的步行速度相等的游泳速度，或者在没有重力的环境中拥有与你的步行速度相等的飞行速度。

item.name: Fishing Tackle
entries: 这套工具包括一根木杆、丝线、软木浮标、钢钩、铅沉子、天鹅绒诱饵和窄网。

item.name: Flail of Tiamat
entries: This magic flail is made in the image of Tiamat, with five jagged heads shaped like the heads of five different chromatic dragons. You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this flail. When you hit with an attack roll using it, the target takes an extra {@damage 5d4} damage of your choice of one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

While holding the flail, you can use an action and speak a command word to cause the heads to breathe multicolored flames in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@damage 14d6} damage of one of the following damage types (your choice): acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage. Once this action is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Flame Lance
entries: This weapon is a long metal lance with a small flame that burns at its end. It has a hose coming from the hilt that connects to a metal tank that you wear on your back.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

The tank has 5 charges. You can use an action and expend one or more charges from the tank to cast {@spell burning hands} (Save DC 15). For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
Once per day, you can pour a vial of alchemist's fire into the tank. When you do, it regains all expended charges. It otherwise does not regain charges on its own.
You have disadvantage when you use a lance to attack a target within 5 feet of you. Also, a lance requires two hands to wield when you aren't mounted.

item.name: Flame Tongue Shortsword of Greed
entries: You can use a bonus action to speak this magic sword's command word, causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra {@damage 2d6} fire damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again or until you drop or sheathe the sword.
当你与这把剑相适应时，你可以使用一个动作，在精神上命令它探测宝石和珠宝。你会知道在剑的60英尺范围内这些物品的种类和数量。

item.name: Flamefriend Lantern
entries: This wrought-iron lantern holds a small fire elemental spirit. To attune to this item, you must also succeed on a {@dc 10} Charisma check to bond with the spirit inside the lantern.

entries.name: Light and Flame
entries: While attuned to the lantern, you can verbally ask the elemental to glow (no action required), causing the lantern to cast bright light in a radius of your choice up to 60 feet and dim light for the same distance beyond that. You can also cast the {@spell produce flame} cantrip from the lantern at will. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: Elemental Essence
entries: The fire elemental spirit in the lantern can grant you a small fragment of its power. As an action, you gain one of the following benefits of your choice for 1 hour:

items: 你对火灾伤害有抵抗力。
Whenever a creature hits you with a melee attack, that creature takes fire damage equal to your proficiency bonus.

You can cast the {@spell burning hands} spell (spell save {@dc 15}) from the lantern at 3rd level. Once you cast the spell, you can't do so again until the next time you use this property of the lantern.

entries: Once the elemental has shared its power with you in this way, it can't do so again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Willful Attunement
entries: Your {@quickref attunement|DMG|1|0} to the lantern lasts until you choose to end it, or until you anger the elemental (by dousing the lantern in water, attacking another nonhostile elemental being, and so forth). You can attempt to attune to the lantern again and repeat the check to bond with the elemental during a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}, but you make this check with {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|disadvantage} until you have made amends to the spirit, as the GM determines.

item.name: Flames Card
entries: You can use this card to summon a devil. The card is attuned to {@filter a specific devil with a challenge rating of 8 or lower|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&8]|tag=devil|miscellaneous=}. As an action, you can hold this card aloft and summon that devil, which appears in an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet of you. The devil is initially unfriendly toward you and your companions. Roll initiative for the devil, which has its own turns. The DM has the creature's stat block. On each of your turns, you can issue a verbal command to the devil (no action required by you), and as long as you are holding this card, the devil obeys your commands. Otherwise, it is under the DM's control and acts according to its nature—it might attack you if it thinks it can prevail or try to tempt you to undertake an evil act in exchange for further service. After 1 minute or when the devil's hit points drop to 0, the devil returns to the Lower Planes. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Flask
entries: 一个烧瓶可容纳1品脱的液体。

item.name: Flayer Slayer
entries: Carvings of decapitated mind flayers adorn this greataxe's metal blade. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this greataxe.

An Aberration hit with this greataxe takes an extra {@damage 1d12} slashing damage. If the Aberration is currently grappling a creature, the Aberration must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or release each creature it is grappling.

item.name: Flensing Claws (Huge)
entries: Flensing的爪子采取铰接式指头的形式，延伸成长长的金属刀片。这些爪子被编织在生物手臂的肉和骨头中，如果不通过手术截肢就无法取出。
每套楞严爪都是为一个特定的生物设计的，不能被其他人使用。装备法兰西之爪的生物可以用它的行动来用爪子进行一次近战武器攻击。该生物在用爪子进行的任何攻击卷中加入其熟练度加成和力量修正值，当它用爪子击中目标时，在其伤害卷中加入其力量修正值。
