一个带有愤怒表情的布娃娃
一套用贝壳制作的风铃
一个美丽的银色罐子，打开后会散发出腐烂鱼的气味。
用钓鱼线、金丝和雪白的猫头鹰羽毛制作的血迹斑斑的捕梦器
一个由冰块制成的永不融化的北极熊塑像
不需要摇晃的雪球
一块形状像独角兽之角的海玻璃
一条深蓝色的围巾，佩戴者的海拔越高，颜色就越浅。

item.name: Icon of Ravenloft
item.reqAttune: by a creature of good alignment
entries: 拉文洛夫特的圣像是一个12英寸高的雕像，由最纯净的银制成，重达10磅。它描绘了一个跪着祈求的教士。
这幅圣像是家族的老朋友--大主教西里尔-罗穆里奇送给斯特拉赫特的，用来为城堡及其小教堂做圣礼。
当在图标的30英尺范围内，生物会受到一个针对恶魔和亡灵的{@spell protection from evil and good}法术的影响。只有与图腾相适应的生物才能使用它的其他属性。

entries.name: Augury
entries: 你可以用一个动作从图标上施放一个{@spell augury}的法术，不需要任何材料成分。一旦使用，这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

entries.name: Bane of the Undead
entries: 你可以在使用转化不死之身或转化邪恶之身的功能时，将这个图标作为一个神圣的符号。如果你这样做，救赎DC增加2。

entries.name: Cure Wounds
entries: 当持有这个图标时，你可以采取一个行动来治疗一个你能看到的30英尺内的生物。目标恢复{@dice 3d8 + 3}的命中率，除非它是不死族、构装体或魔族。一旦使用，这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Iggwilv's Cauldron
entries: {@creature Iggwilv the Witch Queen|WBtW|Iggwilv}在她的养母--大法师巴巴-雅加的帮助下，制作了这个神奇的大锅。这个大锅有两种形式。只有Iggwilv或Baba Yaga可以将大锅从一种形态转变为另一种形态（通过使用动作来触摸它），而这两个人都可以在不与该物品相适应的情况下做到。在第一种形态下，大锅由纯金制成，外面压印着光秃秃的树枝、落叶和扫帚的图像。在第二种形式中，大锅由铁制成，外面压印着蝙蝠、蟾蜍、猫、蜥蜴和蛇的图像，每种动物都有八个。无论哪种形式，大锅的直径大约为3英尺，有一个2英尺宽的嘴，一个圆形的盖子，上面有一个模制的把手，还有八个爪子，以保持稳定。大锅空时重达80磅，可容纳100加仑的液体。

entries.name: Attunement
entries: Any Humanoid creature that attunes to the cauldron must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be aged to the point of decrepitude. In this state, the creature's speed is halved, the range of its vision and hearing is reduced to 30 feet, and it has disadvantage on all ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The creature will reach the end of its natural life span in {@dice 3d8} days. Only a {@spell wish} spell or divine intervention can reverse this aging effect on the creature.
三个女巫可以同时与大锅相合，只要她们组成了一个巫师团。如果女巫团解散，所有三个女巫的调和都会结束。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: 无论采取何种形式，大锅都有以下随机属性。

items: 1个{@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial}属性（通过在《地下城主指南》中的{@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|Minor Beneficial}属性表上滚动来确定）。
1个{@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental}属性（通过在《地下城主指南》中的{@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|Minor Detrimental}属性表上滚动来确定）。

entries.name: Gold Cauldron
entries: 黄金大锅有以下属性。

items: 如果把水倒入大锅并搅拌1分钟，它就会变成丰盛的热炖品，每用一加仑水就能为4个人提供一顿营养餐。炖品在大锅里时保持高温，取出后自然冷却。尽管炖肉很热，但大锅的外部仍然可以安全触摸。
如果将酒倒入大锅并搅拌10分钟，它就会转化为一种神奇的灵药，每使用一加仑的酒最多可以强化四个人。任何吸食灵药的生物都会获得10个临时命中点。任何在1小时内没有饮用的灵药都会消失。一旦使用，大锅的这一属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。
当大锅装满90加仑的水和10加仑的酒时，它可以作为一个{@spell scrying}法术的焦点。当用大锅作为焦点施法时，被施法的目标会自动失败，即使施法者和目标在不同的存在平面上，该法术也会生效。当咒语结束时，大锅中所有的液体都会消失。
将普通扫帚的刷子浸入装满水的大锅中，可使扫帚变成飞行的扫帚，持续3天。一旦使用，大锅的这一属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

entries.name: Iron Cauldron
entries: 铁锅具有以下特性。

items: You can use an action to scream into the empty cauldron, which magically summons a {@creature swarm of bats} that flies out of the cauldron and acts immediately after you in the initiative order. The swarm obeys your commands and disappears after 1 minute if it hasn't been destroyed by then. Once used, this property of the cauldron can't be used again until the next dawn.

If at least 1 gallon of blood is poured into the cauldron and stirred for 1 minute, it turns into a cloud of harmless black smoke that erupts from the cauldron and dissipates quickly. At the same time, all Humanoid creatures within a certain radius of the cauldron fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 hour, except those that are attuned to the cauldron or immune to being {@condition charmed}. The radius of the effect is 100 feet per gallon of blood used. An {@condition unconscious} creature awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an action to shake or slap it. Once used, this property of the cauldron can't be used again until the next dawn.

Tying a dead frog or toad to the end of an ordinary branch and dipping it in the water-filled cauldron transforms the branch into a {@item wand of polymorph} with 3 charges. This wand can't recharge and crumbles to ashes when its final charge is expended. Once used, this property of the cauldron can't be used again for 8 days.

If you spend 1 minute touching the cauldron with a unicorn's horn while reciting the poem called "The Witch Queen's Cauldron" (see the accompanying sidebar), all creatures within 1,000 feet of the cauldron except those that are attuned to it become frozen in time. A time-frozen creature is {@condition incapacitated}, can't move or speak, doesn't age, and is unaware of its surroundings or the passage of time. Moreover, it can't be moved, harmed in any way, or affected by any other magic. All other conditions and effects on the creature are suppressed until it is no longer frozen in time. Destroying the cauldron, sending it to another plane of existence, or touching it with a unicorn's horn for 1 minute while reciting "The Witch Queen's Cauldron" ends the time-freezing effect on all creatures. The effect also ends on any creature that comes into contact with an antimagic field or is touched by a unicorn's horn.

entries.name: Destroying the Cauldron
entries: 大锅是一个中等物体，AC值为19，命中率为80，对来自火焰之舌或冰霜烙印武器以外的任何来源的伤害具有免疫力。用这样的武器将大锅的命中率降至0，会将大锅击碎成八块大小基本相同的碎片，这时大锅所产生的所有持续效果都会结束，因为它失去了魔法。
伊格威夫熔炉的毁灭导致多元宇宙中的所有女巫失去了因身处女巫团而获得的共享法术特性（参见《怪物手册》中的 "女巫团 "侧栏）。

entries.name: Reconstructing the Cauldron
entries: 如果大锅的八块碎片都在彼此的5英尺范围内，一个{@spell wish}的法术可以将它们重新组合，恢复大锅和它的所有属性。大锅的重建也会恢复整个多元宇宙中巫师团体的共享法术特性。

entries.name: The Witch Queen's Cauldron
entries: 正如伊格维尔的熔炉的描述中所解释的那样，名为 "巫婆女王的熔炉 "的诗句是一个暗示该神器的时间冻结特性的咒语。
八只猫栖息在八个死人身上
八只蜥蜴逃离八只老鼠的清扫范围
八只蟾蜍爬行遇到八只死掉的蟾蜍
八条蛇在八只蝙蝠的尖叫声中潜行
睁着八只眼睛，一直在做梦
所有在大锅上的人，都在不断地出现

item.name: Ignacious, the Sword of Burning Truth
entries: This sacred weapon was forged to burn away deception and darkness. Blazing embers gently fall from the silver blade, first ignited by the brazier in the Temple of Lumen.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the following additional properties:

You can use a bonus action to speak the sword's name, causing radiant flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed {@quickref Vision and Light||2||bright light} in a 40-foot radius and {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light} for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra {@damage 4d6} radiant damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to douse the blade, or until you drop or sheathe the sword.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ignacious is a sentient lawful good weapon with an Intelligence of 11, a Wisdom of 19, and a Charisma of 23. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet. The weapon can speak, read, and understand Common, Celestial, and Draconic, and can communicate with its wielder telepathically. It always knows its wielder's thoughts. Its voice is commanding, righteous, and booming. When drawn, Ignacious casts the {@spell zone of truth} spell (save DC 20), and maintains {@status concentration} on it so that you don't have to. The {@spell zone of truth} moves with the blade and remains centred on it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Ignacious is zealously devoted to the Sacred Flame, and has memorized every word of its holy texts. The blade wishes to be wielded by a faithful devotee of any sort; Ignacious does not care about the religious divide between the Falling Fire and the Sacred Flame so long as its wielder keeps the core tenets shared by both sects.

The sword's purpose is to expose all deception and reveal the truth. It does not tolerate any falsehood, duplicitousness, or lies. The sword always knows when it hears a lie, and responds with wrathful fury. If a wielder speaks a lie, it immediately triggers a conflict.

entries.name: Relics of Saint Vitruvio
entries: These holy relics of the Sacred Flame were wielded by Saint Vitruvio and are kept in several religious sites throughout Drakkenheim. The Knights of the Silver Order and the Followers of the Falling Fire now seek these relics. Not only do both factions revere Saint Vitruvio, both wish to use these relics to help advance their goals in Drakkenheim.

A character attuned to three Relics of Saint Vitruvio may cast the {@spell heal} spell three times per day, after which they must finish a long rest before they may do so again. In addition, that character gains the ability to attune to two additional magic items so long as those magic items are both Relics of Saint Vitruvio.

item.name: Illuminator's Tattoo
entries: 这种神奇的纹身是由一种特殊的针制作的，它的特点是美丽的书法，书写工具的图像，以及类似的东西。

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: 为了适应这个项目，你把针放在你希望出现纹身的皮肤上，在整个适应过程中按下针。当调和完成后，针会变成墨水，成为纹身，出现在皮肤上。
如果你对纹身的调和结束，纹身就会消失，而针会重新出现在你的空间。

entries.name: Magical Scribing
entries: 当这个纹身在你的皮肤上时，你可以用你的指尖写字，就像一支墨水笔一样，永远不会耗尽墨水。

As an action, you can touch a piece of writing up to one page in length and speak a creature's name. The writing becomes {@condition invisible} to everyone other than you and the named creature for the next 24 hours. Either of you can dismiss the invisibility by touching the script (no action required). Once used, this action can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Illusionist's Bracers
entries: 迪米尔家族的一位强大的幻术师最初开发了这副手镯，使她能够同时创造多个小幻术。不过，这副手镯的力量远远超出了幻觉的范围。
在佩戴手镯时，每当你施放咒语时，你可以在同一回合使用一个额外动作来第二次施放该咒语。

item.name: Immovable Rod
entries: 这根扁铁棒的一端有一个按钮。你可以用一个动作来按下这个按钮，这将使铁棒神奇地固定在原地。直到你或其他生物再次使用动作按下按钮，这根棍子就不会动了，即使它违背了重力。杆子最多能承受8000磅的重量。更多的重量会导致棒子失灵并坠落。一个生物可以用一个动作做一个DC30的力量检查，成功的话可以将固定的棒子移动到10英尺。

item.name: Inescapable Lash
entries: This braided cord is dull bronze in color, ends in a splayed set of three barbs, and gleams like metal under any light. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, which has a reach of 20 feet. When you hit a creature or object using this whip, you can attempt to {@action grapple} the target as a bonus action.

While you have a creature {@condition grappled} using this whip, you can use your action to either pull the creature up to 20 feet toward you, or cause the creature to be {@condition restrained} until you let go of the whip. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way can escape by making a successful Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check as an action. The DC of this check equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier.

item.name: Infernal Amulet
entries: While wearing this amulet, you can use it as a spellcasting focus for your spells, and it grants a +2 bonus to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus.

entries.name: Curse
entries: You're unwilling to part with this amulet while attuned to it and you wear it always. While wearing the amulet you have disadvantage on Strength saving throws and Strength checks. Only the {@spell Remove Curse} spell allows you to remove the item and end attunement.

entries.name: Corrupting
entries: This item corrupts. See the "{@adventure Infernal Item Corruption|CoA|16|Infernal Item Corruption}" section.

item.name: Infernal Plate Armor
entries: While wearing this armor, you gain a +2 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Curse
entries: Once you wear this armor, and are attuned to it, you can't remove it. Only the {@spell Remove Curse} spell allows you to end the attunement and finally doff it. While wearing the armor, you're vulnerable to the following damage types: force, lightning, psychic, radiant, and thunder.

entries.name: Corrupting
entries: This item corrupts. See the "{@adventure Infernal Item Corruption|CoA|16|Infernal Item Corruption}" section.

item.name: Infernal Puzzle Box
entries: 地狱拼图盒是一个边长为5至6英寸的立方体容器，由密不透风的互锁部件组成，这些部件由九层地狱里的材料制成。这些盒子大多是由地狱铁制成的，但也有一些是用骨头或角雕刻的。地狱谜题箱被用来保护魔鬼和凡人之间签订的恶魔契约，即使这些契约的条款已经履行完毕。一个空的地狱谜题盒重达3磅，无论用什么材料来制作。
当一个小到足以装入地狱拼图盒的物体被放入其中时，容器会神奇地将该物体封闭起来，任何魔法都无法迫使盒子打开。密封的盒子也会对所有的伤害免疫。每个无间道谜盒都有独特的打开方式。解开谜题的诀窍总是平凡的，从来不是魔法的。一旦一个生物想出了打开一个特定的无间道谜题盒所需的诀窍或步骤序列，这个生物就可以作为一个行动来打开这个盒子，允许接触到盒子里的东西。

A creature that spends 1 hour holding an infernal puzzle box while trying to open it can make a DC 30 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check. If the check succeeds, the creature figures out the trick or sequence of steps needed to open the box. If the check fails by 5 or more, the creature must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Infernal Tack
item.reqAttune: by a creature of evil alignment.
entries: A rider binds a {@creature nightmare} to its service with infernal tack, which consists of a bridle, bit, reins, saddle, and stirrups, along with spurs that are worn by the rider. A nightmare equipped with infernal tack must serve whoever wears the spurs until the wearer dies or the tack is removed.
你可以用一个动作来召唤一个装备有地狱之钉的恶梦，方法是将马刺碰撞在一起或将它们刮过血。恶梦会在你下一个回合开始时出现，在你的20英尺范围内。它就像你的盟友一样，在你的主动权数上进行回合。它将持续1天，直到你或它死亡，或直到你以行动方式将其解散。如果梦魇死亡，它将在24小时内在九层地狱中重组，此后你可以再次召唤它。
大头针并不能变出一个恶梦；恶梦必须首先被制服，这样大头针才能被放在它身上。没有一个噩梦会心甘情愿地接受这种被迫的奴役，但有些噩梦最终会对它们的主人形成强烈的忠诚，并成为真正的邪恶伙伴。

items.name: Awakened
entries: 当渗透者的钥匙达到觉醒状态时，它将获得以下属性。

items: 在持有钥匙的时候，你可以使用一个额外的动作将钥匙变成一把神奇的匕首或者变回一把钥匙。当钥匙处于匕首的形态时，你用它进行的攻击和伤害卷获得+1的加成，并且在它被用来进行远程攻击后立即回到你手中。
在握住钥匙的时候，你可以用一个动作从它那里施放以下法术之一。{@spell alter self}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell knock}, 或 {@spell pass without trace}。一旦用钥匙施放了一个法术，在下一个黎明之前就不能再用来施放该法术。

item.name: Infiltrator's Key (Dormant)
entries: 这把软玉骷髅钥匙是用十二个盗贼大师的血铸造的，他们在阿卡努姆时代因试图偷窃魔法物品而被处决。

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 渗透者的钥匙在休眠状态下会给予以下好处。

items: 钥匙可以作为{@item thieves' tools|phb}用于开锁的目的。当使用钥匙时，你被认为精通{@item thieves' tools|PHB}，并且你在打开锁的能力检查中具有优势。
拿着钥匙的时候，你的脚步会被消音，使你在灵巧({@skill Stealth})的检查中获得优势，以便无声地移动。

items.name: Exalted
entries: 当渗透者的钥匙达到高阶状态时，它将获得以下属性。

items: 作为一个额外的动作，你可以将钥匙接触到不超过5英尺厚的地板、墙壁或天花板，并使其表面出现一个神奇的开口。当你创造这个开口时，你可以选择它的长度和宽度，每个维度最多 10 英尺。这个开口一直持续到钥匙穿过它到达另一边，这时它就会消失（如果门洞关闭时有生物在开口中，那么这个生物会被安全地分流到最近的无人空间）。在下一个黎明之前，这把钥匙不能被用来创造另一个开口。
在握住钥匙的时候，你可以用一个动作从它那里施放以下法术之一。{@spell dimension door}, {@spell gaseous form}, 或 {@spell mislead}。一旦用钥匙施放了一个法术，在下一个黎明之前，它不能再被用来施放该法术。

item.name: Ingot of the Skold Rune
entries: 这似乎是一个简单的铁矿锭，大约一英尺长，几英寸宽。观察它的表面，可以发现微弱的、银色的skold（盾牌）符文的轮廓。这块铁锭有以下属性，只有当它在你身上时才有效。

entries.name: Runic Shield
entries: 你有一个+1的交流奖励。

entries.name: Shield Bond
entries: 作为一个额外动作，选择一个你能看到的30英尺范围内的生物，而不是你自己。直到你的下一回合结束，目标受到的任何伤害都会减少到1，但你受到的伤害是以这种方式防止的一半。你受到的伤害不能以任何方式减少。一旦你使用这个属性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

entries.name: Shield Ward
entries: 你可以将魔锭的魔力转移到一个非魔法物品上--盾牌或双手近战武器--通过用手指追踪那里的斯科尔德符文。转移需要8个小时的工作，要求两件物品在彼此5英尺范围内。最后，银锭会被销毁，符文会以银色出现在所选物品上，物品会根据其形态获得好处。

items.name: Shield
items.entry: 盾牌现在是一个稀有的魔法物品，需要调教。它的魔法为你提供了一个+1的交流奖励，并且在你每次长期休息后的第一次伤害将你的命中率降至0时，你的命中率反而会降至1。你必须挥舞着这面盾牌才能获得这些好处。

items.name: Weapon
items.entry: 该武器现在是一个不常见的魔法武器。当你拿着它的时候，它能给你一个+1的交流奖励。

item.name: Ink (1-ounce bottle)
entries: 墨水（1盎司瓶装）

item.name: Inscrutable Staff
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding it, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and your spell save DC.

The staff has 20 charges, and regains {@dice 2d10} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff triggers a random arcane anomaly (see Dungeons of Drakkenheim). On a 20, the staff regains {@dice 1d10} charges.

While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability: {@spell haste} (3 charges), {@spell slow} (3 charges), {@spell arcane eye} (4 charges), {@spell dimension door} (4 charges), {@spell Bigby's hand} (5 charges), {@spell wall of force} (5 charges), {@spell disintegrate} (6 charges), {@spell reverse gravity} (7 charges), or {@spell maze} (8 charges).

You can also use an action to cast one of the following spells from the staff without using any charges: {@spell detect magic}, {@spell Tenser's Floating Disk}, {@spell mage armor}, {@spell mending}, {@spell message}, or {@spell misty step}.

entries.name: Crown Authority
entries: A character cannot attune to more than one Seal of Drakkenheim. Guardian constructs in Drakkenheim such as {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk|wall gargoyles} and {@creature tower dragon|DoDk|tower dragons} do not attack you while you are attuned to one of the Seals of Drakkenheim. An individual guardian ignores this effect for 24 hours if you attack it or cast a spell upon it.

As an action, you may present a Seal of Drakkenheim to rebuke the guardians. You make an opposed Charisma ability check against each {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk} or {@creature tower dragon|DoDk} that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you. If you win the contest, the creature is rebuked for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A rebuked creature doesn't move, and can't take actions or reactions. A creature who wins the contest is immune to your rebuke for 24 hours.

item.name: Insect Repellent (block of incense)
entries: 驱虫剂可以在尼安扎鲁港以两种形式购买：香块或油性药膏。商人王子Kwayothe控制着这两种产品的销售。这两种驱虫剂都不能防止巨型昆虫或《怪物手册》附录A中描述的可恶的昆虫群。
点燃后，它可以燃烧8小时，并能驱除以它为中心的20英尺范围内的普通昆虫。

item.name: Insect Repellent (greasy salve)
entries: 驱虫剂可以在尼安扎鲁港以两种形式购买：香块或油性药膏。商人王子Kwayothe控制着这两种产品的销售。这两种驱虫剂都不能防止巨型昆虫或《怪物手册》附录A中描述的可恶的昆虫群。
一个葫芦或小瓶的药膏包含20种无味的油脂应用。一次涂抹可以保护佩戴者在24小时内免受普通昆虫的侵害。这种药膏是防水的，所以在雨中不会被洗掉。

item.name: Insignia of Claws
entries: 当你进入战斗时，神龙教徽章上的宝石会发出紫色的光，使你的自然拳头或自然武器得到增强。
在佩戴徽章时，你在使用徒手攻击和自然武器进行的攻击卷和伤害卷上获得+1的奖励。这种攻击被认为是神奇的。

item.name: Instrument of Illusions
entries: 当你演奏这种乐器时，你可以在以乐器为中心的5英尺半径范围内创造无害的、虚幻的视觉效果。如果你是一个吟游诗人，半径增加到15英尺。视觉效果的样本包括发光的音符、幽灵般的舞者、蝴蝶和轻轻落下的雪。这些魔法效果既没有实质内容也没有声音，而且显然是虚幻的。当你停止演奏时，这些效果就会结束。

item.name: Instrument of Scribing
entries: This musical instrument has 3 charges. While you are playing it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge from the instrument and write a magical message on a nonmagical object or surface that you can see within 30 feet of you. The message can be up to six words long and is written in a language you know. If you are a bard, you can scribe an additional seven words and choose to make the message glow faintly, allowing it to be seen in nonmagical darkness. Casting {@spell dispel magic} on the message erases it. Otherwise, the message fades away after 24 hours.
该仪器每天在黎明时分重新获得所有消耗的电荷。

item.name: Instrument of the Bards, Anstruth Harp
entries: 吟游诗人的乐器是一个精致的例子，在各方面都优于普通乐器。这种乐器有七种类型，每一种都以传奇吟游诗人学院命名。试图弹奏这种乐器的生物必须在DC15智慧救赎中成功，否则会受到{@damage 2d4}精神伤害。
你可以用一个动作来演奏乐器，并施展它的一个法术。一旦乐器被用来施放咒语，它就不能再被用来施放该咒语，直到下一个黎明。咒语使用你的施法能力和咒语保全DC。
你可以在施法的同时弹奏乐器，使其任何目标在救赎失败时受到{@condition charmed}的影响，从而在救赎时施加不利条件。这个效果只适用于有身体或物质成分的法术。
吟游诗人的所有乐器都可以用来施展以下法术。{@spell fly}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell levitate}, 和 {@spell protection from evil and good}。
In addition, the Anstruth harp can be used to cast {@spell control weather}, {@spell cure wounds} (5th level), and {@spell wall of thorns}.

item.name: Instrument of the Bards, Canaith Mandolin
entries: 吟游诗人的乐器是一个精致的例子，在各方面都优于普通乐器。这种乐器有七种类型，每一种都以传奇吟游诗人学院命名。试图弹奏这种乐器的生物必须在DC15智慧救赎中成功，否则会受到{@damage 2d4}精神伤害。
你可以用一个动作来演奏乐器，并施展它的一个法术。一旦乐器被用来施放咒语，它就不能再被用来施放该咒语，直到下一个黎明。咒语使用你的施法能力和咒语保全DC。
你可以在施法的同时弹奏乐器，使其任何目标在救赎失败时受到{@condition charmed}的影响，从而在救赎时施加不利条件。这个效果只适用于有身体或物质成分的法术。
吟游诗人的所有乐器都可以用来施展以下法术。{@spell fly}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell levitate}, 和 {@spell protection from evil and good}。
In addition, the Canaith mandolin can be used to cast {@spell cure wounds} (3rd level), {@spell dispel magic}, and {@spell protection from energy} (lightning only).

item.name: Instrument of the Bards, Cli Lyre
entries: 吟游诗人的乐器是一个精致的例子，在各方面都优于普通乐器。这种乐器有七种类型，每一种都以传奇吟游诗人学院命名。试图弹奏这种乐器的生物必须在DC15智慧救赎中成功，否则会受到{@damage 2d4}精神伤害。
你可以用一个动作来演奏乐器，并施展它的一个法术。一旦乐器被用来施放咒语，它就不能再被用来施放该咒语，直到下一个黎明。咒语使用你的施法能力和咒语保全DC。
你可以在施法的同时弹奏乐器，使其任何目标在救赎失败时受到{@condition charmed}的影响，从而在救赎时施加不利条件。这个效果只适用于有身体或物质成分的法术。
吟游诗人的所有乐器都可以用来施展以下法术。{@spell fly}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell levitate}, 和 {@spell protection from evil and good}。
In addition, the Cli lyre can be used to cast {@spell stone shape}, {@spell wall of fire}, and {@spell wind wall}.

item.name: Instrument of the Bards, Doss Lute
entries: 吟游诗人的乐器是一个精致的例子，在各方面都优于普通乐器。这种乐器有七种类型，每一种都以传奇吟游诗人学院命名。试图弹奏这种乐器的生物必须在DC15智慧救赎中成功，否则会受到{@damage 2d4}精神伤害。
你可以用一个动作来演奏乐器，并施展它的一个法术。一旦乐器被用来施放咒语，它就不能再被用来施放该咒语，直到下一个黎明。咒语使用你的施法能力和咒语保全DC。
你可以在施法的同时弹奏乐器，使其任何目标在救赎失败时受到{@condition charmed}的影响，从而在救赎时施加不利条件。这个效果只适用于有身体或物质成分的法术。
吟游诗人的所有乐器都可以用来施展以下法术。{@spell fly}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell levitate}, 和 {@spell protection from evil and good}。
In addition, the Doss lute can be used to cast {@spell animal friendship}, {@spell protection from energy} (fire only), and {@spell protection from poison}.

item.name: Ioun Stone of Vitality
entries: 一个{@italic Ioun stone}是以Ioun的名字命名的，Ioun是一个知识和预言之神，在某些世界受到尊敬。存在许多类型的{@italic Ioun stone}，每种类型都有独特的形状和颜色组合。

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of {@dice 1d3} feet and confers a benefit to you. Thereafter, another creature must use an action to grasp or net the stone to separate it from you, either by making a successful attack roll against AC 24 or a successful DC 24 Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. You can use an action to seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.
石头有AC24，10点命中率，并对所有伤害有抵抗力。它被认为是在绕过你的头部时被佩戴的物体。
当这个发光的蓝绿色大理石球体围绕着你的头部时，你的死亡拯救动作会获得+1的奖励。

石头有AC24，10点命中率，并对所有伤害有抵抗力。它被认为是在绕过你的头部时被佩戴的物体。
当这颗银色的宝石围绕着你的头时，你的智力拯救动作获得+1的奖励。

item.name: Ioun Stone, Strength
entries: 一个{@italic Ioun stone}是以Ioun的名字命名的，Ioun是一个知识和预言之神，在某些世界受到尊敬。存在许多类型的{@italic Ioun stone}，每种类型都有独特的形状和颜色组合。

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of {@dice 1d3} feet and confers a benefit to you. Thereafter, another creature must use an action to grasp or net the stone to separate it from you, either by making a successful attack roll against AC 24 or a successful DC 24 Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. You can use an action to seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.

当这个淡蓝色的菱形物体围绕着你的头部时，你的力量得分增加2分，最高为20分。

item.name: Ioun Stone, Supreme Intellect
entries: 一个{@italic Ioun stone}是以Ioun的名字命名的，Ioun是一个知识和预言之神，在某些世界受到尊敬。存在许多类型的{@italic Ioun stone}，每种类型都有独特的形状和颜色组合。

Thereafter, another creature must use an action to grasp or net the stone to separate it from you, either by making a successful attack roll against AC 24 or a successful DC 24 Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. You can use an action to seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.

当这个刻面球体围绕着你的头部时，你的智力检查获得+1的奖励。

item.name: Ioun Stone, Sustenance
entries: 一个{@italic Ioun stone}是以Ioun的名字命名的，Ioun是一个知识和预言之神，在某些世界受到尊敬。存在许多类型的{@italic Ioun stone}，每种类型都有独特的形状和颜色组合。

You can use an action to seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.

当这个透明的纺锤体绕过你的头时，你不需要吃或喝。

item.name: Iron Ball
entries: This ball is used to play a game of {@adventure Chain Lightning|IDRotF|17|Chain Lightning}.

item.name: Iron Bands of Bilarro
entries: 这个生锈的铁球直径为3英寸，重量为1磅。你可以用一个动作说出指令词，并将球体扔向你周围60英尺内你能看到的一个巨大或较小的生物。当球体在空中移动时，它会打开成一个纠结的金属带。
进行一次远程攻击卷，攻击奖励等于你的灵巧修饰加你的熟练度奖励。一旦命中，目标就会被{@condition restrained}，直到你采取额外行动，再次说出命令词来释放它。这样做，或者攻击失误，都会使带子收缩，再次成为一个球体。
一个生物，包括那个{@condition restrained}，可以用一个行动来做一个DC20的力量测验来打破铁箍。一旦成功，该物品就会被摧毁，而那个{@condition restrained}的生物就会被释放。如果检定失败，该生物的任何进一步尝试都会自动失败，直到24小时过后。
一旦带子用完了，就不能再使用，直到下一个黎明。

item.name: Iron Flask
entries: 这个铁瓶有一个铜制瓶塞。你可以用一个动作说出这个瓶子的命令语，目标是你周围60英尺内你能看到的生物。如果目标是你所在的平面以外的存在，那么目标必须在DC17智慧救赎中成功，否则就会被困于瓶中。如果目标曾经被瓶子困住过，那么它在救赎动作上有优势。一旦被困住，生物就会留在瓶中直到被释放。烧瓶一次只能容纳一个生物。被困在瓶中的生物不需要呼吸、吃喝，也不会衰老。
你可以使用一个动作来移除酒瓶的塞子，并释放酒瓶里的生物。该生物在1小时内对你和你的同伴很友好，并在这段时间内服从你的命令。如果你不给它命令或给它一个可能导致它死亡的命令，它就会自卫，但除此之外不采取任何行动。在持续时间结束时，该生物按照其正常的性情和排列方式行事。
一个{@spell identify}的法术显示瓶内有一个生物，但确定生物类型的唯一方法是打开瓶口。一个新发现的瓶子可能已经包含了一个由DM选择或随机确定的生物。

item.name: Iron Pot
entries: 一个铁锅可以容纳1加仑的液体。

item.name: Ironfang
entries: 由一块铁铸成的铁锋，有一个像獠牙一样的头部，上面刻着古老的符文，是一把{@item war pick|phb}。这把镐拿在手里很重，但当持剑者愤怒地挥舞这把镐时，武器似乎几乎没有重量。这把武器对任何形式的生锈、酸或腐蚀都免疫--似乎没有什么能让它留下痕迹。Ironfang含有{@creature Ogrémoch|pota}的火花，邪恶大地的王子。
You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with it, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} thunder damage.

entries.name: Earth Mastery
entries: 当你持有铁拳时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你能说流利的泰兰语。
你对酸性伤害有抵抗力。
你有{@sense tremorsense|MM}到60英尺的范围。
你可以感应到你周围60英尺内的贵重金属和宝石的存在，但不知道它们的确切位置。
你可以对一个{@creature earth elemental}的人施放{@spell dominate monster}(保存DC17)。一旦你这样做了，在下一个黎明之前，铁拳就不能再这样使用了。

entries.name: Shatter
entries: Ironfang has 3 charges. You can use your action to expend 1 charge and cast the 2nd-level version of {@spell shatter} (DC 17). Ironfang regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: The Rumbling
entries: While inside an earth node, you can perform a ritual called the Rumbling, using Ironfang to create a {@item devastation orb of earth|PotA}. Once you perform the ritual, Ironfang can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Flaw
entries: 钢铁之矛增强了持剑者的破坏性。当与该武器相适应时，你会获得以下缺陷："我喜欢打破东西，造成破坏。"

item.name: Ivana's Whisper
entries: 这种毒药带有明显的气味和来自Ivana Boritsi的化学信息。中了这种毒的生物必须在DC18的体质测试中成功，否则在下次睡觉时就会受到伊凡娜创造的{@spell dream}法术的影响。这种毒药是非魔法性的，而且伊凡娜在梦中并不直接与受影响的人交流。相反，她通过炼金术制作她的信息，预测她的目标的反应，并对她的反应进行化学编码，从而创造出与她的目标交谈的假象。她把这种毒药当作香水来使用，或者把它藏在礼品花束里，让它在以后传达她的信息。

item.name: Izzet Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Izzet, allows you to cast {@spell chaos bolt|XGE}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Izzet's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Izzet Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Izzet guild
entries: Formed of carved and polished red and blue stone, the keyrune includes bits of cable and wire. One end resembles a humanlike head, suggesting the jagged elemental form of the {@creature galvanice weird|GGR} that it can become for a duration of 3 hours. In this form, it will serve you as a bodyguard, lift and carry things for you, act as a test subject for your experiments, or aid you in any other way that its capabilities allow.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature galvanice weird|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.
该生物对你、你的同伴和你的公会的其他成员都很友好（除非那些公会成员对你有敌意）。它能听懂你的语言并服从你的口头命令。如果你没有发出任何命令，该生物会采取{@action Dodge}的行动并移动以避免危险。
在持续时间结束时，该生物会恢复到它的钥匙形状。如果它的生命值下降到0，或者你在接触它的时候使用行动再次说出命令词，它就会提前恢复。当该生物恢复到它的钥匙孔形态时，它不能再变身，直到36小时后。

item.name: Jacinth
entries: 一种透明的火橙色宝石。

item.name: Jade
entries: 一种半透明的浅绿色、深绿色或白色宝石。

item.name: Jade game board with solid gold playing pieces
Jade Serpent Staff
entries: This staff is broken into five pieces, each worth 100 gp for the jade alone. The entire staff can be restored with {@spell mending} cantrips; each casting of the spell repairs one break in the staff. If the staff is made whole, it transforms from an object into an animated jade serpent that has the statistics of a {@creature giant poisonous snake}, with these changes:

items: 蛇是一种构造，它理解并服从在它变身时持有法杖的人。
它对毒物伤害和{@condition poisoned}条件有免疫力。它不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。
当它的命中率降到0时，掷一个{@dice d6}。如果掷出1，蛇就会变成灰尘并被摧毁。在任何其他的卷轴上，它都会变回一根法杖，并断成{@dice 1d4 + 1}块，在法杖可以再次使用前必须用魔法修补。

item.name: Jade totem with diamond eyes (River Heralds)

entries.items: Imprinted on this staff is a fragment of a dead wizard's personality. The first character who touches the staff gains the following flaw: "I crave power above all else, and will do anything to obtain more of it." This flaw trumps any conflicting personality trait.

item.name: Jasper
entries: 一种不透明的蓝色、黑色或棕色宝石。

item.name: Javelin of Backbiting
entries: 你在使用这个魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷上获得+2的奖励。当你投掷它时，它的普通和远距离射程都增加了30英尺，并且在命中后会造成一个额外的伤害。在你投掷它并击中或未击中后，它立即飞回你的手中。

entries.name: Curse
entries: 这把武器被诅咒了，成为它的附属品会使诅咒延伸到你身上。在用{@spell remove curse}或类似的魔法破除诅咒之前，你不愿意和这个武器分开，一直保持它在手边。此外，你在使用这把武器以外的其他武器进行攻击时有劣势。
每当你使用此武器在攻击卷上掷出1时，武器会弯曲或飞起来击中你的背部。以你自己的AC为优势重新进行一次攻击卷。如果结果是命中，你会受到伤害，就像你用标枪攻击自己一样。

item.name: Javelin of Lightning
entries: 这个标枪是一个魔法武器。当你投掷它并说出它的指令词时，它就会变成一道闪电，形成一条5英尺宽的线，从你身上延伸到120英尺内的目标。这条线上的每个生物，除了你和目标之外，都必须做一个DC13的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到{@damage 4d6}的闪电伤害，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。当闪电到达目标时，它会变回标枪。对目标进行一次远程武器攻击。一旦命中，目标将受到标枪的伤害以及{@damage 4d6}的闪电伤害。
标枪的属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。在此期间，标枪仍然可以作为魔法武器使用。

item.name: Jester Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card and use it to cast the {@spell Otto's Irresistible Dance} spell (save {@dc 17}), and you have advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain {@status concentration} on it. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Jester's Mask
item.reqAttune: by a bard, sorcerer, or warlock
entries: This colorful, harlequin domino mask is edged with pearls. While wearing this mask, you gain the following benefits:

items.name: Charismatic Focus
entries: You can use the mask as a spellcasting focus. You gain a +3 bonus to any spell attack rolls and spell saving throw DCs that use Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

items.name: Marvelous Escape
entries: When a creature hits you with an attack roll, you can use your reaction to disappear in a puff of smoke and colorful sparkles. You take no damage and instead teleport, along with anything you are wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet of yourself. Once this reaction is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

items.name: Topsy-Turvy
entries: When you roll a 1 on a {@dice d20}, you can treat the roll as if you rolled a 20 instead. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Jet
entries: 一种不透明的深黑色宝石。

items.name: Awakened State
entries: 在这种状态下，这颗宝石已经得到了变革使者阿凡达的祝福。三个精致的尖顶从宝石的中心展开，像春天里开放的花蕾。三颗青金石像露珠一样停在这些尖顶上。

items: 宝石的以下好处得到改善。
宝石赋予你的AC的奖励增加到+2。
其装药数量增加到5个。

entries: 宝石获得了以下额外的属性，你可以在佩戴或持有它时使用这些属性。

items: 你可以消耗宝石的1次充电（不需要行动）来结束自己身上的以下情况之一。{@condition grappled}, {@condition paralyzed}, 或 {@condition restrained}。
当另一个你能看到的在你60英尺范围内的生物的蓄力动作失败时，你可以消耗宝石的1个装药作为反应，使该生物重新掷出蓄力动作，有可能将失败变成成功。该生物必须使用新的投票。

item.name: Jewel of Three Prayers (Dormant)
entries: 三个祈祷的宝石是一个分歧的遗迹（见 "分歧的遗迹 "侧边栏）。在古代，Alyxian the Apotheon带着这个护身符，象征着他与三位主神的盟约。Sehanine（织月者）、Avandra（改变者）和Corellon（拱心）。当这颗宝石被发现时，只有塞哈宁的力量在其休眠的心脏中跳动。其他两位神灵的力量正等待着被一位或多位能够追随阿利仙脚步的英雄所唤醒。

entries.name: Dormant State
entries: 在这种状态下，"三祷之宝 "是一个闪闪发光的金盘，连接在一条精美的金链上。这条链子可以神奇地调整大小，作为佩戴它的生物的一条项链。
在休眠状态下，这颗宝石有以下特性。

items: 在佩戴该珠宝时，你获得一个+1的交流奖励。
在佩戴或持有宝石时，你可以使用一个动作使它在15英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外15英尺范围内发出暗光。光线会持续到你将它熄灭为止（不需要行动）。
宝石有3个电荷，每天黎明时分恢复所有消耗的电荷。在持有宝石时，你可以从它身上消耗1个电荷来施展{@spell invisibility}的法术。

items.name: Exalted State
entries: 在这种状态下，这颗宝石已经得到了拱门之心Corellon的祝福。宝石上出现了一颗闪闪发光的绿宝石，周围是金色的光环。
宝石的以下好处得到改善。

items: 宝石赋予你的AC的奖励增加到+3。
其充电次数增加到7次。

entries: 宝石获得了以下额外的属性，你可以在佩戴或持有它时使用这些属性。

items: 你获得呼吸水的能力，并获得与你的步行速度相等的游泳速度。
你30英尺范围内的每个盟友都会获得呼吸水的能力，并获得与其步行速度相等的游泳速度。

As a bonus action, you can expend 1 of the jewel's charges to target yourself or one willing creature you can see within 15 feet of yourself. The target teleports to an unoccupied space of your choice within 15 feet of yourself, along with any equipment the target is wearing or carrying. The target appears in a flash of golden radiance, and each creature of your choice within 5 feet of the target's new location must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 4d10} radiant damage and is {@condition blinded} until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

item.name: Jeweler's Tools
additionalEntries: Training with jeweler's tools includes the basic techniques needed to beautify gems. It also gives you expertise in identifying precious stones.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 珠宝商的工具包括一个小锯和锤子、锉刀、钳子和镊子。

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: 对珠宝商工具的熟练掌握使你对宝石的著名神秘用途有所了解。当你进行与宝石或镶有宝石的物品有关的{@skill Arcana}检查时，这种洞察力证明很方便。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: 当你检查珠宝物品时，你对珠宝商工具的熟练程度有助于你挑选出它们可能蕴含的线索。

additionalEntries.name: Identify Gems
entries: 你可以识别宝石并确定其价值，一目了然。

additionalEntries.caption: Jeweler's Tools
rows: 修改一个宝石的外观
确定一颗宝石的历史

item.name: Jug
entries: 一个壶可以容纳1加仑的液体。

item.name: Junky +1 Dagger
entries: 你使用这把看起来像垃圾的匕首，在攻击和伤害卷上有+1的奖励。当它被使用时，它的握柄会磨损，它的刀刃会断裂，而且会剥落生锈。如果你在挥舞这把武器时，在攻击卷中得到一个自然的1，它就会断裂，变得没有魔力。

item.name: Kagonesti Forest Shroud
entries: 这件斗篷似乎是由秋天的树叶编织而成的。当你穿上这件斗篷时，你在灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查上有优势，并且你可以使用一个额外的行动，将你和你所穿戴或携带的任何装备一起神奇地传送到一个你能看到的30英尺内的无人空间。然后你在回合结束前进行的下一次攻击卷轴上有优势。一旦这个奖励动作被使用，在下一个黎明前都不能再使用。

item.name: Keelboat
entries: 在湖泊和河流上使用Keelboats和划船。如果顺流而下，要把水流的速度（通常为每小时3英里）加到车辆的速度上。这些车辆不能在任何明显的水流中划行，但它们可以被岸边的吃水动物拉到上游。

item.name: Keg of Alchemist's Fire
entries: A keg of alchemist's fire lobbed at a creature or an object deals 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a hit. Further, the target is set ablaze and takes the damage again every round (in the case of a creature, at the start of each of its turns) until the fire is put out. A creature within reach of the blaze can take an action to smother the flames using a blanket or carpet, reducing the fire damage by {@dice 2d6}. Three such actions are needed to fully put out the fire.

item.name: Keoghtom's Ointment
entries: 这个玻璃罐子直径为3英寸，装有{@dice 1d4 + 1}剂量的浓稠混合物，有淡淡的芦荟味。罐子和里面的东西有半磅重。
作为一个动作，一剂药膏可以被吞下或涂在皮肤上。接受它的生物会恢复{@dice 2d8 + 2}的命中率，停止{@condition poisoned}，并治愈任何疾病。

item.name: Key Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card and use it to cast the {@spell Knock} spell, with no sound made by the spell. This property can be used five times, and it regains all expended uses at dawn.

item.name: Keycharm
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Mark of Warding
entries: 这把小型的风格化钥匙在昆达拉克家族的工作中起着至关重要的作用。如果你施展了{@spell alarm}、{@spell arcane lock}或{@spell glyph of warding}的法术，你可以将效果与钥匙符咒联系起来，这样持有它的人就会收到{@spell alarm}法术的通知，绕过{@spell arcane lock}法术的锁，或者避免触发{@spell glyph of warding}法术放置的石像。此外，持有者（不需要与该物品调和）可以采取行动结束与之绑定的任何一个法术，只要持有者知道你为结束绑定的法术而设置的命令词。钥匙符在同一时间最多可以有三个绑定的法术。

item.name: Keystone of Creation
entries: 创造的基石是一块{@item Stone of Creation|AitFR-AVT}，通常边长在6到10英寸之间，可以由适应{@item Stone of Creation|AitFR-AVT}的石匠粗略凿开或干净地切割和打磨。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: 一个创造的基石具有以下随机属性。

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} 财产
1 {@table Beneficial Manifestations|AitFR-AVT|beneficial}的表现
1 {@table Detrimental Manifestations|AitFR-AVT|detrimental}的表现

entries.name: Extradimensional Places
entries: You can use the keystone to conjure an extradimensional space such as {@spell Mordenkainen's magnificent mansion}. The easiest way is to simply cast the spell using the artifact's power, which requires no spell slots or material components. Each time you cast a spell with the artifact, the subsequent casting replaces the prior one. For more detailed control of a conjured demiplane or extradimensional space, see "Construction Details."

entries.name: Raising Structures
entries: You can use the keystone to conjure a physical structure on the Material Plane. The easiest way is to simply cast the {@spell mighty fortress|XGE} spell using the artifact's power, which requires no spell slots or material components. Each time you cast a spell with the artifact, the subsequent casting replaces the prior one. For more detailed control of a conjured demiplane or extradimensional space, see "Construction Details." Locations conjured by keystones cannot become permanent through repeated spell castings.

entries.name: Connected Spaces
entries: 你可以使用多个基石来创造更大的空间，无论是彼此相邻还是相互联系。你甚至可以通过这种方式将物质界和次元空间的结构结合起来。如果你在调和第二块基石时调和了一块基石，那么这两块基石就会结合成一件神器（利用一个调和槽），将它们的特征和命运永远结合在一起。你不能同时与三个以上的钥石进行调和，因此也不能结合。

entries.name: Destroying a Keystone
entries: 钥石本身就是一件神器，不受大多数伤害的影响，但是一个{@spell disintegrate}的法术就足以摧毁一个未经调整的钥石。
在它被调整过至少一次之后，一个特定的基石需要调整来维持它的魔力。否则，它在物质界的创造物会在{@dice 1d12 + 1}天内逐渐腐烂，而依靠基石的半位面会在{@dice 1d20 + 10}分钟内坍塌。额外的破坏性力量，如火，可能会加速破坏的速度。由基石创造或支撑的半位面在坍塌时，会将其中的所有生物弹射到他们的主位面。
当一个钥石的创造物被完全摧毁时，钥石会变成一块惰性的、无力的岩石。如果{@item Stone of Creation|AitFR-AVT}被摧毁，它的所有钥石都会打破调和，失去所有的魔法属性，它们的创造物也会腐烂或坍塌为无。
如果它达到了混沌元素，或者被与混沌元素相适应的分叉的金属棒击中（如{@spell plane shift}法术），钥石就会被摧毁。

entries.name: Construction Details
entries: 你可以用你能想象到的外观细节来定制一个keystone的创作。你还可以重新安排你的作品的平面图和结构细节，如下。

entries.name: Demiplane Design
entries: 用一块基石，你可以幻化出一个圆顶或金字塔形状的超维空间，每边长达1英里，拥有你想要的任何地形。这个空间的边缘是实心的，无法通行，但可以是{@condition invisible}，所以如果你愿意，你的空间可以看起来是永远持续下去。有了额外的基石，你可以为你的创作增加一个额外的平方英里，增加或结合地形类型。
每一平方英里可以包括一个大小为{@spell Mordenkainen's magnificent mansion}的单一建筑，以及所有随行的仆人和宴会，或者任何数量的较小的建筑，其总面积相当于一个宏伟的豪宅。
你不能创造能造成伤害或以其他方式伤害生物的植物或动物。然而，如果你创造了悬崖、水域或其他自然特征，空间中的生物可能会坠落、淹死或受到其他伤害。

entries.name: Physical Structure Design
entries: 有了一块基石，你就可以创造出一个类似于强大的堡垒的结构，而且还可以灵活地定制这个堡垒，不仅是外观上的细节，而且是实质性的效果。只要你不超过150个10英尺宽的立方体的内部空间，你就可以用一个键石重新安排墙壁、空地、地板、门和其他功能的强大堡垒。你的堡垒可以跨越小溪、河流或其他水域。它可以采取鲁莽甚至危险的形状，包括深坑、淹没的房间等等。你的设计，一旦幻化出来，并不保证能够支持其自身的重量，或在攻击、天气或时间的压力下生存。

You may post any number of your structure's servants as guards, if you wish. They have statistics identical to an unseen servant with the addition of a passive {@skill Perception} score equal to your own, though you cannot perceive through their senses. The servants can ring bells or otherwise manipulate the environment to raise an alarm.

entries.name: Manifestations
entries: 每一个由创造的基石幻化出来的地方或结构都有特殊的、不可预见的表现，影响其构成和外观。有些表现是有益的，有些是有害的。这些表现在每次用基石变出一个结构或地方时都会改变。管理员可以从以下表格中进行滚动或选择，或者根据所变出的特定造物设计出独特的表现。

item.name: Khrusor, Spear of Heliod
entries: Heliod挥舞着Khrusor，这是一把被太阳的力量所祝福的长矛。在他手中，它可以从Nyx投掷到Theros的任何地方。当赫利奥德把他的武器借给一个凡人时，通常是为了让他们以他的名义完成一些伟大的工作，或者作为对他们价值的测试。

entries.name: Spear of the Sun
entries: This spear grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack using this spear, the target takes an extra {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Sun
entries: 如果你是赫利奥德的崇拜者，你会获得以下所有你有必要虔诚度的好处。

items.name: Piety 3+
items.entry: 你在每个黎明时分获得15个临时命中点。

items.name: Piety 10+
items.entry: The spear has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+
items.entry: The spear has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+
items.entry: The spear has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Heliod, the spear has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} properties.
关于随机确定的属性，请参见《地下城管理员指南》第七章的 "神器"。

entries.name: Luminous
entries: 长矛在半径30英尺的范围内发出亮光，在另外30英尺的范围内发出暗光。这些光是太阳光。

entries.name: Sun's Retaliation
entries: When you take damage from a creature within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack with the spear against that creature. On a hit, the spear deals damage as normal, and the creature is {@condition blinded} until the start of its next turn. This property of the spear can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Spells
entries: 矛有10个电荷。当你拿着它时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个或多个电荷，用它来施展以下一个法术（保存DC18）。{@spell guiding bolt} (1次充电), {@spell daylight} (3次充电，只针对矛尖), {@spell sunbeam} (6次充电)。长矛每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的能量。

entries.name: Destroying the Spear
entries: 如果被带到埃里伯斯在泰泽鲁斯的宫殿，并被用来向埃里伯斯献祭赫利奥德的冠军，克鲁索尔要么被摧毁，要么从根本上被扭曲，为埃里伯斯服务。

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Kiss of the Changebringer reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The bonus to {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} increases to +2.
You are immune to the {@condition restrained} condition.
You can use an action to cast the {@spell blink} spell on yourself. This property of the amulet can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|long rest}.

item.name: Kiss of the Changebringer (Dormant)
entries: A beautiful, glittering emerald is set within this silver chain, humming with power and possibility. It is said that this amulet was stolen from the neck of {@deity The Changebringer|Exandria|TDCSR} herself by the {@deity The Lord of the Hells|Exandria|TDCSR}, and locked within the vaults of Bazzoxan in {@book Wildemount|TDCSR|3|Wildemount}. It was later claimed there by a group of Aurora Watch soldiers during an expedition into that grim fortress's abandoned temples.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While the Kiss of the Changebringer is in a dormant state, you have a +1 bonus to {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} and are immune to the {@condition grappled} condition while wearing it.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Kiss of the Changebringer reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The bonus to {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} increases to +3.
You are immune to the {@condition paralyzed} and {@condition petrified} conditions.

When you make an attack roll, ability check, or {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}, you can roll an additional {@dice d20}. You can choose to do so after you make the attack roll, ability check, or {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}, but before the outcome is determined. You choose which of the {@dice 2d20|d20s} to use for your roll. This property of the amulet can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.

item.name: Knave's Eye Patch
entries: 佩戴这种眼罩时，你会获得这些好处。

items: You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.
如果你有阳光敏感的特质，你就不会受到该特质的影响。
你对那些允许其他生物读取你的想法或判断你是否在说谎的魔法免疫。只有在你允许的情况下，生物才能与你进行心灵感应。

item.name: Knife of Stolen Resistance
entries: Using an action, you carve a single infernal rune into the flesh of an {@condition unconscious} Beast, Celestial, Dragon, Fey, or Giant with this knife. Over the next 10 minutes the creature dies an agonizing death that can't be prevented short of the {@spell Wish} spell. If the creature has any resistances or immunities, you gain those resistances and immunities until the creature dies or a {@spell Wish} spell is used to save the creature. The knife's power can't be used again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Knifewing Cape
entries: While wearing this cloak made from the skin of 20 {@creature Knifewing|GHLoE|knifewings}, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. In addition, when you fall while wearing this cloak, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling.

item.name: Knight Card
entries: As an action, you can throw this card to an unoccupied space on the ground within 60 feet of yourself while speaking a command word, whereupon the card magically transforms into a {@creature deck defender|BMT} (see {@book chapter 9|BMT|8|Deck Defender} for its stat block) for up to 1 minute or until you use an action to speak the command word again, whereupon it transforms back into a card. The deck defender obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, it takes the {@action Dodge} action and moves to avoid danger. The deck defender reverts to a card early if it drops to 0 hit points. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Korolnor Scepter
entries: 科罗尔诺权杖是沙纳塔的十根统治权杖之一，由矮人之神铸造，并赐予古代矮人帝国的统治者。科罗纳权杖的位置在很长一段时间内都不为人知，直到一位{@creature storm giant}的女王奈瑞在无轨海底的一艘布满藤壶的沉船上发现了它。统治权杖的大小和形状都大致相同，但它们的材料和属性各不相同。
科罗尔诺权杖是一根锥形的米塔尔棒，像矮人的前臂一样粗长，底部有一个小的铂金旋钮，顶部有一个圆形的圆盘，上面装饰着一圈七颗小小的蓝色宝石。
你用这根权杖进行的攻击和伤害卷获得+3的加成，它可以作为魔法棒挥舞。
你可以使用{@item Wyrmskull Throne|SKT}的属性，也可以使用权杖本身的属性。权杖有10个电荷，在黎明时分可以重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 4}扩大的电荷。它的属性如下。

items: 如果你在地下或水下，你可以使用一个动作，消耗1个电荷来确定到地面的距离。
As an action: you can expend 2 charges to cast the {@spell sending} spell from the scepter.

As an action: you can expend 3 charges to cast the {@spell teleport} spell from the scepter. If the destination is within 60 feet of the {@item Wyrmskull Throne|SKT}, there is no chance of a teleport error or mishap occurring.

item.name: Kyrzin's Ooze
entries: 这种乳白色的共生粘液被密封在一个罐子里，慢慢地移动，仿佛无休止地探索着罐子的内部。要适应这个物品，你必须先喝下罐子里的东西，解锁以下属性。

entries.name: Resistant
entries: 当与Kyrzin's ooze调和时，你对毒和酸的伤害有抵抗力，并且对{@condition poisoned}状况免疫。

entries.name: Amorphous
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以说出一个命令词，使你的身体呈现出渗水的无定形品质。在接下来的一分钟里，你（连同你所穿戴或携带的任何装备）可以在一个1英寸宽的狭窄空间里移动而不受挤压。一旦你使用了这一属性，在下一个黎明之前都不能再次使用。

entries.name: Acid Breath
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以在5英尺宽的30英尺范围内呼出酸液。这条线上的每个生物都必须做一个DC15的灵巧蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到36({@damage 8d8})的酸液伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。一旦你使用了这个属性，直到下一个黎明前都不能再使用。

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: 在你与之共鸣时，无法从你身上移开，你也无法主动终止与之共鸣。如果你被一个结束诅咒的咒语所针对，你对渗出物的感应就会结束，因为它从你体内渗出。
If you die while the ooze is inside you, it bursts out and engulfs you, turning your corpse into a {@creature black pudding} allied with the daelkyr.

item.name: Ladder (10-foot)
entries: 梯子（10英尺）

item.name: Lamp
entries: 一盏灯在15英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外30英尺范围内发出暗光。一旦点燃，它可以用一壶（1品脱）的油燃烧6个小时。

item.name: Lamprey Ship
entries: 兰普雷船很古老，是仍在使用的最古老的法术干扰船之一。Psurlons（见老布的星际动物园）特别喜欢它们。
使用内置在船头的金属抓爪，灯鱼船可以将自己吸附在另一艘船上，这在登船行动中是一个关键的功能。其他的标准武器包括主甲板上的四门弹炮。
灯鱼可以漂浮在水面上，但它不能安全地降落在地面上。在地面上降落的灯鱼船有一个令人苦恼的习惯，那就是翻滚，不止几个船员发现了这一点，让他们感到沮丧。

item.name: Lantern of Revealing
entries: 点燃后，这个{@item hooded lantern|phb}用1品脱的油燃烧6小时，在30英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外30英尺范围内发出暗光。(只要生物和物体处于灯笼的亮光中，就可以看到它们。你可以使用一个动作来降低罩子，在5英尺的范围内将光线降低为暗光。

item.name: Lantern of Tracking
entries: 这个带头罩的灯笼用1品脱的油可以燃烧6个小时，在30英尺范围内发出明亮的光，在另外30英尺范围内发出昏暗的光。
每一盏追踪之灯都是为了追踪某种类型的生物而设计的，这是由追踪之灯表上的滚动决定的。一旦确定，这种生物类型就不能改变。当追踪之灯在任何该类型生物的300英尺范围内时，它的火焰会变成明亮的绿色。然而，灯笼并不能确定该生物的确切位置。

entries.caption: Lantern of Tracking
rows: 畸变
天人合一
构造
龙
元素
Fey
恶魔
巨人
畸形人
亡灵

item.name: Lapis Lazuli
entries: 一种不透明的浅蓝色和深蓝色，带有黄色斑点的宝石。

item.name: Lash of Immolation
entries: The handle of this dark leather whip bears the fire rune, and embers dance around the whip's tail.

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, and on a hit, the whip deals an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage. When you score a critical hit with an attack using this whip, the target also has the restrained condition until the start of your next turn, as fiery bands lash around the target.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: When you make an attack with the whip and hit, you can use your reaction to invoke the whip's rune. Doing so increases the extra fire damage dealt by the whip to {@dice 2d6}.
Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

items.name: Awakened
entries: 当鞭子达到觉醒状态时，它将获得以下属性。

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+2。
对该武器的毒药的救赎DC增加到15。
该武器获得了一个新的毒药选项，叫做食尸鬼之血。对这种毒药的救赎失败的生物会在1分钟内变成{@condition poisoned}。当{@condition poisoned}以这种方式存在时，该生物会{@condition paralyzed}。该生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功时结束对自己的影响。

item.name: Lash of Shadows (Dormant)
entries: 这条蛇皮鞭被泽希尔的力量所触动，末端是五个生动的蛇头。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Lash of Shadows is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 18, a Wisdom of 16, and a Charisma of 20. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这把武器能与它的持有者进行心灵感应，并能说、读和理解深渊语、普通语和德拉康语。

entries.name: Personality
entries: A mad {@creature marilith} named Sizlifeth lives within the Lash of Shadows. The weapon has a short temper and experiences only extreme emotions. It is most happy when dealing harm.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 鞭子在休眠状态下给予以下好处。

items: 你能说、读、写深渊语和德拉康语。
你在使用该魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。
你可以尝试对任何被鞭子击中的生物进行毒害。该生物必须在DC13宪法救赎中成功，否则就会受到你选择的以下一种毒药的影响；一旦使用了蛇毒以外的毒药，在下一个黎明之前就不能再使用这种毒药了。

items.name: Dead Eyes
items.entry: 对这种毒药的救赎失败的生物会被{@condition poisoned}，持续1小时。当{@condition poisoned}以这种方式进行时，该生物是{@condition blinded}。

items.name: Serpent Venom
items.entry: 对这种毒药的救赎失败的生物会受到{@damage 3d6}的毒药伤害，或在救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

items.name: Exalted
entries: 当鞭子达到高尚的状态时，它将获得以下额外的属性。

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+3。
对该武器的毒药的蓄力DC增加到17。

The weapon gains a new poison option called Cockatrice Tears. A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.

item.name: Leather Golem Armor
entries: 奇怪的仪式将一个肉体魔像的身体改造成这套部分有生命力的皮甲。当你穿上这件盔甲时，你获得了一个+1的AC奖励，以及对法术和其他魔法效果的蓄力攻击。此外，你还获得以下属性。

items.name: Immutable Form
entries: 你对任何会改变你形态的法术或效果都是免疫的。

items.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: 你获得对雷电伤害的抵抗。每当你受到雷电伤害时，你会获得5个临时命中点。

entries.name: Curse
entries: 这个盔甲是被诅咒的，成为它的附庸会使诅咒延伸到你身上。在用{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法解除诅咒之前，你不愿意与这套盔甲分离。此外，当你穿着被诅咒的盔甲时，你会获得以下属性。

items.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: 如果你受到火的伤害，你在攻击卷和能力检查上有劣势，直到你下一回合结束。

items.name: Berserk
entries: 每当有人对你进行关键打击时，掷出{@dice d6}。如果得到6分，盔甲会使你变得狂暴。在狂暴状态下的每个回合，你都会攻击你能看到的最近的生物。如果没有足够近的生物可以移动和攻击，你就攻击一个物体，优先选择比自己小的物体。一旦盔甲导致你进入狂暴状态，它就不能被移除。你会继续攻击，直到你变成{@condition incapacitated}，或者直到另一个生物能够用适当的魔法（比如{@spell calm emotions}的咒语）或成功的DC15魅力({@skill Persuasion})检查来安抚你。

item.name: Leatherworker's Tools
additionalEntries: Knowledge of leatherworking extends to lore concerning animal hides and their properties. It also confers knowledge of leather armor and similar goods.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 皮革工人的工具包括一把刀、一个小木槌、一个镶边器、一个打孔器、线和皮革废料。

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: 当你检查用皮革制作的魔法物品，如靴子和一些斗篷时，你在处理皮革方面的专长会赋予你额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: 在研究皮革制品或与之相关的线索时，你会获得更多的洞察力，因为你利用自己对皮革的知识来挑出别人会忽略的细节。

additionalEntries.name: Identify Hides
entries: 在观察一张皮或一件皮革制品时，你可以确定皮革的来源以及处理它的任何特殊技术。例如，你可以发现用矮人方法制作的皮革和用半身人方法制作的皮革之间的区别。

additionalEntries.caption: Leatherworker's Tools
rows: 修改一件皮革制品的外观
确定一件皮革制品的历史

item.name: Lesser Hammock of Worlds
entries: 世界的吊床是用传统的Ataguan设计编织的彩色吊床。
你可以使用一个动作来展开世界之床的较小版本，并将其放在一个坚固的表面上，然后它就会创造一个通往另一个世界或存在平面的双向传送门。每次该物品打开一个传送门时，由DM决定它通向哪里，或者使用者可以使它始终可靠地连接到鬼兰特普伊。你可以用一个动作来关闭一个打开的入口，方法是抓住布的边缘并将其折叠起来。一旦较小的世界之滨打开了一个入口，它在{@dice 1d8}小时内就不能再这样做了。

item.name: Libram of Souls and Flesh
entries: 这本书的封面由皮肤制成，配件由骨头制成，触摸起来很冷，而且会发出微弱的低语。当被发现时，这本书包含了以下的法术，当你与这本书相适应时，这些法术是你的巫师法术。{@spell animate dead}, {@spell circle of death}, {@spell false life}, {@spell finger of death}, {@spell speak with dead}, {@spell summon undead|TCE}, 和{@spell vampiric touch}。它的功能是为你提供一本法术书。
当你拿着这本书时，你可以把它作为你的巫师法术的施法重点。
The book has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: 如果你花了1分钟研究这本书，你可以花费1个电荷，用书中不同的法术来替换你准备的一个巫师法术。新的法术必须是死灵法术流派的。
作为一个行动，你可以消耗1个电荷，在10分钟内呈现出一种不死之相。在持续时间内，你会呈现出死气沉沉的样子，而不死生物对你无动于衷，除非你伤害了它们。在所有外部检查和用来确定目标状态的法术面前，你也显得不死不活。如果你造成伤害或迫使一个生物做出拯救动作，该效果就会结束。

item.name: Lifewell Tattoo
entries: 这种神奇的纹身由一种特殊的针制作而成，其特点是象征着生命和重生。

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: 为了适应这个项目，你把针放在你希望出现纹身的皮肤上，在整个适应过程中按下针。当调和完成后，针会变成墨水，成为纹身，出现在皮肤上。
如果你对纹身的调和结束，纹身就会消失，而针会重新出现在你的空间。

entries.name: Necrotic Resistance
entries: 你对坏死性的伤害有抵抗力。

entries.name: Life Ward
entries: 当你的命中率将降至0时，你反而降至1个命中率。一旦使用，这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Lightbringer
entries: This +1 mace was made for a cleric of Lathander, the god of dawn. The head of the mace is shaped like a sunburst and made of solid brass. Named Lightbringer, this weapon glows as bright as a {@item torch|phb} when its wielder commands. While glowing, the mace deals an extra {@damage 1d6} radiant damage to undead creatures.

item.name: Lightbringer
entries: 你在使用该魔法武器进行攻击和伤害时有+1的奖励。

This weapon, known as Lightbringer, was made for a cleric of Lathander, the god of dawn. The head of the mace is shaped like a sunburst and is made of solid brass. The mace glows as bright as a torch when its wielder commands. While glowing, the mace deals an extra {@damage 1d6} radiant damage to Undead creatures.

item.name: Lightning Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Lindwyrm Venom
entries: This terrible venom is extracted and distilled from the deadly {@creature lindwyrm|GHLoE}. It can be delivered via ingestion or a wound. A creature exposed to the venom must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) poison damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, the creature has disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity skill checks and saving throws.

item.name: Living Gloves
entries: 这些共生手套由薄薄的甲壳素和筋腱组成，具有自己的生命。要适应它们，你必须在整个适应期戴上它们，在这期间，手套与你的皮肤结合。
当你戴上这副手套的时候，你会获得以下一种能力（你在戴上手套的时候选择）。

items: {@skill Sleight of Hand}
{@item Thieves' tools|PHB}
您选择的一种{@item artisan's tools|PHB}。
您选择的一种{@item musical instrument|PHB}。

entries: 当你使用所选择的熟练度进行能力检查时，你在检查中加入双倍的熟练度加成，而不是你正常的熟练度加成。

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: 在你与手套相合的时候，手套不能从你身上移开，你也不能主动结束与手套的相合。如果你被一个结束诅咒的咒语所针对，你对手套的感应就会结束，并且可以被移除。

item.name: Living Loot Satchel
entries: 作为一个2级囤积者，你被授予使用一个活体战利品挎包，这是一个不常见的魔法物品。它的功能是{@item bag of holding}，有多种颜色和样式可供选择。

entries.caption: Class-Based Living Loot Satchel
rows: 野蛮人
宽大的腰带上有十几个挂袋
Bard
琵琶盒
教士
镂空的圣物
德鲁伊
由天然、有机、本地采购的编织纤维制成
战斗机
一个厚重的、有战斗痕迹的铁锁箱
圣骑士
一个带有精美雕刻和卷轴的金属盒
徘徊者
一个毛皮内衬的包袱
流氓
一个不显眼的硬币袋
巫师
一个破旧的皮革挎包，容易在接缝处吐出五彩的火花
术士
一个带有 "纯装饰性 "獠牙嘴的拼接怪物皮革挎包。
魔法师
藏在袖子里或帽子里的一个口袋尺寸

entries: The living loot satchel is a kind of magical being that safeguards the franchise's funds and valuables. Its innards are connected to a secure coffer within Head Office's vault in Waterdeep, to which the satchel periodically transfers the franchise's wealth. As an action, you can transfer any amount of your franchise funds back to your satchel with a successful DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check.

entries.name: Secret Satchel
entries: 作为一个等级3的囤积者，你的活体战利品挎包得到了升级，可以作为用于{@spell Leomund's secret chest}法术的副本箱子发挥作用，成为一个稀有的魔法物品。你可以通过你的活体战利品挎包打开秘密箱子，存入或取出物品--甚至是那些通常不适合放在挎包里，但适合放在箱子里的物品。由于总部与你不想知道的星外生物达成了交易，你真的不想知道，所以这个咒语没有机会结束。

entries.name: That Thing You Need
entries: At rank 3, you can use a bonus action to reach into your living loot satchel and make a DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check. On a success, you draw forth an item of your choice on the Adventuring Gear table in chapter 5 of the Player's Handbook. The item must be of a size that can fit into your secret chest and be worth no more than 15 gp. Once you attempt to draw five items from your satchel, you cannot draw forth any more items until the next dawn.

entries.name: Portable Hole Satchel
entries: 在等级4的时候，你的活体战利品挎包又得到了升级，成为一个非常稀有的魔法物品。由你的挎包进入的秘密箱子现在有一个{@item portable hole}--直径6英尺，深10英尺的存储容量。和以前一样，你可以将任何适当大小的物体放入便携式孔洞大小的箱子中，即使它通常不适合放入你的挎包。

entries.name: That Expensive Thing You Need
entries: 同样在等级4，当你使用 "你需要的东西 "功能时，你可以征用任何价值不超过250金币的物品，只要它能装进你背包的便携孔中。

item.name: Living Ship
entries: 德鲁伊、游侠和献身于自然之神的牧师经常出现在活体船上，那些不想在长期航行中担心自己的船的空气包络层被污染的野生空间探险家也是如此。

This ship's main distinctive feature is the fully grown {@creature treant} on the aft deck. The treant has a speed of 0 because its roots are woven into the deck; it and the ship are inseparable. If the ship is reduced to 0 hit points, the treant dies of shock. The ship can function if its treant dies, but the treant can never be replaced with another.
当树人完成长期休息时，它会修复船体，使船体恢复{@dice 4d12}的命中率，并刷新船体的空气包络（将致命的空气变成污浊的空气，或者将污浊的空气变成新鲜的空气）。
一艘活体船可以漂浮在水面上，并在水面上航行，但它不能安全降落在地面上（它的龙骨会导致它侧翻）。它的标准武器是尾部安装的弹炮。

item.name: Loadstone
entries: 这块石头是一块大宝石，价值150戈比。

entries.name: Curse
entries: 这块石头被诅咒了，但它的魔法性质是隐藏的；{@spell detect magic}不会发现它。一个{@spell identify}的咒语可以揭示石头的真实性质。如果你在石头在你身上时使用{@action Dash}或{@action Disengage}行动，它的诅咒就会启动。在用{@spell remove curse}或类似的魔法解除诅咒之前，你的速度会降低5英尺，你的最大负荷和最大提升能力会减半。你也变得不愿意与石头分开。

item.name: Lock
entries: 这把锁提供了一把钥匙。如果没有钥匙，精通{@item thieves' tools|phb}的生物可以通过成功的DC15灵巧检查来撬开这个锁。你的管理员可以决定以更高的价格买到更好的锁。

item.name: Lock of Trickery
entries: 这把锁看起来是一把普通的锁（《玩家手册》第5章中描述的类型），并配有一把钥匙。这把锁里的滚珠可以神奇地调节，以阻挡盗贼的入侵。撬锁的灵巧性检查是不利的。

item.name: Longbow of the Healing Hearth
entries: This ivory longbow is inscribed with a prayer to the god Hiatea, the runes of which are entwined with gilded engravings of wheat stalks and deer antlers.

You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. If you load no ammunition in the weapon, it produces its own, automatically creating one magic arrow when you pull back the string. The arrow created by the bow vanishes the instant after it hits or misses a target.
The bow has 8 charges for the following properties, which you can use while wielding the bow. The bow regains {@dice 1d4 + 1} charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Curative Arrow
entries: When you take the {@action Attack} action using the bow, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your attacks with a blazing arrow of curative magic, which automatically hits one creature you can see within 150 feet of you. The target can then immediately spend and roll one of its unspent Hit Dice and regain a number of hit points equal to the roll plus your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).
If the target has no unspent Hit Dice remaining, nothing happens. You can use a curative arrow only once per turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries: While holding the bow, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (save DC 18): {@spell create food and water} (1 charge), {@spell warding bond} (2 charges), {@spell guardian of faith} (3 charges).

item.name: Lord Commander's Badge
entries: As an action while wearing this seal, you can invoke its power to issue a bellowing command clearly audible to all creatures within 300 feet of you. When you do, you may choose up to 12 allies you can see who can hear the command. Those allies each gain 20 temporary hit points. While these temporary hit points remain, those allies gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. Once you use this power, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Crown Authority
entries: A character cannot attune to more than one Seal of Drakkenheim. Guardian constructs in Drakkenheim such as {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk|wall gargoyles} and {@creature tower dragon|DoDk|tower dragons} do not attack you while you are attuned to one of the Seals of Drakkenheim. An individual guardian ignores this effect for 24 hours if you attack it or cast a spell upon it.

As an action, you may present a Seal of Drakkenheim to rebuke the guardians. You make an opposed Charisma ability check against each {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk} or {@creature tower dragon|DoDk} that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you. If you win the contest, the creature is rebuked for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A rebuked creature doesn't move, and can't take actions or reactions. A creature who wins the contest is immune to your rebuke for 24 hours.

item.name: Lord's Ensemble
item.reqAttune: by a creature with a humanoid build
entries: 沃特德普的蒙面领主们在彼此见面时都会穿上这套衣服。这套衣服使每个领主都无法与其他人区分开来。这套衣服由三件组成--头盔、护身符和长袍--当它们一起穿在身上时，就像一件魔法物品一样，但只在水底城及其下水道内使用。你会将这套装备作为一个单独的物品进行调整。

entries.name: Lord's Helm
entries: 这款水桶头盔覆盖了你的头部，掩盖了你的面部。眼睛上的屏风有助于掩盖你的身份，而不会使你失明。当你戴上头盔时，你的声音会被神奇地改变成无性别的声音，而且你对那些允许其他生物读取你的想法、判断你是否在撒谎、知道你的排列组合、或知道你的生物类型的魔法免疫。只有在你允许的情况下，生物才能与你进行心灵感应。

entries.name: Lord's Amulet
entries: 这个护身符上有沃特德普的纹章。它的功能是{@item amulet of proof against detection and location}。

entries.name: Lord's Robe
entries: 这件优雅的长袍具有{@item ring of free action}的功能，它使你产生一种错觉，即你有一个不显眼的、雌雄同体的人形身材，站在6英尺高的地方。

item.name: Lorehold Primer
entries: The Lorehold Primer is a magic textbook created at Strixhaven's Lorehold College. The primer has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you make an Intelligence ({@skill History}) or Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) check while holding the primer, you can expend 1 charge to give yourself {@dice 1d4} bonus to the check, immediately after you roll the {@dice d20}.
此外，如果你在长时间休息结束时学习了这本入门书，你可以从牧师或巫师的法术列表中选择一个一级法术。在你完成下一次长时休息之前，如果你持有入门书，你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放一次所选的法术。你对这个法术的施法能力是你选择的智力、智慧或魅力。

item.name: Lost Crown of Besilmer
entries: 这个矮人战盔由一个坚固的敞开式钢制头盔组成，在眉心上方装饰有一个金色的圆环，从圆环上有七个小的金色尖刺向上伸出。戴上这顶皇冠时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你对精神伤害有抵抗力。
你在面对会迷惑你的效果时有优势。

You can use a bonus action to inspire one creature you can see that is within 60 feet of you and that can see or hear you. Once before the end of your next turn, the inspired creature can roll a {@dice d6} and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. This uses 1 charge from the crown. It has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Lost Sword
entries: The Lost Sword is a sentient lawful good {@item +1 shortsword} (Intelligence 11, Wisdom 13, Charisma 13). It has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 120 feet. It communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it.
剑的目的是打击邪恶。这把剑有以下的附加属性。

items: 这把剑在15英尺范围内持续发出亮光，在另外15英尺范围内发出暗光。只有毁掉这把剑才能熄灭这种光。
一个合法的善良生物可以在1分钟内将自己与剑相适应。
While attuned to the weapon, the sword's wielder can use the sword to cast the {@spell crusader's mantle} spell. Once used, this property of the sword can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Luba's Tarokka of Souls
entries: 并非所有徘徊的灵魂都是悲剧性的灵魂，在通往来世的路上迷失了方向。有些人像囚犯一样苦苦挣扎，灵魂如此邪恶，凡人不敢在毫无戒心的来世释放他们。

Created by a figure of Vistani legend, Luba's Tarokka of Souls shaped the destiny of countless heroes. The prophecies of this deck of cards also revealed great evils and guided its creator into the path of nefarious forces. Untold times the deck's creator, Mother Luba, narrowly escaped doom, spared only by her keen insights. But even for her, not all wickedness could be escaped. In the most dire cases, Mother Luba managed to ensnare beings of pure evil amid the strands of fate, imprisoning them within her {@deck tarokka deck|CoS}. There these foul spirits dwell still, trapped within a nether-realm hidden amid shuffling cards, waiting for fate to turn foul—as it inevitably will.
和所有的{@deck Tarokka Deck|CoS|tarokka decks}一样，{@i Tarokka of Souls}是一个图文并茂的牌集，包括高牌的十四张牌和其他四十张牌，分为四种花色：硬币、字形、星星和剑。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The artifact has the following random properties, which you can determine by rolling on the tables in the "Artifacts" section of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG}:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental}属性
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial}属性

entries.name: Spells
entries: 当你拿着这副牌时，你可以用一个动作从其中施放以下的法术（保存DC18）。{@spell comprehend languages}, {@spell detect evil and good}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell detect poison and disease}, {@spell locate object}, 或 {@spell scrying}。一旦你用这副牌施放了一个法术，你就不能再用它施放那个法术，直到下一个黎明。

entries.name: Enduring Vision
entries: While holding the deck, you automatically succeed on Constitution saving throws made to maintain your {@status concentration} on divination spells.

entries.name: Twist of Fate
entries: 作为一个行动，你可以从牌组中抽出一张牌，扭曲你身边15英尺范围内另一个你能看到的生物的命运。从以下效果中选择一个。

items.name: Weal
items.entry: 在接下来的一小时内，该生物在攻击卷轴、能力检查和蓄势待发方面具有优势。

items.name: Woe
items.entry: 在接下来的一小时内，该生物在攻击卷轴、能力检查和蓄势待发方面处于劣势。

items: 这套牌可以以这种方式使用两次，在下一个黎明时分，你会重新获得所有消耗的使用权。

entries.name: Prisoners of Fate
entries: Whenever you use the Twist of Fate property, there is a chance that one of the souls trapped in the deck escapes. Roll {@dice d100} and consult the Souls of the Tarokka table. If you roll one of the high cards, the soul associated with it escapes. You can find its statistics in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}. If you roll a soul that has already escaped, roll again.

野兽

entries: The released soul appears at a random location within {@dice 10d10} miles of you and terrorizes the living. Until the released soul is destroyed, it gains the benefit of a weal from the deck's Twist of Fate property, and both you and the original target of Twist of Fate suffer the effect of woe.

entries.name: Shuffling Fate
entries: If you go 7 days without using the Twist of Fate property, your attunement to Luba's Tarokka of Souls ends, and you can't attune to it again until after another creature uses Twist of Fate on you.

entries.name: Destroying the Deck
entries: Luba's Tarokka of Souls can be destroyed only if all fourteen souls within are released and destroyed. This reveals a fifteenth soul, a {@creature lich}, that inhabits the Nether card, which appears only when the fourteen souls are defeated. If this ancient entity is destroyed, the Nether card vanishes and the deck becomes a normal {@deck tarokka deck|CoS}, with no special properties, but it includes a new card of the DM's design.

entries.name: Mother Luba and the Vistani
entries: 作为 "灵魂塔罗卡 "的创造者，鲁巴母亲是维斯坦尼族最有影响力的领袖之一。无数代以来，维斯塔纳人一直在阴影地带游荡，其中包括可怕的半位面，如吸血鬼出没的巴罗维亚王国。这些旅行者了解了这些领域的许多秘密，并遇到了无数在暗影星域的恐怖中游荡的人。大多数维斯坦因人都接受来自不同行业和不同出身的好心的旅行者，接纳任何想在无尽的道路和隐藏在迷雾中的远景中找到家的人。
作为一个半身人的维斯塔纳人，鲁巴母亲领导着阴影地带最大的维斯塔纳人团体之一。她来自斯特拉赫特-冯-扎罗维奇伯爵和伊娃夫人的同一个世界，她创造了一个善良和坚韧的社区，这在阴影世界中是非常罕见的。她带领她的人民欢迎陌生人，为饥饿的人提供食物，并对抗残酷的人。她和伊娃女士曾经是朋友，直到伊娃女士开始与夜间的生物讨价还价。"我们可以在阴影中徘徊，"卢巴修女说。"但我们必须永远作为我们的同行者的一盏灯。"
几年前，鲁巴母亲消失在迷雾中，只留下了灵魂塔罗卡。据说，如果你从中抽出迷雾牌，就能听到她慈祥的声音的低语。

item.name: Lucent Destroyer
entries: This magic weapon is a triple-barreled bronze musket. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. It requires no ammunition, its damage is radiant instead of piercing, and it doesn't have the loading property. The base of the weapon is emblazoned with the light rune.
Additionally, while attuned to the weapon, you can cast {@spell dancing lights} from the musket at will.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: As an action, you can invoke the weapon's rune to cast the {@spell sunbeam} spell (save DC 17) with it. Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

It's up to you to decide whether a character has proficiency with a firearm. Characters in most D&D worlds wouldn't have such proficiency. During their downtime, characters can use the training rules in the Player's Handbook to acquire proficiency, assuming that they have enough ammunition to keep the weapons working while mastering their use.

item.name: Luminous War Pick
entries: The haft of this war pick is inlaid with crushed pearlescent stones that imbue the weapon with a faint luminescence. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this war pick.

While wielding the war pick, you can use a bonus action to cast the {@spell daylight} spell, choosing a point on the war pick. Once you use this bonus action, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Lute crafted of exotic wood with mother-of-pearl inlay and zircon gems (Brazen Coalition)
Luxon Beacon
entries: 这个散发着微弱光芒的十二面体的水晶比它看起来要重。一组把手被贴在它的两侧，触摸时它会跳动和颤动。

entries.name: Fragment of Possibility
entries: 触摸信标并集中注意力1分钟的生物会得到一个 "可能的碎片"，它看起来像一个微小的、灰色的能量珠子，跟随在生物周围，一直停留在它的1英尺以内。该碎片持续8小时或直到使用。一旦信标给予一个可能性碎片，它就不能再给予另一个，直到下一个黎明。一个从卢克逊信标获得可能性碎片的生物，不能从任何来源获得另一个可能性碎片。

When a creature with a Fragment of Possibility makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it can expend its fragment to roll an additional {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use. Alternatively, when an attack roll is made against the creature, it can expend its fragment to roll a {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use, the one it rolled or the one the attacker rolled.
If the original {@dice d20} roll has advantage or disadvantage, the creature rolls its {@dice d20} after advantage or disadvantage has been applied to the original roll.

entries.name: Soul Snare
entries: 如果一个经历过迫害仪式的卢克逊信徒在卢克逊信标100英里范围内死亡，他们的灵魂就会被信标俘虏。这个灵魂将在信标100英里范围内的一个随机的人形婴儿体内转世。

item.name: Lycanthropy Antidote
entries: This silvery potion, made with {@creature fzeg|GHLoE} blood, is dotted with flecks of red. Drinking this liquid removes the curse of werewolf lycanthropy.

item.name: Lyre of Building
entries: While holding this {@item lyre|PHB}, you can cast {@spell mending} as an action. You can also play the {@item lyre|PHB} as a reaction when an object or a structure you can see within 300 feet of you takes damage, causing it to be immune to that damage and any further damage of the same type until the start of your next turn.

In addition, you can play the {@item lyre|PHB} as an action to cast {@spell fabricate}, {@spell move earth}, {@spell passwall}, or {@spell summon construct|TCE}, and that spell can't be cast from it again until the next dawn.

item.name: Mace of Disruption
entries: When you hit a fiend or an undead with this magic weapon, that creature takes an extra {@damage 2d6} radiant damage. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be destroyed. On a successful save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.
当你持有此武器时，它在20英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外20英尺范围内发出暗光。

item.name: Mace of Smiting
entries: 你在使用该魔法武器进行的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。当你使用该法器攻击一个建筑时，该奖励会增加到+3。
当你用此武器的攻击卷轴掷出20分时，目标会受到额外的7点重击伤害，如果是建筑体，则会受到额外的14点重击伤害。如果构造体在受到这种伤害后还有25点或更少的命中率，它将被摧毁。
{@note Note: According to the SRD, it is an extra {@dice 2d6} and {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage, although {@link this is incorrect|https://rpg.stackexchange.com/a/174522/53884}}.

item.name: Mace of Terror
entries: This magic weapon has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to release a wave of terror. Each creature of your choice in a 30-foot radius extending from you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. While it is {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. For its action it can use only the {@action Dash} action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If it has nowhere it can move, the creature can use the {@action Dodge} action. At the end of each of its turns, a creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
矛头每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d3}已消耗的炸药。

items.name: Awakened
entries: 当狼牙棒达到觉醒状态时，它会获得以下属性。

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and the extra fire damage dealt by the weapon when it is ignited increases to {@dice 2d6}.
The weapon's Summon Devil feature can also be used to summon a {@creature bearded devil}.
持有此武器时，你对毒药伤害有抵抗力。

item.name: Mace of the Black Crown (Dormant)
entries: 这把长矛有一个黑铁的柄和一个红宝石的头，有一个恶魔般的面孔。它承载着阿斯莫德的恩惠，适合于九层地狱最强大的仆人。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Mace of the Black Crown is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intelligence of 20, a Wisdom of 12, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这把武器能与它的持有者进行心灵感应，并能说、读和理解普通话和地狱语。

entries.name: Personality
entries: A greedy {@creature erinyes} named Xartaza lives within the Mace of the Black Crown. Xartaza wants to recruit more souls for Asmodeus, so the weapon pushes its wielder toward lawful evil actions by manipulating the wielder's dreams. A former Blood War general, Xartaza hates demons and relishes crafting sound battle plans in any conflict.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 马斯在休眠状态下会给予以下好处。

items: 你可以说、读、写Infernal。
你在使用该魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。

While holding the mace, you can use a bonus action to speak its Infernal command word, causing flames to erupt from the head. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the mace is ablaze, it deals an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again or until you are no longer holding the mace.

While holding the mace, you can use an action to summon an {@creature imp}. Any devil you summon with this mace is friendly to you and your companions for the duration. The imp obeys any verbal commands that you issue to it and returns to the Nine Hells 10 minutes after you summoned it. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

items.name: Exalted
entries: 当法杖达到高尚的境界时，它将获得以下属性。

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3, and the extra fire damage dealt by the weapon when it is ignited increases to {@dice 3d6}. Fire damage dealt by the mace ignores resistance to fire damage.
The weapon's Summon Devil feature can also be used to summon a {@creature barbed devil}.
当你持有此武器时，你对火灾伤害有抵抗力。

item.name: Macuahuitl
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this longsword, which is made of laminated wood, and inset with jagged teeth of obsidian. It deals an extra {@damage 2d6} damage to any creature of the plant type.

item.name: Maddgoth's Helm
entries: 当你戴着这个头盔，并且在麦迪格的城堡里，在它的屋顶上，或者在它的院子里，你对所有的伤害都有豁免权。如果头盔被带离城堡，它就会变成灰尘并被摧毁。

item.name: Magician's Judge
entries: An executioner's blade from the {@book Age of Arcanum|TDCSR|1|Age of Arcanum}, this magic {@item greatsword|PHB} is one of many similar weapons once used to execute magic-wielding criminals. Though most commonly found in the lands now known as {@book Wildemount|TDCSR|3|Wildemount} and {@book Issylra|TDCSR|3|Issylra}, a few such blades have found their way to Tal'Dorei.

If you hit a creature with an attack using this weapon, you can cast the {@spell dispel magic} spell from the sword against the target as part of the attack. Alternatively, you can use an action to cast {@spell dispel magic} from the sword against a target of your choice. If you need to make a check with your spellcasting ability modifier as part of casting the spell, you make this check with a +3 modifier or your own spellcasting ability modifier, whichever is higher.
Once you cast {@spell dispel magic} using this weapon, you can't do so again until the next dawn.

item.name: Magnifying Glass
entries: 这种透镜可以更仔细地观察小物体。在生火时，它也可以替代火石和钢。用放大镜点火需要像太阳光一样明亮的光线来聚焦，需要煤渣来点燃，并且需要大约5分钟来点火。放大镜在任何评估或检查小型或高度详细的物品的能力检查中都有优势。

item.name: Malachite
entries: 一种不透明的浅绿色和深绿色条纹的宝石。

item.name: Malice
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition blinded}.

item.name: Manacles
entries: 这些金属束缚可以束缚一个小型或中型生物。逃脱这些手铐需要成功地进行DC20的灵巧检查。挣脱它们则需要成功地进行DC20的力量检查。每套手铐都有一把钥匙。如果没有钥匙，精通{@item thieves' tools|PHB}的生物可以通过成功的DC15灵巧检查来打开手铐的锁。手铐有15个打击点。

item.name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
entries: 当你穿上这件斗篷时，你对法术的救赎有优势。

item.name: Manual of Bodily Health
entries: 这本书包含了健康和饮食的提示，它的文字充满了魔力。如果你在6天或更短的时间内花48小时研究这本书的内容并实践它的准则，你的体质分就会增加2分，你的该分数的最大值也会增加。然后，这本手册就会失去魔力，但在一个世纪后又会重新获得它。

item.name: Manual of Clay Golems
entries: This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of golem. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A creature that can't use a manual of golems and attempts to read it takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage.
要创造一个{@creature clay golem}，你必须花30天时间，不间断地用手头的手册工作，每天休息不超过8小时。你还必须支付65,000金币来购买物资。一旦你完成了对巨魔的创造，这本书就会被长生的火焰所吞噬。当手册的灰烬洒在巨像上时，巨像会变得有生命。它在你的控制之下，能听懂并服从你的命令。

item.name: Manual of Flesh Golems
entries: This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of golem. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A creature that can't use a manual of golems and attempts to read it takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage.
要创造一个{@creature flesh golem}，你必须花60天时间，不间断地用手头的手册工作，每天休息不超过8小时。你还必须支付50,000金币来购买物资。一旦你完成了对巨魔的创造，这本书就会被长生的火焰所吞噬。当手册的灰烬洒在巨像上时，巨像会变得有生命。它在你的控制之下，能听懂并服从你的命令。

item.name: Manual of Gainful Exercise
entries: 这本书描述了健身运动，它的文字充满了魔力。如果你在6天或更短的时间内花48小时研究这本书的内容并练习它的准则，你的力量得分就会增加2，你的该得分的最大值也会增加。这本手册随后就会失去魔力，但在一个世纪后又会恢复。

item.name: Manual of Iron Golems
entries: This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of golem. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A creature that can't use a manual of golems and attempts to read it takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage.
要创造一个{@creature iron golem}，你必须花120天时间，不间断地用手头的手册工作，每天休息不超过8小时。你还必须支付100,000金币来购买物资。一旦你完成了对巨魔的创造，这本书就会被长生的火焰所吞噬。当手册的灰烬洒在巨像上时，巨像会变得有生命。它在你的控制之下，能听懂并服从你的命令。

item.name: Manual of Quickness of Action
entries: 这本书包含了协调和平衡练习，它的文字充满了魔力。如果你在6天或更短的时间内花48小时研究这本书的内容并练习它的准则，你的灵巧得分会增加2分，你的该得分的最大值也会增加。这本手册随后就会失去魔力，但在一个世纪后又会恢复。

item.name: Manual of Stone Golems
entries: This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of golem. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A creature that can't use a manual of golems and attempts to read it takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage.
要创造一个{@creature stone golem}，你必须花90天时间，不间断地用手头的手册工作，每天休息不超过8小时。你还必须支付80,000金币来购买物资。一旦你完成了对巨魔的创造，这本书就会被长生的火焰所吞噬。当手册的灰烬洒在巨像上时，巨像会变得有生命。它在你的控制之下，能听懂并服从你的命令。

item.name: Map or Scroll Case
entries: 这个圆柱形的皮箱可以容纳10个卷起来的{@item paper (one sheet)|phb|sheets of paper}或5个卷起来的{@item parchment (one sheet)|phb|sheets of parchment}。

item.name: Marble font with gold inlay (Legion of Dusk)
Mask of the Beast
entries: 这个木质面具的形状类似于野兽的面孔，有3次充电。当你戴着面具时，你可以消耗1个电荷并使用面具作为行动施展{@spell animal friendship}的法术。面具在黎明时分重新获得所有消耗的电荷。

item.name: Mask of the Dragon Queen
entries: 单独来看，这五个龙形面具与它们所命名的龙相似。然而，当两个或更多的龙形面具组合在一起时，它们会神奇地变成龙后面具。每个面具都会缩小，成为一条色龙的头部模型，似乎在咆哮着对{@creature Tiamat|RoT}的奉献，所有的面具组合在一起，像皇冠一样排列在佩戴者的头上。在五个面具的下方，一个新的面具会自行成型，赋予佩戴者一个覆盖脸部、颈部和肩部的龙形面孔。
当你适应并佩戴这个面具时，你可以拥有任何一个面具的任何属性。此外，你还能从五个龙形面具中的每一个获得伤害吸收，并获得五次使用传奇抵抗的属性。

item.name: Mason's Tools
additionalEntries: Mason's tools allow you to craft stone structures, including walls and buildings crafted from brick.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 泥瓦匠的工具包括一把抹子、一把锤子、一把凿子、刷子和一个方形。

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: 你的专业知识可以帮助你确定一个石制建筑的建造日期和用途，以及洞察谁可能建造过它。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: 在检查石头结构内的区域时，你会获得额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: Perception
entries: 你可以发现石墙或地板的不规则之处，从而更容易找到陷阱门和秘密通道。

additionalEntries.name: Demolition
entries: 你的砖石知识使你能够发现砖墙的薄弱点。你的武器攻击对这种结构造成双倍伤害。

additionalEntries.caption: Mason's Tools
rows: 在石壁上凿出一个小洞
找到石墙的薄弱点

item.name: Masque Charm
entries: A masque charm is a small silver pin. While wearing this charm, you can use an action to cast the {@spell disguise self} spell (DC 13 to discern the disguise). Once the spell is cast, it can't be cast from the charm again until the next sunset. When casting the spell, you can have the spell last for its normal 1 hour duration or for 6 hours.
