In more recent times, it was worn by {@creature Pike Trickfoot|TDCSR}, a legendary cleric of the {@deity The Everlight|Exandria|TDCSR}, while fighting against {@book the Chroma Conclave|TDCSR|1|The Chroma Conclave} and {@deity The Whispered One|Exandria|TDCSR}.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While the Plate of the Dawnmartyr is in a dormant state, you gain a +1 bonus to AC while wearing it. When a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to rebuke that creature, dealing it {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Plate of the Dawnmartyr reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The armor's bonus to AC increases to +3.
When you rebuke an attacker, you can choose to deal either fire damage or radiant damage.

When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you can choose to have a blast of healing flame surround you. You regain 1 hit point and are lifted to your feet. Each enemy within 10 feet of you takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage or radiant damage (your choice). This property of the armor can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|long rest}.

item.name: Platinum (pp)
entries: 普通硬币根据其制成的金属的相对价值，有几种不同的面值。最常见的三种硬币是金币（gp）、银币（sp）和铜币（cp）。
用一个金币，一个角色可以买一个腰包，50英尺的好绳子，或者一只山羊。一个熟练的（但不是特殊的）工匠每天可以赚取一块金币。金币是衡量财富的标准单位，即使钱币本身并不常用。当商人讨论涉及价值数百或数千金币的商品或服务的交易时，交易通常不涉及单个金币的交换。相反，金币是一种标准的价值衡量标准，实际的交换是以金条、信用证或有价值的货物进行的。
一块金币价值十块银币，是平民中最普遍的硬币。一枚银币可以买到一个工人一天的工作，一壶灯油，或者在一个贫穷的旅馆里休息一晚。
一块银币值十个铜币，这在劳动者和乞丐中很常见。一个铜块可以买到一支蜡烛、一个火把或一支粉笔。
此外，由其他贵金属制成的不寻常的硬币有时会出现在宝藏中。电子币（ep）和铂金币（pp）起源于没落的帝国和失落的王国，它们在交易中使用时有时会引起怀疑和疑虑。一块银币价值5个银币，一块铂金价值10个金币。
一枚标准硬币的重量约为一盎司的三分之一，因此50枚硬币的重量为一磅。

item.name: Platinum bracelet set with a sapphire
Platinum headdress with topaz sun symbol (Sun Empire)
Platinum ring with yellow sapphire (Sun Empire)
Platinum Scarf
entries: 这条围巾由坚固的布制成，上面覆盖着铂金色的鳞片。
作为一个动作，你可以从围巾上拉出一个刻度，并说出一个命令词。当你这样做的时候，选择以下一种效果。

entries.name: Breath of Life
entries: 鳞片消失，你或你所接触的生物重新获得{@dice 10d4}的打击点数。

entries.name: Platinum Shield
entries: For 1 hour or until you dismiss it (no action required), the scale becomes a {@item +1 shield}, which you or another creature can use. A creature wielding the shield has immunity to radiant damage.

entries.name: Radiant Hammer
entries: For 1 hour or until you dismiss it (no action required), the scale becomes a magic {@item light hammer|phb}, which you or another creature can use. The weapon deals {@damage 2d4} radiant damage, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for a light hammer. It deals an extra {@damage 2d4} radiant damage to chromatic dragons.
一旦从围巾上拔下三片鳞片，就不能再拔下更多的鳞片，直到下一个黎明，所有缺失的鳞片会重新长出来。如果你拉下一个鳞片，但不说命令的话，1分钟后它就会消失。

item.name: Platinum staff topped with amber (Sun Empire)
Poison Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Poisoner's Kit
entries: 毒药师的工具箱包括小瓶、化学品和其他制造毒药所需的设备。对这套工具的熟练程度让你在制作或使用毒药的任何能力检查中加入你的熟练度加成。
此外，{@book Crafting and Harvesting Poison|dmg|8|Crafting and Harvesting Poison}的规则要求使用中毒者的装备。
additionalEntries: A poisoner's kit is a favored resource for thieves, assassins, and others who engage in skulduggery. It allows you to apply poisons and create them from various materials. Your knowledge of poisons also helps you treat them.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 投毒者的工具箱包括玻璃瓶、研钵和研杵、化学品和玻璃搅拌棒。

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: 当你试图回忆有关臭名昭著的中毒事件的事实时，你在毒药方面的训练可以帮助你。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation, Perception
entries: 你对毒药的了解使你学会了小心翼翼地处理这些物质，使你在检查{@condition poisoned}物体或试图从涉及毒药的事件中提取线索时有了优势。

additionalEntries.name: Medicine
entries: 当你治疗毒物的受害者时，你的知识赋予你更多的洞察力，让你知道如何为病人提供最好的护理。

additionalEntries.name: Nature, Survival
entries: 与毒药打交道使你能够获得关于哪些植物和动物有毒的传说。

additionalEntries.name: Handle Poison
entries: 你的熟练程度使你能够处理和应用一种毒药，而不会有使自己暴露在其影响下的风险。

additionalEntries.caption: Poisoner's Tools
rows: 发现一个{@condition poisoned}物体
确定一种毒药的效果

item.name: Pole of Angling
entries: 当你拿着这根10英尺长的杆子时，你可以说一个命令词，把它变成一根带钩、带线和带卷轴的钓鱼杆。再次说出命令词时，鱼竿又会变回普通的10英尺长的鱼竿。

item.name: Pole of Collapsing
entries: 当你拿着这根10英尺长的杆子时，你可以用一个动作说出一个命令词，使它折叠成1英尺长的杆子，以方便储存。杆子的重量不会改变。你可以使用一个动作说出一个不同的命令词，使杆子恢复成一根杆子；但是，杆子的长度只能达到周围空间允许的范围。

item.name: Portable Hole
entries: 这种精细的黑布，像丝绸一样柔软，被折叠成手帕的尺寸。它展开后是一个直径为6英尺的圆片。
你可以使用一个动作来展开一个可移动的洞，并把它放在固体表面上或靠着固体表面，这时可移动的洞会创造一个10英尺深的超维洞。洞内的圆柱形空间存在于不同的平面上，所以它不能被用来创造开放的通道。在一个开放的便携式洞内的任何生物都可以通过爬出洞口来离开。
你可以用一个动作来关闭一个可移动的洞，方法是握住布的边缘并将其折叠起来。折叠布可以关闭洞口，而里面的任何生物或物体都会留在次元空间中。无论里面有什么，这个洞都几乎没有重量。
如果洞口被折叠起来，在洞口外空间的生物可以使用一个动作来进行DC 10力量检查。如果检定成功，该生物会强行出来，并出现在便携洞或携带它的生物的5英尺范围内。在一个封闭的便携洞中，一个会呼吸的生物可以存活10分钟，之后它就会开始窒息。
在一个由{@item bag of holding}、{@item Heward's handy haversack}或类似物品创造的次元空间内放置一个可移动的洞，会立即摧毁两个物品，并打开一个通往星界的门。这道门的起点是一个物品放在另一个物品里面的地方。任何在大门10英尺范围内的生物都会被吸过去，并被安置在星界的一个随机位置。然后门就关闭了。这道门是单向的，不能重新打开。

item.name: Portable Ram
entries: 你可以使用一个便携式撞锤来破门。这样做时，你在力量检查中获得+4的奖励。另外一个角色可以帮助你使用公羊，使你在这个检查中获得优势。

item.name: Portal Compass
entries: This portable arcane instrument points in the direction of the last portal it passed through while it and the portal are on the same plane of existence. If that portal no longer exists, the needle becomes static until the compass passes through a new portal.

item.name: Portfolio Keeper
entries: 在等级2，你获得使用一个风化的皮革袋，这是一个不常见的魔法物品。这个投资组合保管器可以存放和组织笔记、小册子和印有你的联系信息的名片。它也有取之不尽的与你的特许经营权的当前品牌计划相关的小册子。
当你第一次见到某人时，他们的详细资料和粗略的草图会被神奇地储存在投资组合保管人的一张小羊皮纸上。你可以作为一个额外的行动来获取任何这样的存储卡的细节。

entries.name: Cards of Sending
entries: 在等级3时，你的名片保管员的力量变得更加强大，使它成为一个稀有的魔法物品。当你送出一张储存在你的名片时，你可以选择让收件人通过你的{@item sending stone|AI}联系你，就像他们施了一个{@spell sending}的法术。一张名片在送出七天后就会失去这种能力，而且一次不能有超过五张名片拥有这种能力。
你也可以用你的{@item sending stone|AI}来施放{@spell sending}，联系任何拥有你名片的人。一旦你使用了石头的这一功能，你就不能再使用它，直到七天后的黎明。

entries.name: Charming Introduction
entries: Also at rank 4, you are able to make a focused effort to keep a potential customer's attention. When you provide a humanoid with a business card from your portfolio keeper, you can cast {@spell charm person} on them (save DC 15). The spell ends prematurely if the character loses the business card.

item.name: Pot of Awakening
entries: If you plant an ordinary shrub in this 10-pound clay pot and let it grow for 30 days, the shrub magically transforms into an {@creature awakened shrub} at the end of that time. When the shrub awakens, its roots break the pot, destroying it.
被唤醒的灌木对你是友好的。如果没有你的命令，它什么也不做。

item.name: Potion of Acid Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Advantage
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你在接下来一小时内选择的一项能力检查、攻击卷或蓄力投掷上获得优势。
这种药水的形式是闪闪发光的金色雾气，像水一样移动和倾泻。

item.name: Potion of Animal Friendship
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你可以随心所欲地施展{@spell animal friendship}的法术（保存DC13），持续1小时。搅动这种泥泞的液体会使一些小碎片进入视野：鱼鳞、蜂鸟的舌头、猫爪或松鼠的头发。

item.name: Potion of Aqueous Form
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你会变成一滩水。10分钟后你会恢复到你的真实形态，或者如果你是{@condition incapacitated}或死亡。
在这个形态下，你会受到以下影响。

items.name: Liquid Movement
items.entry: 你的游泳速度为30英尺。你可以在其他液体上移动或通过其他液体。你可以进入并占据另一个生物的空间。你可以上升到你的正常高度，你甚至可以通过微小的开口。你可以在你进入的任何空间中熄灭非魔法的火焰。

items.name: Watery Resilience
items.entry: 你对非魔法伤害有抵抗力。你在力量、灵巧和体质方面也有优势。

items.name: Limitations
items.entry: 你不能说话，不能攻击，不能施法，也不能激活魔法物品。你所携带或佩戴的任何物品都会融合到你的新形态中，并且无法使用，不过你会继续受到你所穿戴的任何东西的影响，比如盔甲。

item.name: Potion of Clairvoyance
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the {@spell clairvoyance} spell. An eyeball bobs in this yellowish liquid but vanishes when the potion is opened.

item.name: Potion of Climbing
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. During this time, you have advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks you make to climb. The potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

item.name: Potion of Cloud Giant Strength
entries: 当你喝下这个药水时，你的力量值会变成27，持续1小时。如果你的力量等于或大于该分数，该药水对你没有影响。
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature cloud giant}.

item.name: Potion of Cold Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Comprehension
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of a {@spell comprehend languages} spell for 1 hour. This liquid is a clear concoction with bits of salt and soot swirling in it.

item.name: Potion of Diminution
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你会获得{@spell enlarge/reduce}法术的 "减少 "效果，持续{@dice 1d4}小时（不需要{@status concentration}）。药水中的红色会持续收缩成一个小珠子，然后膨胀，使周围的透明液体着色。摇晃瓶子也不能中断这个过程。

item.name: Potion of Dragon's Majesty
entries: This potion looks like liquid gold, with a single scale from a {@filter chromatic|bestiary|search=chromatic dragon}, {@filter gem|bestiary|search=gem dragon}, or {@filter metallic|bestiary|search=metallic dragon} dragon suspended in it. When you drink this potion, you transform into an adult dragon of the same kind as the dragon the scale came from. The transformation lasts for 1 hour. Any equipment you are wearing or carrying melds into your new form or falls to the ground (your choice). For the duration, you use the game statistics of the adult dragon instead of your own, but you retain your languages, personality, and memories. You can't use a dragon's Change Shape or its legendary or lair actions.

item.name: Potion of Fire Breath
entries: 喝了这个药水后，你可以用一个额外的动作向你30英尺范围内的目标呼出火焰。目标必须做一个DC13的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到{@damage 4d6}的火焰伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。效果在你呼出三次火后或1小时后结束。这种药水的橙色液体会闪烁，烟雾会充满容器的顶部并在打开时飘散出来。

item.name: Potion of Fire Giant Strength
entries: 当你喝下这个药水时，你的力量值会变成25，持续1小时。如果你的力量等于或大于该分数，该药水对你没有影响。
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature fire giant}.

item.name: Potion of Fire Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Flying
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你会获得相当于你行走速度的飞行速度，持续1小时，并且可以悬停。如果药水失效时你还在空中，你就会坠落，除非你有其他办法保持在高空。这种药水的透明液体漂浮在其容器的顶部，并有浑浊的白色杂质漂浮在其中。

item.name: Potion of Force Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Frost Giant Strength
entries: 当你喝下这个药水时，你的力量值会变成23，持续1小时。如果你的力量等于或大于该分数，该药水对你没有影响。
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature frost giant}.

item.name: Potion of Gaseous Form
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你会获得{@spell gaseous form}的法术效果，持续1小时（不需要{@status concentration}）或直到你以额外行动结束效果。这种药水的容器似乎装着雾气，像水一样移动和倾泻。

item.name: Potion of Giant Size
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，如果你是中型或小型，你会在24小时内变得巨大，否则药水没有任何作用。在该持续时间内，你的力量会变成25，如果它还没有变高的话，而且你的最大命中率会翻倍（当你喝下药水时，你当前的命中率会翻倍）。此外，你的近战攻击范围增加5英尺。
你所携带和穿戴的所有东西也会在持续时间内增加尺寸。当对以这种方式扩大的武器进行伤害计算时，要掷出正常骰子数量的三倍；例如，一把扩大的长剑会造成{@damage 3d8}的砍击伤害（而不是{@dice 1d8}），或者在双手使用时造成{@damage 3d10}的砍击伤害（而不是{@dice 1d10}）。
当效果结束时，你的命中率超过你的最大命中率，就会变成临时命中率。这种药水是一种淡白色的液体，由巨蚌的舌头制成，有一种类似腐烂海藻的刺鼻香气。然而在饮用时，它的味道是甜的。

item.name: Potion of Greater Healing
entries: 喝下此药水后，你会恢复{@dice 4d4 + 4}的命中率。药水的红色液体在搅动时闪闪发光。

item.name: Potion of Growth
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你会获得{@spell enlarge/reduce}法术的 "放大 "效果，持续{@dice 1d4}小时（不需要{@status concentration}）。药水中的红色从一个小珠子不断膨胀，使其周围的透明液体着色，然后收缩。摇晃瓶子也不能中断这个过程。

item.name: Potion of Healing
entries: 喝下此药水后，你会恢复{@dice 2d4 + 2}的命中率。药水的红色液体在搅动时闪闪发光。

item.name: Potion of Heroism
entries: For 1 hour after drinking it, you gain 10 temporary hit points that last for 1 hour. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the {@spell bless} spell (no {@status concentration} required). This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.

item.name: Potion of Hill Giant Strength
entries: 当你喝下这个药水时，你的力量值会变成21，持续1小时。如果你的力量等于或大于该分数，该药水对你没有影响。
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature hill giant}.

item.name: Potion of Invisibility
entries: This potion's container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. When you drink it, you become {@condition invisible} for 1 hour. Anything you wear or carry is {@condition invisible} with you. The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

item.name: Potion of Invulnerability
entries: 在你喝下此药水后的1分钟内，你对所有伤害都有抵抗力。该药水的糖浆状液体看起来像液化的铁。

item.name: Potion of Lightning Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Longevity
entries: When you drink this potion, your physical age is reduced by {@dice 1d6 + 6} years, to a minimum of 13 years. Each time you subsequently drink a potion of longevity, there is a {@chance 10|10 percent||You grow older!|You become younger} cumulative chance that you instead age by {@dice 1d6 + 6} years. Suspended in this amber liquid are a scorpion's tail, an adder's fang, a dead spider, and a tiny heart that, against all reason, is still beating. These ingredients vanish when the potion is opened.

item.name: Potion of Maximum Power
entries: 在喝下药水后的1分钟内，你第一次施放4级或以下的伤害性法术时，你可以不通过掷骰子来决定所造成的伤害，而是使用每个骰子可能的最高数字。
这种发光的紫色液体闻起来有糖和李子的味道，但它有一种泥土的味道。

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (beast)
entries: 当你喝下精神控制药水时，如果你在下一回合结束前对特定的生物施展支配咒语（保存DC15），你可以这样做。如果你不这样做，药水就会被浪费掉。
心灵控制的药水会产生{@spell dominate beast}的法术效果。如果目标最初的蓄力失败，效果会持续1小时，而你不需要{@status concentration}。在这段时间内，{@condition charmed}的生物在新的蓄力投掷中处于劣势，无法打破这个效果。

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (humanoid)
entries: 当你喝下精神控制药水时，如果你在下一回合结束前对特定的生物施展支配咒语（保存DC15），你可以这样做。如果你不这样做，药水就会被浪费掉。
心灵控制的药水会产生{@spell dominate person}的法术效果。如果目标最初的蓄力失败，效果会持续1小时，而你不需要{@status concentration}。在这段时间内，{@condition charmed}的生物在新的蓄力投掷中处于劣势，无法打破这个效果。

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (monster)
entries: 当你喝下精神控制药水时，如果你在下一回合结束前对特定的生物施展支配咒语（保存DC15），你可以这样做。如果你不这样做，药水就会被浪费掉。
心灵控制的药水会产生{@spell dominate monster}的法术效果。如果目标最初的蓄力失败，效果会持续1小时，而你不需要{@status concentration}。在这段时间内，{@condition charmed}的生物在新的蓄力投掷中处于劣势，无法打破这个效果。

item.name: Potion of Mind Reading
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你会获得{@spell detect thoughts}的法术效果（保存DC13）。药水中浓密的紫色液体中漂浮着一团卵形的粉红色云彩。

item.name: Potion of Necrotic Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Poison
entries: This concoction looks, smells, and tastes like a {@item potion of healing} or other beneficial potion. However, it is actually poison masked by illusion magic. An {@spell identify} spell reveals its true nature.

If you drink it, you take {@damage 3d6} poison damage, and you must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. At the start of each of your turns while you are {@condition poisoned} in this way, you take {@damage 3d6} poison damage. At the end of each of your turns, you can repeat the saving throw. On a successful save, the poison damage you take on your subsequent turns decreases by {@dice 1d6}. The poison ends when the damage decreases to 0.

item.name: Potion of Poison Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Possibility
entries: 当你喝下这种透明的药水时，你会获得两个 "可能的碎片"，每个碎片看起来都像一个微小的、灰色的能量珠，跟随在你身边，一直停留在你的1英尺以内。每个碎片可持续8小时或直到使用为止。

When you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can expend your fragment to roll an additional {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use. Alternatively, when an attack roll is made against you, you can expend your fragment to roll a {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use, the one you rolled or the one the attacker rolled.
如果原来的{@dice d20}卷有优势或劣势，在优势或劣势应用于原来的卷之后，你再卷你的{@dice d20}。
当你从这个药水中拥有一个或多个可能性碎片时，你不能从任何来源获得另一个可能性碎片。

item.name: Potion of Psionic Fortitude
entries: When you drink this potion, you have advantage for 1 hour on saving throws you make to avoid or end the charmed or stunned condition on yourself.
This black potion swirls with shimmering flecks of pink and purple.

item.name: Potion of Psychic Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Radiant Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Speed
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the {@spell haste} spell for 1 minute (no {@status concentration} required). The potion's yellow fluid is streaked with black and swirls on its own.

item.name: Potion of Stone Giant Strength
entries: 当你喝下这个药水时，你的力量值会变成23，持续1小时。如果你的力量等于或大于该分数，该药水对你没有影响。
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature stone giant}.

item.name: Potion of Storm Giant Strength
entries: 当你喝下这个药水时，你的力量值会变成29，持续1小时。如果你的力量等于或大于该分数，该药水对你没有影响。
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature storm giant}.

item.name: Potion of Superior Healing
entries: 喝下此药水后，你会恢复{@dice 8d4 + 8}的命中率。药水的红色液体在搅动时闪闪发光。

item.name: Potion of Supreme Healing
entries: 喝下此药水后，你会恢复{@dice 10d4 + 20}的命中率。药水的红色液体在搅动时闪闪发光。

item.name: Potion of Thunder Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistance}

item.name: Potion of Vitality
entries: When you drink this potion, it removes any {@condition exhaustion} you are suffering and cures any disease or poison affecting you. For the next 24 hours, you regain the maximum number of hit points for any Hit Die you spend. The potion's crimson liquid regularly pulses with dull light, calling to mind a heartbeat.

item.name: Potion of Watchful Rest
entries: 当你喝下这种药水时，你会在接下来的8小时内获得以下好处：魔法无法使你入睡，你可以在长时间的休息中保持清醒，并仍然获得其好处。这种甜美的、琥珀色的饮料对不需要睡眠的生物没有影响，例如精灵。

item.name: Potion of Water Breathing
entries: 喝下这种药水后，你可以在水下呼吸1小时。其浑浊的绿色液体有大海的味道，并有一个水母般的气泡漂浮在其中。

item.name: Potter's Tools
additionalEntries: Potter's tools are used to create a variety of ceramic objects, most typically pots and similar vessels.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 陶工的工具包括陶工针、肋骨、刮刀、刀和卡尺。

additionalEntries.name: History
entries: 你的专业知识可以帮助你识别陶瓷物品，包括它们是什么时候创造的，以及它们可能的来源地或文化。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation, Perception
entries: 在检查陶瓷时，你会获得额外的洞察力，通过发现细微的不规则，发现别人会忽视的线索。

additionalEntries.name: Reconstruction
entries: 通过检查陶器碎片，你可以确定一件物品的原始、完整的形式以及它可能的用途。

additionalEntries.caption: Potter's Tools
rows: 确定一艘船曾经装过什么
创造一个可使用的锅
找到陶瓷物体的薄弱点

item.name: Pouch
entries: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 {@item sling bullet|phb|sling bullets} or 50 {@item blowgun needle|phb|blowgun needles}, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a {@item component pouch|phb}. A pouch can hold up to ⅕ cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

item.name: Powered Armor
entries: 动力装甲类似于一套不寻常的板甲，有精细的关节，由油性、黑色、类似皮革的材料连接。这套盔甲被加工成一个肌肉发达的战士的样子，它的大头盔很不寻常，因为它没有开口，只有前面的一块宽大的玻璃板，上面还有另一块玻璃。奇怪的板子、管子和大型金属凸起以看似随意的方式装饰着盔甲。在盔甲的左手铠甲背面有一个长方形的金属盒，从里面伸出一根短棒，顶端有一个锥形的红色水晶。
穿着这件盔甲时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你有一个+1的交流奖励。
你的力量值是18（如果你的力量值已经是18或更高，这没有影响）。
你在救死扶伤方面有优势。

entries: 该盔甲有更多的功能，可以由能量电池或你自己的生命能量提供动力。你可以使用一个额外的动作从能量电池中吸取能量，或者牺牲命中率来获得以下的好处之一。

items: 发出一个力场，获得{@dice 2d6 + 5}临时命中率(1次充电或5个命中率)。
激活助推器，获得15英尺的飞行速度，持续1分钟（1次充电或5点命中率）。
发射手臂上的激光。{@atk rw} {@hit 8}击中，范围120英尺，一个目标。{@h}{@damage 2d6}辐射伤害(1次充电或5点命中)。
翻译你能看到的任何非魔法语言的文字，在1分钟内总共翻译1000个字（1次充电或5点命中率）。
让盔甲充满空气，让你在任何环境下都能正常呼吸，时间长达1小时（1次充电或5点命中率）。
获得{@sense darkvision}到60英尺的范围，最长1小时(1次充电或5点命中率)。

entries: 该盔甲一次只能接受一个能量电池。它被发现时连接着一个能量电池，含有{@dice 2d10}的电量。

entries.name: Powered Armor Options
entries: 根据它在冒险中出现的位置和方式，你可能希望修改Kwalish的传奇动力盔甲的特征。

entries.name: Automatic Defenses
entries: 除非Kwalish解除盔甲的自动防御功能，否则没有人可以接近盔甲而不触发这些防御功能。将盔甲视为一个储存了一个使用四级法术槽施放的{@creature shield guardian}法术的{@spell magic missile}。当盔甲的命中率降低到0时，它的防御系统就会失效，可以安全地接近它。

entries.name: Battle of Wills
entries: When donned by a new user, the armor deems itself superior and attempts to take possession of that user. The user must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the armor. While possessed, the user is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body but retains its awareness. The armor uses the possessed user's statistics (as adjusted by the armor), but doesn't gain access to the user's knowledge, features, or proficiencies.

Freeing a creature trapped inside the armor first requires defeating the armor's automatic defenses (as above). The trapped creature can also attempt a DC 20 Charisma saving throw each day at dawn. On a successful save, the armor no longer controls the creature and can be safely donned by that creature at any time.

entries.name: Stasis
entries: Whenever a creature wearing the armor drops to 0 hit points, the armor places that creature into a state of stasis. While in this state, the creature is stable and does not make death saving throws, but the armor takes control of the creature (as above). Additionally, the armor attempts to assume the identity of the user, assuring their allies that nothing is amiss. Freeing the user first requires defeating the armor's automatic defenses (as above). A creature in stasis does not make Charisma saving throws to break the armor's control.

entries.name: Alternative Power
entries: Powered armor originally required energy cells to fuel it, but was adapted by Kwalish to be fueled by the life energy of the creature wearing it. You might decide that the armor can also draw power from additional sources, or that energy cells can be recharged with the aid of a tinker, inventor, or artificer. It might also be possible for allies to connect to the armor through the use of magic that generates a conduit something like an astral silver cord. While so connected, a willing ally can give up hit points as a reaction to fuel the armor's abilities.

item.name: Prehistoric Figurine of Wondrous Power, Carnelian Triceratops
entries: Larger and more roughly hewn than typical figurines of wondrous power, these statuettes depict dinosaurs and related creatures from the earliest days of the world.

As an action, you can throw a prehistoric figurine of wondrous power to a point on the ground within 60 feet of yourself while speaking a command word, whereupon the figurine magically transforms into a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.

The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions. See the Monster Manual for the creature's statistics.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its statuette form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.

entries.name: {@creature triceratops||Carnelian Triceratops}
entries: This figurine becomes a {@creature triceratops} for up to 6 hours and can be ridden as a mount. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 10 days have passed.

item.name: Prehistoric Figurine of Wondrous Power, Jasper Tyrannosaurus Rex
entries: Larger and more roughly hewn than typical figurines of wondrous power, these statuettes depict dinosaurs and related creatures from the earliest days of the world.

When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.

entries.name: {@creature tyrannosaurus rex||Jasper Tyrannosaurus Rex}
entries: This figurine, crafted from rare green jasper, becomes a {@creature tyrannosaurus rex} for up to 1 hour. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 14 days have passed.

Whenever you command the figurine while it's in tyrannosaurus rex form (including commanding it to revert to figurine form), you must roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, you lose control of the figurine, and it becomes hostile to you and your companions until it is reduced to 0 hit points, at which point it reverts to figurine form.

item.name: Prehistoric Figurine of Wondrous Power, Kyanite Pteranodon
entries: Larger and more roughly hewn than typical figurines of wondrous power, these statuettes depict dinosaurs and related creatures from the earliest days of the world.

When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.

entries.name: {@creature pteranodon||Kyanite Pteranodon}
entries: This figurine becomes a {@creature pteranodon} for up to 8 hours. If your size is Medium or smaller, you can ride the pteranodon as a mount. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

item.name: Prehistoric Figurine of Wondrous Power, Pyrite Plesiosaurus
entries: Larger and more roughly hewn than typical figurines of wondrous power, these statuettes depict dinosaurs and related creatures from the earliest days of the world.

As an action, you can throw a prehistoric figurine of wondrous power to a point on the ground within 60 feet of yourself while speaking a command word, whereupon the figurine magically transforms into a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.

It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.

entries.name: {@creature plesiosaurus||Pyrite Plesiosaurus}
entries: This figurine becomes a {@creature plesiosaurus} for up to 12 hours and can be ridden as a mount. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 4 days have passed.
While you are riding the plesiosaurus, you can use it to cast {@spell water breathing} at will.

item.name: Pressure Capsule
entries: This small capsule is made of beeswax blended with sand and a variety of enchanted water plants. A creature who consumes a pressure capsule ignores the effects of swimming at depths greater than 100 feet (see "{@book Unusual Environments|dmg|5|Unusual Environments}" in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

item.name: Pride Silk
entries: The hearty silk unique to the region has long been a point of pride with the locals. When processed and woven properly, the resulting cloth is pride silk: an extremely flexible material with the durability of tanned leather. Pride silk has become a favorite cloth for use on military ship sails, war banners, and other utilitarian applications, but has also gained popularity in affluent circles. High-end clothing made from pride silk is both fashionable and protective, leading many nobles and wealthy merchants to seek full outfits and formal gowns made with it. The tailors skilled enough to create such outfits are few and far between, so while pride silk might be expensive as a raw material, outfits made of the cloth are prohibitively expensive for most common folk.

item.name: Pride Silk Outfit
entries: An outfit made of pride silk weighs 4 pounds and costs 500 gp. If you aren't wearing armor, your base Armor Class is 11 + your Dexterity modifier while wearing it.

item.name: Priest's Pack
entries: 包括。

items: a {@item backpack|phb}
a {@item blanket|phb}
10 {@item candle|phb|candles}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
an alms box
2 blocks of incense
a censer
vestments
2天的{@item Rations (1 day)|phb|rations}
a {@item waterskin|phb}.

item.name: Primal Amulet
entries: This beaded jade necklace bears an ancient symbol of the River Heralds. When worn, the primal amulet allows its wearer to cast {@spell speak with animals}, {@spell locate object}, and {@spell pass without trace}. Once the amulet has been used to cast a spell, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Prismari Primer
entries: The Prismari Primer is a magic textbook created at Strixhaven's Prismari College. The primer has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you make a Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) or a Charisma ({@skill Performance}) check while holding the primer, you can expend 1 charge to give yourself a {@dice 1d4} bonus to the check, immediately after you roll the {@dice d20}.
此外，如果你在长时间休息结束时学习了底牌，你可以从吟游诗人或巫师的法术列表中选择一个一级法术。在你完成下一次长时休息之前，如果你持有入门书，你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放一次所选的法术。你对这个法术的施法能力是你选择的智力、智慧或魅力。

item.name: Prismatic Well
entries: 这口井增强了和谐之城的色彩，使人们精神振奋。当这口井充满能量时，所有看到颜色的善良生物都会体验到幸福的感觉，并在所有魅力检查中获得优势。

item.name: Professor Orb
entries: 每个教授球体的形式是一个光滑、坚固、5磅重的烟灰色石英球体，大约有柚子那么大。仔细观察可以发现球体深处有两个或更多的银光针尖。

教授球体是有知觉的，具有学者的个性。它的排列方式是通过在《{@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg}》第七章的"{@book Sentient Magic Items|DMG|7|Sentient Magic Items} "部分的排列表上滚动决定的。不管它的性格如何，球体的智力为18，智慧和魅力的分数由滚动{@dice 3d6}来决定每一种能力。球体能说、能读、能理解四种语言，并能在60英尺范围内正常看和听。与大多数有生命的物品不同，球体没有自己的意志，不能与拥有它的生物发生冲突。
一个球体教授在四个狭窄的学术领域拥有广泛的知识。当进行智力测验以回忆其任何专业领域的传说时，球体有一个+9的奖励（包括其智力修正值）。
除了它所拥有的知识外，教授球体还可以随意施展{@spell mage hand}的咒语。它只在运输自己时使用该咒语。它的法术能力是智力。

item.name: Professor Skant
entries: The {@item professor orb|WDMM} owned by Vellynne Harpell and stolen by Nass Lantomir calls itself Professor Skant. It is lawful good, and it has a Wisdom of 11 and a Charisma of 9 {@note (as a professor orb, it has an Intelligence of 18)}. It speaks and reads Common, Draconic, Elvish, and Loross (the dead language of the Empire of Netheril). Professor Skant is a chatterbox and assumes all humanoids are dunderheads. When elaborating on its areas of expertise, it adopts an unintentionally patronizing tone. It has the following four areas of expertise:

items: 尼瑟尔的历史（见"{@adventure Fate of Netheril|IDRotF|17|Fate of Netheril} "边栏）。
吸血鬼与吸血鬼的特质
围绕着Elverquisst的制作、装瓶和饮用的仪式（一种稀有的、红宝石色的精灵酒，由阳光和稀有的夏季水果蒸馏而成）。
The {@creature tarrasque} (see the Monster Manual)

entries: 当进行智力检定以回忆其任何专业领域的传说时，球体有一个+9的奖励卷（包括其智力修正值）。
斯坎特教授的形态是一个光滑、坚实、5磅重的烟灰色石英球体，大约有柚子那么大。仔细观察可以发现球体深处有两个或更多的银色光点。
斯坎特教授可以在60英尺的范围内正常地看到和听到。与大多数有生命的物品不同，这个球体没有自己的意志，不能与拥有它的生物发生冲突。
In addition to the knowledge it possesses, Professor Skant can cast the {@spell mage hand} cantrip at will. It uses the spell only to transport itself. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

item.name: Propeller Helm
entries: While worn, the helm allows its wearer to use an action to cast the {@spell levitate} spell, requiring no components. The helm's propeller spins and whirs loudly until the spell ends. Each time the spell ends, there is a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance that the helm loses its magic and becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Prosthetic Limb
entries: 这种物品可以替代失去的肢体--手、胳膊、脚、腿或类似的身体部位。当假肢连接在一起时，它的功能与它所替代的部分完全相同。你可以把它拆开或重新装上作为一个动作，它不能违背你的意愿被移除。如果你死了，它就会分离。

item.name: Protective Verses
entries: This leather-bound spellbook is reinforced with iron and silver fittings and an iron lock (DC 20 to open). As an action, you can touch the book's cover and cause it to lock as if you cast {@spell arcane lock} on it. When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell arcane lock}, {@spell dispel magic}, {@spell globe of invulnerability}, {@spell glyph of warding}, {@spell Mordenkainen's private sanctum}, {@spell protection from evil and good||protection from evil}, and {@spell symbol}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
当你拿着这本书时，你可以把它作为你的巫师法术的施法重点。
The book has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: 如果你花了1分钟来学习这本书，你可以花费1个电荷，用书中不同的法术来替换你准备的一个巫师法术。新的法术必须是堕落学派的。
当你施展堕落法术时，你可以消耗1个电荷，给予你30英尺范围内你能看到的生物{@dice 2d10}的临时命中率。

item.name: Prying Blade
entries: A hooked blade useful on board a ship or as a cutting tool in the wilderness, this {@item +1 shortsword} grants its wielder advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks to climb or to escape while {@condition restrained}.

item.name: Psi Crystal
item.reqAttune: by a creature with an intelligence score of 3 or higher
entries: 只要你保持对它的调和，这块水晶就会赋予你心灵感应。关于这种心灵感应的工作原理，请参见{@book introduction of the Monster Manual|MM|0|Telepathy}的规则。
当你与之调和时，水晶也会发出紫红色的内在光芒。
你的智力越高，光的强度就越大，心灵感应的范围也越大（见Psi水晶属性表）。

entries.caption: Psi Crystal Properties
rows: 15 feet
在5英尺的范围内，光线变暗
30 feet
半径5英尺内有亮光，另外5英尺内有暗光
60 feet
方圆10英尺内有亮光，另外10英尺内有暗光
16岁或以上
120 feet
半径15英尺内有亮光，另外15英尺内有暗光

item.name: Psychic Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Purging Rod
entries: Once per day while holding this rod, you can use an action to cast {@spell purge contamination|DoDk}. After casting the spell, roll {@dice 1d20}. On a 1, the rod melts into sludge.

item.name: Purple Worm Poison
entries: This poison must be harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitated} {@creature purple worm}. A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Puzzle Card
entries: As an action, you can hold this card aloft and magically disable each trap within 60 feet of you that isn't behind {@book total cover|PHB|9|Cover}. A trap, for the purpose of this property, includes any object or mechanism that would inflict a sudden effect that was intended by its maker to cause harm or inconvenience. If the trap is the effect of a spell, such as {@spell Alarm}, that trap is suppressed for 10 minutes instead of being disabled. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When Pyremaul reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack rolls increases to +2.
The extra fire damage dealt by the weapon increases to {@dice 2d6}.

As an action, you can slam Pyremaul into the ground to cast the {@spell burning hands} spell at 2nd level (save {@dc 15}). You can't use this property again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}.
Whenever you score a critical hit with this weapon, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

item.name: Pyremaul (Dormant)
entries: Forged from deep red iron, this massive hammer is set with a brilliant fire opal that shimmers with eternal flame. It is rumored to be currently wielded by {@book Grand Legate Phaestor, the fire giant ruler of Vulkanon|TDCSR|6|fire giants}, somewhere beneath the {@book Cliffkeep Mountains|TDCSR|3|Cliffkeep Mountains}.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While Pyremaul is in a dormant state, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} fire damage.
Additionally, you can choose to have this weapon shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet (no action required).

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When Pyremaul reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack rolls increases to +3.
The extra fire damage dealt by the weapon increases to {@dice 3d6}.
When you cast {@spell burning hands} with the weapon, you do so at 3rd level and the save DC increases to 17.

When you score a critical hit with this weapon, the {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} to avoid being knocked {@condition prone} increases to 17. You also roll an extra {@damage 3d6} fire damage when determining the extra damage for the critical hit.

When you kill a creature with an attack using this weapon, you can take {@damage 10d10} fire damage and immolate the creature's corpse. This damage can't be reduced in any way, and you die if this damage reduces you to 0 hit points. The immolated creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of ash. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a {@spell true resurrection} or a {@spell wish} spell. You can't use this property of the maul again until 7 days have passed.

item.name: Pyroconverger
entries: 火焰喷射器是一种伊扎特制造的火焰喷射器。每次使用都有发生故障的风险。
作为一个动作，你可以使火力转化器在10英尺的范围内喷火。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个DC13的灵巧蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到{@damage 4d6}的火焰伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。
每次你使用火力转换器时，掷出{@dice d10}并加上你在上次长休后使用它的次数。如果总数是11或更高，火力转换器就会发生故障：你会受到{@damage 4d6}的火焰伤害，并且在你完成长时间休息之前，你不能再使用火力转换器。

item.name: Pyxis of Pandemonium
entries: A creature that touches this ornate wooden vessel for 1 minute gains the benefits of a short rest. That creature also gains the effects of the {@spell bless} spell until the creature finishes a short or long rest. The creature can't gain these benefits again until it finishes a long rest.
如果容器被打开，在Pyxis of Pandemonium表上滚动以决定发生什么。任何由该容器施放的法术，其法术防御DC为17。容器被打开后一分钟，它就消失了。24小时后，它将在同一平面上的一个随机位置重新出现，并被密封。

entries.name: Curse
entries: Any creature that gains the benefit of a short rest from the vessel hears cloying telepathic whispers emanating from it. That creature must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the vessel for 1 hour. The {@condition charmed} creature does everything it can to open the vessel as soon as possible. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the vessel's whispers for 24 hours.

rows: {@b Androphagia.}60英尺范围内的每个生物必须在DC17智慧救赎中成功，否则会狂暴1分钟。狂暴生物必须在其回合开始时使用{@action Attack}行动，对离它最近的生物进行一次近战或远程攻击（自己选择）。狂暴生物可以在其回合结束时重复救赎，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。
{@b Bile Blight.}该容器对它周围30英尺内的每个生物施展{@spell harm}的法术。
{@b Flood.} 船只在120英尺范围内由DM选择的地点施放{@spell tsunami}的法术。
{@b Medusa's Gaze.}该容器对它周围30英尺内的每个生物施展{@spell flesh to stone}的法术。
{@b Labyrinth.}该容器对它周围30英尺内的每个生物施展{@spell maze}的法术。
{@b Nightmare.}阴影的卷须从容器中渗出并形成{@dice 1d4}{@creature shadow demon||shadow demons}（见怪物手册中的状态块），它们出现在它周围30英尺内无人的空间，并具有敌意。
{@b Swarming Insects.} 容器施放{@spell insect plague}法术，以自己为中心，半径为30英尺。
{@b Unbridled Revel.}该容器对它周围30英尺内的每个生物施展{@spell Otto's irresistible dance}的法术。

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Anchor
entries: 这个微小的物体看起来像一根羽毛。存在不同类型的羽毛令牌，每一种都有不同的单次使用效果。

entries.name: Anchor
entries: 你可以使用一个动作将令牌接触到船只或船舶。在接下来的24小时内，该船不能以任何方式被移动。再次将令牌碰触到该船，则效果结束。当效果结束时，令牌会消失。

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Bird
entries: 这个微小的物体看起来像一根羽毛。存在不同类型的羽毛令牌，每一种都有不同的单次使用效果。

entries.name: Bird
entries: You can use an action to toss the token 5 feet into the air. The token disappears and an enormous, multicolored bird takes its place. The bird has the statistics of a {@creature roc}, but it obeys your simple commands and can't attack. It can carry up to 500 pounds while flying at its maximum speed (16 miles an hour for a maximum of 144 miles per day. with a one-hour rest for every 3 hours of flying), or 1,000 pounds at half that speed. The bird disappears after flying its maximum distance for a day or if it drops to 0 hit points. You can dismiss the bird as an action.

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Fan
entries: 这个微小的物体看起来像一根羽毛。存在不同类型的羽毛令牌，每一种都有不同的单次使用效果。

entries.name: Fan
entries: 如果你在船上，你可以用一个动作将令牌抛到10英尺的空中。令牌会消失，而一个巨大的扇子会取代它。扇子会漂浮起来，并产生足以填满一艘船的帆的风，使其速度每小时增加5英里，持续8小时。你可以将扇子作为一个行动来解散。

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Swan Boat
entries: 这个微小的物体看起来像一根羽毛。存在不同类型的羽毛令牌，每一种都有不同的单次使用效果。

entries.name: Swan Boat
entries: 你可以使用一个行动，将令牌接触到一个直径至少60英尺的水体。令牌会消失，一个50英尺长、20英尺宽的天鹅形状的小船会取代它的位置。该船是自走式的，以每小时6英里的速度在水中移动。你可以在船上使用一个动作来命令它移动或转弯，转弯幅度可达90度。这艘船最多可以携带三十二个中型或小型生物。一个大型生物算作四个中型生物，而一个巨大的生物则算作九个。这艘船可以停留24小时，然后消失。你可以用一个行动来解散这艘船。

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Tree
entries: 这个微小的物体看起来像一根羽毛。存在不同类型的羽毛令牌，每一种都有不同的单次使用效果。

entries.name: Tree
entries: 你必须在户外才能使用这个令牌。你可以用一个动作将它触及到地面上一个无人的空间。这个令牌会消失，在它的位置上，一棵非魔法的橡树会涌现出来。这棵树有60英尺高，有一个直径5英尺的树干，其顶端的树枝在20英尺的范围内散开。

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Whip
entries: 这个微小的物体看起来像一根羽毛。存在不同类型的羽毛令牌，每一种都有不同的单次使用效果。

entries.name: Whip
entries: You can use an action to throw the token to a point within 10 feet of you. The token disappears, and a floating whip takes its place. You can then use a bonus action to make a melee spell attack against a creature within 10 feet of the whip, with an attack bonus of {@hit 9}. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6 + 5} force damage.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can direct the whip to fly up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 10 feet of it. The whip disappears after 1 hour, when you use an action to dismiss it, or when you are {@condition incapacitated} or die.

item.name: Quandrix Primer
entries: The Quandrix Primer is a magic textbook created at Strixhaven's Quandrix College. The primer has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you make an Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) or an Intelligence ({@skill Nature}) check while holding the primer, you can expend 1 charge to give yourself a {@dice 1d4} bonus to the check, immediately after you roll the {@dice d20}.
此外，如果你在一次长时休息结束时学习了引言，你可以从德鲁伊或巫师的法术列表中选择一个一级法术。在你完成下一次长时休息之前，如果你持有入门书，你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放一次所选的法术。你对这个法术的施法能力是你选择的智力、智慧或魅力。

item.name: Quartz
entries: 一种透明的白色、烟灰色或黄色的宝石。

item.name: Quiver
entries: A quiver can hold up to 20 {@item arrow|phb|arrows}.

item.name: Quiver of Ehlonna
entries: 箭筒的三个隔间中的每一个都连接到一个次元空间，使箭筒可以容纳许多物品，而重量永远不超过2磅。最短的隔间可以容纳六十{@item arrow|phb|arrows}，{@item crossbow bolt|phb|bolts}，或类似的物品。中等大小的隔间可容纳十八个{@item javelin|phb|javelins}或类似物品。最长的隔间最多可以容纳六件长物，如弓箭、{@item quarterstaff|phb|quarterstaffs}或{@item spear|phb|spears}。
你可以抽取箭筒中的任何物品，就像从普通的箭筒或刀鞘中抽取一样。

item.name: Radiance
entries: 拿着这根魔杖时，你的法术攻击卷获得+1的加成。此外，在进行法术攻击时，你会忽略一半的掩护。光芒的形式是一面精致的金色手镜。

While surrounded by darkness, it sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. A creature that is attuned to Radiance can use a bonus action while holding the mirror to cast the {@spell enhance ability} spell, choosing itself and no other creature as the spell's target. Once this property of the wand is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Radiant Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Rain Catcher
entries: 集雨器是一个简单的装置，由一块5英尺见方的皮布和一个带腿的木框组成。当篷布横跨木质框架时，它形成一个盆地，每英寸降雨量可以接住2加仑饮用水，最多可容纳8加仑。篷布和木架可以折叠起来，便于运输。

item.name: Rakdos Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Rakdos, allows you to cast {@spell hellish rebuke}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Rakdos' recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Rakdos Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Rakdos guild
entries: This dark granite keyrune is marbled with scarlet veins and carved with the leering visage of a mischievous demon. When activated, it transforms into a {@creature cackler|GGR} for up to 1 hour.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature cackler|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.
该生物对你、你的同伴和你的公会的其他成员都很友好（除非那些公会成员对你有敌意）。它能听懂你的语言并服从你的口头命令。如果你没有发出任何命令，该生物会采取{@action Dodge}的行动并移动以避免危险。
在持续时间结束时，该生物会恢复到它的钥匙形状。如果它的生命值下降到0，或者你在接触它的时候使用行动再次说出命令词，它就会提前恢复。当该生物恢复到它的钥匙孔形态时，它不能再变身，直到36小时后。

item.name: Rakdos Riteknife
entries: 你在使用该魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。它的刀刃是残酷的锯齿状，刀柄类似于一个恶魔的头和翅膀。每当你用匕首攻击杀死一个生物时，该生物的灵魂就会被囚禁在匕首里，而该生物只能通过{@spell wish}的法术恢复生命。匕首最多可以容纳五个灵魂。

For each soul imprisoned in the dagger, your attacks with it deal an extra {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage on a hit. While the dagger is within 5 feet of you, your dreams are haunted by whispers from the trapped souls.
匕首具有以下附加属性。

entries.name: Siphon Vitality
entries: As a bonus action, you can release any number of stored souls from the dagger to regain {@dice 1d10} hit points per soul released.

entries.name: Annihilation
entries: 如果匕首上有五个灵魂，你可以使用这个属性。在你用匕首击中一个生物并对该目标造成伤害后，作为反应，你可以释放所有五个灵魂。如果目标现在的命中率低于75，它必须在DC15宪法救赎中成功，否则就会死亡。如果目标死亡，你不能再次使用这个属性，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

item.name: Ranseur of Torture
entries: Forged of infernal iron and Hellfire through the help of Dispater, the Ranseur of Torture has been Belial's weapon of choice since he first became an archdevil.
It is so directly tied to him that one of his worshipped symbols is a two-pronged fork. The weapon never leaves his side, and he is a master at wielding it.

The Ranseur of Torture is a magic pike. You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, and it does {@damage 2d10} piercing damage instead of its regular damage. When you hit a good aligned creature with it, that creature takes an extra {@damage 1d10} necrotic damage.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Ranseur of Torture has the following random properties:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} 财产
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} 财产
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} 财产

entries.name: Wounding
entries: Damage dealt by the Ranseur of Torture is particularly dangerous, as it can only be restored through magical means. Resting, food, and medicine won't restore hit points removed by the pike. If the damage goes untreated for 7 days, the missing hit points are permanently removed, and can be recovered only through casting a {@spell Regenerate} or {@spell Wish} spell on the victim.

entries.name: Execution
entries: If a creature with less than its full hit points is hit by this pike, the Ranseur of Torture deals {@dice 1d10} additional piercing damage. If a creature is killed by the pike, their soul is sent to Phlegethos and can be restored only through casting a {@spell Wish} spell on the victim.

entries.name: Staggered
entries: Each time a creature takes damage from the Ranseur of Torture, they must make a Constitution save, with a DC equaling the damage they took. On a failed save, their movement speed is reduced by 5 feet until the end of their next turn. This penalty stacks, though movement speed can't be reduced below 0.

entries.name: Interrupting
entries: Spellcasters damaged by the Ranseur of Torture have disadvantage on Constitution checks made to maintain {@status concentration} until the damage is healed. If a creature is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell when damaged by the ranseur, their {@status concentration} is immediately ended.

entries.name: Destroying the Ranseur
entries: Only through the written consent of both Dispater and Belial can the Ranseur of Torture be destroyed. If either or both of the archdevils are dead, then the new archdevil to take their mantle must give permission in their stead. The two writs must be wrapped around each of the prongs of the weapon, then the weapon must be tossed into the Pit of Flame. If performed successfully, the Hellfire briefly burns a different hue.

item.name: Rations (1 day)
entries: 口粮由适合长期旅行的干粮组成，包括肉干、干果、硬面包和坚果。

item.name: Raven's Slumber
entries: This black crystal pendant is a magical gateway to a small pocket dimension. You can use the pendant as an improvised weapon to make a melee or ranged weapon attack against a Large or smaller creature. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or be trapped within the crystal. A creature that wants to be trapped can intentionally fail this {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}.

Only one creature at a time can be held in a raven's slumber. That creature is aware of the passage of time and can see the world outside of this talisman as if through a window. You can release a held creature to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you as a bonus action.

If a companion creature granted to you by a class feature, or a beast that you've tamed as a companion, is reduced to 0 hit points while within 100 feet of you, it is immediately drawn into the pendant and stabilized. If the pendant already holds a creature, this effect fails.

item.name: Ready Gunk
entries: This sticky paste is fashioned from the powdered bone armor of a {@creature bone trader|GHLoE}. When you treat a weapon, shield, or other item that can be wielded in one or two hands, you can use a bonus action to summon and equip it, as long as the item is within 30 feet of you. After using the magic of the paste three times, it loses its potency.

item.name: Reaper's Scream
entries: The spikes of this iron morningstar glow with sickly, pale light. The death rune is inscribed on its shaft and inlaid with pearl.
You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, and attacks with this weapon deal necrotic damage instead of piercing damage.

When you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, you gain 10 temporary hit points. Any creature that hits you with a melee attack while you have 1 or more of these temporary hit points takes 10 necrotic damage.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: As a bonus action, you can invoke the weapon's rune, unleashing the screams of every creature slain by the weapon in one cacophonous burst. Each creature of your choice within 60 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the stunned condition until the start of your next turn.
Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Red Chromatic Rose
entries: {#itemEntry Chromatic Rose|WBtW}

item.name: Red Dragon Mask
entries: 这个光亮的深红色面具有后掠的角和尖锐的颊脊。面具可以重塑，以适应与之相适应的佩戴者。当你戴着这个面具并与之相适应时，你可以获得以下属性。

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: 你对火灾伤害有抵抗力。如果你已经对其他来源的火系伤害有抵抗力，你反而对火系伤害有免疫力。如果你已经对其他来源的火系伤害有免疫力，每当你受到火系伤害时，你不会受到任何伤害，并恢复相当于该类型伤害的一半的命中率。

entries.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: 当你没有穿戴盔甲时，你可以将你的魅力值加到你的盔甲等级上。

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: 如果你有一个需要休息才能充能的呼吸武器，它获得的充能是6。

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense darkvision} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense blindsight} out to 30 feet for 5 minutes.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: 你能说并听懂德拉科尼亚语。在你对红龙进行的任何魅力检查中，你也有优势。

entries.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: (1/天)如果你的拯救动作失败，你可以选择成功代替。

entries.name: Dragon Fire
entries: 如果你对一个生物或易燃物造成火力伤害，它就开始燃烧。在它的每个回合开始时，以这种方式燃烧的生物会受到{@damage 1d6}火灾伤害。一个可以到达燃烧目标的生物可以使用一个行动来灭火。

item.name: Red Dragon Scale Mail
entries: 龙鳞邮件是由一种龙的鳞片制成的。有时，龙会收集它们遗弃的鳞片并将它们赠送给人类。其他时候，猎人会小心翼翼地剥下死龙的皮并加以保存。在这两种情况下，龙鳞甲都有很高的价值。当你穿上这件盔甲时，你会获得一个+1的交流奖励，在面对龙的恐怖存在和呼吸武器时，你在蓄力时有优势，并且你对火焰伤害有抵抗力。
此外，你可以集中你的感官作为一个行动，以魔法方式辨别距离你30英里内最近的红龙的距离和方向。这个特殊动作在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Red Wizard Blade
entries: Forged by Red Wizards using a secret process known only to them, this grim steel dagger draws its power from the Negative Plane. When you hit a creature with a melee attack using this magic dagger, the target takes an extra {@damage 3d12} necrotic damage.

A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this weapon dies and can't be raised from the dead except by a deity or by a creature using a {@item tablet of reawakening|HAT-LMI} to cast the {@spell true resurrection} spell.

item.name: Refined Delerium Dust
entries: This pouch contains an ounce of purified and magically charged delerium dust. It may be ingested as an action. When you consume a full pouch, you gain advantage on spell attack rolls and saving throws against spells for one minute.
You gain one {@adventure level of contamination|DoDk|12} when you consume refined delerium dust.

item.name: Reincarnation Dust
entries: When this small pouch of purple dust is sprinkled on a dead humanoid or a piece of a dead humanoid, the dust is absorbed by the remains. If willing, the dead creature returns to life with a new body as if the {@spell reincarnate} spell had been cast on the remains.

item.name: Residuum
entries: The sheer amount of leftover arcane power within the {@item whitestone|TDCSR} of the mountains is incredibly receptive to enchantment. Magic items that incorporate at least an ounce of {@item whitestone|TDCSR} into their construction require only one-quarter the creation time of other magic items. Some alchemists in {@book Emon|TDCSR|3|Emon, the City of Fellowship} have discovered that dissolving {@item whitestone|TDCSR} with specific acids can leave behind pure residuum, which can substitute for expensive spell components when such materials are not readily available.

If a spell has a component cost that consumes the component, its caster can substitute the required component for an amount of residuum of an equal value. One pound of pure residuum is worth approximately 500 gp in most markets, though it becomes extremely expensive and difficult to find outside of {@book Emon|TDCSR|3|Emon, the City of Fellowship} or the city of {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} itself.

Residuum can also be heated and blown into glass, forming a shimmering, greenish surface. Residuum slates or orbs can be used in stationary enchanting tables. Archmages willing to pay exorbitant rates—easily 20,000 gp or more—may acquire an {@item Residuum enchanting slate|TDCSR|enchanting slate} that can be used to expedite the creation of all magic items. Using such a table allows anyone crafting a magic item to do so in one-quarter of the usual time.

item.name: Residuum Enchanting Slate
entries: {@item Residuum|TDCSR} can also be heated and blown into glass, forming a shimmering, greenish surface. Residuum slates or orbs can be used in stationary enchanting tables. Archmages willing to pay exorbitant rates—easily 20,000 gp or more—may acquire an {@item Residuum enchanting slate|TDCSR|enchanting slate} that can be used to expedite the creation of all magic items. Using such a table allows anyone crafting a magic item to do so in one-quarter of the usual time.

item.name: Reszur
entries: 你用这种武器进行的攻击和伤害卷有+1的加成，这种武器在击中或切割东西时不会发出噪音。
Reszur "这个名字被刻在了匕首的柄部。如果持刀者说出这个名字，刀身就会发出微弱的冷光，在10英尺范围内发出昏暗的光芒，直到持刀者再次说出这个名字。

item.name: Reveler's Concertina
entries: 在持有此琴时，你的吟游诗人法术的蓄力DC获得+2的奖励。
As an action, you can use the concertina to cast {@spell Otto's irresistible dance} from the item. This property of the concertina can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Rhodochrosite
entries: 一种不透明的浅粉色宝石。

item.name: Ring of Acid Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Air Elemental Command
entries: 戴上这枚戒指后，你在对来自空气元素界的元素进行攻击时有优势，而他们在对你进行攻击时有劣势。此外，你可以获得基于空气元素界的属性。
这枚戒指有5次充电。它每天在黎明时分会重新获得{@dice 1d4 + 1}已消耗的电量。从戒指上施放的法术，其救赎DC为17。
你可以消耗戒指的2个电荷，对一个{@creature air elemental}的人施放{@spell dominate monster}。此外，当你坠落时，你每回合会下降60英尺，并且不会受到坠落的伤害。你也能说并理解奥兰语。
If you help slay an {@creature air elemental} while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

items: 你对雷电伤害有抵抗力。
你的飞行速度等同于你的步行速度，并且可以悬停。
你可以从戒指中施放以下法术，并消耗必要的电荷数。{@spell chain lightning}（3次充电），{@spell gust of wind}（2次充电），或{@spell wind wall}（1次充电）。

item.name: Ring of Amity
entries: This ring is carved from hematite and bears an engraving of the friend rune.

When you first attune to this ring, you can touch one willing creature and form a magical bond between the two of you. While this bond lasts, whenever you are subjected to a spell or magical effect that restores hit points, the bonded creature also receives the benefits of the spell or effect.
You can bond with a different creature whenever you finish a long rest, provided that you can touch the creature and the creature is willing.

A creature can benefit from only one ring of amity's bond at a time. The bond ends if either you or the creature travels to a different plane of existence, if you bond with a different creature at the end of a long rest, or if you sever the bond as a bonus action.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: When the bonded creature hits a target with an attack roll, you can use your reaction to invoke the ring's rune if you are within 60 feet of the bonded creature. The bonded creature's attack is then turned into a critical hit.
Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Ring of Animal Influence
entries: This ring has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast one of the following spells:

items: {@spell Animal friendship} (保存DC13)
{@spell Fear}（保存DC13），只针对智力为3或更低的野兽
{@spell Speak with animals}

item.name: Ring of Cold Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Collecting
entries: While wearing this ring you can use it to cast the {@spell Leomund's Tiny Hut} spell as an action. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn. Additionally, as a bonus action, you can use the ring to disintegrate any nonmagical piece of art (drawing, painting, or sculpture) within 60 feet that is no larger than Medium-sized. That art now appears inside the tiny hut, for you to appreciate whenever you desire. If you try to remove this art from the tiny hut, it vanishes forever. You can steadily improve this space, but only be denying such beauty to the rest of the world. For every 1,000 gp of art acquired, the tiny hut increases in size by adding another foot to its radius and lasts one additional hour.

item.name: Ring of Djinni Summoning
entries: While wearing this ring, you can speak its command word as an action to summon a particular {@creature djinni} from the Elemental Plane of Air. The {@creature djinni} appears in an unoccupied space you choose within 120 feet of you. It remains as long as you concentrate (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell), to a maximum of 1 hour, or until it drops to 0 hit points. It then returns to its home plane.

While summoned, the {@creature djinni} is friendly to you and your companions. It obeys any commands you give it, no matter what language you use. If you fail to command it, the {@creature djinni} defends itself against attackers but takes no other actions.
在{@creature djinni}离开后，24小时内不能再被召唤，如果{@creature djinni}死亡，戒指就会变得没有魔力。

item.name: Ring of Earth Elemental Command
entries: 戴上这枚戒指后，你对来自地球元素界的元素体的攻击卷有优势，而他们对你的攻击卷则有劣势。此外，你可以获得基于地球元素界的属性。
这枚戒指有5次充电。它每天在黎明时分会重新获得{@dice 1d4 + 1}已消耗的电量。从戒指上施放的法术，其救赎DC为17。
你可以消耗戒指的2个炸药，在一个{@creature earth elemental}的地方施放{@spell dominate monster}。此外，你可以在由碎石、岩石或泥土组成的{@quickref difficult terrain||3}中移动，就像普通地形一样。你也可以说并理解泰兰语。
If you help slay an {@creature earth elemental} while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

items: 你对酸性伤害有抵抗力。
You can move through solid earth or rock as if those areas were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. If you end your turn there, you are shunted out to the nearest unoccupied space you last occupied.
你可以从戒指中施放以下法术，并消耗必要的费用。{@spell stone shape} (2次充电), {@spell stoneskin} (3次充电), 或 {@spell wall of stone} (3次充电)。

item.name: Ring of Evasion
entries: 这个戒指有3个电荷，它每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d3}已消耗的电荷。当你戴着它的时候，你的灵巧救赎失败，你可以用你的反应来消耗它的一个电荷来代替救赎成功。

item.name: Ring of Feather Falling
entries: 当你戴着这枚戒指摔倒时，你每回合会下降60英尺，并且不会因为摔倒而受到伤害。

item.name: Ring of Fire Elemental Command
entries: 戴上这枚戒指后，你对来自火元素界的元素体的攻击卷有优势，而他们对你的攻击卷有劣势。此外，你可以获得基于火元素界的属性。
这枚戒指有5次充电。它每天在黎明时分会重新获得{@dice 1d4 + 1}已消耗的电量。从戒指上施放的法术，其救赎DC为17。
你可以消耗戒指的2个电荷，对一个{@creature fire elemental}的人施放{@spell dominate monster}。此外，你对火灾伤害有抵抗力。你还能说和理解伊格纳语。
If you help slay a {@creature fire elemental} while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

items: 你对火灾伤害免疫。
你可以从戒指中施放以下法术，并消耗必要的费用。{@spell burning hands} (1次充电), {@spell fireball} (2次充电), 和 {@spell wall of fire} (3次充电)。

item.name: Ring of Fire Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Force Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Free Action
entries: While you wear this ring, {@quickref difficult terrain||3} doesn't cost you extra movement. In addition, magic can neither reduce your speed nor cause you to be {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition restrained}.

item.name: Ring of Invisibility
entries: While wearing this ring, you can turn {@condition invisible} as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} with you. You remain {@condition invisible} until the ring is removed, until you attack or cast a spell, or until you use a bonus action to become visible again.

item.name: Ring of Jumping
entries: 戴上这枚戒指时，你可以将其中的{@spell jump}法术作为额外动作随意施放，但施放时只能以自己为目标。

item.name: Ring of Lightning Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Mind Shielding
entries: 在佩戴这枚戒指时，你对那些允许其他生物读取你的想法、判断你是否在说谎、知道你的排列组合或知道你的生物类型的魔法免疫。只有在你允许的情况下，生物才能与你进行心灵感应。
You can use an action to cause the ring to become {@condition invisible} until you use another action to make it visible, until you remove the ring, or until you die.
如果你在佩戴戒指时死亡，你的灵魂会进入戒指，除非它已经容纳了一个灵魂。你可以留在戒指里，也可以离开这里去往来世。只要你的灵魂还在戒指里，你就可以与任何佩戴戒指的生物进行心灵感应。佩戴者不能阻止这种心灵感应的交流。

item.name: Ring of Necrotic Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Obscuring
entries: This band of iron resembles a skull and is cold to the touch. It has 3 charges and regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. As an action while wearing the ring, you can expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell fog cloud} spell from it, with the following changes: the cloud is centered on you when it first appears, and the spell lasts for 1 minute (no {@status concentration} required).

item.name: Ring of Poison Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Protection
entries: 佩戴此戒指时，你的攻击力和自救能力获得+1的奖励。

item.name: Ring of Psychic Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Puzzler's Wit
entries: This gold ring bears a fluorite stone and is enchanted to sharpen the wearer's mind.
The ring has 3 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 - 1} expended charges daily at dawn. When you make an Intelligence check, you can expend 1 charge to grant yourself advantage on the check.

item.name: Ring of Radiant Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Red Fury
entries: 这枚戒指有一条Ruidium的条纹贯穿其中。戴上这枚戒指时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你可以呼吸水。
你获得的游泳速度与你的步行速度相等。

entries.name: Ruidium Rage
entries: As a bonus action, you can use the ring to gain the following benefits, which last for 1 minute or until you are {@condition incapacitated}:

items: 你在力量检查和力量投掷方面具有优势。
当你用攻击命中时，你可以将你的熟练度加到伤害卷上。
困难的地形不会使你损失额外的移动，而且你对{@condition paralyzed}和{@condition restrained}的条件免疫。

entries: 在你完成长时间的休息之前，你不能再次使用戒指的这个属性。

entries.name: Ruidium Corruption
entries: When you use the Ruidium Rage property of the ring, you must make a DC 20 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. If you are not already suffering from ruidium corruption, you become corrupted when you fail this save.

entries.name: If Ruidium Is Destroyed
entries: If the Apotheon is killed or redeemed, all the ruidium in Exandria is destroyed instantly, and the ring of red fury becomes a {@item ring of free action}.

item.name: Ring of Regeneration
entries: 佩戴此戒指时，只要你至少有1个命中率，你每10分钟就能恢复{@dice 1d6}的命中率。如果你失去了身体的某个部分，如果你在整个过程中至少有1个命中率，戒指会使缺少的部分重新生长，并在{@dice 1d6 + 1}天后恢复全部功能。

item.name: Ring of Shooting Stars
entries: While wearing this ring in dim light or darkness, you can cast {@spell dancing lights} and {@spell light} from the ring at will. Casting either spell from the ring requires an action.
戒指有6次充电，用于以下其他属性。戒指每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6}已消耗的电荷。

entries.name: Faerie Fire
entries: You can expend 1 charge as an action to cast {@spell faerie fire} from the ring.

entries.name: Ball Lightning
entries: 你可以消耗2个电荷作为行动，创造1到4个直径3英尺的闪电球。你创造的球体越多，每个球体的单独威力就越小。
每个球体都会出现在你周围120英尺内你能看到的无人空间。球体持续的时间与你的注意力一样长（就像{@status concentration||concentrating}施法一样），最长为1分钟。每个球体在半径30英尺的范围内发出昏暗的光。

作为一个额外动作，你可以将每个球体移动到30英尺以内，但最远不能超过120英尺的距离。当你以外的生物进入球体的5英尺范围内时，球体会向该生物释放闪电并消失。该生物必须做一个DC15的灵巧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，该生物会受到基于你创造的球体数量的闪电伤害。(4个球体 = {@dice 2d4}, 3个球体 = {@dice 2d6}, 2个球体 = {@dice 5d4}, 1个球体 = {@dice 4d12})

entries.name: Shooting Stars
entries: 你可以在行动中消耗1到3个电荷。每消耗一次电荷，你就从戒指中发射一个发光的光点到你周围60英尺内你能看到的地方。以该点为起点的15英尺范围内的每个生物都会被喷出火花，并且必须做一个DC 15的灵巧蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到{@damage 5d4}的火焰伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。

item.name: Ring of Spell Storing
entries: 这枚戒指可以储存施放的法术，直到佩戴者使用它们。戒指一次最多可以储存5级的法术。当被发现时，它包含由DM选择的{@dice 1d6 - 1}等级的存储法术。
任何生物都可以在施法时接触戒指，向戒指施放1到5级的法术。咒语没有任何效果，只是被储存在戒指中。如果戒指不能容纳该咒语，该咒语就会被消耗掉而没有效果。用来施法的槽的等级决定了它所使用的空间大小。
在佩戴这枚戒指时，你可以施放任何储存在戒指中的法术。该法术使用原施法者的槽位等级、法术救赎DC、法术攻击加成和施法能力，但在其他方面与你施法的情况一样。从戒指中施放的法术不再储存在戒指中，从而释放出空间。

item.name: Ring of Spell Turning
entries: 戴上这枚戒指后，你对任何只针对你的法术（不在效果范围内）的救赎有优势。此外，如果你的蓄力值为20，并且该法术为7级或更低，则该法术对你没有影响，而是针对施法者，使用施法者的等级、法术蓄力值、攻击力和施法能力。

item.name: Ring of Swimming
entries: 佩戴此戒指时，你的游泳速度为40英尺。

item.name: Ring of Telekinesis
entries: While wearing this ring, you can cast the {@spell telekinesis} spell at will, but you can target only objects that aren't being worn or carried.

item.name: Ring of Temporal Salvation
entries: If you die while wearing this gray crystal ring, you vanish and reappear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the space you left (or the nearest unoccupied space). You have a number of hit points equal to {@dice 3d6} + your Constitution modifier. If your hit point maximum is lower than the number of hit points you regain, your hit point maximum rises to a similar amount. If you have any levels of {@condition exhaustion}, reduce your level of {@condition exhaustion} by 1. Once the ring is used, it turns to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: Ring of the Copycat
entries: You gain the ability to channel energy from allies to cast spells, even if you normally can't. When an ally within 60 feet of you casts a spell that you normally can't cast and that requires 10 gp or fewer in material components, you may use a reaction to cast that spell. When cast in this way, the spell is cast using your ally's spellcasting ability, spell save DC, and spell attack bonus, as needed. You decide this cloned spell's target, as specified in the spell's description, and the spell originates from you. After you use this ability, your ally can't cast this spell again until they finish a long rest.

item.name: Ring of the Orator
entries: This ring has 6 charges. While you wear it, you can expend 1 of its charges to project your voice to be heard clearly by all creatures within 1 mile of yourself, regardless of intervening noise, for 1 minute. Magical silence, 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood blocks this projection. If you project your voice while speaking a language the listening creatures don't understand, you can make the creatures understand what you're saying. You must be able to see the creatures to make them understand. The ring regains {@dice 1d6} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Ring of the Ram
entries: This ring has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can use an action to expend 1 to 3 of its charges to make a ranged spell attack against one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The ring produces a spectral ram's head and makes its attack roll with a +7 bonus. On a hit, for each charge you spend, the target takes {@damage 2d10} force damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.
另外，你可以消耗戒指的1到3个电荷作为行动，试图打破你60英尺范围内可以看到的没有被佩戴或携带的物体。戒指会对你所花费的每一个炸药进行强度检查，并获得+5的奖励。

item.name: Ring of Three Wishes
entries: While wearing this ring, you can use an action to expend 1 of its 3 charges to cast the {@spell wish} spell from it. The ring becomes nonmagical when you use the last charge.

item.name: Ring of Thunder Resistance
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistance}

item.name: Ring of Treachery
entries: This ring has 3 charges. While wearing this ring, when you're damaged, you may use a reaction to expend a charge and transfer that damage to a random creature (which could include an ally) within 60 feet. All charges are restored when you finish a long rest.

item.name: Ring of Truth Telling
entries: While wearing this ring, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks to determine whether someone is lying to you.

item.name: Ring of Warmth
entries: 佩戴这枚戒指时，你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。此外，你和你所穿戴和携带的一切物品在低至华氏50度的温度下都不会受到伤害。

item.name: Ring of Water Elemental Command
entries: 戴上这枚戒指后，你对来自水元素界的元素体的攻击卷有优势，它们对你的攻击卷有劣势。此外，你可以获得基于水元素界的属性。
这枚戒指有5次充电。它每天在黎明时分会重新获得{@dice 1d4 + 1}已消耗的电量。从戒指上施放的法术，其救赎DC为17。
你可以消耗戒指的2个炸药，在一个{@creature water elemental}上施放{@spell dominate monster}。此外，你可以站在和走过液体表面，就像它们是固体地面一样。你也可以说并理解阿坎语。
If you help slay a {@creature water elemental} while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

items: 你可以在水下呼吸，游泳的速度与你的步行速度相等。
你可以从戒指中施放以下法术，并消耗必要的费用。{@spell create or destroy water} (1次充电), {@spell control water} (3次充电), {@spell ice storm} (2次充电), 或 {@spell wall of ice} (3次充电)。

item.name: Ring of Water Walking
entries: 戴上这枚戒指，你可以站在任何液体表面上移动，就像站在固体地面上一样。

item.name: Ring of Winter
entries: {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA}将此物品保存了一个多世纪。冬之戒是一个金色的戒指，可以调整大小，紧紧地戴在佩戴者的手指上。戒指外面覆盖着一层薄薄的冰霜，一般的热量是无法融化的。戒指触感冰冷，最初会使佩戴者的手感到麻木，但对这枚戒指有感应的人就不会再感到这种寒冷。
冬日之戒是有知觉的，它试图控制任何佩戴它的生物（见《地下城主指南》第七章 "有知觉的魔法物品"）。如果它成功了，戒指就会迫使佩戴者对周围的人和物造成不应有的伤害，冷酷无情地试图引起敌人的愤怒并给佩戴者带来灭顶之灾。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: 冬之戒是一个有生命的混乱邪恶物品，智力为14，智慧为14，魅力为17。戒指通过向携带或挥动它的生物传递情感来进行交流，它的听觉和视觉范围在60英尺以内。戒指渴望破坏，它喜欢不分青红皂白地伤害他人。

entries.name: Nondetection
entries: 冬日之戒拒绝用魔法来定位它的企图。戒指和它的佩戴者都不能被任何占卜魔法所锁定，也不能通过神奇的探查传感器被感知。

entries.name: Frozen Time
entries: As long as you wear the ring, you don't age naturally. This effect is similar to suspended animation, in that your age doesn't catch up to you once the ring is removed. The ring doesn't protect its wearer from magical or supernatural aging effects, such as the Horrifying Visage of a {@creature ghost}.

entries.name: Cold Immunity
entries: 当适应并佩戴这枚戒指时，你对寒冷的伤害有免疫力，并且不会受到极端寒冷的影响（见《地下城主指南》第五章）。

entries.name: Magic
entries: 冬日之戒有12次充电，每天黎明时分恢复所有已消耗的充电。在佩戴戒指时，你可以消耗必要数量的电荷来激活以下属性之一。

items: 你可以在行动中消耗1个电荷，并使用戒指来降低以你300英尺范围内可以看到的点为中心的120英尺半径的球体的温度。该区域的温度每分钟下降20度，最低为华氏-30度。一旦温度降到32度以下，表面就会开始形成霜和冰。这个效果是永久性的，除非你用戒指结束它的行动，此时该区域的温度会以每分钟10度的速度恢复正常。

你可以从戒指中施放以下一种法术（法术救赎DC17），只要消耗必要的费用。{@spell Bigby's hand}(2次充电；手由冰制成，对寒冷伤害免疫，并像紧握的拳头一样造成重击伤害而不是力量伤害), {@spell cone of cold}(2次充电), 肉体变成冰(3次充电。和{@spell flesh to stone}一样，除了目标变成坚冰，其密度和耐久度与石头一样），{@spell ice storm}（2次），{@spell Otiluke's freezing sphere}（3次），{@spell sleet storm}（1次），{@spell spike growth}（1次；尖刺是由冰制成的），或{@spell wall of ice}（2次）。

你可以在行动中消耗必要数量的能量，用戒指创造一个无生命的冰块（2个能量）或一个有生命的冰块（4个能量）。这个冰块不能有任何活动部件，必须能装进一个10英尺的立方体中，并且具有金属或石头的密度和耐久性（你选择）。冰生物必须以挑战等级为2或以下的野兽为模型。冰雪生物的统计数据与它所模拟的野兽相同，但有以下变化：该生物是一个结构体，易受火灾伤害，对寒冷和毒药伤害免疫，并对以下条件免疫。{@condition charmed}、{@condition exhaustion}、{@condition frightened}、{@condition paralyzed}、{@condition petrified}和{@condition poisoned}。冰雪生物只听从其创造者的命令。冰块或生物出现在你周围60英尺内的一个无人空间。24小时后或当它的命中率降至0时，它将融化成一滩普通的水。在极热的情况下，它在融化时每分钟会损失5({@dice 1d10})点命中率。如果有必要的话，请使用《地下城管理员指南》第8章的指南来确定无生命物体的命中率。

entries.name: Other Properties
entries: 据传闻，冬之戒还拥有其他属性，只有邪恶的存在才能激活，而戒指的意志是无法打破的。长期以来，冰霜巨人一直相信这枚戒指可以用来冻结整个世界，而一个为卡利希特帕夏服务的{@creature djinni}曾经声称，这枚戒指可以用来召唤和控制白龙，以及名为Cryonax的强大的冰原。

entries.name: Destroying the Ring
entries: 这枚戒指几乎是无坚不摧的，甚至可以抵御最强烈的魔法热量。如果它被戴在被称为 "夏日女王 "的强大的大法官的手指上，戒指就会融化并被永远销毁。

item.name: Ring of X-ray Vision
entries: 在佩戴这枚戒指时，你可以使用一个动作说出它的命令语。当你这样做的时候，你可以在1分钟内看到固体物质并穿过它。这种视野的半径为30英尺。对你来说，该半径内的固体物体看起来是透明的，并不妨碍光线穿过它们。这种视野可以穿透1英尺的石头，1英寸的普通金属，或者3英尺的木材或泥土。更厚的物质会阻挡视野，就像薄薄的铅板一样。
Whenever you use the ring again before taking a long rest, you must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

item.name: Robe of Eyes
entries: 这件长袍上有类似眼球的图案装饰。当你穿着这件袍子时，你会获得以下好处。

items: The robe lets you see in all directions, and you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.
你有{@sense darkvision}到120英尺的范围。
你可以看到{@condition invisible}生物和物体，也可以看到虚空界，范围为120英尺。

entries: 袍子上的眼睛不能闭上或移开。虽然你可以闭上或移开自己的眼睛，但在穿上这件袍子时，你永远不会被认为是在这样做。
在袍子上施展的{@spell light}法术或在袍子5英尺内施展的{@spell daylight}法术会使你在1分钟内失明{@condition blinded}。在你每个回合结束时，你可以做一个宪法救赎动作（DC11为{@spell light}，DC15为{@spell daylight}），成功后结束失明。

item.name: Robe of Scintillating Colors
entries: This robe has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While you wear it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cause the garment to display a shifting pattern of dazzling hues until the end of your next turn. During this time, the robe sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Creatures that can see you have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. In addition, any creature in the bright light that can see you when the robe's power is activated must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the effect ends.

item.name: Robe of Serpents
entries: A robe of serpents is a stylish silk garment that is popular among wealthy nobles and retired assassins. The robe is emblazoned with {@dice 1d4 + 3} stylized serpents, all brightly colored.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can transform one of the robe's serpents into a {@creature giant poisonous snake}. The snake instantly falls from the robe, slithers into an unoccupied space next to you, and acts on your initiative count. The snake can tell friendly creatures from hostile ones and attacks the latter. The snake disappears in a harmless puff of smoke after 1 hour, when it drops to 0 hit points, or when you dismiss it (no action required). Once detached, a snake can't return to the robe. When all of the robe's snakes have detached, the robe becomes a nonmagical garment.

item.name: Robe of Stars
entries: 这件黑色或深蓝色的袍子上绣有白色或银色的小星星。当你穿上它时，你会获得一个+1的救赎奖励。
位于长袍前部的六颗星，特别大。穿着这件袍子时，你可以用一个动作拉下其中一颗星星，用它来施展{@spell magic missile}的五级法术。每天黄昏时分，{@dice 1d6}被摘下的星星会重新出现在袍子上。
当你穿上长袍时，你可以使用一个动作，连同你所穿戴和携带的所有东西一起进入星界。你会一直呆在那里，直到你使用一个动作回到你原来所在的平面。你会重新出现在你最后占据的空间，如果该空间被占据，则会出现在最近的未被占据的空间。

item.name: Robe of Summer
entries: 这件优雅的衣服是由红色、橙色和金色色调的细布制成。当你穿上这件袍子时，你对寒冷的伤害有抵抗力。此外，你会感到舒适，就像在一个温暖的日子里一样，所以你不会因为天气的极端温度而受到不良影响。

item.name: Robe of the Archmagi
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 这件优雅的衣服由白色、灰色或黑色的精致布料制成，并装饰有银色的符文。袍子的颜色与该物品所对应的排列方式有关。白色长袍是为善而制，灰色是为中立而制，黑色是为恶而制。你不能与大法师的袍子调和，因为它不符合你的排列。
你在穿着长袍时获得这些好处。

items: 如果你没有穿戴盔甲，你的基本护甲等级是15+你的灵巧修正值。
你对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。
你的法术救赎DC和法术攻击奖励各增加2。

item.name: Robe of Useful Items
entries: 这件袍子上有各种形状和颜色的布块覆盖。当你穿着这件袍子的时候，你可以使用一个动作将其中一个补丁分离出来，使其成为它所代表的物体或生物。一旦最后一块补丁被移除，这件袍子就会变成一件普通的衣服。
袍子上有以下各两个补丁。

items: 匕首
牛眼灯笼（已装好并点燃）。
钢镜
10英尺长的杆子
大麻绳（50英尺，盘绕）。
Sack

entries: In addition, the robe has {@dice 4d4} other patches. The DM chooses the patches or determines them randomly.

rows: 100金币的袋子
银棺材（1英尺长，6英寸宽和深），价值500克普
铁门（最宽10英尺，最高10英尺，在你选择的一侧有栅栏），你可以把它放在你能到达的开口处；它符合开口的要求，自己连接和铰链。
10颗宝石，每颗价值100戈比
木制梯子（24英尺长）。
A{@creature riding horse}，带马鞍袋
坑（一个边长为10英尺的立方体），你可以把它放在你10英尺范围内的地面上
4 {@item potion of healing||potions of healing}
{@item Rowboat} (12英尺长)
包含一个1-3级法术的法术卷轴
2 {@creature mastiff||mastiffs}
窗口（2英尺乘4英尺，最深2英尺），你可以把它放在一个你能触及的垂直表面上
{@item Portable ram|phb}

item.name: Rod of Absorption
entries: 在持有这根棍子时，你可以用你的反应来吸收一个只针对你而没有效果区域的法术。被吸收的咒语效果被取消，而咒语的能量--而不是咒语本身--被储存在棒子里。这些能量的等级与施法时的等级相同。棍子在其存在的过程中可以吸收和储存多达50级的能量。一旦棒子吸收了50级的能量，它就不能再吸收更多。如果你被棒子不能储存的咒语所针对，棒子对该咒语没有影响。
当你与法杖相适应时，你知道法杖在其存在过程中吸收了多少级能量，以及它目前储存了多少级法术能量。
如果你是一个持有棍子的施法者，你可以将储存在棍子中的能量转化为法术槽，以施放你准备的或知道的法术。你只能创造与你自己的法术槽等级相同或更低的法术槽，最高可达五级。你使用储存的等级来代替你的法术槽，但除此之外，你可以像平常一样施展法术。例如，你可以使用储存在棍子中的3个等级作为一个3级的法术槽。
一个新发现的棒子已经有{@dice 1d10}级的法术能量储存在里面。一个不能再吸收法术能量并且没有剩余能量的棍子会变成非魔法的。

item.name: Rod of Alertness
entries: 这种杆子有一个法兰盘头，有以下特性。

entries.name: Alertness
entries: While holding the rod, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on rolls for initiative.

entries.name: Spells
entries: 当你拿着棍子的时候，你可以用一个动作从棍子上施放出以下的法术之一。{@spell detect evil and good}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell detect poison and disease}, 或 {@spell see invisibility}。

entries.name: Protective Aura
entries: As an action, you can plant the haft end of the rod in the ground, whereupon the rod's head sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 60 feet. While in that bright light, you and any creature that is friendly to you gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws and can sense the location of any {@condition invisible} hostile creature that is also in the bright light.
棍子的头部停止发光，效果在10分钟后结束，或者当一个生物使用行动将棍子从地上拉出来时。这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Rod of Hellish Flames
entries: Glowing cinders orbit the flanged head of this black iron rod.
This rod can be used as an arcane focus. While holding this rod, you gain the following benefits:

items.name: Hellish Resistance
entries: You have resistance to fire and necrotic damage.

items.name: Searing Rebuke
entries: You can cast the {@spell Hellish Rebuke} spell as a 4th-level spell (save DC 16) from the rod. Once you use the rod to cast the spell, the rod can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

items.name: Surge of Brimstone
entries: Whenever you cast a spell that deals fire or necrotic damage, you can use the rod to deal the maximum damage instead of rolling. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Rod of Lordly Might
entries: 这根棍子有一个法兰西式的头，它的功能是一个魔法棒，对使用它的攻击和伤害卷给予+3的奖励。这根棍子的属性与六个不同的按钮有关，这些按钮沿着棍子的轴线设置成一排。它还有其他三种属性，详见下文。

entries.name: Six Buttons
entries: 你可以按下棍子的六个按钮中的一个作为额外动作。一个按钮的效果会持续到你按下一个不同的按钮，或者直到你再次按下同一个按钮，这将导致棒子恢复到它的正常形态。
如果你按下按钮1，杆子就会变成{@item flame tongue}，因为从杆子的法兰盘头对面的一端冒出一把火红的剑（你选择剑的类型）。
如果你按下按钮2，棍子的法兰盘头就会折叠起来，两个月牙形的刀片就会弹出来，把棍子变成一把神奇的战斧，用它进行攻击和伤害的卷轴就会获得+3的奖励。
如果你按下按钮3，棍子的法兰盘头就会折叠下来，一个矛头从棍子的顶端弹出，棍子的手柄就会延长成一个6英尺长的柄，把棍子变成一个魔法长矛，在用它进行的攻击和伤害卷中获得+3的奖励。
如果你按下按钮4，杆子就会变成一根攀登杆，最长可达50英尺，如你所指定。在像花岗岩一样坚硬的表面，底部的一个钉子和顶部的三个钩子将杆子固定。3英寸长的水平杆从两侧折叠出来，相隔1英尺，形成一个梯子。该杆可以承受4000磅的重量。更多的重量或缺乏牢固的锚定会使杆子恢复到正常的形式。
如果你按下第5个按钮，这根棍子就会变成一个手持的撞锤，并给予它的使用者在突破门、路障和其他障碍物时的力量检查+10的奖励。
如果你按下按钮6，杆子就会采取或保持正常的形式，并显示磁北。(如果在没有磁北的地方使用杆的这个功能，则不会发生任何事情)。这根杆子还能让你知道你在地面下的大致深度或你在地面上的高度。

entries.name: Drain Life
entries: When you hit a creature with a melee attack using the rod, you can force the target to make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target rakes an extra {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage, and you regain a number of hit points equal to half that necrotic damage. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Paralyze
entries: When you hit a creature with a melee attack using the rod, you can force the target to make a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Terrify
entries: While holding the rod, you can use an action to force each creature you can see within 30 feet of you to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a target is {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Rod of Mercurial Form
entries: This humble steel rod is engraved with tiny symbols representing different weapons, as well as the monogram "T.D." A creature holding this rod can speak the name of any simple or martial weapon aloud as a bonus action, causing the rod to transform into an ordinary weapon of that type. When in the form of a ranged weapon, this rod magically creates its own ammunition, which disappears after a ranged attack hits or misses.

item.name: Rod of Resurrection
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or paladin
entries: 这根棍子有5次充电。当你拿着它时，你可以用一个动作从它身上施放以下的法术之一。{@spell heal}（消耗1个电荷）或{@spell resurrection}（消耗5个电荷）。
The rod regains 1 expended charge daily at dawn. If the rod is reduced to 0 charges, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the rod disappears in a burst of radiance.

item.name: Rod of Retribution
entries: 这根金刚棒的顶端有一个发光的晶眼。这根棒子有3次充电，每天在黎明时分恢复所有消耗的充电。

When a creature you can see within 60 feet of you damages you while you are holding this rod, you can use your reaction to expend 1 of the rod's charges to force the creature to make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 2d10} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Rod of Rulership
entries: You can use an action to present the rod and command obedience from each creature of your choice that you can see within 120 feet of you.
