Each target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you for 8 hours. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature regards you as its trusted leader. If harmed by you or your companions, or commanded to do something contrary to its nature, a target ceases to be {@condition charmed} in this way. The rod can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Rod of Security
entries: While holding this rod, you can use an action to activate it. The rod then instantly transports you and up to 199 other willing creatures you can see to a paradise that exists in an extraplanar space. You choose the form that the paradise takes. It could be a tranquil garden, lovely glade, cheery tavern, immense palace, tropical island, fantastic carnival, or whatever else you can imagine. Regardless of its nature, the paradise contains enough water and food to sustain its visitors. Everything else that can be interacted with inside the extraplanar space can exist only there. For example, a flower picked from a garden in the paradise disappears if it is taken outside the extraplanar space.

For each hour spent in the paradise, a visitor regains hit points as if it had spent 1 Hit Die. Also, creatures don't age while in the paradise, although time passes normally. Visitors can remain in the paradise for up to 200 days divided by the number of creatures present (round down).

When the time runs out or you use an action to end it, all visitors reappear in the location they occupied when you activated the rod, or an unoccupied space nearest that location. The rod can't be used again until ten days have passed.

item.name: Rod of the Vonindod
entries: 扎尔托公爵{@creature fire giant}雇了一个巫师来制作几根这样的金刚棒。每根都有4英尺长，100磅重，尺寸可以舒适地放在一个{@creature fire giant||fire giant's}的手中。棍子的一端有两个棱角，另一端有一个模制的手柄抓手。

The rod has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} of its expended charges daily at dawn. As an action, you can grasp it by the handle and expend 1 charge to cast the {@spell locate object} spell from it. When the rod is used to detect objects made of adamantine, such as fragments of the Vonindod construct, its range increases to 10 miles.

item.name: Rogue Card
entries: When you hit a target with a weapon attack while holding this card, you can deal an extra {@damage 6d6} force damage to that target. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Rogue's Mantle
entries: This dark, hooded mantle of thick cloth is infused with secretive and deceptive magic. While wearing it, you gain the following benefits:

items.name: Darkvision
entries: You gain {@sense darkvision} within a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision}, the mantle increases your {@sense darkvision}'s range by 60 feet instead.

items.name: Move in Shadows
entries: While you are in {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light} or darkness, you can use a bonus action to teleport, along with anything you are wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light} or darkness. You then have advantage on the first melee attack you make before the end of the turn.

items.name: Willful Enmity
entries: You can cast the {@spell Antagonize|BMT} spell (save DC 15) from the mantle. Once the mantle has cast the spell, it can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Rope of Climbing
entries: 这根60英尺长的丝绳重3磅，可承受3000磅的重量。如果你握住绳子的一端，并使用一个动作说出命令的话语，绳子就会有活力。作为一个额外动作，你可以命令另一端向你选择的目的地移动。那一端在你第一次命令它的回合中移动10英尺，在你的每个回合中移动10英尺，直到到达目的地，直到它的最大长度，或者直到你告诉它停止。你也可以告诉绳子把自己牢牢地固定在一个物体上，或者把自己解开，把自己打结或解开，或者把自己卷起来以便携带。
如果你让绳子打结，大结会沿着绳子每隔1英尺出现。在打结的时候，绳子会缩短到50英尺长，并在攀登的检查中获得优势。
绳索有20点AC值和20点命中率。只要它至少有1点命中率，每5分钟就能恢复1点命中率。如果绳子下降到0命中率，它将被摧毁。

item.name: Rope of Entanglement
entries: This rope is 30 feet long and weighs 3 pounds. If you hold one end of the rope and use an action to speak its command word, the other end darts forward to entangle a creature you can see within 20 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition restrained}.

You can release the creature by using a bonus action to speak a second command word. A target {@condition restrained} by the rope can use an action to make a DC 15 Strength or Dexterity check (target's choice). On a success, the creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by the rope.
绳索有20点AC值和20点命中率。只要它至少有1点命中率，每5分钟就能恢复1点命中率。如果绳子下降到0命中率，它将被摧毁。

item.name: Rope of Mending
entries: 你可以把这根50英尺长的麻绳剪成任何数量的小块，然后用一个动作说出一个命令词，使这些小块重新编织在一起。这些碎片必须是相互接触的，而且没有其他用途。如果有一段麻绳丢失或毁坏，补天绳就永远缩短了。

item.name: Rotor of Return
entries: 当你适应这个装置时，你有一个+1的宪法救赎奖励。你会定期收到旧时记忆的闪回，你可以准确无误地回忆起过去30天内发生的任何事件。

entries.name: Borrow Object
entries: 你说出一件价值50GP或以下的世俗物品，它出现在你的手中或脚下。这可以是《玩家手册》第5章"{@book Equipment|PHB|5} "中出现的任何物品，或经DM许可选择的任何类似物品。被召唤的物品会从世界的其他地方传送到你身边，但它的性质是通用的，所以你可能会召唤一把长剑，但你不能借用一个特定生物的长剑。该物品在出现10分钟后就会消失。一旦你使用了回归之轮的这一功能，在下一个黎明之前就不能再次使用。

entries.name: Recall Code
entries: 作为一个行动，你可以将你当前的位置设定为锁定在转轮上的返回点。此后的任何时候，只要你在回程点的500英尺范围内，你都可以使用一个额外的行动来传送到转子的回程点。一旦你使用返回点传送，这个功能就不能再使用，直到下一个黎明。

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: 虽然这个组件没有安装在{@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}，但它的魔法可能会零星地发挥作用，或者有不可预知的副作用，这由DM决定。

item.name: Rowboat
entries: 龙骨船和划艇在湖泊和河流上使用。如果顺流而下，在车辆的速度上加上水流的速度（通常是每小时3英里）。这些车辆不能在任何明显的水流中划行，但它们可以被岸边的吃水动物拉到上游。一艘划艇重100磅，以备冒险者在陆地上携带。

item.name: Ruby
entries: 一种透明的透明红色至深红色的宝石。

item.name: Ruby of the War Mage
entries: 这颗直径为1英寸的红宝石上刻有长生不老的符文，它可以让你把一个{@filter simple or martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;simple weapon}作为你的法术焦点。为了使这一属性发挥作用，你必须将红宝石贴在武器上，将红宝石压在武器上至少10分钟。此后，红宝石就不能被移除，除非你把它作为一个动作移除或者武器被摧毁。即使是一个{@spell antimagic field}也不会导致它脱落。如果你对红宝石的调和结束，红宝石就会从武器上脱落。

item.name: Ruby Rod of Asmodeus
entries: Asmodeus's Ruby Rod is said to have been constructed from a shard of pure evil, a ruby soaked in the blood of the innocents, the drool from a draconic deity, and the tears of 777 angels. It is a magic rod that functions as a morningstar and you have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. All damage dealt with it is converted to necrotic, and when you hit a good aligned creature, that creature takes an extra {@damage 2d12} necrotic damage.

The Ruby Rod of Asmodeus has 66 charges and regains {@dice 6d6} charges each nightfall. Asmodeus is always capable of perceiving through the rod and knows the exact location of any creature attuned to it. If a creature uses the special abilities of the rod without Asmodeus's permission, they take {@damage 2d12} necrotic damage each use, doubled if they're good aligned. This damage ignores resistances and immunities, and if it kills the user, Asmodeus permanently claims their soul.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Ruby Rod of Asmodeus has the following random properties:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} 财产
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} 财产
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} properties

entries: Asmodeus is immune to the detrimental properties of the weapon.

entries.name: Bow to the King
entries: You may use an action to expend 33 charges to use the rod to force all creatures within a 150-foot-radius to bow to you. A creature must succeed on a DC 21 Charisma saving throw or be forced to kneel for up to 1 hour. Creatures immune to the {@condition charmed} condition have advantage on their save. Each time a kneeling creature takes damage, they may repeat the save, ending the effect on a success. The effect also ends early for kneeling creatures if they're touched by the Ruby Rod.

entries.name: Acid, Cold, and Lightning
entries: At a cost of 9 charges each use, you may use an action to trigger one of the following effects:

items: You project acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 12d8} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

You project an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 12d8} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

You shoot lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 12d10} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Reactions
entries: As a reaction to suffering a detrimental effect, you may cast {@spell Lesser Restoration} (expending 3 charges) or {@spell Greater Restoration} (expending 12 charges.)

Additionally, if you're the sole target of a spell, you may use a reaction to attempt to use the rod to absorb the spell and cancel its effect. You roll {@dice 1d20 + 2}, and if the result is higher than the spell level + 10, the spell is absorbed into the rod. The rod regains charges equal to the spell level it absorbed. If the absorbed charges go over the maximum of 66 charges, it overloads, dealing {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage per charge to you and expending all charges.

entries.name: Destroying the Rod
entries: While Asmodeus lives, the Ruby Rod of Asmodeus can't be destroyed, and if attempted it simply returns to Asmodeus. If he were defeated, the rod could be destroyed by bringing it to the Abyss from whence it was created, then performing a ritual known only to Asmodeus.

item.name: Ruby Weave Gem
entries: 当你持有这颗宝石时，你可以把它作为你的法术重点来使用。
这颗宝石有3次充能，每天在黎明时分恢复所有消耗的充能。当你在持有此宝石时施展法术，你可以消耗最多3次电荷来忽略法术的物质成分，每次消耗的电荷最多为500金币。
当你完成一个长时间的休息时，从任何类别的列表中选择一个法术。你选择的法术必须是你可以施展的等级。你知道所选择的法术，并且可以用你相应等级的法术槽来施放它，直到你下一次长休结束。

item.name: Ruidium Shield
entries: 在这个盾牌的金属表面延伸出ruidium的卷须。当这面盾牌在你身上时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你对精神伤害有抵抗力。
你可以呼吸水。
你获得的游泳速度与你的步行速度相等。

entries.name: Psychic Reflection
entries: 当你在持有盾牌时受到精神伤害，你可以用你的反应来选择在你30英尺范围内你能看到的另一个生物。那个生物会承受你本来要承受的精神伤害。

entries.name: Ruidium Corruption
entries: When you use the shield's Psychic Reflection property, you must make a DC 20 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. If you are not already suffering from ruidium corruption, you become corrupted when you fail this save.

entries.name: If Ruidium Is Destroyed
entries: 如果Apotheon被杀或被赎回，Exandria的所有ruidium都会被瞬间摧毁，并且ruidium盾牌会变成{@item +2 shield}。

item.name: Ruin Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card and use it to cast the {@spell Disintegrate} spell (save {@dc 17}). Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

items.name: Awakened
entries: 当长矛达到觉醒状态时，它会获得以下属性。

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and the extra piercing damage dealt by the weapon increases to {@dice 2d8}.
当你投掷长矛并说出命令语时，长矛会变成一道闪电，形成一条5英尺宽的线，从你身上延伸到你所看到的120英尺内的生物。这条线上的每个生物，不包括你，都必须做一个DC15的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到{@damage 8d6}的雷电伤害，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。毁灭之醒随后回到你的手中。这个属性直到下一个黎明才可以再次使用。

item.name: Ruin's Wake (Dormant)
entries: 这把长矛是由古代金龙的象牙骨制成的，上面雕刻着半兽人对格鲁姆什的赞歌。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ruin's Wake is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 20, a Wisdom of 16, and a Charisma of 22. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这把武器能与它的持有者进行心灵感应，并能说、读、听懂深渊人、普通人和兽人。

entries.name: Personality
entries: A slaughter-loving {@creature balor} named Yarrowish lives within Ruin's Wake. The weapon desires only to draw blood and pushes its wielder to solve problems with violence.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 该矛在休眠状态下给予了以下好处。

items: 你能说、读、写深渊人和兽人。

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, and it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to any target it hits. Immediately after you make a ranged attack with this weapon, it flies back to your hand.
当你被近战攻击击中时，作为反应，你可以用毁灭之醒进行近战攻击，对攻击者有优势。在你完成短暂或长时间的休息之前，你不能再次使用这个属性。

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

items.name: Exalted
entries: 当长矛达到高尚的状态时，它将获得以下属性。

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+3。
当你手持长矛时，你可以作为一个额外动作发出战斗呐喊。你选择的30英尺范围内的每个生物在攻击卷轴上获得优势，直到你下一个回合开始。这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。
当你用长矛的攻击将一个生物的命中率降为0时，你可以重新获得与你的攻击伤害相等的命中率。这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Ruinblade
entries: Ruinblade is a unique weapon possessed by {@creature Moghadam|IMR}, the architect of the Tomb of Horrors. A symbol of his authority, Moghadam carries the weapon during the time frame of the adventure to intimidate the tomb's workers. (In later years, after {@creature Acererak|ToA} trapped Moghadam in the completed tomb as an undead archwraith, Moghadam was able to use the weapon as his own phylactery.)
恐怖之墓的绿色魔鬼脸的小玉版被塑造成武器的柄部，刀刃从其张开的嘴中伸出。这把刀总是显得破败和生锈，并使其周围的环境出现在刀身上，仿佛处于腐烂状态。
You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit an undead creature with it, the attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} force damage.
此外，该武器还具有以下特性。

entries.name: Blighted Ruin
entries: You can cast the {@spell blight} spell from the weapon (DC 15). Once used, this property of the weapon can't be used until the next dawn.

entries.name: Destructive Ruin
entries: 你可以从武器上施放{@spell disintegrate}的法术，但只能针对非魔法物品或魔法力量的创造物。一旦使用，武器的这一属性在七天后的黎明前不能再使用。

entries.name: Curse
entries: 这把武器被诅咒了，成为它的附属品会使诅咒延伸到你身上。在用{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法解除诅咒之前，你不愿意与该武器分离。
该武器必须每七天直接参与销毁价值1,000 gp的材料和物品，或者在第七天结束时你和该武器之间产生冲突。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ruinblade is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intelligence of 15, a Wisdom of 8, and a Charisma of 16. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
该武器能说、能读、能理解普通话，并能与持枪者进行心灵感应。它的声音是一种粗糙的、毁坏的回声。当你与它调和时，毁灭之刃也能听懂你知道的每一种语言。

entries.name: Personality
entries: 毁灭之刃说话的语气要么是哀伤的，要么是狂热的，取决于它的情绪。当这把剑积极从事破坏活动时，这种情绪会得到改善，但如果这把剑被搁置太久就会变坏。
这把武器的目的是毁坏和取消现有的物体，以便它的主人能够从一张白纸上重建世界。因此，它鼓励其持有者不断进行破坏，声称这将允许从之前的废墟中创造出更优越的愿景。

item.name: Ruinous Flail
entries: This ash-gray flail is cold to the touch. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, and it deals double damage to objects and structures.

Additionally, when you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force the creature to make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the poisoned condition for 1 minute. The poisoned creature takes {@damage 2d4} necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once this property is used in this way, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Ruinstone
entries: 一个火红色的晶体，有人类手掌大小。
每天一次的额外行动，小人可以激活废石来撤销他们所做的一件事。这里的可能性很广，但在战斗中，最简单的是让他们有机会 "倒退 "一次行动并再次行动，或者重新计算一次失败的拯救动作（如果它还能采取行动的话）。

Each use of the artifact has a terrible side effect: someone known to the wielder is also erased from reality. After the villain uses the ruinstone, roll a {@dice d20}: on a 5-20, one of their allies disintegrates, on an 1-4, one of the player characters disintegrates.
如果在 "塔利瓦的灯塔 "任务中，有生物将自己的灵魂与废墟石绑定，那么该神器在使用时就会爆炸，被绑定的生物就会瓦解，从现实中消失，只能用{@spell wish}的法术或类似的魔法将其带回来。

item.name: Ryath Root
entries: 任何摄取瑞亚特根的生物都会获得{@dice 2d4}的临时打击点数。如果一个生物在24小时内吃了一个以上的雷亚特根，必须在DC13的宪法救赎中成功，否则就会在1小时内出现{@condition poisoned}的状况。

item.name: Sack
entries: 一个麻袋最多可以容纳1立方英尺或30磅的装备。

item.name: Saddle of the Cavalier
entries: 在坐骑的这个马鞍上时，如果你有意识，就不能违背你的意愿下马，而且对坐骑的攻击卷轴有劣势。

item.name: Sage Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card and use it to cast the {@spell Contact Other Plane} spell. When you cast the spell in this way, your questions are answered by the mysterious figure depicted on the card. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Sage's Mirror
entries: This item has 3 charges and regains all charges at dusk. You can use an action and expend 1 of the mirror's charges to cast one of the following spells:

items: {@spell Find the Path}
{@spell Legend Lore}

entries: With each use, it is apparent that the information gleaned from the mirror comes from a chamber in the Nine Hells where sages and scholars are tortured for the answers to each question.

item.name: Sage's Signet (Bear)
entries: This gilded ring bears a beautiful engraving and is imbued with powers of keen wisdom and foresight. While wearing this ring, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Augury} spell from the ring. Once you use the ring to cast the spell, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

While wearing the Sage's Signet, you can cast the {@spell Enlarge/Reduce} and {@spell Polymorph} once each from the ring using your Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. Once you cast each spell from the ring, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Sage's Signet (Hart)
entries: This gilded ring bears a beautiful engraving and is imbued with powers of keen wisdom and foresight. While wearing this ring, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Augury} spell from the ring. Once you use the ring to cast the spell, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

While wearing the Sage's Signet, you can cast the {@spell Aura of Vitality} and {@spell Mass Cure Wounds} once each from the ring using your Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. Once you cast each spell from the ring, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Sage's Signet (Lion)
entries: This gilded ring bears a beautiful engraving and is imbued with powers of keen wisdom and foresight. While wearing this ring, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Augury} spell from the ring. Once you use the ring to cast the spell, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

While wearing the Sage's Signet, you can cast the {@spell Destructive Wave} and {@spell Fireball} once each from the ring using your Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. Once you cast each spell from the ring, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Sage's Signet (Serpent)
entries: This gilded ring bears a beautiful engraving and is imbued with powers of keen wisdom and foresight. While wearing this ring, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Augury} spell from the ring. Once you use the ring to cast the spell, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

While wearing the Sage's Signet, you can cast the {@spell Fear} and {@spell Hex} once each from the ring using your Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. Once you cast each spell from the ring, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Sage's Signet (Songbird)
entries: This gilded ring bears a beautiful engraving and is imbued with powers of keen wisdom and foresight. While wearing this ring, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Augury} spell from the ring. Once you use the ring to cast the spell, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

While wearing the Sage's Signet, you can cast the {@spell Charm Person} and {@spell Hypnotic Pattern} once each from the ring using your Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. Once you cast each spell from the ring, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Sage's Signet (Wolf)
entries: This gilded ring bears a beautiful engraving and is imbued with powers of keen wisdom and foresight. While wearing this ring, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Augury} spell from the ring. Once you use the ring to cast the spell, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

While wearing the Sage's Signet, you can cast the {@spell Freedom of Movement} and {@spell Pass without Trace} once each from the ring using your Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. Once you cast each spell from the ring, the ring can't cast the spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Saint Markovia's Thighbone
entries: Saint Markovia's thighbone has the properties of a {@item mace of disruption}. If it scores one or more hits against a {@creature vampire} or a {@creature vampire spawn} in the course of a single battle, the thighbone crumbles into dust once the battle concludes.
年轻时，马尔科维亚追随她的心，在她18岁生日后不久就成为了晨曦之神的牧师。她被证明是一个有魅力的传教士，在30岁之前，她已经获得了不容许邪恶在她面前出现的声誉。

Markovia had long considered Strahd a mad tyrant, but only after his transformation into a {@creature vampire} did she dare to challenge him. As she rallied her followers and prepared to march on Castle Ravenloft, Strahd sent a group of {@creature vampire spawn} to her abbey. They confronted Markovia and were destroyed to a one.
充满了正义的胜利带来的自信，马尔科维亚向雷文洛夫特城堡进发。一场大战役从地下墓穴一直打到护栏上。最后，马尔科维亚再也没有回到巴罗维亚，而斯特拉赫特在很久以后都是一瘸一拐地走路，面带痛苦的表情。据说他把马尔科维亚困在了他城堡下的一个地下室里，她的遗体还在那里徘徊。
当她身体的其他部分分解时，马尔科维亚的圣洁精髓部分进入了她的骨骼。她剩下的大腿骨被灌注了力量，对亡灵造成了严重的伤害。

{@item Mace of Disruption}. When you hit a fiend or an undead with this magic weapon, that creature takes an extra {@damage 2d6} radiant damage. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be destroyed. On a successful save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.
当你持有此武器时，它在20英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外20英尺范围内发出暗光。

item.name: Saint Vitruvio's Phylactery
item.reqAttune: by a bard, cleric, druid, or paladin
entries: You can use an action to cast one of the following spells from the phylactery: {@spell bless}, {@spell death ward}, {@spell greater restoration}, {@spell prayer of healing}, or {@spell revivify}. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC. Once the phylactery has been used to cast a spell, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Crown Authority
entries: A character cannot attune to more than one Seal of Drakkenheim. Guardian constructs in Drakkenheim such as {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk|wall gargoyles} and {@creature tower dragon|DoDk|tower dragons} do not attack you while you are attuned to one of the Seals of Drakkenheim. An individual guardian ignores this effect for 24 hours if you attack it or cast a spell upon it.

As an action, you may present a Seal of Drakkenheim to rebuke the guardians. You make an opposed Charisma ability check against each {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk} or {@creature tower dragon|DoDk} that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you. If you win the contest, the creature is rebuked for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A rebuked creature doesn't move, and can't take actions or reactions. A creature who wins the contest is immune to your rebuke for 24 hours.

entries.name: Relics of Saint Vitruvio
entries: These holy relics of the Sacred Flame were wielded by Saint Vitruvio and are kept in several religious sites throughout Drakkenheim. The Knights of the Silver Order and the Followers of the Falling Fire now seek these relics. Not only do both factions revere Saint Vitruvio, both wish to use these relics to help advance their goals in Drakkenheim.

A character attuned to three Relics of Saint Vitruvio may cast the {@spell heal} spell three times per day, after which they must finish a long rest before they may do so again. In addition, that character gains the ability to attune to two additional magic items so long as those magic items are both Relics of Saint Vitruvio.

item.name: Sanctum Amulet
entries: A black opal pendant hangs at the base of this pearlescent chain. The sacred rune is inscribed on the back of the pendant.
While wearing this item, you have resistance to necrotic damage. Additionally, you can cast the {@spell spare the dying} cantrip using either an action or a bonus action.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: When a creature you can see within 60 feet of you is reduced to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, you can use your reaction to invoke the item's rune, causing the pendant to flash with pale light. The creature then instead drops to 1 hit point.
Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Sapphire Buckler
entries: 这个蓝色的水晶盾牌是由蓝宝石龙的鳞片制成的，是为了帮助根除异端的影响。在挥舞这面盾牌时，你对精神和雷霆伤害有抵抗力。同时，当你受到5英尺内的生物的伤害时，你可以用你的反应对该生物造成{@damage 2d6}的雷霆伤害。
作为一个动作，你可以用这个盾牌来帮助你找到异形，直到你下一个回合结束。如果有任何异形在你周围1英里内，防护罩会发出一阵低沉的嗡嗡声，你就会知道该范围内所有异形的方向。一旦这个属性被使用，直到下一个黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Sardonyx
entries: 一个不透明的红色和白色宝石带。

item.name: Scarab of Protection
entries: 如果你将这个甲虫形状的奖章拿在手上1个回合，它的表面会出现一个铭文，揭示它的神奇性质。当它在你身上的时候，它提供了两个好处。

items: 你在对法术的救赎上有优势。
这把刀有12个电荷。如果你对亡灵法术或来自不死生物的有害影响的救赎失败，你可以用你的反应来消耗一个电荷，把失败的救赎变成成功的。当它的最后一个电荷用完时，它就会碎裂成粉末并被摧毁。

item.name: Sceptre of Saint Vitruvio
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell guiding bolt} (1 charge), {@spell flaming sphere} (2 charges), or {@spell flame strike} (5 charges). The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Relics of Saint Vitruvio
entries: These holy relics of the Sacred Flame were wielded by Saint Vitruvio and are kept in several religious sites throughout Drakkenheim. The Knights of the Silver Order and the Followers of the Falling Fire now seek these relics. Not only do both factions revere Saint Vitruvio, both wish to use these relics to help advance their goals in Drakkenheim.

A character attuned to three Relics of Saint Vitruvio may cast the {@spell heal} spell three times per day, after which they must finish a long rest before they may do so again. In addition, that character gains the ability to attune to two additional magic items so long as those magic items are both Relics of Saint Vitruvio.

item.name: Scholar's Pack
entries: 包括。

items: a {@item backpack|phb}
一个{@item book|phb}的传说
a {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|phb|bottle of ink}
an {@item ink pen|phb}
10 {@item Parchment (one sheet)|phb|sheets of parchment}
一袋小沙子
一把小刀。

item.name: Scimitar of Speed
entries: 你在使用这个魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷上获得+2的奖励。此外，你可以在每个回合中用它作为奖励动作进行一次攻击。

item.name: Scissors of Shadow Snipping
item.reqAttune: by a fey or a spellcaster
entries: 作为一个动作，你用这些铁剪剪几下，使你周围5英尺内的一个人形生物的影子从它的源头脱离。如果该生物不愿意放弃它的影子，它可以做一个DC 15的魅力救赎，如果成功则保留它的影子。无论影子是否被剪断，剪刀的这一属性在下一个黎明前都不能再次使用。
脱离的影子会扎根在它被剪断的地方，直到你使用一个额外的动作使它以下列方式行事，这两种方式都只有在你能看到影子的情况下才可能。

items: You control the shadow's movements and can make the shadow move up to 30 feet across a solid or liquid surface, in any direction you choose (including along vertical surfaces), provided it remains within your sight at all times. The shadow is harmless and unable to be harmed, and it is {@condition invisible} in darkness. It can't speak, and it doesn't require air, sleep, or nourishment.

You can relinquish control of the shadow, at which point it becomes autonomous and behaves as the DM wishes. It uses the {@creature shadow} stat block in the Monster Manual, but its creature type is Fey instead of Undead. A creature whose Strength is reduced to 0 by this shadow's Strength Drain attack does not die but falls {@condition unconscious} instead. The creature regains consciousness and all its Strength after finishing a short or long rest.

entries: 一个影子从它身上脱离的生物是被诅咒的。如果一个无影的生物受到任何结束诅咒的法术的影响，或者如果它的分离的影子被减少到0命中率，分离的影子就会消失，并且该生物会立即恢复它的正常影子。

item.name: Scorpion Armor
entries: 这套板甲是由{@creature giant scorpion}甲壳素制作而成。穿着这套盔甲时，你会获得以下好处。

items: The armor improves your combat readiness, granting you a +5 bonus to initiative as long as you aren't {@condition incapacitated}.
The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on your Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.
盔甲不会对抵御极热影响的蓄力动作造成不利影响（见《地下城管理员指南》第5章）。

entries.name: Curse
entries: This armor is cursed. Whenever you don or doff it, you must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 100 ({@damage 10d10 + 45}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Only a {@spell wish} spell can remove the armor's curse.

item.name: Scorpion Ship
entries: 蝎子船是古老的金属战舰，从未失去过它们的人气，主要是因为它们的多功能性。铰接腿使蝎子船能够安全地降落在地面上，并以30英尺的步行速度在固体表面上移动。然而，该船不能漂浮在水面上。在顶层甲板上安装了一个弹炮，尾部末端有一个芒格。这艘船的两只爪子在战斗中的效率相对较低，但抓住一个生物的爪子可以迅速使其失去行动能力。

item.name: Scourge of Shadow
entries: Said to be a gift to Glasya from Asmodeus, the Scourge of Shadow is a multi-headed whip constructed from infernal iron. The scourge is nigh-in- destructible, and Glasya carries it with her wherever she goes. When she wields the whip in battle, it shrouds her in an aura of shadow.

The Scourge of Shadow is a magic whip. You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, and it does {@damage 3d4} slashing damage instead of its regular damage. When you hit a good aligned creature with it, that creatures takes an extra {@damage 4d4} necrotic damage.
Whenever an unattuned creature attacks with the weapon, it deals {@damage 2d4} necrotic damage, ignoring resistances and immunities, to them, but otherwise functions normally.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Scourge of Shadow has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial}属性
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} 财产
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental}属性
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} 财产

entries.name: Keen
entries: The whip scores a critical on a roll of 18, 19, or 20. When it scores a critical, its damage dice are upgraded to {@dice 3d6} instead of {@dice 3d4} for the duration of the attack. If attacking a good aligned creature, or attacking with the weapon unattuned, the necrotic damage dice are also increased to a {@dice d6} instead of a {@dice d4}.

entries.name: Fast Reflexes
entries: While attuned to the Scourge of Shadow, you gain advantage on initiative rolls, and you add your Charisma and Dexterity modifiers to the roll. You may use either your Strength, Dexterity, or Charisma modifier for the attack and damage rolls (the same modifier must be used for both attack and damage).

entries.name: Veil of Shadow
entries: You're protected by a field of shadow that makes you resistant to radiant and necrotic damage. While in {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light} or darkness you gain {@sense blindsight} out to 60 feet and Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks are made with advantage.

entries.name: Destroying the Scourge
entries: Though the process is known only to Glasya and Asmodeus, the Scourge of Shadow can be destroyed. It must be taken to the Pit of Fire in Phlegethos. The scourge, along with the body of an archdevil, must be thrown into the Hellfire together. As they hit the flames, a spell of Darkness must be cast at 9th level on the scourge. If each part of the ritual is performed correctly, the whip disintegrates within the Hellfire.

item.name: Scribe's Pen
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Mark of Scribing
entries: 你可以用这支笔在任何表面上写字。你可以决定书写是可见的还是{@condition invisible}，但对于有刻印的人来说，书写总是可见的。
任何拥有涂鸦印记的生物都可以使用一个动作来触碰{@condition invisible}的文字，使其被所有人看到。
如果你用这支笔在不是构筑物的生物上写字，7天后字迹就会消失。

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Aberrations
entries: 使用行动来阅读卷轴，可以将你包围在一个{@condition invisible}的屏障中，这个屏障从你身上延伸，形成一个5英尺半径，10英尺高的圆柱体。在5分钟内，这个屏障可以防止畸变体进入或影响圆柱体内的任何东西。圆柱体与你一起移动，并以你为中心保持。然而，如果你的移动方式使异象进入圆筒内，效果就会结束。一个生物可以通过使用一个行动来尝试克服这个障碍，进行DC15魅力检查。一旦成功，该生物就不再受到屏障的影响。

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Beasts
entries: 使用行动来阅读卷轴，可以将你包围在一个{@condition invisible}的屏障中，这个屏障从你身上延伸，形成一个5英尺半径，10英尺高的圆柱体。在5分钟内，这个屏障可以防止野兽进入或影响圆筒内的任何东西。圆柱体随你移动，并保持以你为中心。然而，如果你的移动方式使野兽进入圆筒内，效果就会结束。一个生物可以用一个动作来尝试克服这个障碍，进行DC15魅力检查。一旦成功，该生物就不再受到屏障的影响。

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Celestials
entries: 使用一个动作来阅读卷轴，可以将你包围在一个{@condition invisible}的屏障中，这个屏障从你身上延伸，形成一个5英尺半径、10英尺高的圆柱体。在5分钟内，这个屏障可以阻止天人进入或影响圆柱体内的任何东西。圆柱体随你移动，并保持以你为中心。然而，如果你的移动方式使天人进入圆筒内，则效果结束。一个生物可以通过使用一个行动来尝试克服这个障碍，进行DC15魅力检查。一旦成功，该生物就不再受到屏障的影响。

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Elementals
entries: 使用行动来阅读卷轴，可以将你包围在一个{@condition invisible}的屏障中，这个屏障从你身上延伸，形成一个5英尺半径，10英尺高的圆柱体。在5分钟内，这个屏障可以阻止元素进入或影响圆柱体内的任何东西。圆柱体与你一起移动，并以你为中心保持。然而，如果你的移动方式使元素进入圆筒内，则效果结束。一个生物可以用一个行动来尝试克服这个屏障，进行DC15魅力检查。一旦成功，该生物就不再受屏障的影响。

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Fey
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form a 5-foot-radius, 10-foot-high cylinder. For 5 minutes, this barrier prevents fey from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that a fey would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Charisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Fiends
entries: 使用行动来阅读卷轴，可以将你包围在一个{@condition invisible}的屏障中，这个屏障从你身上延伸，形成一个5英尺半径，10英尺高的圆柱体。在5分钟内，这个屏障可以阻止魔物进入或影响圆柱体内的任何东西。圆柱体与你一起移动，并以你为中心保持。然而，如果你的移动方式使魔物进入圆筒内，效果就会结束。一个生物可以用一个动作来尝试克服这个障碍，进行DC15魅力检查。一旦成功，该生物就不再受屏障的影响。

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Plants
entries: 使用一个动作来阅读卷轴，将你包围在一个{@condition invisible}的屏障中，这个屏障从你身上延伸，形成一个5英尺半径，10英尺高的圆柱体。在5分钟内，这个屏障可以阻止植物进入或影响圆柱体内的任何东西。圆柱体与你一起移动，并保持以你为中心。然而，如果你的移动方式使植物进入圆筒内，效果就会结束。一个生物可以用一个动作来尝试克服这个障碍，进行DC15魅力检查。一旦成功，该生物就不再受到屏障的影响。

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Undead
entries: 使用一个动作来阅读卷轴，可以将你包围在一个{@condition invisible}的屏障中，这个屏障从你身上延伸，形成一个5英尺半径，10英尺高的圆柱体。在5分钟内，这个屏障可以阻止亡灵进入或影响圆柱体内的任何东西。圆柱体随你移动，并以你为中心保持。然而，如果你的移动方式使亡灵进入圆筒内，效果就会结束。一个生物可以用一个动作来尝试克服这个障碍，进行DC15魅力检查。一旦成功，该生物就不再受屏障的影响。

item.name: Scroll of Tarrasque Summoning
entries: Using an action to read the scroll causes the {@creature tarrasque} (see the creature's entry in the Monster Manual) to appear in an unoccupied space you can see within 1 mile of you. The tarrasque disappears when it drops to 0 hit points and is hostile toward all creatures other than itself.

item.name: Scroll of the Comet
entries: 通过使用行动来阅读卷轴，你会使一颗彗星从天而降，在你能看到的距离1英里的地方坠落到地面。使用该卷轴时，你必须在户外，否则什么都不会发生，卷轴也会被浪费。
彗星在撞击时产生一个50英尺深、500英尺半径的弹坑。半径内的任何生物都必须做一个DC20的灵巧投掷，如果投掷失败，将受到{@damage 30d10}力量伤害，如果投掷成功，将受到一半的伤害。火山口的所有建筑都被摧毁，所有没有被佩戴或持有的非魔法物品也被摧毁。

item.name: Seeker Dart
entries: 这个小飞镖上装饰着像风一样的螺旋形图案，横跨其镖杆的长度。
当你低声说 "寻找 "这个词并投掷这个飞镖时，它就会在你120英尺范围内寻找你选择的目标。你之前必须看到这个目标，但是你现在不需要看到它。如果目标不在范围内，或者没有明确的路径，飞镖就会落到地上，它的魔力就会被消耗掉。否则，元素之风会引导飞镖瞬间穿过空气到达目标处。飞镖可以通过狭窄的1英寸宽的开口，并且可以改变方向，在角落里飞行。
当飞镖到达它的目标时，目标必须在DC16的灵巧反射中成功，否则会受到{@damage 1d4}的穿刺伤害和{@damage 3d4}的雷电伤害。然后，飞镖的魔力被消耗，它变成了一个普通的飞镖。

item.name: Sekolahian Worshiping Statuette
entries: 这个1英尺高的雕像由砂岩巧妙地雕刻而成，描绘了一条张着嘴在水中扭动的鲨鱼。如果任何微小的海栖动物在雕像的嘴边1英寸范围内，鲨鱼就会闪现出来，并对其造成1次穿刺伤害。鲨鱼以这种方式造成的伤害每小时不超过一次。

item.name: Selesnya Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Selesnya, allows you to cast {@spell charm person}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Selesnya's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Selesnya Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Selesnya guild
entries: Carved from white and green marble in the shape of a wolf's head, this keyrune transforms into a {@creature dire wolf}. The wolf persists for 8 hours. Its Intelligence is 6, and it understands Elvish and Sylvan but can't speak those languages. While it is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate with each other telepathically.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature dire wolf}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.
该生物对你、你的同伴和你的公会的其他成员都很友好（除非那些公会成员对你有敌意）。它能听懂你的语言并服从你的口头命令。如果你没有发出任何命令，该生物会采取{@action Dodge}的行动并移动以避免危险。
在持续时间结束时，该生物会恢复到它的钥匙形状。如果它的生命值下降到0，或者你在接触它的时候使用行动再次说出命令词，它就会提前恢复。当该生物恢复到它的钥匙孔形态时，它不能再变身，直到36小时后。

item.name: Sending Stone
entries: Also at rank 1, you are given use of an Acquisitions Incorporated sending stone, an uncommon magic item that resembles a gemstone in a bold setting. It functions like a normal sending stone, except that it has no matching stone and allows communication with Head Office, specific secretarians you know, and the secretarian nearest your location. You must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check to establish contact. Once the stone is successfully used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
与另一个秘书联系时，假定他们拥有自己的发送石。

entries.caption: Quirks of Your Sending Stone
rows: 这是一块翻转的石头。
除了在你的总部，它在任何地方都能得到很好的接收。
它有时会拾起其他神奇的对话。
它的尺寸、形状和重量都很完美，可以作为跳石使用。
当你使用它时，它就会发热，以至于它曾经烧穿你的手套。
它有一个令人厌恶的铃声，你不知道如何改变。
除了微弱的脉动光芒外，它未能通知你收到的信息。
它是语音激活的，因此，每次你与某人交谈时，它都会尝试向其他人发送信息。

entries.name: Rumor Mill
entries: Also at rank 2, whenever your franchise begins a major quest or mission, make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill History}) check. On a success, you can learn up to three rumors related to creatures or organizations involved in the mission, which come to you through your sending stone. These rumors reflect current or historical knowledge possessed by Acquisitions Incorporated or the organization's many contacts.

entries.name: Improved Rumor Mill
entries: 在等级3，当你使用你的 "谣言粉碎机 "功能时，DM为你提供一种感觉，即某一谣言的哪些部分是不准确的，如果有的话。你不一定能了解到那些虚假谣言背后的真相。

item.name: Sending Stones
entries: Sending stones come in pairs, with each smooth stone carved to match the other so the pairing is easily recognized. While you touch one stone, you can use an action to cast the {@spell sending} spell from it. The target is the bearer of the other stone. If no creature bears the other stone, you know that fact as soon as you use the stone and don't cast the spell.
一旦{@spell sending}被投在石头上，它们就不能再被使用，直到下一个黎明。如果一对石头中的一个被毁，另一个就会变成非魔法的。

item.name: Sensory Stone
entries: This small, smooth stone contains the essence of a single experience.

As an action, you or a willing creature you designate can touch the stone and experience the sensation as if it happened to the designated creature. The illusory experience is fleeting and harmless, however real it might feel in the moment.

entries.name: Record Sensation
entries: You can use your reaction to record a short sensation lasting no longer than 6 seconds experienced by a creature of your choice within 30 feet of yourself, infusing the essence of that experience into the stone. This replaces any sensation already stored within the stone.

entries.name: Siphon Sensation
entries: As a bonus action, you can draw on the stone's magic to end the charmed or frightened condition on yourself, destroying the stone in the process.

item.name: Sentinel Shield
entries: 拿着这面盾牌时，你在主动出击和智慧({@skill Perception})检查方面有优势。盾牌上印有一个眼睛的标志。

item.name: Serpent Scale Armor
entries: 这套魔法盔甲由闪亮的鳞片制成。穿着它时，你可以在确定你的护甲等级时应用你全部的灵巧修正值（而不是最大的+2）。此外，这件盔甲不会对你的灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查造成不利。

item.name: Serpent Venom
entries: This poison must be harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitated} {@creature giant poisonous snake}. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Serpent's Fang
entries: This single-edged magic sword is made from the scrimshawed fang of a giant serpent. Its hilt changes shape to adjust to the grasp of any creature that picks it up. The weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d10} poison damage to any target it hits.

item.name: Shadowfell Brand Tattoo
entries: 这种神奇的纹身是由一种特殊的针头制作的，颜色深，很抽象。

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: 为了适应这个项目，你把针放在你希望出现纹身的皮肤上，在整个适应过程中按下针。当调和完成后，针会变成墨水，成为纹身，出现在皮肤上。
如果你对纹身的调和结束，纹身就会消失，而针会重新出现在你的空间。

entries.name: Shadow Essence
entries: 你获得{@sense darkvision}，范围为60英尺，你在灵巧({@skill Stealth})检查中具有优势。

entries.name: Shadowy Defense
entries: 当你受到伤害时，你可以使用你的反应使你变得不真实，使你受到的伤害减半。然后，在下一个日落之前，该反应不能再次使用。

item.name: Shadowfell Shard
entries: 这块沉闷、冰冷的水晶沉甸甸地坐在那里，被阴影地带的绝望所淹没。作为一个动作，你可以将这个碎片附在一个微小的物体上（比如武器或珠宝），或者将它分离。如果你对它的调和结束，它就会脱落。当你持有或佩戴它时，你可以将碎片作为施法的焦点。
当你在持有或佩戴碎片的情况下对一个法术使用元神选项时，你可以暂时诅咒一个被该法术攻击的生物；选择一个能力得分，直到你下一回合结束，该生物在使用该能力的能力检查和蓄力时有劣势。

item.name: Shard
entries: Silver coin, slightly smaller than the nib (1 shard = 10 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Shard of the Ise Rune
entries: 这块冰碎片又长又细，大概有匕首那么大。里面的ise（冰）符文会发光。这块碎片有以下属性，只有当它在你身上时才有效。

entries.name: Frigid Touch
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以触摸一个水体，并将水冻结在你触摸的地方周围10英尺半径的范围内。一旦你使用了这个属性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

entries.name: Frost Friend
entries: 你对火灾伤害有抵抗力。

entries.name: Icy Mantle
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以用手指上的水触摸自己或其他生物。这些水会产生一个冰冷的保护罩。在接下来的一分钟内，如果目标受到重击、砍击或穿刺的伤害，该伤害会减少到0，并且护罩会被摧毁。一旦你使用这个属性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

entries.name: Winters Howl
entries: As an action, you can cast {@spell sleet storm} (spell save DC 17). You regain this ability after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Frost
entries: 你可以将碎片的魔力转移到一个非魔法物品上--斗篷或一双靴子--通过用手指追踪那里的伊瑟符文。转移需要8个小时的工作，要求两件物品的距离在5英尺以内。最后，碎片被摧毁，符文以蓝色出现在所选择的物品上，物品会根据其形态获得好处。

items.name: Cloak
items.entry: The cloak is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing it, you have resistance to fire damage, and you have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made while in snowy terrain.

items.name: Boots
items.entry: The pair of boots is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing it, you ignore {@quickref difficult terrain||3} while walking, and you can walk on water.

item.name: Shard of Xeluan
entries: 这块1英尺长的黑曜石碎片在其冰冷的表面下有银和金的脉络。

entries.name: Empowered Magic
entries: 在持有碎片时，你可以把它作为施法的重点，它能使你的法术攻击卷获得+1的奖励。

entries.name: Enhanced Strength
entries: 当碎片在你身上时，你的力量得分增加4。这块碎片不能使你的力量值超过22。

entries.name: Curse
entries: 与此物品相合，它的诅咒就会延伸到你身上。你会一直受到诅咒，直到你被{@spell remove curse}的法术或类似的魔法所攻击，或者直到碎片重新连接到Xeluan的{@condition petrified}心脏。
碎片的诅咒导致不幸降临在你身上。当你在攻击卷、能力检查或蓄力投掷中掷出1时，在碎片的不幸表上滚动以确定不幸。在这个不幸持续的时间内，没有其他碎片的不幸降临到你身上。

rows: You accidentally cut yourself with the shard and are {@condition poisoned} until the next dawn.
You experience a vision of an ancient calamity—a beautiful city threatened by crumbling mountains and erupting volcanoes—and are {@condition stunned} until the end of your next turn.
For a few seconds, the ground shakes under you. You and each creature within 10 feet of you must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
碎片释放三个发光的魔力飞镖，目标是你周围30英尺内的一个随机生物。如果没有这样的目标，你就成为目标。每个飞镖都会自动击中目标，并对目标造成3({@damage 1d4 + 1})力量伤害。
直到下一个黎明，智力值为3或更低的野兽会对你产生敌意。
似乎没有什么事情是按照你的方式进行的。直到下一个黎明，你在能力检查上都处于劣势。

item.name: Shard Solitaire (Black Sapphire)
entries: 这种宝石含有一个不稳定的维外裂缝。它的切面是带状的彩虹色脉络，似乎在自行移动。已知存在五种类型的碎片单晶，每一种都是不同类型的宝石，如碎片单晶类型表所示。

entries.name: Rift Step
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，在佩戴或持有碎片接龙时，你可以将自己和你所佩戴或携带的东西传送到一个你能看到的30英尺范围内的无人空间。
当你使用这个属性时，你可以利用石头的次元裂缝的不稳定力量来增加传送距离，最多30英尺，但如果你使用裂缝步法传送超过30英尺，你必须在DC 16宪法救赎中成功，否则在传送后立即受到{@damage 3d10}武力伤害。

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries: 这块石头有6个电荷，每天在黎明时分恢复{@dice 1d6}已消耗的电荷。作为一个行动，你可以通过消耗必要数量的电荷来施展石头的一个法术，不需要任何材料成分（保存DC 16）。黑色蓝宝石碎片单晶可以用来施展以下法术：{@spell banishment}（3次收费；目标在法术持续期间被放逐到石头的次元空间），{@spell mirror image}（1次收费），{@spell blight}（3次收费），{@spell finger of death}（6次收费）.ter你会传送。

item.name: Shard Solitaire (Diamond)
entries: 这种宝石含有一个不稳定的维外裂缝。它的切面是带状的彩虹色脉络，似乎在自行移动。已知存在五种类型的碎片单晶，每一种都是不同类型的宝石，如碎片单晶类型表所示。

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries: 这块石头有6次充能，每天在黎明时分可以恢复{@dice 1d6}已消耗的充能。作为一个动作，你可以通过消耗必要数量的电荷来施展石头的一个法术，不需要任何材料成分（保存DC 16）。钻石碎片单体可以用来施展以下法术：(1%)（3次收费；目标在法术持续期间被放逐到石头的次元空间），(2%)（1次收费），(3%)（3次收费），(4%)（6次收费；法术创造的复制品与它模仿的生物拥有相同的命中率）。

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries: 这块石头有6个电荷，每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6}已消耗的电荷。作为一个动作，你可以通过消耗必要数量的电荷来施展石头的一个法术，不需要任何材料成分（保存DC16）。雅辛石碎片接龙可以用来施展以下法术：(1%)（3次收费；目标在法术持续期间被放逐到石头的次元空间），(2%)（1次收费），(3%)（2次收费），(4%)（6次收费）。 {@spell mirror image}(1次收费), {@spell fireball}(3次收费), {@spell fire storm}(6次收费；重复创造.%)(3次收费；目标被放逐到石头的次元空间，持续施法时间), {@spell mirror image}(1次收费), {@spell fireball}(3次收费), {@spell fire storm}（6次收费）.ter你传送出去。

item.name: Shard Solitaire (Ruby)
entries: 这种宝石含有一个不稳定的维外裂缝。它的切面是带状的彩虹色脉络，似乎在自行移动。已知存在五种类型的碎片单晶，每一种都是不同类型的宝石，如碎片单晶类型表所示。

当你使用这个属性时，你可以利用石头的次元裂缝的不稳定力量来增加传送距离，最多30英尺，但如果你使用裂缝步法传送超过30英尺，你必须在DC 16宪法救赎中成功，否则在传送后立即受到{@damage 3d10}武力伤害。

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries: The stone has 6 charges and regains {@dice 1d6} expended charges daily at dawn. As an action, you can cast one of the stone's spells by expending the requisite number of charges, requiring no material components (save DC 16). The ruby shard solitaire can be used to cast the following spells: {@spell banishment} (3 charges; the target is banished to the stone's extradimensional space for the spell's duration), {@spell mirror image} (1 charge), {@spell fly} (2 charges), {@spell teleport} (6 charges).

item.name: Shatterspike
entries: 你用这个魔法武器进行的攻击和伤害卷有+1的加成。如果它击中了一个物体，则自动成为关键一击，并且它可以对该物体造成打击或砍击伤害（你选择）。此外，来自非魔法来源的伤害也不能伤害该武器。

item.name: Shatterstick
entries: A shatterstick is a nonmagical, 12-inch-long, 4-pound stake made of blue-tinged infernal iron mined on Cania, the eighth layer of the Nine Hells. When embedded in earth or pounded into solid rock, the stake emits a seismic vibration in a 20-foot radius centered on itself for 1 minute, shaking the ground in that area for the duration. When the effects ends, the shatterstick breaks apart, becoming useless, and all structures within 20 feet of it take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage.

item.name: Shield Guardian Amulet
entries: 护身符是一个4英寸宽的圆盘，由银框木组成，表面刻有符文。一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语在护身符周围显示了一个神奇的魔法光环。
每一个{@creature shield guardian}都有一个护身符与之神奇地相连。一个盾牌守护者只能有一个相应的护身符，如果该护身符被毁，盾牌守护者会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到创建一个替代的护身符。
盾牌守护者的护身符如果没有被佩戴或携带，会受到直接攻击。它有10点攻击力，10点命中率，对毒药和精神伤害有免疫力。制作一个护身符需要1周的时间，需要花费1,000金币的组件。
盾牌守护者的唯一重点是保护护身符的佩戴者。护身符的佩戴者可以命令守护者攻击它的敌人或保护佩戴者免受攻击。如果攻击有可能伤害到佩戴者，这个结构可以用魔法将打击吸收到自己的身体里，即使是在远处。
与此护身符契合的人知道护身符的距离和方向，只要护身符和护身符在同一个存在平面上。作为一项行动，护身符的佩戴者可以尝试重新激活护身符，只要成功进行DC20智力({@skill Arcana})检查即可。只有当护身符和守护者在彼此的10英尺范围内时才能尝试重新激活。

item.name: Shield of Expression
entries: 这面盾牌的正面是以脸的形状塑造的。在佩戴此盾牌时，你可以使用一个额外动作来改变脸部的表情。

item.name: Shield of Far Sight
entries: A {@creature mind flayer} skilled at crafting magic items creates a shield of far sight by harvesting an eye from an intelligent humanoid and magically implanting it on the outer surface of a nonmagical shield. The shield becomes a magic item once the eyes is implanted, whereupon the {@creature mind flayer} can give the shield to a thrall or hang it on a wall in its lair. As long as the shield is on the same plane of existence as its creator, the {@creature mind flayer} can see through the shield's eye, which has {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. While peering through this magical eye, the {@creature mind flayer} can use its Mind Blast action as though it were standing behind the shield.
如果远视之盾被摧毁，创造它的{@creature mind flayer}会被{@condition blinded}，持续{@dice 2d12}小时。

item.name: Shield of Missile Attraction
entries: 持有此盾牌时，你对远程武器攻击的伤害有抵抗力。

entries.name: Curse
entries: 这个盾牌是被诅咒的。附着在它身上会使你受到诅咒，直到你被{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法锁定。移除盾牌不能结束对你的诅咒。每当对你10英尺内的目标进行远程武器攻击时，诅咒会使你变成目标。

item.name: Shield of Shouting
entries: 一个{@spell detect magic}的法术在这个盾牌周围显示出一个转化魔法的光环，这个光环有一个小的魔法属性：盾牌持有者所说的话会被放大，声音比正常情况下大十倍。

item.name: Shield of the Blazing Dreadnought
entries: Modeled after the formidable spiked tower shields wielded by some fire giants, this iron shield emanates a constant warmth.
You can use a bonus action to activate the shield, causing glowing lava to flow through the shield's grooves for 1 minute. While the shield is active, you gain the following benefits:

entries.name: Blazing Soul
entries: You have immunity to fire damage.

entries.name: Cleansing Fire
entries: As an action, you can cause the shield to flare with the cleansing fire of the god Surtur. Choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself (you can choose yourself). One disease or condition of your choice affecting this creature ends immediately; the condition can be blinded, charmed, deafened, or poisoned.

entries.name: Shield Bash
entries: When you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with a shield bash, targeting one creature you can see within 5 feet of yourself. The target must make a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier). On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d6} bludgeoning damage plus {@damage 3d6} fire damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. You can use Shield Bash only once per turn.
Once the shield has been activated, it can't be activated again until the next dawn.

item.name: Shield of the Hidden Lord
entries: 隐秘之主的盾牌源自天体，是坑道恶魔加尔古特的监狱，他的凡人追随者把它当作神来敬仰。随着时间的推移，加高斯的邪恶扭曲了盾牌的外观，因此它的天体图案和设计已经扭曲成一张恶魔的脸，以令人不安的方式巧妙地移动。
在持有此盾牌时，你获得+2的交流奖励和对火灾伤害的抵抗。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: 隐匿之主的盾牌只要禁锢住加加思，就会有灵性。在有知觉的情况下，该盾牌具有以下属性。

items: 盾牌的智力为22，智慧为18，魅力为24，以及听觉和{@sense truesight}的范围为120英尺。
盾牌能说、能读、能听懂普通话和地狱语，并且能与它周围120英尺内的任何生物进行心灵感应。它的声音是一种低沉、空洞的耳语。
盾牌有3个电荷。你可以使用一个动作来消耗1个电荷来施放{@spell fireball}或2个电荷来施放{@spell wall of fire}的盾牌（每次都要用DC21来保存）。{@spell wall of fire}的法术持续1分钟（不需要{@status concentration}）。盾牌每天在黎明时分重新获得所有消耗的电荷。
在你的回合中的任何时候，盾牌都可以选择散发出恐惧的光环，持续1分钟。(这不是你控制的盾牌的力量。)任何对你有敌意的生物如果在盾牌20英尺范围内开始它的回合，必须做一个DC18的智慧救赎。拯救失败时，该生物会被{@condition frightened}，直到其下一回合开始。拯救成功时，该生物在接下来的24小时内对盾牌的这种力量免疫。一旦盾牌使用了这种力量，在下一个黎明前就不能再使用了。

entries.name: Gargauth's Personality
entries: 嘎嘎斯拼命地寻求自由，但它自己却无法逃脱。坑魔不愿透露它的真实性质，只称自己为隐藏的主。它抛出暗示和微妙的建议，说它是一个被困在不神圣的监狱中的天使。如果从盾牌中被释放出来，坑魔会遵守它为促进其逃脱而达成的任何交易条款。
在被困在盾牌中时，Gargauth会小心翼翼地引导盾牌当前的主人做出残忍和统治的行为，希望能将个人的灵魂送入九层地狱。如果盾牌的主人做了任何会使Gargauth更难逃出监狱的事情，例如将盾牌留在一个别人不太可能发现的地方，就会发生冲突。
加戈斯不知道如何从盾牌中逃脱。坑魔认为（不正确），如果把它带到九层地狱，它就能挣脱防护罩，因为它相信防护罩的力量在那里会更弱。

entries.name: Freeing Gargauth
entries: 对盾牌施展{@spell dispel evil and good}有{@chance 1|1 percent}的机会释放坑道恶魔，如果是由{@creature solar}、{@creature planetar}或大恶魔施展的法术，则自动成功。神明可以通过触摸盾牌并说出加尔古斯的名字来释放坑魔。当被释放时，加尔古斯会出现在一个随机的、未被占用的空间，尽可能地靠近盾牌。

item.name: Shield of the Tortoise
entries: While you are wielding this shield, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This item is cursed. Attuning to it extends the curse to you until you are targeted by a {@spell Remove Curse} spell or similar magic. You cannot discard the shield, and remain attuned to it, as long as you are cursed. As long as you are cursed, you are sluggish. Your speed is halved. When you roll initiative, treat the roll on your {@dice d20} as a 1. You can't change your initiative by any means.

item.name: Shield of the Uven Rune
entries: 这面盾牌是由一条古老的白龙的鳞片制成。它朝外的一面刻录了一个符文。检查符文并成功通过DC20智力({@skill History})检查的人物可以认出这是一个赋予巨大力量的Uven(巨人语 "敌人")符文。
在持有盾牌时，你会从以下属性中受益。

entries.name: Winter's Friend
entries: 你对寒冷伤害免疫。

entries.name: Deadly Rebuke
entries: 在一个生物用近战攻击击中你之后，你可以立即使用你的反应对该生物造成{@damage 3d6}坏死伤害。

entries.name: Bane
entries: You can cast the {@spell bane} spell from the shield (save DC 17). The spell does not require {@status concentration} and lasts for 1 minute. Once you cast the spell from the shield, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Vengeance
entries: 你可以将盾牌的魔力转移到非魔法武器上，只要用一根手指在武器上描画出乌文符文。转移需要8个小时的工作，需要两件物品在5英尺以内。最后，盾牌被摧毁，而符文则被刻在或烧在所选的武器上。这把武器成为稀有的魔法物品，需要进行调和。它具有+1武器的属性。当该武器用于对付以下生物类型时，奖励会增加到+3，这些生物类型由你在创造该魔法武器时选择：异形、天人、建筑、龙、元素、妖怪、魔人、巨人或不死生物。

item.name: Shiftweave
entries: 当一套移花接木的衣服被创造出来时，最多可以有五种不同的服装被嵌入到布中。当你穿上这套衣服时，你可以把它的命令语作为一个额外的动作，把你的衣服变成你所选择的包含在其中的其他设计中的一种。不管它的外观如何，这套衣服除了是衣服之外不能有任何其他东西。虽然它可以复制其他魔法服装的外观，但它不会获得它们的魔法属性。

item.name: Shrieking Greaves
entries: Each of these black leg guards is decorated with a motif of monstrous skulls screaming in terror.

The greaves have 3 charges. While wearing these greaves, you can use a bonus action to expend 1 charge to increase your walking speed by 30 feet, and you have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. These effects last for 1 minute. The greaves regain {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Curse
entries: The greaves are cursed, and becoming attuned to them extends the curse to you. You can't remove the greaves or end your attunement to them until you are targeted by a {@spell Remove Curse} spell or similar magic.

You have disadvantage on saving throws against the frightened condition. Whenever you start your turn frightened, the greaves release an ear-piercing scream. You and each creature within 10 feet of you must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Shrike Ship
entries: 这种迅捷的船只是一种相对较新的设计，迅速得到了商人和海盗的青睐。史莱克船的腿使它能够安全地降落在地面上。该船可以漂浮，但不是为水上旅行而建造的，在波涛汹涌的海面上很快就会下沉。
史莱克战舰的标准武器包括三支弹炮--一支在前甲板，一支在顶层甲板的中间，一支在船尾。在绝望的情况下，该船的加固船头可以作为一个刺穿的撞锤使用。

item.name: Silk Rope (50 feet)
entries: 绳索，无论是麻还是丝制成的，都有2个命中率，可以通过DC17力量检查来爆裂。

items.name: Awakened
entries: 剑客在觉醒状态下可获得以下好处。

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+2。
该武器的毒药的蓄力DC增加到15。
拿着剑的时候，你可以用一个动作用它来施展以下的法术（保存DC15）。{@spell cloudkill}, {@spell darkness}, {@spell levitate}, 或 {@spell web}。一旦用长剑施法，在下一个黎明之前，该法术不能再从长剑上施放。

item.name: Silken Spite (Dormant)
entries: 这把剑的剑身是由蜘蛛丝制成的。它的玛瑙鞍座上有一颗切割成蜘蛛形状的红宝石，剑身带有洛神的祝福。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Silken Spite is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intelligence of 13, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 15. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这把武器能与它的持有者进行心灵感应，并能说、读和理解深渊语、普通语、精灵语和地下语。

entries.name: Personality
entries: A murderous {@creature yochlol} named Sinnafex lives within Silken Spite. The weapon speaks in whispers, pushing its wielder to trust no one and to kill those who cause the slightest personal offense.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 剑客在休眠状态下可获得以下好处。

items: 你能说、读、写深渊语、精灵语和地下水。
你有{@sense darkvision}到60英尺的范围。如果你已经拥有(1%)，被调谐到剑术后，你的(2%)的范围会增加60英尺。
你在使用该魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。

You can use an action to cause poison to coat the rapier's blade. The poison remains for 1 minute or until an attack using this weapon hits a creature. That creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the creature awake.
在携带剑客时，你可以向上、向下和穿过垂直表面，并沿着天花板倒立移动，同时让你的双手保持自由。你的攀爬速度等同于你的步行速度。此外，你不能被任何形式的网所困，并且可以像{@quickref difficult terrain||3}一样在网中移动。

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

items.name: Exalted
entries: 剑客在其高尚的状态下会有以下好处。

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+3。
对该武器的毒药和从该武器施放的法术的蓄力DC增加到17。
Magical darkness doesn't impede your {@sense darkvision}.
当你在昏暗的光线或黑暗中拿着武器时，你可以使用一个额外的动作，传送到一个你能看到的同样处于昏暗光线或黑暗中的无人空间，最远可达60英尺。这个属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Silver (sp)
entries: 普通硬币根据其制成的金属的相对价值，有几种不同的面值。最常见的三种硬币是金币（gp）、银币（sp）和铜币（cp）。
用一个金币，一个角色可以买一个腰包，50英尺的好绳子，或者一只山羊。一个熟练的（但不是特殊的）工匠每天可以赚取一块金币。金币是衡量财富的标准单位，即使钱币本身并不常用。当商人讨论涉及价值数百或数千金币的商品或服务的交易时，交易通常不涉及单个金币的交换。相反，金币是一种标准的价值衡量标准，实际的交换是以金条、信用证或有价值的货物进行的。
一块金币价值十块银币，是平民中最普遍的硬币。一枚银币可以买到一个工人一天的工作，一壶灯油，或者在一个贫穷的旅馆里休息一晚。
一块银币值十个铜币，这在劳动者和乞丐中很常见。一个铜块可以买到一支蜡烛、一个火把或一支粉笔。
此外，由其他贵金属制成的不寻常的硬币有时会出现在宝藏中。电子币（ep）和铂金币（pp）起源于没落的帝国和失落的王国，它们在交易中使用时有时会引起怀疑和疑虑。一块银币价值5个银币，一块铂金价值10个金币。
一枚标准硬币的重量约为一盎司的三分之一，因此50枚硬币的重量为一磅。

item.name: Silver Dragon Scale Mail
entries: 龙鳞邮件是由一种龙的鳞片制成的。有时，龙会收集它们遗弃的鳞片并将它们赠送给人类。其他时候，猎人会小心翼翼地剥下死龙的皮并加以保存。在这两种情况下，龙鳞甲都有很高的价值。当你穿上这件盔甲时，你会获得+1的交流奖励，在面对龙的恐怖存在和呼吸武器时，你的蓄力动作有优势，并且你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。
此外，你可以集中你的感官作为一个行动，以魔法方式辨别距离你30英里内最近的银龙的距离和方向。这个特殊动作在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Silver headdress with amber and red-coral feathers (Sun Empire)
Silver necklace with a gemstone pendant
Silver necklace with an amber pendant (Sun Empire)
Silver shoulder piece with amber and garnet (Sun Empire)
Silver Sword
item.reqAttune: by a creature that has psionic ability
entries: 你用这个魔法武器进行的攻击和伤害卷有+3的加成。在对处于星体中的目标进行关键打击时（如{@spell astral projection}法术），你可以切断将目标拴在物质身体上的银色绳子，而不是造成伤害。

item.name: Silver-plated steel longsword with jet set in hilt
Silverquill Primer
entries: The Silverquill Primer is a magic textbook created at Strixhaven's Silverquill College. The primer has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you make a Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) or a Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check while holding the primer, you can expend 1 charge to give yourself a {@dice 1d4} bonus to the check, immediately after you roll the {@dice d20}.
此外，如果你在长时间休息结束时学习了入门书，你可以从吟游诗人或牧师的法术列表中选择一个一级法术。在你完成下一次长时休息之前，如果你持有入门书，你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放一次所选的法术。你对这个法术的施法能力是你选择的智力、智慧或魅力。

item.name: Simic Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Simic, allows you to cast {@spell expeditious retreat}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Simic's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Simic Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Simic guild
entries: This keyrune is assembled from coral, mother-of-pearl, and chrome and adorned with the spirals and curves characteristic of Simic ornamentation. The head resembles the shell of a sea creature. On command, the keyrune turns into a {@creature category 1 krasis|GGR} that has the Grabber and Stabilizing Legs adaptations. The transformation lasts for up to 5 hours.

When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature category 1 krasis|GGR} that has the Grabber and Stabilizing Legs adaptations. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.
该生物对你、你的同伴和你的公会的其他成员都很友好（除非那些公会成员对你有敌意）。它能听懂你的语言并服从你的口头命令。如果你没有发出任何命令，该生物会采取{@action Dodge}的行动并移动以避免危险。
在持续时间结束时，该生物会恢复到它的钥匙形状。如果它的生命值下降到0，或者你在接触它的时候使用行动再次说出命令词，它就会提前恢复。当该生物恢复到它的钥匙孔形态时，它不能再变身，直到36小时后。

item.name: Sinda berries (10)
entries: 这些浆果是深棕色的，有苦味。一个完全生长的辛达浆果树丛有{@dice 4d6}的浆果生长。被摘掉所有浆果的灌木丛会在(1%)个月内长出新的浆果。采摘的浆果在24小时后就会失去其新鲜度和功效。
新鲜的辛达果实可以生吃，或者碾碎后加入饮料中以减弱其苦味。一个生物如果吃了至少10个新鲜的辛达果实，在接下来的24小时内对疾病和毒药的抵抗力会有优势。

item.name: Siren Song Lyre
entries: 你可以用一个动作来弹奏这把琴，并且用它来施展以下的法术。{@spell animal friendship}, {@spell charm person}, {@spell enthrall}, {@spell suggestion}. 如果该法术需要蓄力，则法术蓄力DC为13。
一旦该乐器被用来施法，它就不能再被用来施法，直到下一个黎明。

item.name: Skull Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card and use it to cast {@spell Spirit of Death|BMT} (see {@book chapter 7|BMT|6|Spirit of Death}) as a 6th-level spell (spell attack bonus {@hit 9}, save {@dc 17}). Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Skull Helm
entries: While wearing this skull-shaped helm, you have resistance to cold, poison, and necrotic damage.

Additionally, while wearing the helm, you can cast {@spell Spirit of Death|BMT} from it without requiring material components. Once you use the helm to cast the spell, the helm can't cast this spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Skull of Selfish Knowledge
entries: You may use an action to make the magical skull devour a nonmagical book, map, or scroll. Once devoured the learning is forever available to you, but you can never write the information down or communicate it to others. It is for you alone.

item.name: Skyblinder Staff
entries: 你在使用这根魔法四角杖的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。拿着它的时候，你的法术攻击卷获得+1的奖励。

If a flying creature you can see within 30 feet of you makes an attack roll against you, you can use your reaction to hold the staff aloft and cause it to flare with light. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll, and it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of its next turn.

item.name: Skymetal Shield
entries: This shield is constructed from hammered meteoric iron and embossed with a delerium crystal. When you are hit with a melee or ranged attack while wielding this shield, you can use your reaction to absorb residual energy from the attack. You suffer damage and effects from the attack as normal, and the shield gains 1 charge. The shield can have a maximum of 5 charges. Unexpended charges are lost each day at dawn.

As an action while wielding the shield, you can expend all its charges to release a forceful blast. Creatures within 10 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, creatures in the area take {@damage 1d6} force damage for each expended charge, and are flung back 10 feet and knocked prone.

item.name: Skymetal Staff
entries: This quarterstaff was built from refined meteoric iron and has a liquid delerium core.

Once on your turn, when you hit a creature with a melee attack using this weapon, you can force the target to make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, it takes an extra {@damage 3d6} psychic damage and can't take reactions until the start of your next turn. In addition, on its next turn, the creature must choose to take an action, bonus action, or move: it may only do one of the three.

item.name: Skysail
entries: These bat-like wings were first used by the {@book Air Ashari|TDCSR|3|Zephrah} to soar through the sky. They are constructed of either leather and bone, or cloth and wood, and are set onto a sturdy wooden pole that helps their user remain stable during flight.

While these wings are open and you are riding the skysail, you can glide through the air. You have a flying speed of 60 feet, but you must descend at least 10 feet by the end of each of your turns and you can't gain altitude.
Additionally, while in contact with the skysail, you can use an action to cast the {@spell fly} spell on yourself, with a duration of 1 minute and requiring no {@condition concentration}.

The spell ends if you lose physical contact with the skysail. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn, or unless the skysail is immersed in powerful magic of elemental air. (This includes magic such as that found at the top of the {@book Summit Peaks|TDCSR|3|Summit Peaks} near the rift of air in {@book Zephrah|TDCSR|3|Zephrah}, or on the Elemental Plane of Air).
When the skysail is not in use, its wings can be retracted, and its pole can be used as a {@item quarterstaff|PHB}.

item.name: Skyship
entries: Purchasing a {@item skyship|TDCSR} costs 100,000 gp, and requires a personal connection with the Alsfarin Union in {@book Ank'Harel|TDCSR|3|Marquet}. A {@item skyship|TDCSR} travels at a top speed of 10 miles per hour, can carry total cargo of 10 tons, and requires a crew of six to ten humanoids to operate at peak performance. Most {@item skyship|TDCSR|skyships} have maximum accommodations for up to 30 passengers. Most {@item skyship|TDCSR|skyships} only travel between existing skyports (see "{@book Emon Skyport|TDCSR|3|8. Emon Skyport},"), and charge a fee of 2 gp per mile for a passenger ticket. Chartering a {@item skyship|TDCSR} to a destination off the standard sky routes costs 15 gp per mile, if the captain is available and willing to undertake the journey. Shipping cargo costs 1 gp per mile per 100 pounds of cargo along normal sky routes, and twice that to other destinations.

item.name: Sled Dog
entries: 一只雪橇犬（使用《怪物手册》附录A中的{@creature wolf}状态块）需要50个金币，可以拉360磅。
Sled dogs must take a short rest after pulling a sled for 1 hour; otherwise, they gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

item.name: Sling Bullets of Althemone
entries: 吊索子弹装在一个袋子里，里面有{@dice 1d4 + 4}的子弹。为每颗子弹在魔法吊索子弹表上滚动，以确定它的魔法属性。
你在使用这些子弹时，攻击和伤害卷都有+2的奖励。如果子弹没有击中目标，子弹会被传送回袋子里。一旦子弹击中目标，子弹就会失去其魔力。

entries.caption: Magic Sling Bullets
rows: {@b Banishment.}受到此子弹伤害的生物，必须在DC15魅力救赎中成功，否则会被驱逐，就像受到{@spell banishment}法术影响一样。
{@b Fulguration.}一旦击中，这颗子弹会对目标造成额外的{@damage 2d8}雷电伤害。在目标10英尺范围内的所有其他生物必须在DC 15宪法规定的投掷中获得成功，否则会受到{@damage 1d8}雷电伤害。
{@b Stunning.} 命中后，这颗子弹会造成额外的{@damage 1d10}武力伤害，并且目标会被{@condition stunned}，直到你的下一个回合结束。
{@b Tracking.} 受到此子弹伤害的生物在子弹击中的地方会有一个发光的符文标记。这个标记会持续24小时。当该生物被标记时，你总是知道它的方向。

item.name: Sling of Giant Felling
entries: When you hit a Giant creature with a ranged attack roll using this magic sling, the creature must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or have the prone condition.

item.name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
entries: 当你穿上这双轻巧的鞋子时，你可以向上、向下和穿过垂直表面，并沿着天花板颠倒移动，同时让你的双手保持自由。你的攀爬速度与你的行走速度相等。然而，拖鞋不允许你在湿滑的表面上以这种方式移动，例如被冰或油覆盖的表面。

item.name: Slumbering Dragon Vessel
entries: 这个容器可以是一个药水瓶、饮水喇叭或其他用于盛放液体的容器。

As a bonus action, if the vessel is empty, you can speak the command word to fill the vessel with one of the following (your choice): ale, olive oil, a {@item potion of healing}, or a {@item potion of climbing}. Once this property is used, it can't be used until the next dawn. A potion you create in this way loses its magical properties if it isn't imbibed within 24 hours.

item.name: Slumbering Dragon-Touched Focus
entries: 这个神奇的物品可以是权杖、球体、护身符、水晶或其他精巧的物品。它通常包含了龙的翅膀、爪子、牙齿或鳞片的图像。
你在主动性卷轴上有优势。当你持有这个焦点时，它可以作为你所有法术的施法焦点。

item.name: Slumbering Scaled Ornament
entries: 这种装饰品可以是珠宝、斗篷或其他可佩戴的配件。它似乎是由龙的鳞片、牙齿或爪子制成的，或者它包含了这些形状的图像。
你在为避免被{@condition charmed}或{@condition frightened}或结束你身上的这些情况而进行的拯救动作上有优势。

item.name: Small gold statuette set with rubies
Small mirror set in a painted wooden frame
Smith's Tools
additionalEntries: Smith's tools allow you to work metal, heating it to alter its shape, repair damage, or work raw ingots into useful items.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 史密斯的工具包括锤子、钳子、木炭、抹布和一块磨刀石。

additionalEntries.name: Arcana and History
entries: 你的专长使你在检查金属物品（如武器）时具有额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: 当调查涉及盔甲、武器或其他金属制品时，你可以发现线索并作出别人可能会忽略的推断。

additionalEntries.name: Repair
entries: 只要有工具和足够热的明火使金属变得柔韧，你每工作一小时就可以为受损的金属物体恢复10点命中率。

additionalEntries.caption: Smith's Tools
rows: 研磨钝的刀片
修复一套盔甲
摧毁一个非魔法的金属物体

item.name: Smoke Grenade
entries: 作为一个动作，一个角色可以向60英尺以外的地方投掷手榴弹。使用手榴弹发射器，角色可以将手榴弹推进到120英尺以外。
烟雾弹落地后的一回合，会散发出一团烟雾，在20英尺范围内形成一个严重遮蔽的区域。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里或以上）在1个回合内驱散。

item.name: Smokepowder
entries: 烟火药是一种神奇的炸药，主要用于将子弹从枪械的枪管中推出。它被储存在密闭的木桶或微小的防水皮包中。一包烟火药足够五次射击，而一桶烟火药足够五百次射击。

If smokepowder is set on fire, dropped, or otherwise handled roughly, it explodes and deals fire damage to each creature or object within 20 feet of it: {@dice 1d6} for a packet, {@dice 9d6} for a keg. A successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw halves the damage.
在烟火上施放{@spell dispel magic}会使它永久地变成惰性。

item.name: Snicker-Snack
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic vorpal sword. In addition, the weapon ignores resistance to slashing damage. When you use this weapon to attack a creature that has at least one head and roll a 20 on the attack roll, you cut off one of the creature's heads. The creature dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damage, it doesn't have or need a head, it has legendary actions, or the DM decides that the creature is too big for its head to be cut off with this weapon. Such a creature instead takes an extra {@damage 6d8} slashing damage from the hit.
当你与Snicker-Snack调和时，你可以熟练使用大剑，并且你可以使用你的魅力修正值而不是你的力量修正值来进行攻击和伤害卷。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Snicker-Snack is a sentient, chaotic good greatsword with an Intelligence of 9, a Wisdom of 14, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet. It can speak, read, and understand Common, and its voice sounds silvery and melodic. Snicker-Snack craves the destruction of evil Dragons and urges you to seek out these creatures and slay them.
Snicker-Snack有一个善变的个性。如果你连续三次使用该武器的攻击卷不中，它就会结束对你的调教。在那之后，每次你完成一个长时间的休息，你都可以通过对舔食者进行有争议的魅力检查来试图重新获得剑的信任。如果你赢得了比赛，你对武器的调和就会立即恢复。你对这把武器的信任不能以任何其他方式恢复。

item.name: Snowshoes
entries: 雪鞋减少了穿戴者陷入深雪中的可能性。

item.name: Soothsalts
entries: Soothsalts are derived from a naturally occurring crystalline substance discovered throughout the wilds of the Miskath Strand. The crimson crystals have been mined from cavernous veins like those in the mouth of the Miskath Pit and found within smaller geode formations near sites ravaged by the Calamity. Soothsalts are consumed orally in lozenge-sized doses, and frequent users can be identified by the telltale crimson stain around their mouths. A creature subjected to a dose of soothsalts gains advantage on all Intelligence checks for {@dice 1d4} hours.
For each dose of soothsalts consumed, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}—an effect which is cumulative with multiple doses.

item.name: Sorcerous Spyglass
entries: This elegant brass {@item spyglass|phb} features an intricate lens mechanism. A creature looking through the sorcerous spyglass has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks to detect things that can be seen. In addition, the user can view magical auras while looking through the spyglass, as if under the effect of a {@spell detect magic} spell.

item.name: Soul Bag
entries: 当一个邪恶的人形生物因{@creature night hag}的噩梦萦绕而死亡时，夜行者会把灵魂装在这个由肉体缝制的黑色袋子里。一个灵魂袋一次只能容纳一个邪恶的灵魂，而且只有制作这个袋子的夜行者才能用它来捕捉灵魂。制作一个灵魂袋需要7天时间和一个人形祭品（其肉体被用来制作袋子）。

item.name: Soul Coin
entries: 灵魂硬币大约5英寸宽，大约一英寸厚，由地狱铁铸成。每枚硬币有三分之一的重量，上面刻有地狱的文字和一个咒语，可以神奇地将一个灵魂绑定在硬币上。因为每个灵魂硬币都有一个独特的灵魂被困在里面，所以每个都有一个故事。一个生物可能因为违约而被囚禁，而另一个则可能是夜巫师诅咒的受害者。

entries.name: Carrying Soul Coins
entries: 拿着一枚灵魂硬币，就能感受到灵魂被束缚在其中--被愤怒所征服或被绝望所困扰。
一个邪恶的生物可以携带任意数量的灵魂硬币（不超过其最大的重量限制）。非邪恶生物可以携带等于或少于其体质修正值的灵魂币而不受惩罚。如果非邪恶生物携带的灵魂币数量大于它的体质修正值，那么它在攻击卷、能力检查和蓄力上都会处于劣势。

entries.name: Using a Soul Coin
entries: 一个灵魂硬币有3个电荷。携带硬币的生物可以使用其行动从灵魂硬币中消耗1个电荷，并使用它来做以下事情之一。

items.name: Drain Life
items.entry: 你吸走一些灵魂的精华，并获得{@dice 1d10}的临时命中率。

items.name: Query
items.entry: 你用心灵感应向灵魂提问，并收到一个简短的心灵感应，你可以理解。灵魂只知道它生前知道的事情，但它必须如实回答你，并尽其所能。答案不超过一两句话，可能是隐晦的。

entries.name: Freeing a Soul
entries: Casting a spell that removes a curse on a soul coin frees the soul trapped within it, as does expending all of the coin's charges. The coin itself rusts from within and is destroyed once the soul is released. A freed soul travels to the realm of the god it served or the outer plane most closely tied to its alignment (DM's choice). The souls of lawful evil creatures released from soul coins typically emerge from the River Styx as {@creature lemure} devils.
灵魂也可以通过摧毁包含它的硬币而被释放。灵魂硬币有19点攻击力，每剩下一个电荷就有1点攻击力，并对所有的伤害免疫，除了由{@item hellfire weapon|bgdia}或地狱战争机器的熔炉造成的伤害（见"{@adventure Soul Fuel|bgdia|11|Soul Fuel}"）。
将一个灵魂从灵魂币中释放出来被认为是一种善举，即使这个灵魂属于邪恶的生物。

entries.name: Hellish Currency
entries: 灵魂币是九层地狱的一种货币，受到魔鬼的高度重视。灵魂币在地狱等级制度中被用来交换恩惠，贿赂不愿意的人，以及奖励忠诚的人所提供的服务。
灵魂硬币是由玛门和他的大恶魔们在九层地狱的第三层米瑙罗斯创造的，在一个巨大的密室里，邪恶的凡人的灵魂被束缚在硬币里。这些硬币随后被分发到整个九层地狱，用于购买商品和服务，进行无间道交易，进行黑暗交易和贿赂。

item.name: Soul Coin
entries: Soul Coins are about 5 inches across and about an inch thick, minted from infernal iron. Each coin weighs one-third of a pound and is inscribed with Infernal writing and a spell that magically binds a single soul to the coin. Because each Soul Coin has a unique soul trapped within it, each has a story. A creature might have been imprisoned as a result of defaulting on a deal, while another might be the victim of a night hag's curse.

entries.name: Carrying Soul Coins
entries: To hold a Soul Coin is to feel the soul bound within it—overcome with rage or fraught with despair.

An evil creature can carry as many Soul Coins as it wishes (up to its maximum weight allowance). A non-evil creature can carry a number of Soul Coins equal to or less than its Constitution modifier without penalty. A non-evil creature carrying a number of Soul Coins greater than its Constitution modifier has disadvantage on its attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

entries.name: Using a Soul Coin
entries: A Soul Coin has 3 charges. A creature carrying the coin can use its action to expend 1 charge from a Soul Coin and use it to do one of the following:

items.name: Drain Life
entries: 你吸走一些灵魂的精华，并获得{@dice 1d10}的临时命中率。

items.name: Query
entries: 你用心灵感应向灵魂提问，并收到一个简短的心灵感应，你可以理解。灵魂只知道它生前知道的事情，但它必须如实回答你，并尽其所能。答案不超过一两句话，可能是隐晦的。

entries.name: Freeing a Soul
entries: Casting a spell that removes a curse on a Soul Coin frees the soul trapped within it, as does expending all of the coin's charges. The coin itself rusts from within and is destroyed once the soul is released. A freed soul travels to the realm of the god it served, or the outer plane most closely tied to its alignment (DM's choice). The souls of lawful evil creatures released from Soul Coins typically emerge from the River Styx as lemure devils.

A soul can also be freed by destroying the coin that contains it. A Soul Coin has AC 19, 1 hit point for each charge it has remaining, and immunity to all damage except that which is dealt by an infernal warship's furnace.
Freeing a soul from a Soul Coin is considered a good act, even if the soul belongs to an evil creature.

entries.name: Hellish Currency
entries: Soul Coins are a currency of the Nine Hells and are highly valued by devils. The coins are used among the infernal hierarchy to barter for favors, bribe the unwilling, and reward the faithful for services rendered.

Soul Coins are created by Mammon and his greater devils on Minauros, the third layer of the Nine Hells, in a vast chamber where the captured souls of evil mortals are bound into the coins. These coins are then distributed throughout the Nine Hells to be used for goods and services, infernal deals, dark bargains, and bribes.

item.name: Sovereign Glue
entries: This viscous, milky-white substance can form a permanent adhesive bond between any two objects. It must be stored in a jar or flask that has been coated inside with {@item oil of slipperiness}. When found, a container contains {@dice 1d6 + 1} ounces.
一盎司的胶水可以覆盖一个1英尺见方的表面。胶水需要1分钟才能凝固。一旦定型，它所产生的粘合力只能通过使用{@item universal solvent}或{@item oil of etherealness}，或用{@spell wish}的咒语来打破。

item.name: Space Galleon
entries: 太空大帆船是穿梭于荒野空间和星际海洋的众多船只中的主力。太空大帆船可以很容易地被当作普通的航海大帆船。因为它们可以像它们的名字一样在水面上登陆和移动，它们可以驶入陆地世界的港口而不引起不必要的注意。像普通的大帆船一样，太空大帆船并不是为了在地面上降落而建造的（它的龙骨会导致它侧翻）。该船的标准武器包括两个前部安装的弹弓和一个后部安装的芒果枪。

item.name: Speaking Stone
entries: The key to long-distance, virtually instantaneous communication across Khorvaire is House Sivis's network of message stations. Each station contains at least one speaking stone, which is carved from a Siberys dragonshard and inscribed with arcane symbols that uniquely identify it. If you're a gnome with the Mark of Scribing, you can touch the stone and use an action to cast the {@spell sending} spell from it. The target is any other speaking stone whose location or unique sequence of symbols you know. A creature within 5 feet of the stone hears the message as if they were the target.
在西维斯的信息站里，一个地精总是在说话的石头边上值班，听着可能传来的信息，并把它们转录到预定的收件人那里。

item.name: Spear of Backbiting
entries: 你在使用这个魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷上获得+2的奖励。当你投掷它时，它的普通和远距离射程都增加了30英尺，并且在命中后会造成一个额外的伤害。在你投掷它并击中或未击中后，它立即飞回你的手中。

entries.name: Curse
entries: 这把武器被诅咒了，成为它的附属品会使诅咒延伸到你身上。在用{@spell remove curse}或类似的魔法破除诅咒之前，你不愿意和这个武器分开，一直保持它在手边。此外，你在使用这把武器以外的其他武器进行攻击时有劣势。
每当你使用此武器在攻击卷上掷出1时，武器会弯曲或飞起来击中你的背部。以你自己的AC为优势重新进行一次攻击卷。如果结果是命中，你会受到伤害，就像你用长矛攻击自己一样。

item.name: Spell Bottle
entries: 这个玻璃瓶一次可以储存一个5级以下的法术。当发现时，掷出{@dice d6}并减去1；总数决定了瓶子里的法术等级（DM选择法术，0意味着瓶子是空的）。当瓶子里有法术时，旋转的蓝色蒸气会充满瓶子。
当瓶子是空的，任何生物都可以在施法时接触它，向它施放一个1到5级的法术。咒语除了被储存在瓶子里之外没有其他效果。
拿着瓶子的时候，你可以施放储存在瓶子里的法术。该法术使用原施法者的槽位等级、法术保全系数、法术攻击加成和施法能力，但在其他方面则与你施法的情况相同。一旦施法完毕，瓶子就会变空。
如果你拿着这个空瓶子，当你看到一个生物在你周围60英尺内施法时，你可以作为反应打开瓶子，试图打断这个法术。如果该生物正在施放3级或更低的法术，则该法术没有效果，并被储存在瓶子里。如果它施放的是四级或更高级别的法术，请进行智力测验。智力值等于10 + 咒语的等级。如果成功，该咒语没有效果，并被储存在瓶子里。

item.name: Spell Gem (Amber)
entries: 一个琥珀法术宝石可以包含任何等级的法术列表中的一个法术。当你学习宝石的属性时，你就会意识到这个法术。在持有宝石时，如果你知道该咒语或该咒语在你的等级的咒语列表中，你可以作为一个动作从宝石中施放该咒语。这样做不需要任何组件，也不需要调和。咒语随后从宝石上消失。
如果该法术的等级高于你通常可以施展的等级，你必须使用你的施法能力进行能力检查以确定你是否成功施展。测验值等于10 + 咒语的等级。如果检定失败，该咒语将从宝石上消失，没有其他效果。
An amber spell gem can store up to 4th level spells. Spells cast from the spell gem have a save DC of 15 and an attack bonus of {@hit 9}.
如果你与宝石契合并且它是空的，你可以给它注入咒语。要做到这一点，你要在持有宝石的同时施放咒语。咒语会被储存在宝石中，而不会产生任何效果。施放咒语必须需要1个动作或1分钟或更长时间，而且咒语的等级必须不高于宝石的最大值。如果该法术属于咒语学派，并且需要消耗材料成分，你必须提供这些材料，但它们的价值可以是普通的一半。
一旦被灌输了咒语，在下一个黎明之前，宝石不能再被灌输。
深海地精创造了这些神奇的宝石，并对创造过程保密。

item.name: Spell Gem (Bloodstone)
entries: 一颗血石法术宝石可以包含任何等级的法术列表中的一个法术。当你学习宝石的属性时，你会意识到该咒语。在持有宝石时，如果你知道该咒语或该咒语在你的等级的咒语列表中，你可以作为一个动作从它那里施放咒语。这样做不需要任何组件，也不需要调和。咒语随后从宝石上消失。
如果该法术的等级高于你通常可以施展的等级，你必须使用你的施法能力进行能力检查以确定你是否成功施展。测验值等于10 + 咒语的等级。如果检定失败，该咒语将从宝石上消失，没有其他效果。
A bloodstone spell gem can store up to 3rd level spells. Spells cast from the spell gem have a save DC of 15 and an attack bonus of {@hit 7}.
如果你与宝石契合并且它是空的，你可以给它注入咒语。要做到这一点，你要在持有宝石的同时施放咒语。咒语会被储存在宝石中，而不会产生任何效果。施放咒语必须需要1个动作或1分钟或更长时间，而且咒语的等级必须不高于宝石的最大值。如果该法术属于咒语学派，并且需要消耗材料成分，你必须提供这些材料，但它们的价值可以是普通的一半。
一旦被灌输了咒语，在下一个黎明之前，宝石不能再被灌输。
深海地精创造了这些神奇的宝石，并对创造过程保密。

item.name: Spell Gem (Diamond)
entries: 一个钻石法术宝石可以包含任何等级的法术列表中的一个法术。当你学习宝石的属性时，你会意识到该咒语。在持有宝石时，如果你知道该咒语或该咒语在你等级的咒语列表中，你可以作为一个动作从宝石中施放咒语。这样做不需要任何组件，也不需要调和。咒语随后从宝石上消失。
如果该法术的等级高于你通常可以施展的等级，你必须使用你的施法能力进行能力检查以确定你是否成功施展。测验值等于10 + 咒语的等级。如果检定失败，该咒语将从宝石上消失，没有其他效果。
A diamond spell gem can store up to 9th level spells. Spells cast from the spell gem have a save DC of 19 and an attack bonus of {@hit 11}.

item.name: Spell Scroll (1st Level)
entries: 咒语卷轴上有一个单一的咒语，以神秘的密码形式书写。如果该咒语在你的等级的咒语列表中，你可以阅读该卷轴并施放其咒语，而无需提供任何物质成分。否则，该卷轴是无法理解的。通过阅读卷轴来施法需要该法术的正常施法时间。一旦施法，卷轴上的文字就会褪色，并且碎裂成灰。如果施法过程被打断，卷轴也不会丢失。
如果该法术在你的等级的法术列表中，但等级比你通常能施放的要高，你必须用你的法术能力进行能力检查以确定你是否成功施放。DC是11。如果检定失败，该咒语将从卷轴上消失，没有其他效果。
一旦施法，卷轴上的文字就会褪色，而卷轴本身也会碎裂成灰。
A spell cast from this scroll has a save DC of 13 and an attack bonus of {@hit 5}.
魔法卷轴上的巫师咒语可以被复制，就像魔法书中的咒语可以被复制一样。当咒语卷轴上的咒语被复制时，复制者必须在DC11智力（{@skill Arcana}）检查中取得成功。如果检定成功，该咒语就被成功复制了。无论检查是成功还是失败，法术卷轴都会被销毁。

entries: 咒语卷轴上有一个单一的咒语，以神秘的密码形式书写。如果该咒语在你的等级的咒语列表中，你可以阅读该卷轴并施放其咒语，而无需提供任何物质成分。否则，该卷轴是无法理解的。通过阅读卷轴来施法需要该法术的正常施法时间。一旦施法，卷轴上的文字就会褪色，并且碎裂成灰。如果施法过程被打断，卷轴也不会丢失。
如果该法术在你的等级的法术列表中，但等级比你通常能施放的要高，你必须用你的法术能力进行能力检查以确定你是否成功施放。检验标准是17。如果检定失败，该咒语将从卷轴上消失，没有其他效果。
一旦施法，卷轴上的文字就会褪色，而卷轴本身也会碎裂成灰。
用此卷轴施展的法术，其救赎DC为18，攻击加成为{@hit 10}。
