item.name: Spellbook
entries: 对于巫师来说，法术书是必不可少的，它是一本皮制的小册子，有100页空白的牛皮纸，适合用来记录法术。

item.name: Spellguard Shield
entries: 在持有此盾牌时，你对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势，而法术攻击对你有劣势。

item.name: Spelljamming Helm
entries: 这种华丽的椅子的功能是在空间和空气中推动和操纵安装了它的船只。它还可以在水上或水下推动和操纵一艘船，只要该船是为这种旅行而建造的。这艘船必须重达1吨或以上。
与咒语干扰头盔相适应的感觉类似于一个人的胳膊或腿睡着后的针刺效果，但没有那么痛苦。
在与法术干扰头盔相适应并坐在其中时，只要你保持{@status concentration}(就像{@status concentration||concentrating}的法术)，你就会获得以下能力。

items: 你可以使用咒语干扰舵在空间、空气或水中移动船只，最高可达到船只的速度。如果飞船在太空中，并且周围1英里内没有其他重达1吨或以上的物体，你可以使用咒语干扰舵使飞船快速移动，足以在24小时内行驶1亿英里。
你可以操纵这艘船，尽管有些笨拙，就像用船舵或船桨来操纵一艘航海船一样。
在任何时候，你都可以看到和听到船上和周围发生的事情，就像你站在你选择的船上的某个位置一样。

entries.name: Transfer Attunement
entries: 你可以用一个动作来接触一个愿意的施法者。那个生物会立即与咒语干扰头盔相适应，而你对它的适应也会结束。

entries.name: Cost of a Spelljamming Helm
entries: 咒语干扰头盔可以推动和引导船只，就像风帆、船桨和船舵在海船上的作用一样，如果有合适的咒语，咒语干扰头盔很容易制作。{@spell Create spelljamming helm|AAG}的材料成分成本为5000金币，所以这是为获得一个咒语干扰头盔所能付出的最低成本。
荒野空间的商人，包括{@creature dohwar|BAM|dohwars}和{@creature mercane|BAM|mercanes}（都在{@book Boo's Astral Menagerie|BAM}中描述过），通常会以大大超过制作成本的价格出售一个咒语干扰头盔。多少钱取决于市场，但7500金币是一个合理的要求。在卖方市场上，一个绝望的买家可能会支付10,000金币或更多。

item.name: Spellpiercing Wand
entries: You can use this wand as a spellcasting focus. Creatures making a saving throw against a spell cast using this wand can't gain benefit from advantage on their saving throws.

item.name: Spellshard
entries: 这种抛光的Eberron龙形碎片适合拿在手里，储存的信息类似于一本书。碎片可以容纳相当于一本书的内容，长度不超过320页。碎片可以是空白的，也可以是已经装满信息的。当碎片被创建时，创建者可以设置一个密码，必须说出这个密码才能访问里面存储的信息。

在持有碎片的时候，你可以使用一个动作来向碎片打开你的心智，在你的脑海中看到它的内容。在随后的回合中，阅读文字或在碎片中的空白 "页面 "上刻画新的文字需要{@status concentration}（就像{@status concentration||concentrating}的咒语一样），并且需要的时间与你正常阅读和书写的时间相同。想到一个特定的短语或主题，你就会被吸引到碎片中涉及它的第一个部分。
巫师可以把法术碎片当作法术书来使用，只需花费通常的金币和时间就可以把法术 "写 "进碎片。

item.name: Spellwrought Tattoo (1st Level)
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo contains a single {@filter 1st level spell|spells|level=1}, wrought on your skin by a magic needle. To use the tattoo, you must hold the needle against your skin and speak the command word. The needle turns into ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin in whatever design you like. Once the tattoo is there, you can cast its spell, requiring no material components. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and for the spell's duration. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
该法术的能力修饰是+3；拯救DC是13，攻击奖励是+5。

item.name: Sphere of Annihilation
entries: 这个直径2英尺的黑球是多元宇宙中的一个洞，在空间中盘旋，被周围的魔法场稳定。
球体抹去了它所经过的所有物质和所有经过它的物质。神器是个例外。除非神器容易受到湮灭之球的伤害，否则它将毫发无损地通过球体。其他任何接触到球体但没有被它完全吞噬和湮灭的东西都会受到{@damage 4d10}力的伤害。

The sphere is stationary until someone controls it. If you are within 60 feet of an uncontrolled sphere, you can use an action to make a DC 25 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check. On a success, the sphere levitates in one direction of your choice, up to a number of feet equal to 5 × your Intelligence modifier (minimum 5 feet). On a failure, the sphere moves 10 feet toward you. A creature whose space the sphere enters must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be touched by it, taking {@damage 4d10} force damage.

If you attempt to control a sphere that is under another creature's control, you make an Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check contested by the other creature's Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check. The winner of the contest gains control of the sphere and can levitate it as normal.

If the sphere comes into contact with a planar portal, such as that created by the {@spell gate} spell, or an extradimensional space, such as that within a {@item portable hole}, the DM determines randomly what happens, using the following table.

rows: 球体被摧毁。
球体通过门户或进入次元空间移动。
一个空间裂缝将球体周围180英尺内的每个生物和物体，包括球体，送到一个随机的存在平面。

item.name: Spider Staff
entries: 这根黑色的金刚杖的顶部形状像一只蜘蛛。该法杖重达6磅。你必须与法杖相适应才能获得它的好处并施展它的法术。这根法杖可以作为四分法杖来挥舞。当用来进行武器攻击时，它能造成{@dice 1d6}的额外毒药伤害。
法杖有10个电荷，用来为其中的法术提供能量。当法杖在手时，你可以用你的行动从法杖中施放以下一个法术，如果该法术在你的等级的法术列表中。{@spell spider climb}(1次充电)或{@spell web}(2次充电，法术保全DC 15)。不需要任何组件。
每天黄昏时，法杖会重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了法杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，法杖就会碎裂成灰尘并被摧毁。

item.name: Spider Staff
item.reqAttune: by a bard, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: The top of this magic quarterstaff is shaped like a spider. It deals an extra {@damage 1d6} poison damage on a hit when used to make a weapon attack.

entries.name: Spells
entries: The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can expend the requisite number of charges to cast one of the following spells from the staff: {@spell spider climb} (1 charge) or {@spell web} (2 charges; spell save DC 15).
The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dusk. If you expend the staff's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff crumbles to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: Spies' Murmur
entries: This headpiece, crafted from dark metal, is worn curved around the ear. If you know a creature wearing another Spies' Murmur and that creature is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate telepathically with each other. As a bonus action, you can allow that creature to hear everything you hear for 1 hour. You can end this effect as a bonus action, and it ends if you're {@condition incapacitated}.

item.name: Spindle of Fate
entries: This wand is shaped like a drop spindle wrapped in red thread. The wand has 6 charges that can be used for the following properties:

items.name: Battle Foreknowledge
entries: When you roll initiative, you can expend 1 charge to add or subtract your proficiency bonus from the total roll.

items.name: Doom Foretold
entries: As an action, you can expend 2 charges to target a creature within 30 feet of yourself and invoke that creature's doom. While the target is on the same plane of existence as you, you can sense the direction to its location, and you know the direction of its movement if it's in motion. Additionally, once per turn when you deal damage to the doomed creature, you can roll {@dice 1d6} and add the number rolled to the damage roll. These benefits persist for 1 hour or until you target another creature with this effect.

items.name: Twist of Fate
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of you makes a saving throw or an attack roll, you can use your reaction to expend 3 charges and alter the outcome, turning a failed saving throw into a successful one, a missed attack roll into a hit, or vice versa.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Spinel
entries: 一种透明的红色、红褐色或深绿色的宝石。

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Spire of Conflux reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The staff has 12 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d6 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn.
You can also spend charges to cast the following spells from the staff: {@spell conjure elemental} (5 charges) or {@spell ice storm} (4 charges).
When you cast a spell that deals bludgeoning, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage and you roll a 1 on a damage die, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

item.name: Spire of Conflux (Dormant)
entries: A powerful relic passed down from generation to generation of Ashari leaders, the Spire of Conflux was lost over three centuries ago when Joran the Sea-Speaker, a respected leader of {@book the Water Ashari|TDCSR|2|The Ashari}, was devoured by a demon of the Abyss. It was rediscovered by the legendary druid {@creature Keyleth, Voice of the Tempest|TDCSR|Keyleth of Zephrah, Voice of the Tempest}. However, rumors swirl that she is seeking another hero to wield it—one who can travel the land and do good in small ways as she once did.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While the Spire of Conflux is in a dormant state, the staff has 8 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. While holding the staff, you can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell burning hands} (1 charge) or {@spell fireball} (3 charges).
Additionally, while holding this staff, you have a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and your spell save DC increases by 1.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Spire of Conflux reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The staff has 20 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.
You can also spend charges to cast the following spells from the staff: {@spell chain lightning} (6 charges) or {@spell fire storm} (7 charges)
The bonus to spell attack rolls and your spell save DC increases to +2.

item.name: Spyglass
entries: 通过望远镜观察的物体会被放大到两倍大小。

item.name: Spyglass of Clairvoyance
entries: At rank 2, your Head Office-supplied spyglass becomes a common magic item. As an action, you can look through the spyglass of clairvoyance at a location within 1 mile of you that is obstructing your view, such as a mountain, castle, or forest. You must then succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom check using {@item cartographer's tools|phb} to map the natural terrain found within three miles of that chosen point. You do not gain any knowledge of creatures, structures, or anything other than natural terrain. This property of the spyglass cannot be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Spymaster's Signet
entries: While wearing this ring, you can cast {@spell disguise self} at-will. In addition, you can turn invisible as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible with you. You remain invisible for one minute, or until you use a bonus action to become visible again. Once you use this power, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Crown Authority
entries: A character cannot attune to more than one Seal of Drakkenheim. Guardian constructs in Drakkenheim such as {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk|wall gargoyles} and {@creature tower dragon|DoDk|tower dragons} do not attack you while you are attuned to one of the Seals of Drakkenheim. An individual guardian ignores this effect for 24 hours if you attack it or cast a spell upon it.

As an action, you may present a Seal of Drakkenheim to rebuke the guardians. You make an opposed Charisma ability check against each {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk} or {@creature tower dragon|DoDk} that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you. If you win the contest, the creature is rebuked for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A rebuked creature doesn't move, and can't take actions or reactions. A creature who wins the contest is immune to your rebuke for 24 hours.

item.name: Squid Ship
entries: 在最古老的法术干扰船类型中，乌贼船受到私掠者的欢迎，经常被用作巡逻船。乌贼船的标准武器包括一个前部安装的芒果，两个后部安装的弹弓，以及一个用于冲撞的加固的船头。从船头延伸出来的触手几乎占到了船只龙骨长度的一半。
乌贼船可以在水上漂浮和航行，也可以在地面上降落。

item.name: Staff of Adornment
entries: 如果你在持有法杖时将一个重量不超过1磅的物体（如水晶碎片、鸡蛋或石头）放在法杖顶端上方，该物体会漂浮在离法杖顶端一英寸的地方，并保持在那里，直到它被移除或法杖不再在你手中。法杖在任何时候都可以有最多三个这样的物体漂浮在其顶端。在握住法杖时，你可以让一个或多个物体慢慢旋转或原地转圈。

item.name: Staff of Birdcalls
entries: 这根木杖上有鸟类雕刻的装饰。它有10个电荷。拿着它的时候，你可以用一个动作从法杖上消耗1个电荷，使它在60英尺范围内产生以下声音之一：雀鸟的鸣叫，乌鸦的鸣叫，鸭子的嘎嘎声，鸡的咯咯声，鹅的鸣叫，泥鳅的叫声，火鸡的咯咯声，海鸥的叫声，猫头鹰的叫声，或者鹰的尖叫声。

The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff explodes in a harmless cloud of bird feathers and is lost forever.

item.name: Staff of Charming
item.reqAttune: by a bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: While holding this staff, you can use an action to expend 1 of its 10 charges to cast {@spell charm person}, {@spell command}, or {@spell comprehend languages} from it using your spell save DC. The staff can also be used as a magic quarterstaff.
如果你拿着法杖，对一个只针对你的施法失败，你可以把失败的拯救变成成功的拯救。在下一个黎明之前，你不能再使用法杖的这个属性。如果你对一个只针对你的魔法咒语的救赎成功，无论是否有法杖的干预，你都可以用你的反应从法杖上消耗一个电荷，并将该咒语转回给它的施法者，就像你施法一样。
The staff regains {@dice 1d8 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

item.name: Staff of Contaminated Power
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.

The staff has 20 charges for the following properties. The staff regains 1 charge each hour it rests in the Deep Haze. You can also touch a delerium crystal to the staff, which causes it to regain {@dice 2d8 + 4} charges, then the crystal crumbles to dust. If you expend the last charge, you immediately gain {@dice 1d6} {@adventure levels of contamination|DoDk|12}.

entries.name: Spells
entries: While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability: {@spell delerium orb|DoDk} (1 charge), {@spell warp bolt|DoDk} (2 charges), {@spell ride the rifts|DoDk} (3 charges), {@spell delerium blast|DoDk} (4 charges), {@spell conjure the deep haze|DoDk} (5 charges), and {@spell ray of contamination|DoDk} (6 charges). You don't gain any {@adventure contamination levels|DoDk|12} when you cast these spells using charges from this staff.

item.name: Staff of Defense
entries: 这根细长的空心杖是由玻璃制成的，但却像橡木一样坚固。它重达3磅。你必须与法杖相适应，才能获得它的好处并施展它的法术。
持有法杖时，你的护甲等级有+1的加成。
法杖有10个电荷，用来为其中的法术提供能量。当法杖在手时，你可以用你的行动从法杖中施放以下一个法术，如果该法术在你的等级的法术列表中。{@spell mage armor}（1次充电）或{@spell shield}（2次充电）。不需要任何组件。
每天黎明时分，法杖会重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的能量。如果你消耗了法杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。如果是1，法杖就会碎裂并被摧毁。

item.name: Staff of Defense
item.reqAttune: by a bard, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: This slender, hollow staff is made of glass yet is as strong as oak. It weighs 3 pounds. While holding the staff, you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Spells
entries: The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can expend the requisite number of charges to cast one of the following spells from the staff: {@spell mage armor} (1 charge) or {@spell shield} (2 charges).
The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the staff's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff shatters and is destroyed.

item.name: Staff of Dunamancy
entries: This staff of polished gray wood bears numerous runes carved along its length. The staff has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff turns into dust and is destroyed.
在持有法杖时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的2个或更多的电荷，用它来施展以下的法术，使用你的法术保全DC和法术攻击加成：{@spell fortune's favor|egw}（2个电荷），{@spell pulse wave|egw}（3个电荷），或{@spell gravity sinkhole|egw} （4个电荷）。

entries.name: New Possibility
entries: 如果你拿着法杖，对一个只针对你的法术的救赎失败，你可以把你失败的救赎变成成功的。这个属性直到下一个黎明才可以再次使用。

item.name: Staff of Fate
entries: 这根透明的水晶杖可以作为魔法四角杖来挥舞，对使用它的攻击和伤害回合给予+3的奖励。

entries.name: Altered Outcome
entries: The staff has 6 charges. As a bonus action, you can expend 1 of the staff's charges to give yourself or one other creature that you can see a {@dice d4}. The recipient can roll this {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, damage roll, or saving throw it makes before the start of your next turn. If this extra die is not used before then, it is lost.
如果你消耗了法杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。在掷出9或更低的分数时，法杖会变成一个非魔法的四分法杖，在它第一次击中并造成伤害时就会断裂。在掷出10或更高的分数时，法杖重新获得{@dice 1d6}已消耗的能量。

item.name: Staff of Fire
item.reqAttune: by a druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 当你持有此法杖时，你对火灾伤害有抵抗力。
该法杖有10个电荷。当你拿着它时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个或多个电荷，用它来施放以下一个法术，使用你的法术保全DC。{@spell burning hands} (1次充电), {@spell fireball} (3次充电), 或 {@spell wall of fire} (4次充电)。
法杖每天在黎明时分恢复{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果你耗尽了最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1时，法杖变黑，碎成焦炭，并被摧毁。

item.name: Staff of Flowers
entries: 这根木杖有10个电荷。拿着它的时候，你可以用一个动作从法杖上消耗一个电荷，使一朵花从你周围5英尺内的土块或土壤中发芽，或者从法杖本身发芽。除非你选择了一种特定的花，否则法杖会创造出一朵带有淡淡香味的雏菊。这种花是无害的、非魔法的，它像普通的花一样生长或凋谢。法杖每天在黎明时分恢复{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电量。如果你消耗了最后的电荷，掷出{@dice d20}。如果是1，法杖就会变成花瓣并永远消失。

item.name: Staff of Frost
item.reqAttune: by a druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 当你持有此法杖时，你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。
该法杖有10个电荷。当你拿着它时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个或多个电荷，用它来施展以下的法术，使用你的法术保存DC。{@spell cone of cold} (5个电荷), {@spell fog cloud} (1个电荷), {@spell ice storm} (4个电荷), 或 {@spell wall of ice} (4个电荷)。
法杖每天在黎明时分恢复{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果你耗尽了最后的电荷，请掷出{@dice d20}。1时，法杖会变成水并被摧毁。

item.name: Staff of Healing
item.reqAttune: by a bard, cleric, or druid
entries: 这根法杖有10个电荷。在持有它的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个或多个电荷，用它来施放以下一个法术，使用你的法术保全DC和法术能力修改器。{@spell cure wounds}(每个法术等级1次充电，最高4级)，{@spell lesser restoration}(2次充电)或{@spell mass cure wounds}(5次充电)。
法杖每天在黎明时分恢复{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了最后的电荷，掷出{@dice d20}。如果是1，法杖就会在一束光中消失，永远消失。

item.name: Staff of Power
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 这根法杖可以作为魔法四角杖来挥舞，对使用它的攻击和伤害卷给予+2的奖励。拿着它的时候，你的护甲等级、蓄力和法术攻击卷获得+2的奖励。

The staff has 20 charges for the following properties. The staff regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff retains its +2 bonus to attack and damage roll but loses all other properties. On a 20, the staff regain {@dice 1d8 + 2} charges.

entries.name: Power Strike
entries: When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage to the target.

entries.name: Spells
entries: While holding this staff, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spell attack bonus: {@spell cone of cold} (5 charges), {@spell fireball} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell globe of invulnerability} (6 charges), {@spell hold monster} (5 charges), {@spell levitate} (2 charges), {@spell lightning bolt} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell magic missile} (1 charge), {@spell ray of enfeeblement} (1 charge), or {@spell wall of force} (5 charges).

entries.name: Retributive Strike
entries: 你可以用一个动作将法杖从你的膝盖上折断，或者对着一个坚固的表面，进行一次报应式打击。法杖被摧毁，并在爆炸中释放其剩余的魔力，爆炸范围扩大到以它为中心的30英尺半径的球体。
你有{@chance 50}的机会瞬间穿越到一个随机的存在平面，避开爆炸。如果你没能避开，你会受到相当于16×法杖中炸药数量的力量伤害。该区域内的所有其他生物都必须做一个DC17的灵巧救赎。如果救赎失败，生物会根据它离起源点的距离受到一定量的伤害，如下表所示。拯救成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害。

rows: 10英尺远或更近
8 × 工作人员中的指控数量
11至20英尺远
6 × 工作人员中的指控数量
21至30英尺远
4 × 工作人员中的指控数量

item.name: Staff of Striking
entries: 这根法杖可以作为魔法四角杖来挥舞，对使用它的攻击和伤害卷轴给予+3的奖励。

The staff has 10 charges. When you hit with a melee attack using it, you can expend up to 3 of its charges. For each charge you expend, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage. The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

item.name: Staff of Swarming Insects
item.reqAttune: by a bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 这根法杖有10个电荷，每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1时，一个{@creature swarm of insects}消耗并摧毁法杖，然后消散。

entries.name: Spells
entries: 在持有法杖的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的部分能量，用它来施展以下的法术，使用你的法术保全DC。{@spell giant insect} (4次充电) 或 {@spell insect plague} (5次充电)。

entries.name: Insect Cloud
entries: 在持有法杖时，你可以使用一个动作并消耗1个电荷，使一群无害的飞虫在你周围30英尺的范围内散开。这些昆虫会停留10分钟，使该区域对除你以外的生物产生严重的遮蔽。虫群随你移动，以你为中心保持。每小时至少10英里的风会驱散虫群并结束该效果。

item.name: Staff of the Adder
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or warlock
entries: 你可以使用一个额外的行动来说出这个法杖的命令词，并使法杖的头部变成一条有生命的毒蛇，持续1分钟。通过使用另一个额外行动再次说出命令语，你可以使法杖恢复到正常的无生命形态。
你可以使用蛇头进行一次近战攻击，蛇头的攻击范围为5英尺。你的熟练度加成适用于攻击卷。一旦命中，目标会受到{@damage 1d6}的穿刺伤害，并且必须在DC15宪法规定的投掷中成功，否则会受到{@damage 3d6}的毒药伤害。
蛇头是可以被攻击的，而它是有生命的。它的护甲等级为15，命中率为20。如果蛇头的命中率下降到0，法杖就会被摧毁。只要它没有被摧毁，当它恢复到无生命状态时，法杖就会恢复所有损失的命中率。

item.name: Staff of the Forgotten One
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 这根弯曲的法杖是用骨头雕刻的，上面有一个被遗忘的{@creature archmage}人的头骨，{@creature Acererak|ToA}人在很久以前就被摧毁了。在头骨的额头上刻有{@creature acererak|ToA|Acererak's}的符文，这在许多世界上都被称为死亡的标志。

entries.name: Beneficial Properties
entries: 当法杖在你身上时，你获得以下好处。

items: 你对智力({@skill Arcana})和智慧({@skill History})检查的熟练度加成加倍。
你不能成为{@condition blinded}、{@condition charmed}、{@condition deafened}、{@condition frightened}、{@condition petrified}、或{@condition stunned}。
挑战等级为2或更低的亡灵既不会威胁也不会攻击你，除非你伤害它们。
你可以将法杖作为一个+3的四分法杖来挥舞，在击中时造成额外的10({@damage 3d6})坏死伤害。

entries.name: Invoke Curse
entries: The Staff of the Forgotten One has 7 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn. While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend 1 charge and target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (using your spell save DC) or be cursed. While cursed in this way, the target can't regain hit points and has vulnerability to necrotic damage. A {@spell greater restoration}, {@spell remove curse}, or similar spell ends the curse on the target.

entries.name: The Forgotten One
entries: The bodiless life force of a dead {@creature archmage} empowers the staff and is imprisoned within it. The rune carved into the staff's skull protects {@creature Acererak|ToA} from this spirit's vengeance. Each time a creature other than {@creature Acererak|ToA} expends any of the staff's charges, there is a {@chance 50} chance that the life force tries to possess the staff wielder. The wielder must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or be possessed, becoming an NPC under the DM's control. If the intruding life force is targeted by magic such as a {@spell dispel evil and good} spell, it becomes trapped in the staff once more. Once it takes control of another creature, the insane spirit of the dead {@creature archmage} attempts to destroy the staff.

entries.name: Destroying the Staff
entries: 拥有法杖的生物可以用一个动作将它折断在一个膝盖或一个坚固的表面上。法杖被毁，并在爆炸中释放其剩余的魔力，爆炸范围扩大到以它为中心的30英尺半径的球体。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个DC18的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到132({@damage 24d10})的力量伤害，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。当法杖被摧毁时，被遗忘者的生命力被释放到来世。它去了哪里谁也不知道。

item.name: Staff of the Ivory Claw
entries: This gray-and-cerulean staff is topped with a small dragon claw carved from ivory. While holding the staff, you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. Whenever you score a critical hit with a spell attack, the target takes an extra {@damage 3d6} radiant damage.

item.name: Staff of the Magi
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 这根法杖可以作为魔法四角杖来挥舞，对使用它的攻击和伤害卷给予+2的奖励。当你持有它的时候，你获得一个+2的法术攻击卷的奖励。
该工作人员有50个电荷，用于以下属性。它每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 4d6 + 2}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了最后的电荷，掷出{@dice d20}。在20分时，法杖会重新获得{@dice 1d12 + 1}电荷。

entries.name: Spell Absorption
entries: 在持有法杖时，你对法术的蓄力攻击有优势。此外，当其他生物施展只针对你的法术时，你可以使用你的反应。如果你这样做了，法杖就会吸收该法术的魔力，取消其效果并获得与被吸收的法术等级相等的费用。然而，如果这样做使法杖的电荷总数超过50，法杖就会爆炸，就像你激活了它的报应打击一样（见下文）。

entries.name: Spells
entries: 当你持有法杖时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的部分费用，用它来施展以下的法术，使用你的法术保全DC和法术能力。{@spell conjure elemental}(7费), {@spell dispel magic}(3费), {@spell fireball}(7级版本，7费), {@spell flaming sphere}(2费), {@spell ice storm}(4费), {@spell invisibility}(2费), {@spell knock}（2费）。{@spell lightning bolt}(7级版本，7次收费)，{@spell passwall}(5次收费)，{@spell plane shift}(7次收费)，{@spell telekinesis}(5次收费)，{@spell wall of fire}(4次收费)，或{@spell web}(2次收费)。
你也可以用一个动作从法杖中施放以下法术，而不使用任何费用。{@spell arcane lock}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell enlarge/reduce}, {@spell light}, {@spell mage hand}, 或 {@spell protection from evil and good}。

entries.name: Retributive Strike
entries: 你可以用一个动作将法杖从你的膝盖上折断，或者对着一个坚固的表面，进行一次报应式打击。法杖被摧毁，并在爆炸中释放其剩余的魔力，爆炸范围扩大到以它为中心的30英尺半径的球体。
你有{@chance 50}的机会瞬间穿越到一个随机的存在平面，避开爆炸。如果你没能避开，你会受到相当于16×法杖中炸药数量的力量伤害。该区域内的所有其他生物都必须做一个DC17的灵巧救赎。如果救赎失败，生物会根据它离起源点的距离受到一定量的伤害，如下表所示。拯救成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害。

rows: 10英尺远或更近
8 × 工作人员中的指控数量
11至20英尺远
6 × 工作人员中的指控数量
21至30英尺远
4 × 工作人员中的指控数量

item.name: Staff of the Python
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or warlock
entries: You can use an action to speak this staff's command word and throw the staff on the ground within 10 feet of you. The staff becomes a {@creature giant constrictor snake} under your control and acts on its own initiative count. By using a bonus action to speak the command word again, you return the staff to its normal form in a space formerly occupied by the snake.

On your turn, you can mentally command the snake if it is within 60 feet of you and you aren't {@condition incapacitated}. You decide what action the snake takes and where it moves during its next turn, or you can issue it a general command, such as to attack your enemies or guard a location.
如果蛇的命中率降至0，它就会死亡并恢复到它的法杖形态。然后法杖碎裂并被摧毁。如果蛇在失去所有命中率之前恢复到法杖形态，它将恢复所有的命中率。

item.name: Staff of the Rooted Hills
entries: The hill rune is carved into this gnarled wooden staff. The staff magically resizes to match the height of any creature that attunes to it.

The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. The first time you hit any creature with the staff on your turn, the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be restrained by spectral vines until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: As an action, you can invoke the staff's rune to cast either {@spell hold person} (save DC 12) or {@spell speak with plants} with the staff. When you cast {@spell hold person} using the staff, the target is wreathed in spectral vines.
Once the rune has been invoked to cast either spell, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Staff of the Woodlands
entries: 这根法杖可以作为魔法四角杖来挥舞，对使用它的攻击和伤害卷给予+2的奖励。拿着它的时候，你的法术攻击卷有+2的加成。

The staff has 10 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff loses its properties and becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

entries.name: Spells
entries: 你可以使用一个动作来消耗法杖的1个或更多的能量，用它来施展以下的法术，使用你的法术保全DC。{@spell animal friendship} (1次充电), {@spell awaken} (5次充电), {@spell barkskin} (2次充电), {@spell locate animals or plants} (2次充电), {@spell speak with animals} (1次充电), {@spell speak with plants} (3次充电), 或 {@spell wall of thorns} (6次充电) 。
你也可以用一个动作从法杖上施放{@spell pass without trace}的法术，而不使用任何收费。

entries.name: Tree Form
entries: 你可以用一个动作将法杖的一端种在肥沃的土地上，并消耗1个电荷，将法杖变成一棵健康的树。这棵树有60英尺高，有一个直径5英尺的树干，其顶端的树枝在20英尺的范围内展开。这棵树看起来很普通，但如果以{@spell detect magic}为目标，会放射出淡淡的转化魔法光环。在触摸这棵树并使用另一个动作说出它的命令词时，你会使法杖恢复到正常形态。当它恢复成法杖时，树上的任何生物都会倒下。

item.name: Staff of Thunder and Lightning
entries: 这根法杖可以作为魔法四角杖来挥舞，对使用它的攻击和伤害卷给予+2的奖励。它还具有以下附加属性。当这些属性之一被使用时，在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

entries.name: Lightning
entries: 当你用法杖进行近身攻击时，你可以使目标受到额外的{@damage 2d6}雷电伤害。

entries.name: Thunder
entries: When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can cause the staff to emit a crack of thunder, audible out to 300 feet. The target you hit must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Lightning Strike
entries: 你可以使用一个动作，使一道闪电从法杖的顶端跃出，形成一条宽5英尺、长120英尺的线。这条线上的每个生物都必须做一个DC17的灵巧救赎，如果救赎失败会受到{@damage 9d6}的闪电伤害，如果救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。

entries.name: Thunderclap
entries: 你可以用一个动作使法杖发出震耳欲聋的雷鸣声，在600英尺以外都能听到。在你周围60英尺范围内的每个生物（不包括你）必须做一个DC17的宪法救赎动作。拯救失败时，生物会受到{@damage 2d6}的雷霆伤害，并在1分钟内变成{@condition deafened}。拯救成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会变成{@condition deafened}。

entries.name: Thunder and Lightning
entries: 你可以用一个动作同时使用 "雷击 "和 "霹雳 "属性。这样做并不消耗那些属性的日常使用，只消耗这个属性的使用。

item.name: Staff of Withering
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or warlock
entries: This staff has 3 charges and regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff. On a hit, it deals damage as a normal quarterstaff, and you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@damage 2d10} necrotic damage to the target. In addition, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage for 1 hour on any ability check or saving throw that uses Strength or Constitution.

item.name: Star Card
entries: As a bonus action, you can speak a command word while holding this card aloft to gain advantage on all saving throws you make for the next 10 minutes. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Star Moth
entries: 星蛾是由星界精灵建造和驾驶的飞船，他们不喜欢这些飞船最终落入他人手中。
星蛾的船体是由生长和雕刻的有机物质制成的，其巨大的、装饰性的翅膀是由闪闪发光的水晶制成。这艘船是为太空旅行而建造的，但它的设计确实使它能够漂浮在水面上或安全地降落在地面上。标准的武器装备包括两台依偎在星蛾眼孔中的弹炮和安装在舰桥上方的芒格。

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When Star Razor reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+2。
When a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to create a burst of radiance from the sword, dealing {@damage 1d8} radiant damage to the attacker.
You can cast the {@spell see invisibility} spell from the sword as an action, and the save DC for spells cast using the sword increases to 15.

item.name: Star Razor (Dormant)
entries: The thick, grooved blade of this shining silver {@item longsword|PHB} is lined with etched runes that sparkle blue in the light. Star Razor—known also as Dwueth'var—was thought to have been destroyed or lost after the {@book Calamity|TDCSR|1|The Calamity}, but new rumors suggest that it might be wielded by a half-orc somewhere in {@book Wildemount|TDCSR|3|Wildemount}.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While Star Razor is in a dormant state, you can hold this magic longsword and use a bonus action to speak the command word {@i Galas-var}, causing the sword to emit a pale blue glow that sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. This glow lasts until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again, or until you drop or sheathe the sword.

items: While this longsword is glowing, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with the weapon, and you have resistance to radiant damage.

You can cast the {@spell faerie fire} spell from the weapon as an action, requiring no components (save {@dc 13}). Once a spell has been cast using Star Razor, that spell can't be cast from the sword until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When Star Razor reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+3。

The burst of radiance you can create as a reaction when hit with a melee attack deals {@damage 1d12} radiant damage, and you can immediately teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 15 feet of you as part of the same reaction.
You can cast the {@spell fly} spell from the sword as an action, and the save DC for spells cast using the sword increases to 17.

item.name: Star rose quartz
entries: 一个半透明的玫瑰色宝石，中间是白色的星形宝石。

item.name: Star Ruby
entries: 一颗半透明的红宝石与白色星形中心宝石。

item.name: Star Sapphire
entries: 一颗半透明的蓝色蓝宝石与白色星形中心宝石。

item.name: Statuette of Augury
entries: This gold statuette of an elf is worth 100 gp, and is imbued with divination magic. A non-evil creature grasping the statue can ask it a question and receive a telepathic response, as though the creature had cast {@spell augury}. Once a creature has asked its question and received a response, it can never activate the statuette again.

item.name: Statuette of Saint Markovia
entries: 这个金色的雕像能让任何携带它的善良的生物获得+1的救赎奖励。

item.name: Steel
entries: 你在使用该魔法武器进行攻击和伤害时有+2的奖励。

entries.name: Revivify
entries: 你可以用一个动作从剑上施放{@spell revivify}的法术。你必须用剑接触目标才能施法。一旦武器的这一属性被使用，直到下一个黎明前都不能再使用。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: 钢铁是一把有生命的合法长剑，智力为8，智慧为11，魅力为15。它可以看到和听到60英尺的范围。这把剑能说、能读、能理解普通话和德拉科尼亚语。当你与它调和的时候，它担心你的健康，而且它不喜欢在战斗中退缩。

item.name: Steward's Seal
entries: While wearing this badge, you can cast {@spell mage hand}, {@spell prestidigitation}, {@spell purify food and drink}, and {@spell unseen servant} at-will.

You can use an action to cast one of the following spells: {@spell animate objects}, {@spell create food and water}, {@spell dispel magic}, or {@spell telekinesis}. Once the badge has been used to cast one of these spells, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. You can choose your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score as the spellcasting ability for casting these spells, and use your proficiency bonus to determine their attack bonus and saving throw DC.

entries.name: Crown Authority
entries: A character cannot attune to more than one Seal of Drakkenheim. Guardian constructs in Drakkenheim such as {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk|wall gargoyles} and {@creature tower dragon|DoDk|tower dragons} do not attack you while you are attuned to one of the Seals of Drakkenheim. An individual guardian ignores this effect for 24 hours if you attack it or cast a spell upon it.

As an action, you may present a Seal of Drakkenheim to rebuke the guardians. You make an opposed Charisma ability check against each {@creature wall gargoyle|DoDk} or {@creature tower dragon|DoDk} that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you. If you win the contest, the creature is rebuked for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A rebuked creature doesn't move, and can't take actions or reactions. A creature who wins the contest is immune to your rebuke for 24 hours.

item.name: Stink Bomb
entries: This smelly explosive can be primed and thrown up to 30 feet as an action. It explodes at the start of your next turn. Creatures within 20 feet of it must make a {@dc 12} Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Stirring Dragon Vessel
entries: 这个容器可以是一个药水瓶、饮水喇叭或其他用于盛放液体的容器。

As a bonus action, if the vessel is empty, you can speak the command word to fill the vessel with one of the following (your choice): ale, olive oil, mead, a {@item potion of healing}, a {@item potion of greater healing}, a {@item potion of climbing}, or a {@item potion of fire breath}. Once this property is used, it can't be used until the next dawn. A potion you create in this way loses its magical properties if it isn't imbibed within 24 hours.

item.name: Stirring Dragon-Touched Focus
entries: 这个神奇的物品可以是权杖、球体、护身符、水晶或其他精巧的物品。它通常包含了龙的翅膀、爪子、牙齿或鳞片的图像。
你在主动性卷轴上有优势。当你持有这个焦点时，它可以作为你所有法术的施法焦点。
焦点会获得一个额外的属性，由其囤积的龙的家族决定，它成为搅动的对象。

items.name: Chromatic
entries: Whenever you use a spell slot to cast a spell that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage, roll a {@dice d6}, and you gain a bonus equal to the number rolled to one of the spell's damage rolls.

items.name: Gem
entries: 每当你使用一个法术槽施法时，你可以立即传送到你周围15英尺内你能看到的一个无人的空间。

items.name: Metallic
entries: 当你能看到的30英尺范围内的生物做出拯救动作时，你可以使用你的反应来使该生物在拯救动作上获得优势。

item.name: Stirring Scaled Ornament
entries: 这种装饰品可以是珠宝、斗篷或其他可佩戴的配件。它似乎是由龙的鳞片、牙齿或爪子制成的，或者它包含了这些形状的图像。

You gain a +1 bonus to AC, and you can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. Moreover, each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} or to end those conditions on itself.

item.name: Stone of Controlling Earth Elementals
entries: If the stone is touching the ground, you can use an action to speak its command word and summon an {@creature earth elemental}, as if you had cast the {@spell conjure elemental} spell. The stone can't be used this way again until the next dawn. The stone weighs 5 pounds.

item.name: Stone of Creation
entries: 罕见的关于创造之石的传说和传说声称它像一颗流星一样从遥远的外层世界或远层世界的某个边缘坠落到物质界。不同世界的类似传说，都描述了从魔法中长出建筑和岛屿的石头，就像从种子中长出房子一样，表明创世之石并不是一件独特的神器，或者说它的所有碎片都来自于一个单一的石头来源，甚至比圣人想象的还要大。
这种原始的黑色石头看起来像板岩一样片状，但却像花岗岩一样坚硬，并带有黄金和铂金的纹路。原始的、完整的创世之石采取了像立石一样的块状板块形式，但可能无法知道创世之石的真正大小，或者 "完整 "的创世之石的概念是否适用于该工艺品。也许由创世神石制成的其他板块和巨石已经散落在多元宇宙中，通过星际运动和神器本身的魔力被切割和重新组合。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: 创造之石具有以下随机属性。

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial}属性
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} 财产

entries.name: Stone Smithing
entries: While attuned to the Stone of Creation, you are proficient with {@item mason's tools|PHB} and can use them to cut pieces from the Stone's slab, thereby creating lesser artifacts.

entries.name: Cut into Pieces
entries: 创造之石是小型工艺品的来源，这些工艺品的力量来自于它。这些碎片允许你为自己或他人塑造和赋予石板的部分力量。
You can cut pieces in two general sizes: a {@item chip of creation|AitFR-AVT} or a {@item keystone of creation|AitFR-AVT}. These lesser artifacts require their own attunement.
在现有的石板上最多可以创造出11个创造的碎片，再加上最多九个关键石块。一个芯片类似于一片岩石，大约有成人的手掌大小。一块基石至少是这个厚度的五倍。
当所有的碎片和基石都被切掉后，石头的一部分仍然存在，但证明不受其他试图切割或凿开它的尝试的影响。这块最小的石头与一个小生物的大小相同。

entries.name: Raze or Reshape Creations
entries: 虽然创造之石不能自己创造结构或半平面，但当你与它相合时，你可以修改或翻新任何由钥石或芯片创造的结构或半平面，只要你在创造之石的1英里范围内，并且你能看到或以其他方式感知到该结构或半平面。例如，你可以增加门，封住窗户，改变房间的布置，甚至是消除由钥石创造的结构。要做到这一点，你必须集中精力1分钟，就像施法一样，同时在脑海中想象你想做的改变；在这1分钟里，改变会慢慢发生。这些变化不能造成伤害或直接伤害生物。被驱散的结构会逐渐后退并减弱为零，让生物不受伤害。

entries.name: Destroying the Stone
entries: 创造之石是一件奇怪的神器，它可以被分割成更小的神器，然而这块石头对大多数伤害都是不透的。只有与创造之石相适应的铁匠才能雕刻它。摧毁石头上较小的、衍生的神器（以及它们的创造物）对石头本身没有任何损害。
如果创造之石到达混沌元素，或者被与混沌元素相适应的分叉金属棒击中（根据{@spell plane shift}法术），它就会被摧毁。然后石头会破碎成无害的、惰性的岩石碎片。创造之石被摧毁后，由石板的碎片和基石创造的地方会崩溃、腐烂或消逝，化为乌有。创造之石本身是否是一个更大的神器的碎片仍然是个未知数。

item.name: Stone of Golorr
entries: Golorr之石是一块有光泽的青灰色石头，可以放在你的手掌上。这块石头实际上是一个名为Golorr的{@creature aboleth}，通过魔法变成了一个物体。

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: Golorr之石有以下属性，通过在《地下城管理员指南》第7章 "神器 "部分的表格中滚动来确定。

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}

entries.name: Legend Lore
entries: The Stone of Golorr has 3 charges and regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. While holding the stone, you can expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell legend lore} spell.

By using the stone to cast {@spell legend lore}, you communicate directly with the {@creature aboleth}, and it shares its knowledge with you. The aboleth can't lie to you, but the information it provides is often cryptic or vague.
亚伯拉罕知道纽伦堡勋爵的秘密金库在哪里。它还知道打开金库需要三把钥匙，而且有一条名为Aurinax的金龙居住在金库中，并守护着金库的宝藏。

entries.name: Failed Memory
entries: 当你对Golorr之石的修炼结束时，你必须做一个DC16的智慧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，你会失去所有关于石头在你身上的记忆以及由它传授的所有知识。对你施展的{@spell remove curse}法术有{@chance 20}的机会恢复失去的知识和记忆，而{@spell greater restoration}的法术会自动恢复。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Stone of Golorr is a sentient lawful evil magic item with an Intelligence of 18, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet. It can communicate telepathically with the creature that is attuned to it, as long as that creature understands at least one language. In addition, the {@creature aboleth} learns the greatest desires of any creature that communicates telepathically with the stone.
Golorr之石渴望获得信息，并且不喜欢在任何生物的魔掌中停留太久。每当这块石头想要一个新的主人时，它就要求尽快把它交给另一个智慧生物。如果它的要求被忽视，它就会试图控制它的主人（见《地下城主指南》第七章的 "有生命的魔法物品"）。

entries.name: Personality
entries: Golorr之石有一个既霸道又渴望知识的外来智力。它认为自己是一个不老的、不朽的神。

entries.name: Destroying the Stone
entries: 在石头形态下，{@creature aboleth}不是生物，也不会受到针对生物的效果。Golorr之石对所有的伤害都是免疫的。如果选择了反感效果，并且该咒语是针对驱除畸形物的，那么对石头施放(1%)的咒语会破坏它。当法术以这种方式施放时，石头会变成粘液并被摧毁，Aboleth Golorr会出现在石头残骸30英尺内的一个无人空间。阿波勒斯因为石头的毁灭而被激怒，它攻击所有它能看到的其他生物。

item.name: Stone of Good Luck
entries: 当这块抛光的玛瑙在你身上时，你的能力检查和救赎动作获得+1的奖励。

item.name: Stone of Ill Luck
entries: This polished agate appears to be a {@item stone of good luck} to anyone who tries to identify it, and it confers that item's property while on your person.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This item is cursed. While it is on your person, you take a -2 penalty to ability checks and saving throws. Until the curse is discovered, the DM secretly applies this penalty, assuming you are adding the item's bonus. You are unwilling to part with the stone until the curse is broken with {@spell remove curse} or similar magic.

item.name: Stonebreaker's Breastplate
entries: This breastplate is made from marbled granite, though it feels no heavier than a typical metal breastplate. Its chest is emblazoned with the stone rune.
While wearing this breastplate, you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and are immune to being knocked prone.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: As an action, you can invoke the breastplate's rune to cast the {@spell wall of stone} spell (save DC 14) with it. When you cast the spell in this way, you have advantage on saving throws made to maintain {@status concentration} on the spell.
Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

This armor consists of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather. Although it leaves the legs and arms relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered.

item.name: Stonemaker War Pick
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic war pick. It has the following special properties:

items.name: Meld into Stone
entries: You can cast the {@spell Meld into Stone} spell from this war pick. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

items.name: Petrification
entries: The war pick has {@dice 1d6 + 1} charges. If you score a critical hit against a creature that has fewer than 100 hit points, you can expend 1 charge from the war pick to have that creature make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the petrified condition for 8 hours. When the war pick has no charges remaining, it loses this property.

item.name: Stonespeaker Crystal
entries: 这块十九英寸长的石英碎片是由格雷文霍尔的石巨人图书馆管理员创造的，当它在你身上时，会使你在智力（{@skill Investigation}）检查上获得优势。
这个水晶有10个电荷。当你拿着它时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一些电荷，用它来施展以下的法术。{@spell speak with animals} (2个电荷), {@spell speak with dead} (4个电荷), 或 {@spell speak with plants} (3个电荷)。

When you cast a {@filter divination|spells|school=D} spell, you can use the crystal in place of one material component that would normally be consumed by the spell, at a cost of 1 charge per level of the spell. The crystal is not consumed when used in this way.
水晶每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了水晶的最后一次充电，请掷出{@dice d20}。如果是1，水晶就会消失，永远消失。

item.name: Stonky's ring
entries: While wearing this ring, you can cast the {@spell telekinesis} spell at will, but you can target only objects that aren't being worn or carried.
Any character who attunes to the ring gains control of Stonky's creations, though the {@creature skitterwidget|cm|skitterwidgets} ignore commands spoken more than 30 feet away from them.

item.name: Storm Boomerang
entries: This boomerang is a ranged weapon carved from {@creature griffon} bone and etched with the symbol of elemental air. When thrown, it has a range of 60/120 feet, and any creature that is proficient with the javelin is also proficient with this weapon. On a hit, the boomerang deals {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage and {@damage 3d4} thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a miss, the boomerang returns to the thrower's hand.
一旦回旋镖对目标造成雷霆伤害，该武器就会失去造成雷霆伤害的能力和眩晕目标的能力。当回旋镖在一个空气元素节点内停留至少1小时后，这些属性就会恢复。

items.name: Awakened
entries: 当佩戴风暴腰带处于觉醒状态时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 如果你的力量值还没有达到23或更高，就会变成23。
你的风暴神通的闪电攻击造成{@damage 4d6}的闪电伤害(而不是{@dice 3d6})。
当你变身为风暴神通时，你获得30英尺的飞行速度，并且可以悬停。

item.name: Stormgirdle (Dormant)
entries: 风暴腰带是一条用厚皮制成的宽腰带，上面烙有科德的标志。腰带的扣子是由龙象牙制成的。

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 在休眠状态下佩戴风暴腰带时，你对闪电伤害和雷电伤害有抵抗力，如果你的力量值还没有达到21或更高，你的力量值会变成21。此外，你可以使用一个动作成为风暴神通1分钟，在持续时间内获得以下好处。

items: 你对闪电伤害和雷电伤害有免疫力。
当你用通常造成破坏性伤害的武器攻击命中时，会改成造成雷电伤害。当你用通常造成穿刺或砍击伤害的武器攻击命中时，会改成造成闪电伤害。
作为一个额外动作，你可以选择一个你能看到的30英尺范围内的生物被雷电击中。目标必须做一个DC15的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到{@damage 3d6}的雷电伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。

entries: 一旦你使用了腰带的风暴头像属性，该属性就不能再使用，直到下一个黎明。

items.name: Exalted
entries: 当你在高尚的状态下佩戴风暴腰带时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 如果你的力量值还没有达到25或更高，就会变成25。
你的风暴神通的闪电攻击造成{@damage 5d6}的闪电伤害(而不是{@dice 3d6})。
You can cast the {@spell control weather} spell from the girdle. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Stormrider Boots
entries: These dark leather boots look to be of common make, but a subtle pattern of swirling storm clouds upon their soles suggests the potency of their enchantment. You can activate these boots as part of your movement, gaining the following benefits until the end of your turn:

items: You have a flying speed of 90 feet.
{@action Opportunity attack|PHB|Opportunity attacks} against you are made with {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|disadvantage}.

Whenever you move within 5 feet of a hostile creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or take {@damage 3d8} lightning damage. A creature can't be damaged in this way more than once per turn.

entries: Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Strixhaven Pennant
entries: 这个魔法旗帜上印有Strixhaven或其某个学院的标志。Lorehold, Prismari, Quandrix, Silverquill, or Witherbloom。当你挥动旗帜时，上面的标志会闪闪发光，旗帜会在10英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外10英尺范围内发出暗光。

item.name: Summer's Dance
entries: This beautiful golden blade appears to bend and flex like a reed with your movements. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Additionally, the scimitar has 3 charges and regains 1 expended charge daily at dawn. While wielding this {@item scimitar|PHB}, you can expend 1 charge as a bonus action to cast the {@spell misty step} spell.

item.name: Sun
entries: 铂金币，是{@item nib|wdh}的两倍(1个太阳=1,000{@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Sun amulet on a beaded chain (Sun Empire)
Sun Blade
entries: 这个物品看起来是一个长剑的剑柄。当你握住剑柄时，你可以使用一个额外的动作来使一把纯正的光芒的剑涌现出来，或者使剑消失。当剑身存在时，这把神奇的长剑具有精巧的特性。如果你精通{@item shortsword|phb|shortswords}或{@item longsword|phb|longswords}，你就精通太阳剑。

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with it, that target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.
剑的夜光刃在15英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外15英尺范围内发出暗光。这种光是太阳光。当剑身持续存在时，你可以使用一个动作来扩大或缩小它的亮光和暗光的半径，各增加5英尺，最大为30英尺，最小为10英尺。

item.name: Sun Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card and use it to cast the {@spell Sunbeam} spell (save {@dc 17}), projecting the light from the card's face. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Sun Staff
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or wizard
entries: Veins of sunstone run through this wooden staff. This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When you hit with an attack roll using this staff, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} fire damage.

entries.name: Solar Focus
entries: You can use the staff as a spellcasting focus. While holding the staff, you can reroll a number of damage dice up to your proficiency bonus when you use a spell slot to cast a spell that deals fire or radiant damage. You must use the new rolls. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Sunny Glow
entries: As a bonus action, you can cause the staff to glow with sunlight. While glowing, the staff sheds {@quickref Vision and Light||2||bright light} in a 15-foot radius and {@quickref Vision and Light||2||dim light} for an additional 15 feet. The light lasts until you use another bonus action to extinguish it.

item.name: Sunbeam Compass
entries: A device that always directs the user to the sun by emitting a small light at the tip of the needle in a glass orb, allowing it to rotate in all directions—a very useful tool when exploring subterranean territory.
Created by {@book Karaline von Ethro|TDCSR|3|Karaline von Ethro}.

item.name: Sunforger
entries: 你在使用该魔法武器进行的攻击和伤害卷中获得+2的奖励。
作为一个动作，你可以将武器投掷到你能看到的地方，最远可达120英尺。当它到达该点时，武器在爆炸中消失，以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物都必须做一个DC 15的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到{@damage 6d6}的火焰伤害，成功则受到一半的伤害。之后，你可以使用一个动作来使武器重新出现在你的空手中。在你完成短期或长期休息之前，你不能使它再次爆炸。
如果你不把武器唤回你的手中，它就会在你不再适应它时或24小时过去后重新出现在它爆炸的地方。

item.name: Sunsword
entries: 太阳剑是斯特拉赫特的弟弟谢尔盖-冯-扎罗维奇曾经拥有的一把独特的剑。它的原始形态是铂金刀柄和护手，以及与钢铁一样坚固的水晶薄刃。
斯特拉特雇佣了一位名叫卡赞的强大巫师，在谢尔盖死后销毁了这把武器。销毁过程的第一部分需要将刀柄和刀身分开，卡赞完成了这项工作。当卡赞忙着销毁刀身时，他的学徒偷了刀柄并逃走了。卡赞后来在斯瓦利克森林里找到了他徒弟被肢解的尸体，但刀柄却不知所踪。为了避免吸血鬼的愤怒，卡赞告诉斯特拉赫特，整个武器已经被毁。
The hilt, which is sentient, knows that it can never be reunited with its original crystal blade. It has, however, gained the properties of a {@item sun blade}:

items: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with it, that target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.
剑的夜光刃在15英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外15英尺范围内发出暗光。这种光是太阳光。当剑身持续存在时，你可以使用一个动作来扩大或缩小它的亮光和暗光的半径，各增加5英尺，最大为30英尺，最小为10英尺。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: 太阳剑是一种有生命的混乱善的武器，智力为11，智慧为17，魅力为16。它在60英尺范围内有听觉和正常视觉。该武器通过向携带它或挥舞它的生物传递情感来进行交流。

entries.name: Personality
entries: 太阳剑的特殊目的是摧毁斯特拉赫，这倒不是因为它想把巴罗维亚的土地从邪恶中解放出来，而是因为它想为失去水晶刀而复仇。这把武器暗地里害怕自己的毁灭。

item.name: Survival Mantle
entries: 这种类似于斗篷的增强物将佩戴者的部分肩膀、脖子和胸部包裹起来。生存斗篷相当于一套非魔法的半板甲，穿脱所需的时间也一样长。它不能与其他种类的盔甲一起穿戴。
穿着生存斗篷的生物可以在任何环境下正常呼吸（包括真空），并且在面对有害气体（例如由{@spell cloudkill}法术、{@spell stinking cloud}法术、吸入的毒药和一些龙的呼吸武器所产生的有害气体）时，在拯救动作上有优势。

item.name: Suude (Blue)
entries: Exandria's most infamous drug, {@item suude|TDCSR} is a glittering powder made from {@book residuum|TDCSR|3|An Enchanting Export}. It was first developed by power-hungry archmages in the {@book Age of Arcanum|TDCSR|1|Age of Arcanum} as an incense burned to enhance focus during ritual spellcasting. The secret to its refinement has been lost and rediscovered a variety of times since the {@book Calamity|TDCSR|1|The Calamity}, and many different types of {@item suude|TDCSR} have been developed by arcanists in search of ever-greater power. It has terrible addictive and mentally degenerative properties, even when used sparingly.

After burning {@item suude|TDCSR} within a vessel and inhaling its fumes as an action, you take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage and must make a {@dc 10} Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}. On a failure, you become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour and fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, or until you are shaken awake as an action. During this time, the world seems to move in slow motion, and your vision is twisted in kaleidoscopic colors—yet your focus is never distorted. If one dose of {@item suude|TDCSR}, or more, is used within 1 hour of another, the DC of the Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} is increased by 5 per additional dose. If you fail this save by 10 or more, you instantly drop to 0 hit points.

On a success, you gain the ability to use one of the following Metamagic options as a sorcerer for the next minute, requiring no sorcery points. The type of Metamagic you gain access to depends on the type of {@item suude|TDCSR}, and once you use it, you can't use it again until you inhale {@item suude|TDCSR} again.
Blue suude allows you to use the {@optfeature Twinned Spell|PHB} Metamagic option.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Answerer)
entries: 在格雷霍克的世界中，已知只有九把这样的剑存在。每一把都是以传奇之剑Fragarach为原型，有不同的译法，即 "最终之语"。这九把剑中的每一把都有自己的名字和排列方式，而且每一把的剑座上都有不同的宝石。
回答者，混沌善的剑，在其鞍座上镶嵌了一颗绿宝石。
你用这把剑进行的攻击和伤害卷获得+3的加成。此外，当你持有这把剑时，你可以用你的反应来对你范围内任何对你造成伤害的生物进行一次近战攻击。你在攻击卷上有优势，而且用这种特殊攻击造成的任何伤害都会忽略目标的任何伤害免疫或抵抗。
