item.name: Truth Serum
entries: 遭受这种毒害的生物必须在DC11宪法救赎中成功，否则就会变成{@condition poisoned}，持续1小时。1%）的生物不能明知故犯地说出谎言，就像受到{@spell zone of truth}的法术影响一样。

item.name: Turquoise
entries: 一种不透明的浅蓝绿色宝石。

item.name: Turtle Ship
entries: 海龟船被包裹在一个保护性的金属壳中，就像它的名字一样，上面布满了武器。除了宽敞的舱室外，它还可以携带相当大的有效载荷，使它在商人和其他需要大量货物空间的人中很受欢迎。这艘船可以在地面上降落，也可以在水上漂浮。滑动面板可以关闭，使船体密闭，使该船能够在水下安全行驶，甚至到很深的地方。如果船舶在水上或水下受到损害，内部的舱门可以被密封，以防止船舶被完全淹没。
龟甲舰上的标准武器包括三个前装弹炮和一个后装芒果枪。当船在水下时，这些武器不能被使用。

item.name: Two-Birds Sling
entries: 你在使用此武器进行攻击和伤害时有+1的奖励。
当你用这个吊索进行远程攻击并击中一个目标时，你可以使弹药向第一个目标10英尺内的第二个目标弹射，然后对第二个目标进行远程攻击。

item.name: Two-Person Tent
entries: 一个简单而便携的帆布棚子，一个帐篷可以睡两个人。

item.name: Tyrant Ship
entries: 神灵用他们的分解射线从石头上雕刻出暴君船，并利用这些船在星界游荡，寻找可以征服的世界和可以摧毁的敌对神灵。没有两艘暴君船看起来是一样的，但它们都有一个或多个让人联想到其创造者的特征，如球形和眼梗。
在船的指挥台上有一个球形的房间，作为一个只有信仰者才能适应的法术干扰舵。任何占据这个房间的信徒都可以与之相适应。将一艘暴君战舰的命中率降至0，不仅可以摧毁它，还可以摧毁战舰的法术干扰头盔和眼线炮。
霸王船不能漂浮在水面上，但它可以安全地降落在地面上。

item.name: Unbreakable Arrow
entries: This arrow can't be broken, except when it is within an {@spell antimagic field}.

item.name: Uncommon Glamerweave
entries: Glamerweave是被灌输了无害的虚幻魔法的衣服。当穿着这些衣服时，你可以用一个额外的动作在布中创造一个移动的虚幻图案。或者，你也可以让图案从布上升起。例如，一件玻璃织品长袍可能被无害的、虚幻的火焰所包围，而一顶玻璃织品帽子可能有虚幻的蝴蝶在周围飞舞。
当你在穿着闪光织布时进行魅力({@skill Performance})或魅力({@skill Persuasion})检查时，你可以掷出{@dice d4}并将掷出的数字加入检查中。一旦你使用了这个属性，直到下一个黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Universal Solvent
entries: This tube holds milky liquid with a strong alcohol smell. You can use an action to pour the contents of the tube onto a surface within reach. The liquid instantly dissolves up to 1 square foot of adhesive it touches, including {@item sovereign glue}.

item.name: Vanquisher's Banner
entries: 这个饱经沧桑但没有破损的标准印有黄昏军团其中一支部队的徽章。持有征服者旗帜的生物可以使用一个额外的行动，在盟友的下一次攻击卷、蓄力或能力检查中给予盟友优势。

item.name: Vanrak's Mithral Shirt
entries: 密特拉尔是一种轻盈、灵活的金属。米特拉尔链式衬衫或胸甲可以穿在普通衣服里面。如果盔甲通常会对灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查造成不利，或者对力量有要求，那么米塔尔材质的盔甲就不会。
当你穿上这件盔甲时，你在60英尺范围内获得{@sense darkvision}。

item.name: Velvet doublet with gold buttons (Legion of Dusk)
Ventilating Lungs
entries: 这些金属结节是为了应对上次战争战场上使用的毒气而产生的。当你与这些肺相适应时，它们会取代你胸中的肺，而这些肺会消失。这些肺允许你正常呼吸，即使在反魔法领域，它们的呼吸功能也不能被魔法压制。

Outside an antimagic field or any other effect that suppresses magic, these lungs allow you to breathe normally in any environment (including a vacuum), and you have advantage on saving throws against harmful gases such as those created by a {@spell cloudkill} spell, a {@spell stinking cloud} spell, inhaled poisons, and gaseous breath weapons.
作为一个动作，你可以用这些肺呼出一阵风，就像你施展了{@spell gust of wind}的法术(法术救赎DC15)，没有任何成分。肺部的这一属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。
如果你对肺部的调和结束，你原来的肺部就会重新出现。

items.name: Awakened
entries: 当你在觉醒状态下佩戴蛭子罩时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你对毒药伤害有抵抗力。
You can use an action to cast the {@spell insect plague} spell (save DC 15) from the Verminshroud, requiring no material components. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.
当你使用蛭石罩施展{@spell polymorph}法术时，你可以转化为{@creature giant wasp}。

item.name: Verminshroud (Dormant)
entries: 这件斑驳的斗篷是由在Blightshore发现的以死人为食的老鼠皮拼凑而成的，缝隙中还点缀着被魔法保存的昆虫的臃肿尸体。

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 在休眠状态下佩戴蛭石罩时，你会获得以下好处。

items: You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell, you are immune to disease, and you have {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision}, wearing the cloak increases the range of your {@sense darkvision} by 60 feet.

As an action, you can use the Verminshroud to cast {@spell polymorph} on yourself, transforming into a {@creature giant rat} or {@creature rat} while retaining your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as the properties of the cloak. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

items.name: Exalted
entries: 当你在高尚状态下佩戴蛭子罩时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你获得的攀爬速度与你的步行速度相等。

Your teeth become razor-sharp natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike. You can make this attack as a bonus action. When you bite a creature and deal damage to it, the creature must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success.
当你使用蛭石罩施展{@spell polymorph}法术时，你可以转化为{@creature giant scorpion}。

item.name: Veteran's Cane
entries: 当你握住这根手杖并使用额外动作说出指令词时，它就会变成一把普通的长剑，不再具有魔力。

item.name: Vial
entries: 一个小瓶可以容纳4盎司的液体。

item.name: Vial of Greed
entries: This small glass vial can stockpile resources for use in the future. Once stored, resources last for 1 century before vanishing. As an action you make the vial store any number of the following resources, which are magically consumed and converted into a violet-colored liquid:

items: Up to 31 days of food and/or drink. The flavors are lost, instead becoming tasteless.
Up to 7 days of alcohol. The flavors are lost, instead becoming tasteless.
Up to 5 magic scrolls that affect a single creature. The target of the spell is you, and if the spell requires {@status concentration}, you can concentrate.
Up to 5 magic potions. No more than 2 duplicate potions can be stored at a time.

entries: You may have more than one kind of resource in the vial, up to the limits expressed above. You can use a bonus action to consume one day of food (or alcohol) or activate one scroll or magic potion. If activating a magic scroll, the effects of that scroll must end before you can activate another scroll from the Vial of Greed.

item.name: Vial of Stardust
entries: 任何将星尘瓶的内容物洒在自己身上的生物，都会获得施放一次{@spell dream}法术的能力，作为一个行动（法术救赎DC 15），不需要任何组件。

item.name: Vial of Thought Capture
entries: 这个深蓝色的小瓶允许你读取他人的表面思想，并将它们捕捉为思想串，将这些思想串储存在小瓶中。作为一个行动，你可以激活这个小瓶，以你10英尺范围内可以看到的生物为目标，学习它的表面思想，并将学到的思想从该生物的头脑中拉出来，成为一串有形的发光能量，称为思想串。思想串可以在小瓶中储存24小时，或者直到小瓶达到容量，在这种情况下，最古老的思想串会消散。受小瓶影响的生物知道它的思想正在被探查。
这个小瓶也可以储存由{@spell encode thoughts|ggr}咒语创造的思想线。它不会将这些思想线的持续时间延长到8小时以上，但如果你在咒语持续期间再次施放{@spell encode thoughts|ggr}，储存的思想线也不会消失。
小瓶有3次充电，可以储存最多3条思想线。它每天在黄昏时重新获得所有的能量。

item.name: Void Card
entries: As an action, you can brandish this card and attempt to banish up to three creatures you can see within 120 feet of yourself. If the target is from a different plane of existence than the plane you're on, the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or be banished, returning to that other plane. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Voidwalker Armor
entries: This black studded leather armor bears a red sheen. While wearing this armor, you can use a bonus action to summon a projection of yourself in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of yourself. The projection is a translucent copy of you that has immunity to all damage and conditions, and you can make attacks and cast spells with a range other than self as if standing in the projection's space. The projection disappears at the end of your turn. Once you use this bonus action, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This armor is cursed, and attuning to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed, you're unwilling to part with the armor. Taking it off fails to end the curse. While cursed in this way, you feel disconnected from your body, continuously hearing whispers that call for you to join them. Whenever you finish a long rest while cursed, you must make a DC 11 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, your soul is drawn from your body and trapped in an object on a different plane of existence. The object and location of this object are chosen by the DM (but might be the House of Cards; see chapter 18). While your soul is trapped in this way, your body is inert and doesn't age or require sustenance. Destroying the object frees your soul; otherwise, only a {@spell Wish} spell can restore your soul to your body.
Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

item.name: Voting Kit
entries: 在等级4时，你的投票工具箱成为一个普通的魔法物品，可以隐藏一个次元空间。作为奖励动作，你可以将一个你精通的工具箱放入投票箱中，也可以将其移除。其他类型的物体不能被放入次元空间中。搜索投票箱的生物在成功通过DC20智力（{@skill Investigation}）或智慧（{@skill Perception}）检查后可以发现并取出工具包。
Additionally, you can use the voting kit to cast {@spell charm person} (save DC 15). This property of the kit can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Vox Seeker
entries: This clockwork device resembles a metal crab the size of a dinner plate. Every action used to wind up the device allows it to operate for 1 minute, to a maximum of 10 minutes. While operational, the item uses the accompanying {@creature Vox Seeker|EGW} stat block. This automaton is under the DM's control. A vox seeker reduced to 0 hit points is destroyed.

item.name: Voyager Staff
entries: 你在使用这根魔法四角杖的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。当你拿着它时，你的法术攻击卷获得+1的加成。
这根法杖有10个电荷。在持有它的时候，你可以使用一个动作，消耗法杖的1个或更多的电荷，用它来施放以下一个法术，使用你的法术保全DC。{@spell banishment} (4次充电), {@spell blink} (3次充电), {@spell misty step} (2次充电), {@spell passwall} (5次充电), 或 {@spell teleport} (7次充电)。
法杖每天在黎明时分恢复{@dice 1d6 + 4}已消耗的电荷。如果你耗尽了最后的电荷，请掷出{@dice d20}。如果是1，法杖将永远消失。

item.name: Wakened Dragon Vessel
entries: 这个容器可以是一个药水瓶、饮水喇叭或其他用于盛放液体的容器。

As a bonus action, if the vessel is empty, you can speak the command word to fill the vessel with one of the following (your choice): ale, olive oil, mead, wine, a {@item potion of healing}, a {@item potion of greater healing}, a {@item potion of superior healing}, a {@item potion of climbing}, a {@item potion of fire breath}, or a {@item potion of flying}. Once this property is used, it can't be used until the next dawn. A potion you create in this way loses its magical properties if it isn't imbibed within 24 hours.

item.name: Wakened Dragon-Touched Focus
entries: 这个神奇的物品可以是权杖、球体、护身符、水晶或其他精巧的物品。它通常包含了龙的翅膀、爪子、牙齿或鳞片的图像。
你在主动性卷轴上有优势。当你持有这个焦点时，它可以作为你所有法术的施法焦点。
焦点会获得一个额外的属性，由其囤积的龙的家族决定，它成为搅动的对象。

items.name: Chromatic
entries: Whenever you use a spell slot to cast a spell that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage, roll a {@dice d6}, and you gain a bonus equal to the number rolled to one of the spell's damage rolls.

items.name: Gem
entries: 每当你使用一个法术槽施法时，你可以立即传送到你周围15英尺内你能看到的一个无人的空间。

items.name: Metallic
entries: 当你能看到的30英尺范围内的生物做出拯救动作时，你可以使用你的反应来使该生物在拯救动作上获得优势。
当你持有被唤醒的焦点时，你可以用它来施展某些法术。一旦该物品被用来施放特定的法术，它就不能再被用来施放该法术，直到下一个黎明。这些法术是由它成为觉醒者的龙的家族决定的。

items.name: Chromatic
entries: {@spell Hold monster}, {@spell Rime's binding ice|FTD}

items.name: Gem
entries: {@spell Rary's telepathic bond}, {@spell Raulothim's psychic lance|FTD}

items.name: Metallic
entries: {@spell Fizban's platinum shield|FTD}, {@spell legend lore}

item.name: Wakened Scaled Ornament
entries: 这种装饰品可以是珠宝、斗篷或其他可佩戴的配件。它似乎是由龙的鳞片、牙齿或爪子制成的，或者它包含了这些形状的图像。

You gain a +1 bonus to AC, and you can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. Moreover, each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} or to end those conditions on itself.
当你会受到龙的气息所造成的伤害时，你可以用你的反应来代替不受伤害，并且你会恢复相当于你会受到的伤害的点数。一旦这个属性被使用，直到下一个黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Wand of Binding
entries: 这根魔杖有7个电荷，有以下属性。它每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

entries.name: Spells
entries: 在持有魔杖的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一些能量，来施展以下的法术（保存DC 17）。{@spell hold monster} (5次充电) 或 {@spell hold person} (2次充电)。

entries.name: Assisted Escape
entries: 当你拿着魔杖时，你可以用你的反应来消耗1个电荷，并在你为避免被{@condition paralyzed}或{@condition restrained}而做的拯救动作上获得优势，或者你可以消耗1个电荷，并在你为逃脱抓捕而做的任何检查上获得优势。

item.name: Wand of Conducting
entries: 这根魔杖有3次充电。拿着它的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个电荷，并通过挥舞它来创造管弦乐。音乐可以在60英尺的范围内听到，并在你停止挥动魔杖时结束。
The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, a sad tuba sound plays as the wand crumbles to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: Wand of Enemy Detection
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to speak its command word. For the next minute, you know the direction of the nearest creature hostile to you within 60 feet, but not its distance from you. The wand can sense the presence of hostile creatures that are ethereal, {@condition invisible}, disguised, or hidden, as well as those in plain sight. The effect ends if you stop holding the wand.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Entangle
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell entangle} spell (save DC 13) from it.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Fear
entries: 这根魔杖有7个电荷，有以下属性。它每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

entries.name: Command
entries: 在持有魔杖时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗1个电荷，并命令另一个生物逃跑或卑躬屈膝，就像{@spell command}法术一样（保存DC 15）。

entries.name: Cone of Fear
entries: While holding the wand, you can use an action to expend 2 charges, causing the wand's tip to emit a 60-foot cone of amber light. Each creature in the cone must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. While it is {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the {@action Dash} action or try to escape from an effect that prevent it from moving. If it has nowhere it can move, the creature can use the {@action Dodge} action. At the end of each of its turns, a creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Wand of Fireballs
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell fireball} spell (save DC 15) from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Lightning Bolts
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell lightning bolt} spell (save DC 15) from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Magic Detection
entries: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell detect magic} spell from it. The wand regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell magic missile} spell from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Orcus
entries: The ghastly Wand of Orcus rarely leaves {@creature Orcus|MTF|Orcus's} side. The device, as evil as its creator, shares the demon lord's aims to snuff out the lives of all living things and bind the Material Plane in the stasis of undeath. {@creature Orcus|MTF} allows the wand to slip from his grasp from time to time. When it does, it magically appears wherever its master senses an opportunity to achieve some fell goal.

Made from bones as hard as iron, the wand is topped with a magically enlarged skull that once belonged to a human hero slain by {@creature Orcus|MTF}. The wand can magically change in size to better conform to the grip of its user. Plants wither, drinks spoil, flesh rots, and vermin thrive in the wand's presence.

Any creature besides {@creature Orcus|MTF} that tries to attune to the wand must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature takes {@damage 10d6} necrotic damage. On a failed save, the creature dies and rises as a {@creature zombie}.

In the hands of one who is attuned to it, the wand can be wielded as a magic {@item mace|phb} that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. The wand deals an extra {@damage 2d12} necrotic damage on a hit.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: 奥库斯魔杖有以下随机属性。

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}

entries: 当奥库斯魔杖被调谐到{@creature Orcus|MTF}自己身上时，奥库斯魔杖的有害属性会被抑制。

entries.name: Protection
entries: 持有魔杖时，你获得+3的护甲等级奖励。

entries.name: Spells
entries: 这根魔杖有7个电荷。拿着它的时候，你可以使用一个动作并消耗1个或更多的电荷，用它来施展以下的法术（保存DC18）。{@spell animate dead} (1次充电), {@spell blight} (2次充电), {@spell circle of death} (3次充电), {@spell finger of death} (3次充电), {@spell power word kill} (4次充电), 或{@spell speak with dead} (1次充电)。魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d4 + 3}已消耗的能量。
当与魔杖相适应时，{@creature Orcus|MTF}或被他祝福的追随者可以用较少的费用（最少为0）来施展魔杖的每个法术。

entries.name: Call Undead
entries: While you are holding the wand, you can use an action to conjure {@creature skeleton||skeletons} and {@creature zombie||zombies}, calling forth as many of them as you can divide 500 hit points among, each undead having average hit points. The undead magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of you and obey your commands until they are destroyed or until dawn of the next day, when they collapse into inanimate piles of bones and rotting corpses. Once you use this property of the wand, you can't use it again until the next dawn.
当与魔杖调和时，{@creature Orcus|MTF}可以召唤任何种类的亡灵，不只是骷髅和僵尸。亡灵不会灭亡，也不会在次日黎明时分消失，一直到(1%)将其解散。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Wand of Orcus is a sentient, chaotic evil item with an Intelligence of 16, a Wisdom of 12, and a Charisma of 16. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这根魔杖能与它的持有者进行心灵感应，并能说、读和理解深渊和普通话。

entries.name: Personality
entries: The wand's purpose is to help satisfy {@creature Orcus|MTF|Orcus's} desire to slay everything in the multiverse. The wand is cold, cruel, nihilistic, and bereft of humor. In order to further its master's goals, the wand feigns devotion to its current user and makes grandiose promises that it has no intention of fulfilling, such as vowing to help its user overthrow {@creature Orcus|MTF}.

entries.name: Destroying the Wand
entries: 摧毁奥库斯魔杖需要由头骨在上面的古代英雄把它带到正能量位面。要做到这一点，这位失散多年的英雄必须首先恢复生命--这可不是一件容易的事，因为{@creature Orcus|MTF}已经将英雄的灵魂囚禁起来，并将其隐藏起来，严加保护。
将魔杖浸泡在正能量中会导致它的破裂和爆炸，但除非满足上述条件，否则魔杖会在深渊的{@creature Orcus|MTF|Orcus's}层上瞬间复原。

item.name: Wand of Paralysis
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cause a thin blue ray to streak from the tip toward a creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Polymorph
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell polymorph} spell (save DC 15) from it.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Pyrotechnics
entries: 这根魔杖有7次充电。当你拿着它的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个电荷，并在你能看到的60英尺以外的地方创造一个无害的多色光爆。这阵光伴随着噼里啪啦的声音，最远可在300英尺外听到。光线和火炬的火焰一样亮，但只持续一秒钟。
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖会爆发出无害的烟火表演并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Scowls
entries: 这根魔杖有3次充电。拿着它的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个电荷，并将目标锁定在你30英尺范围内你能看到的一个人形生物。目标必须在DC 10的魅力反射中成功，否则将被迫皱眉头1分钟。
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得所有消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖会变成一个{@item wand of smiles|xge}。

item.name: Wand of Secrets
entries: 这根魔杖有3次充电。当你拿着它时，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个电荷，如果一个暗门或陷阱在你30英尺范围内，魔杖会跳动并指向离你最近的那个。魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d3}消耗的能量。

item.name: Wand of Silence
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast the {@spell silence} spell (save DC 15). The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Wand of Smiles
entries: 这根魔杖有3次充电。拿着它的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个电荷，并将目标锁定在你30英尺范围内你能看到的一个人形生物。目标必须在DC10的 "人格魅力 "判断中成功，否则将被迫微笑1分钟。
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得所有消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖会变成一个{@item wand of scowls|xge}。

item.name: Wand of Viscid Globs
entries: Crafted by the {@creature drow}, this slim black wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cause a small glob of viscous material to launch from the tip at one creature within 60 feet of you. Make a ranged attack roll against the target, with a bonus equal to your spellcasting modifier (or your Intelligence modifier, if you don't have a spellcasting modifier) plus your proficiency bonus. On a hit, the glob expands and dries on the target, which is {@condition restrained} for 1 hour. After that time, the viscous material cracks and falls away.
在{@condition restrained}的生物上涂抹一品脱或更多的酒精，就能立即溶解球状物，就像涂抹{@item oil of etherealness}或{@item universal solvent}一样。如果暴露在阳光下，球体也会立即溶解。没有其他非魔法过程可以去除这种粘稠的物质，直到它自己变质。
魔杖每天在午夜时分恢复{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的能量。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖会融化成无害的粘液并被摧毁。
如果暴露在阳光下1小时不间断，粘稠的胶状物的魔杖就会被破坏。

item.name: Wand of Web
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell web} spell (save DC 15) from it.
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎成灰烬并被摧毁。

item.name: Wand of Winter
entries: 这根魔杖看起来和感觉都像一根冰柱。你必须与这根魔杖相适应才能使用它。

The wand has 7 charges, which are used to fuel the spells within it. With the wand in hand, you can use your action to cast one of the following spells from the wand, even if you are incapable of casting spells: {@spell ray of frost} (no charges, or 1 charge to cast at 5th level; +5 to hit with ranged spell attack), {@spell sleet storm} (3 charges; spell save DC 15), or {@spell ice storm} (4 charges; spell save DC 15). No components are required. The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges each day at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20, the wand melts away, forever destroyed.

item.name: Wand of Wonder
entries: 这根魔杖有7个电荷。在持有它的时候，你可以使用一个动作来消耗它的一个电荷，并选择一个在你周围120英尺内的目标。目标可以是一个生物，一个物体，或者空间中的一个点。掷出{@dice d100}并参考下表来发现会发生什么。
如果该效果使你从魔杖上施放咒语，该咒语的救赎DC为15。如果该法术通常有一个以英尺为单位的范围，那么它的范围就会变成120英尺，如果它还不是。
如果一个效果覆盖了一个区域，你必须将咒语集中在目标上并包括目标。如果一个效果有多个可能的对象，则由DM随机决定哪些对象受到影响。
魔杖每天在黎明时分重新获得{@dice 1d6 + 1}已消耗的电荷。如果你消耗了魔杖的最后一次充能，掷出{@dice d20}。1的话，魔杖就会碎裂成灰尘并被摧毁。

rows: 你施展{@spell slow}。
你施展{@spell faerie fire}。
你是{@condition stunned}，直到你的下一个回合开始，相信刚刚发生了一些很棒的事情。
你施展{@spell gust of wind}。
You cast {@spell detect thoughts} on the target you chose. If you didn't target a creature, you instead take {@damage 1d6} psychic damage.
你施展{@spell stinking cloud}。
在以目标为中心的60英尺范围内下大雨。该区域变得轻度遮蔽。大雨会一直下到你下一个回合开始。
一只动物出现在离目标最近的空位上。这只动物不受你的控制，并像平常一样行动。掷出{@dice d100}来决定哪个动物出现。在01-25的时候，出现一个（1%）；在26-50的时候，出现一个（2%）；而在51-100的时候，出现一个（3%）。
你施展{@spell lightning bolt}。
一团由600只超大的蝴蝶组成的云彩充满了以目标为中心的30英尺半径范围。该区域会变得严重遮蔽。蝴蝶停留时间为10分钟。
You enlarge the target as if you had cast {@spell enlarge/reduce}. If the target can't be affected by that spell or if you didn't target a creature, you become the target.
你施展{@spell darkness}。
在以目标为中心的60英尺范围内的地面上长出草来。如果那里已经有了草，它就会长到正常大小的10倍，并保持1分钟的过度生长。
一个由DM选择的物体会消失在虚空界。该物体必须既不被佩戴也不被携带，在目标的120英尺范围内，并且在任何维度上都不大于10英尺。
You shrink yourself as if you had cast {@spell enlarge/reduce} on yourself.
你施展{@spell fireball}。
You cast {@spell invisibility} on yourself.
叶子从目标处生长。如果你选择空间中的一个点作为目标，叶子就会从离该点最近的生物身上长出。除非它们被摘下来，否则叶子会变成褐色，并在24小时后脱落。
一股{@dice 1d4 × 10}的宝石流，每颗价值1金币，从魔杖的顶端射出，排成30英尺长，5英尺宽。每颗宝石都会造成1次重击伤害，宝石的总伤害会平均分配给队伍中的所有生物。

A burst of colorful shimmering light extends from you in a 30-foot radius. You and each creature in the area that can see must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
目标的皮肤变成明亮的蓝色，持续{@dice 1d10}天。如果你选择空间中的一个点，离该点最近的生物会受到影响。

If you targeted a creature, it must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. If you didn't target a creature, you become the target and must make the saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instantly {@condition petrified}. On any other failed save, the target is {@condition restrained} and begins to turn to stone. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the target is freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

item.name: Wand Sheath
entries: 魔杖鞘夹在你的手臂上，带来以下好处。

items: 在你与之调和的时候，魔杖鞘不能从你身上移开。
你可以将魔杖插入鞘中作为一个动作。鞘一次只能容纳一根魔杖。
你可以将魔杖从鞘中收回或伸出作为一个额外动作。当魔杖被伸出时，你可以像拿着它一样使用它，但你的手仍然是自由的。

entries: 如果一根带鞘的魔杖需要调整，你必须在使用它之前调整该魔杖。然而，就你可以调整的魔法物品的数量而言，魔杖鞘和连接的魔杖算作一个魔法物品。如果你将魔杖从鞘中取出，你对魔杖的调和就会结束。

item.name: War Horn of Valor
entries: This brass war horn is engraved with the war rune, which glows purple when the horn is blown.

You can blow the horn as a bonus action. When you do, if you have the frightened condition, you immediately end that condition on yourself. You also have advantage on saving throws against being frightened until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Invoking the Rune
entries: When you blow the horn, you can also invoke the rune, imbuing the horn's deep call with protective magic that affects creatures of your choice within 30 feet of yourself. You and all affected creatures gain a +1 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Once the rune has been invoked, it can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Warrior's Passkey
entries: This silver skeleton key is warm to the touch. While holding the key in its key form, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Knock} spell from the key.

entries.name: Transforming the Key
entries: While holding the key, you can use a bonus action to transform it into a magic longsword. You are considered proficient with the sword, and you have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. On a hit, the sword deals {@damage 1d10} force damage. The item remains in its sword form until it leaves your grasp or you use another bonus action to revert it to its key form.
If you end your attunement to the item while it's in its sword form, it automatically reverts to its key form.

item.name: Wasp Ship
entries: 黄蜂船是轻型的木制船只，能够安全地降落在地面上，但不能降落在水上。它们对冒险家有吸引力，因为它们价格低廉，不需要大量的船员。海盗们喜欢它们，因为它们很敏捷。贵族们喜欢用它们作为飞行游艇，因为船的货舱可以很容易地改装成豪华的生活区。
该船的背部隆起，为武器库提供了高处，通常配备了一个弹炮。

item.name: Watchful Helm
entries: While you wear this helm, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and remain aware of your surroundings even while you're asleep, and you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.
As a bonus action, you can cast the {@spell see invisibility} spell from the helm. Once this property of the helm is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Waterskin
entries: 一个水皮可以容纳4品脱的液体。

item.name: Wave
item.reqAttune: by a creature that worships a god of the sea
entries: 这把三叉戟存放在白翎山的地牢中，是一件精致的武器，上面刻有海浪、贝壳和海洋生物的图像。虽然你必须崇拜一个海神来适应这把武器，但波浪很乐意接受新的皈依者。
你在使用该魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷中获得+3的奖励。如果你用它打出关键一击，目标会受到相当于其最大命中率一半的额外坏死伤害。

The weapon also functions as a {@item trident of fish command} and a {@item weapon of warning}. It can confer the benefit of a {@item cap of water breathing} while you hold it, and you can use it as a {@item cube of force} by choosing the effect, instead of pressing cube sides to select it.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Wave is a sentient weapon of neutral alignment, with an Intelligence of 14, a Wisdom of 10, and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这把武器可以和它的持有者进行心灵感应，并且可以说、读、听懂阿坎语。它还可以与水生动物对话，就像使用一个{@spell speak with animals}的法术一样，使用心灵感应让它的持有者参与对话。

entries.name: Personality
entries: 当它变得焦躁不安时，波浪有一种哼唱曲子的习惯，从海歌到海神的神圣赞美诗都有。
海浪热切地希望让凡人皈依一个或多个海神，否则就会让无信仰的人走向死亡。如果持枪者不能在这个世界上推进武器的目标，就会产生冲突。三叉戟对它的铸造地有一种怀旧情结，那是一个叫做雷霆堡的荒凉岛屿。一位海神在那里囚禁了一个风暴巨人家族，巨人们为了献身或反叛该神而铸造了 "浪潮"。
波浪对自己的性质和目的怀有秘密的怀疑。由于它对海神的虔诚，波浪担心它的目的是使某位海神灭亡。这种命运是波浪可能无法避免的。

item.name: Wayfarer's Boots
entries: This pair of boots is made of durable cloth, with the journey rune stitched in golden thread above each heel. While you are wearing this item, your walking speed increases by 10 feet, and you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

entries.name: Invoking the Runes
entries: As a bonus action, you can invoke the boots' runes to cast the {@spell expeditious retreat} spell with them. Once the runes have been invoked, they can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Waythe
entries: Waythe is a unique greatsword most recently in the possession of a high-ranking {@creature cloud giant} ambassador.
你在使用此魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷上获得+1的加成。当你用它击中一个巨人类型的生物时，该巨人会受到额外的{@damage 2d6}砍击伤害，而且它必须在DC15力量救赎中成功，否则就会倒下{@condition prone}。
The sword also functions as a {@item wand of enemy detection}. It regains all of its expended charges at dawn and isn't at risk of crumbling if its last charge is used.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Waythe is a sentient weapon of neutral good alignment, with an Intelligence of 12, a Wisdom of 2, and a Charisma of 14. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
该武器可以说并理解巨人和普通话，它可以与持枪者进行心灵感应。

entries.name: Personality
entries: 这把剑相信自由，并允许其他人按他们认为合适的方式生活。它保护自己的朋友，并希望与志同道合的持剑者成为朋友。(一个好心的角色只需要1分钟就能获得与这把剑的默契。) 然而，Waythe勇敢到了愚蠢的地步，并大声呼吁采取大胆行动。它可能会与邪恶或胆小的持剑者发生冲突。

item.name: Weaver's Tools
additionalEntries: Weaver's tools allow you to create cloth and tailor it into articles of clothing.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 织工的工具包括线、针和布屑。你知道如何使用织布机，但这种设备太大，无法运输。

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History
entries: 你的专长使你在检查布质物品，包括斗篷和长袍时具有额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: 利用你对创造布艺物品过程的知识，你可以在检查挂毯、室内装饰品、服装和其他编织品时，发现别人会忽略的线索并做出推断。

additionalEntries.name: Repair
entries: 作为短暂休息的一部分，你可以修复一个受损的布质物体。

additionalEntries.name: Craft Clothing
entries: 假设你有足够的布和线，你可以为一个生物制作一套衣服，作为长期休息的一部分。

additionalEntries.caption: Weaver's Tools
rows: 重新使用布
在布上补一个洞
定制服装

item.name: Weird Tank
entries: 一个怪异的罐子是一个由吹制的玻璃和雕刻的青铜制成的十加仑的罐子，有一个由坚韧的皮革制成的类似背包的背带。一个{@creature water weird}被装在罐子里。当你穿上这个罐子时，你可以用一个动作来打开它，让（1%）出现。{@creature water weird}在主动权顺序中紧随你之后行动，并且它被束缚在坦克上。
当你穿上坦克时，你可以用心灵感应指挥{@creature water weird}（不需要任何行动）。只有在你首先命令{@creature water weird}缩进坦克或{@creature water weird}已经死亡的情况下，你才可以作为一个动作关闭坦克。
如果{@creature water weird}被杀死了，水箱就会失去它的魔力容纳属性，直到它在一个水元素节点内呆了至少24小时。当水箱被充能时，一个新的{@creature water weird}在里面形成。

The tank has AC 15, 50 hit points, vulnerability to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Reducing the tank to 0 hit points destroys it and the {@creature water weird} contained within it.

item.name: Well of Many Worlds
entries: 这种精细的黑布，像丝绸一样柔软，被折叠成手帕的尺寸。它展开后是一个直径为6英尺的圆片。
你可以用一个动作来展开并将多世界之井放在一个坚固的表面上，然后它就会创造一个通往另一个世界或存在平面的双向传送门。每次该物品打开一个入口时，由DM决定它通向哪里。你可以用一个动作来关闭一个打开的入口，方法是抓住布的边缘并将其折叠起来。一旦众多世界之井打开了一个传送门，它在{@dice 1d8}小时内就不能再这样做。

item.name: Wheel of Stars
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Wisdom saving throws, and you can use an action to cast the {@spell dancing lights}, {@spell guidance}, or {@spell message} cantrips.

entries.name: Portent of the Stars
entries: As a reaction when a creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes an attack roll, saving throw, or ability check, you make that creature roll a {@dice d10} and add or subtract the number rolled (your choice) from the roll. Once you use this feature of the wheel of stars, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Alter Gravity
entries: As an action, you can cast {@spell fly} on yourself or you can cast {@spell levitate} (save DC 15). Once you use this feature of the wheel of stars, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: 虽然这个组件没有安装在{@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}，但它的魔法可能会零星地发挥作用，或者有不可预知的副作用，这由DM决定。

item.name: Wheel of Wind and Water
entries: 当安装在元素大帆船或飞艇的舵上时，这个轮子允许拥有风暴印记的生物以心灵感应控制船只内的元素。
如果一个风水轮被安装在一艘普通的帆船上，一个拥有风暴印记的生物在使用风水轮时可以在船只周围创造一个理想的区域，使其速度增加每小时5英里。

item.name: Whelm
entries: Whelm是由矮人锻造的强大战锤，在白翎山的地牢中丢失。
你在使用该魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷上获得+3的加成。在你第一次使用Whelm进行攻击的第二天黎明，你会产生一种对户外活动的恐惧，只要你保持对该武器的适应，这种恐惧就会持续下去。这将导致你在看到白天的天空时，在攻击卷、蓄力和能力检查方面处于劣势。

entries.name: Thrown Weapon
entries: Whelm has the thrown property, with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged weapon attack using it, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage, or an extra {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage if the target is a giant. Each time you throw the weapon, it flies back to your hand after the attack. If you don't have a hand free, the weapon lands at your feet.

entries.name: Shock Wave
entries: You can use an action to strike the ground with Whelm and send a shock wave out from the point of impact. Each creature of your choice on the ground within 60 feet of that point must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Supernatural Awareness
entries: While you are holding the weapon, it alerts you to the location of any secret or concealed doors within 30 feet of you. In addition, you can use an action to cast {@spell detect evil and good} or {@spell locate object} from the weapon. Once you cast either spell, you can't cast it from the weapon again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Whelm is a sentient lawful neutral weapon with an Intelligence of 15, a Wisdom of 12, and a Charisma of 15. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这把武器可以和它的持有者进行心灵感应，并且可以说、读和理解矮人、巨人和哥布林语。在战斗中使用时，它可以用矮人语喊出战斗口号。

entries.name: Personality
entries: Whelm's purpose is to slaughter giants and goblinoids. It also seeks to protect dwarves against all enemies. Conflict arises if the wielder fails to destroy goblins and giants or to protect dwarves. Whelm has ties to the dwarf clan that created it, variously called the Dankil or the Mightyhammer clan. It longs to be returned to that clan. It would do anything to protect those dwarves from harm. The hammer also carries a secret shame. Centuries ago, a dwarf named Ctenmiir wielded it valiantly for a time. But Ctenmiir was turned into a {@creature vampire}. His will was strong enough that he bent Whelm to his evil purposes, even killing members of his own clan.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When Whisper reaches an awakened state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2. Additionally, when you hit with an attack using this dagger, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} psychic damage.
The DC to resist being {@condition frightened} from a critical hit increases to 15.

item.name: Whisper (Dormant)
entries: Forged with a mercurial metal accidentally drawn from the Realms Beyond, this dagger shimmers with an unsettling sourceless light. It was once wielded by {@creature Champion of Ravens|TDCSR|Vax'ildan, a legendary champion of the Matron of Ravens}. Two raven feathers are linked to its pommel as a memento of its former bearer.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While Whisper is in a dormant state, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Additionally, when you score a critical hit with this dagger, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. On a success, the target is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When Whisper reaches an exalted state, you gain the following benefits:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3, and the extra psychic damage it deals increases to {@dice 1d8}.
The DC to resist being {@condition frightened} from a critical hit increases to 17.

When this dagger is used to make a ranged attack, you can choose to transform into shadow and merge with the blade as part of the action used to attack, teleporting to another location. If the attack hits, you appear in an unoccupied space of your choice within 5 feet of the target. If the attack misses, you appear where the GM determines the dagger lands (typically within {@dice 1d6 × 5} feet of the target). In either case, you appear with the dagger in your hand.

item.name: Whisper Jar
entries: 同样在等级1，你是一个耳语瓶的受益者--这是一个普通的魔法物品，类似于一个装满乙醚的瓶子，有一个长的自来水管。这个罐子被用来记录别人的故事和你自己的观察，就像一个拥有无限空间的言语笔记本。耳语瓶记录的速度和生物对它说话的速度一样快，并以记录的速度轻声回放话语。激活播放某个特定的录音是一个动作。

entries.caption: Things Recorded in Your Whisper Jar
rows: 被遗忘的舞台剧《热铁皮屋脊上的塔巴西》的唯一演出现场录音
在你之前拥有这个罐子的罗列者的毕生工作
你曾经有过的每一个勇敢的想法，以掩盖你在大多数时间里的恐惧。
一切，因为你周围的人有一天都会自食其果!
你去过的每个定居点中吃炸老鼠串的前七个地方
法鲁恩现存或遗失的所有皇室血统的全部家谱
对你最喜欢的吉姆-达克米奇舞台表演的逐一回顾
喧闹的掌声，你随意回放的声音

entries.name: Whispered Encyclopedia
entries: At rank 2, your whisper jar becomes an uncommon magic item that can tap into the broader lore of Acquisitions Incorporated. As a bonus action, you ask the jar for information on a specific subject and make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill History}) check. On a success, the jar plays back a recording on that subject, made somewhere, sometime by another Acq Inc loremonger. This property of the whisper jar can't be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Whispered Warnings
entries: 同样在等级3，你的耳语瓶获得了额外的力量，并成为一个稀有的魔法物品。作为一个行动，你可以使罐子作为一个{@item wand of enemy detection}的功能，此时它对范围内的敌人轻声说出方向。耳语瓶的这一属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

entries.name: Whispered Arcana
entries: 同样在等级4，你的耳语罐获得了更多的魔法。通过在罐子里轻声念出以下咒语的名字作为行动，你可以从罐子里施放该咒语。{@spell detect evil and good}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell detect poison and disease}, {@spell find traps}, {@spell identify}, 或 {@spell locate animals or plants}。悄悄话罐子的这一属性在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Whistle-Stick
entries: {@book One Grung Above|OGA}的{@race grung|OGA}被训练使用这种新的乐器。这是一个空心管，整个管子上都凿有孔，很像笛子。你可以用它来演奏音乐进行娱乐，但格陵人也会用一根结实的绳索（附图）来摆动它，创造出其他格陵人可以识别的声音，这样他们就能知道对方的大概位置。此外，懂得（2%）的格伦人可以用这种方式用哨棒进行远距离交流。

item.name: White Chromatic Rose
entries: {#itemEntry Chromatic Rose|WBtW}

item.name: White Dragon Cape
entries: 穿上这件斗篷时，你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。

item.name: White Dragon Mask
entries: 这个闪闪发光的面具是白色的，带有淡蓝色的亮点，上面有一个带刺的徽章。面具可以重新塑形，以适应与之相适应的佩戴者。当你戴着这个面具并与之相适应时，你可以获得以下属性。

entries.name: Damage Absorption
entries: 你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。如果你已经对其他来源的寒冷伤害有抵抗力，你反而对寒冷伤害有免疫力。如果你已经对其他来源的寒冷伤害有免疫力，每当你受到寒冷伤害时，你不会受到任何伤害，并恢复相当于该类型伤害一半的命中率。

entries.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: 当你没有穿戴盔甲时，你可以将你的魅力值加到你的盔甲等级上。

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: 如果你有一个需要休息才能充能的呼吸武器，它获得的充能是6。

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense darkvision} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense blindsight} out to 30 feet for 5 minutes.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: 你能说并听懂德拉科尼亚语。在你对白龙进行的任何魅力检查中，你也有优势。

entries.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: (1/天)如果你的拯救动作失败，你可以选择成功代替。

entries.name: Winter's Fury
entries: While your current hit points are equal to or less than half your hit point maximum, you deal an extra {@damage 1d8} cold damage with your melee attacks.

item.name: White Dragon Scale Mail
entries: 龙鳞邮件是由一种龙的鳞片制成的。有时，龙会收集它们遗弃的鳞片并将它们赠送给人类。其他时候，猎人会小心翼翼地剥下死龙的皮并加以保存。在这两种情况下，龙鳞甲都有很高的价值。当你穿上这件盔甲时，你会获得+1的交流奖励，在面对龙的恐怖存在和呼吸武器时，你的蓄力动作有优势，并且你对寒冷伤害有抵抗力。
此外，你可以集中你的感官作为一个行动，以魔法方式辨别距离你30英里内最近的白龙的距离和方向。这个特殊动作在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: White Ghost Orchid Seed
entries: More rarely, the orchids produce a smaller pod holding a single white seed. Among its various magical properties, if a white seed is ground and scattered over a dead body, the body is affected by the {@spell resurrection} spell. A white ghost orchid seed has no effect if consumed.

item.name: Whitestone
entries: The sheer amount of leftover arcane power within the whitestone of the {@book Alabaster Sierra|TDCSR|3|Alabaster Sierras} mountains is incredibly receptive to enchantment. Magic items that incorporate at least an ounce of whitestone into their construction require only one-quarter the creation time of other magic items. Some alchemists in {@book Emon|TDCSR|3|Emon, the City of Fellowship} have discovered that dissolving whitestone with specific acids can leave behind pure {@item residuum|TDCSR}, which can substitute for expensive spell components when such materials are not readily available.

item.name: Wildroot
entries: 将野菜根的汁液引入{@condition poisoned}生物的血液中（例如，将其涂抹在开放的伤口上），可以消除该生物的{@condition poisoned}状况。一旦以这种方式使用，野菜根就会失去这种特性。

item.name: Wildspace Orrery
entries: 在Wildspace系统内，这个便携式的神秘装置会自动追踪该系统内所有太阳、行星、卫星和彗星的位置和运动，并在其当前位置上方的空间投射出所有这些天体的显示。在该显示中，一个白色的、脉动的针状光点标志着ORRERY的位置。

items.name: Awakened
entries: 当战镐达到觉醒状态时，它将获得以下属性。

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+2。
战镐的呼吸武器属性的蓄力DC增加到15，该属性在蓄力失败时造成{@damage 4d6}的伤害，或在成功时造成一半的伤害。
战神之锤的恐怖存在属性的蓄力DC增加到15。
在携带该武器时，你对酸、冷、火、闪电和毒伤害有抵抗力。

item.name: Will of the Talon (Dormant)
entries: 黑色、蓝色、绿色、红色和白色的宝石雕刻成龙头的形状，覆盖在这个浮夸的黄金战镐上，标志着它是一个引导提亚马特力量的武器。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Will of the Talon is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intelligence of 14, a Wisdom of 15, and a Charisma of 19. It has hearing and {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 120 feet.
这把武器能与它的持有者进行心灵感应，并能说、读、听懂普通话、德拉康语和地狱语。

entries.name: Personality
entries: A short-tempered {@creature bone devil} named Ashtyrlon lives within Will of the Talon. The weapon is greedy and values strong leadership. It demands that its wielder take decisive action to keep order in high-pressure situations—and to always take a fair share of treasure in return.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 在休眠状态下，战争选拔赛给予以下好处。

items: 你能说、读、写德拉科尼亚语和地狱语。
你在使用该魔法武器的攻击和伤害卷中获得+1的奖励。

As a bonus action while holding the war pick, you can cause the following effect: each creature of your choice that is within 30 feet of you and is aware of you must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to your Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.
当持有战镐时，你可以用你的行动来呼出破坏性的能量。从 "塔伦呼吸武器的意志 "表中挑选一种伤害类型。呼气区域内的每个生物都必须做一个DC13的蓄力动作，其类型在表格中指定。救赎失败时，生物会受到{@damage 3d6}的伤害，救赎成功时，会受到一半的伤害。

entries: 当你使用战挑释放特定伤害类型的呼吸武器时，你不能再选择相同的伤害类型，直到下一个黎明。

entries.caption: Will of the Talon Breath Weapons
rows: Acid
5英尺宽，30英尺长的线
灵活性
Cold
15英尺锥体
宪法
Fire
15英尺锥体
灵活性
閃電
5英尺宽，30英尺长的线
灵活性
毒药
15英尺锥体
宪法

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

items.name: Exalted
entries: 当战镐达到高尚的状态时，它将获得以下属性。

items: 该武器的攻击和伤害卷的奖励增加到+3。
战镐的呼吸武器属性的蓄力DC增加到17，该属性在蓄力失败时造成{@damage 5d6}的伤害，或在成功时造成一半的伤害。
战神之锤的恐怖存在属性的蓄力DC增加到17。

item.name: Willowshade Oil
entries: 一种深蓝色的油可以从柳叶菜的稀有果实中提取。一个生物可以用它的行动将这种油涂抹在另一个已经{@condition petrified}少于1分钟的生物身上，使该生物身上的{@condition petrified}条件在该生物的下一回合开始时结束。

item.name: Wind Fan
entries: While holding this fan, you can use an action to cast the {@spell gust of wind} spell (save DC 13) from it. Once used, the fan shouldn't be used again until the next dawn. Each time it is used again before then, it has a cumulative {@chance 20} chance of not working and tearing into useless, nonmagical tatters.

item.name: Windvane
entries: A silver spear, Windvane has dark sapphires on the filigreed surface of its polished head. Held by its shining haft, the weapon feels insubstantial, as if clutching a cool, gently flowing breeze. The spear contains a spark of {@creature Yan-C-Bin|PotA}, the Prince of Evil Air.
You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon, which has the finesse weapon property. When you hit with it, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} lightning damage.

entries.name: Air Mastery
entries: 当你持有风向标时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你能说流利的奥兰语。
你对雷电伤害有抵抗力。
你可以对一个{@creature air elemental}的人施放{@spell dominate monster}(保存DC17)。一旦你这样做了，在下一个黎明之前，风车不能再这样使用。

entries.name: Song of the Four Winds
entries: While inside an air node, you can perform a ritual called the Song of the Four Winds, using Windvane to create a {@item devastation orb of air|PotA}. Once you perform the ritual, Windvane can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Flaw
entries: 风笛使其持有者变得多疑和不可靠。当你使用这把武器时，你会获得以下缺陷："我打破我的誓言和计划。责任和荣誉对我来说毫无意义。"

item.name: Wing Crest Shield
entries: While wielding this shield, you gain a +1 bonus to your AC.

As an action, you can speak the command word to cast {@spell gust of wind} (save DC 15). Once the shield has been used to cast this spell, it can't be used to cast this spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Winged Boots
entries: 当你穿上这双靴子时，你的飞行速度与你的步行速度相等。你可以使用这双靴子飞行4个小时，一次或分几次短距离飞行，每次至少使用1分钟的持续时间。如果你在飞行时持续时间已过，你会以每回合30英尺的速度下降，直到你降落。
靴子每不使用12小时就会恢复2小时的飞行能力。

item.name: Wings of Flying
entries: 穿着这件斗篷时，你可以用一个动作说出它的命令语。这将使斗篷变成你背上的一对蝙蝠翅膀或鸟类翅膀，持续1小时或直到你以行动重复命令语。翅膀使你的飞行速度达到60英尺。当它们消失时，你在{@dice 1d12}小时内不能再次使用它们。

item.name: Wingwear
entries: 这种贴身的制服上缝有空气的符号，皮制的襟翼沿着手臂、腰部和腿部伸展，形成滑翔的翅膀。一套翼装有3次充电。当你穿上这套衣服时，你可以使用一个额外的动作并消耗1个电荷来获得30英尺的飞行速度，直到你着陆。在你每个回合结束时，你的高度会下降5英尺。如果你在回合结束时没有在水平方向上飞行至少30英尺，你的高度会立即下降到0英尺。当你的高度下降到0英尺时，你就会降落（或坠落），你必须再花一次电荷才能再次使用这套衣服。
衣服在空气元素节点中度过至少1小时后，会重新获得所有消耗的电荷。

item.name: Winter's Dark Bite
entries: 你在使用该魔法武器进行攻击和伤害时有+1的奖励。
这把大剑是由一种未知的黑色金属制成。在大多数情况下，它的作用是{@item +1 greatsword}。但当用来对付{@creature thessalhydra|hftt}时，它可以作为{@item +3 greatsword}使用。在颠倒状态下，它可以作为一把+4的大剑使用。

item.name: Witchlight Vane
item.reqAttune: by a mister light or his handpicked successor
entries: 这根华丽的杆子顶部有一对蝴蝶翅膀，并在其长度中加入了红色玻璃碎片。它重达3磅。

entries.name: Magic Weapon
entries: In the hands of one who is attuned to it, the vane can be wielded as a magic mace that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. In addition, the vane deals an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage on a hit.

entries.name: Sense Mood
entries: 当风向标在巫师之光狂欢节的范围内时，它可以感知狂欢节中每个智力在4以上的生物的情绪。作为一个行动，与风向标相适应的生物可以用它来确定狂欢节中最快乐的生物的位置。
当狂欢节的气氛普遍高涨时，风向标顶端的蝴蝶形状就会顺时针慢慢旋转；如果狂欢节的气氛普遍低落，风向标顶端就会逆时针慢慢旋转。

entries.name: Sentience
entries: 风向标是一个有生命的、混乱的善的神奇物品，智力为11，智慧为14，魅力为14。它有听觉和正常的视觉，范围为30英尺，它通过向与它相适应的生物传递情感来进行交流。它的目的是确保每个参加巫师之光狂欢节的人都有一个美好的时光。

entries.name: Additional Properties
entries: 该风向标具有以下附加属性。

items: 持有风向标的生物对雷电伤害有脆弱性。
The creature attuned to the vane can't be {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition petrified}, or {@condition stunned}.

While carrying the vane, the creature attuned to it can cast the {@spell dancing lights}, {@spell polymorph}, or {@spell ray of frost} spell as an action, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. After the vane's {@spell polymorph} spell is cast, roll a {@dice d8}; on a roll of 3 or 8, the vane can't be used to cast this spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Witchlight Watch
item.reqAttune: by a mister witch or his handpicked successor
entries: 这只华丽的怀表被固定在一条金链的末端。它在打开时发出微弱的金光，并发出柔和的滴答声，只有持有它的生物才能听到。手表的表面显示了一幅微型的巫师之光狂欢节画，画中有一个小小的鸡冠石，在夜间被一个小到可以穿过针眼的光点环绕。这种光会使鸡冠石投下阴影，而这些阴影可以让手表的主人追踪时间的流逝。

entries.name: Carnival Setup and Takedown
entries: 与手表相适应的生物可以使用一个动作来启动巫师之光狂欢节的打包或拆包，只要该生物和狂欢节在同一个存在平面上。在1小时内，所有属于狂欢节元素的物品都会被神奇地拂过，直到所有东西都打包好准备旅行，或者拆开包装后组装起来。这块表对生物没有影响，它们可以在嘉年华会被设置或拆除时自由安全地活动。一旦狂欢节的打包或拆包过程开始，在任务完成之前是无法停止的。当手表被用来收拾或拆开狂欢节时，在8小时过去之前，这个属性不能再次使用。

entries.name: Additional Properties
entries: 怀表具有以下附加属性。

items: While carrying the watch, the creature attuned to it can cast the {@spell fire bolt}, {@spell invisibility}, or {@spell message} spell as an action, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. After the watch's {@spell invisibility} spell is cast, roll a {@dice d8}; on a roll of 3 or 8, the watch can't be used to cast this spell again until the next dawn.
被附和的生物会增加30磅的体重。这个额外的重量在调和结束后会消失。
适应手表的生物每天必须吃喝正常量的八倍。

item.name: Witherbloom Primer
entries: The Witherbloom Primer is a magic textbook created at Strixhaven's Witherbloom College. The primer has 3 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you make an Intelligence ({@skill Nature}) or Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check while holding the primer, you can expend 1 charge to give yourself a {@dice 1d4} bonus to the check, immediately after you roll the {@dice d20}.
此外，如果你在一次长时休息结束时学习了引言，你可以从德鲁伊或巫师的法术列表中选择一个一级法术。在你完成下一次长时休息之前，如果你持有入门书，你可以在没有法术槽的情况下施放一次所选的法术。你对这个法术的施法能力是你选择的智力、智慧或魅力。

item.name: Woodcarver's Tools
additionalEntries: Woodcarver's tools allow you to craft intricate objects from wood, such as wooden tokens or arrows.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: 木雕师的工具包括一把刀、一把凿子和一把小锯。

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History
entries: 当你检查木制物品，如小雕像或箭时，你的专业知识会给你带来额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: Nature
entries: 当你检查树木时，你对木制物品的知识给你带来一些额外的洞察力。

additionalEntries.name: Repair
entries: 作为短暂休息的一部分，你可以修复一个受损的木制物品。

additionalEntries.name: Craft Arrows
entries: 作为短暂休息的一部分，你可以制作最多五支箭。作为长时间休息的一部分，你最多可以制作20支箭。你手上必须有足够的木材来制作。

additionalEntries.caption: Woodcarver's Tools
rows: 制作一个小的木制小雕像
在木头上雕刻出复杂的图案

item.name: Woodcutter's Axe
entries: 你在使用该魔法武器进行攻击和伤害时有+1的奖励。

When you use this axe to make an attack against a plant (an ordinary plant or a creature with the Plant type) or a wooden object that isn't being worn or carried, the attack deals an extra {@damage 2d6} slashing damage on a hit.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Wraps of Dyamak reach an awakened state, they gain the following properties:

items: The bonus to attack and damage rolls with your unarmed strike increases to +2.

You can cast the {@spell misty step} spell from the wraps as a bonus action, vanishing in a cloud of crimson mist. This property of the wraps can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}, or until you score a critical hit with an unarmed strike against a hostile creature.

item.name: Wraps of Dyamak (Dormant)
entries: Created and wielded by the ancient warrior-monk Dyamak, these thick strips of enchanted cloth are stained to appear dark crimson with blood of unknown origin. The current resting place of the wraps is unknown.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: When the Wraps of Dyamak are in a dormant state, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with your unarmed strike while wearing them.
In addition, when you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|short or long rest}, you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your total number of ki points.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Wraps of Dyamak reach an exalted state, they gain the following properties:

items: The bonus to attack and damage rolls with your unarmed strike increases to +3.

When you hit with an unarmed strike, you can choose to make the attack a ravenous strike. The target takes an extra {@damage 6d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. This property of the wraps can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|long rest}, or until you score a critical hit with an unarmed strike against a hostile creature.

items.name: Awakened
entries: 一旦棱镜花环达到觉醒状态，它将获得以下好处。

items: 你可以用花环影响挑战等级为10或更低的生物。
花环法术的拯救DC增加到15。

item.name: Wreath of the Prism (Dormant)
entries: 这圈金色的荆棘上镶嵌着几十颗代表提亚马特五种颜色的宝石。

entries.name: Dormant
entries: 当花环处于休眠状态时，你有{@sense darkvision}到60英尺的范围。如果你已经拥有{@sense darkvision}，佩戴花环会使你的{@sense darkvision}范围增加60英尺。

When you hit a beast, dragon, or monstrosity of challenge rating 5 or lower with an attack, or when you grapple it, you can use the wreath to cast {@spell dominate monster} on the creature (save DC 13). On a successful save, the target is immune to the power of the wreath for 24 hours. On a failure, a shimmering, golden image of the wreath appears as a collar around the target's neck or as a crown on its head (your choice) until it is no longer {@condition charmed} by the spell. If you use the wreath to charm a second creature, the first spell immediately ends. When the spell ends, the target knows it was {@condition charmed} by you.

items.name: Exalted
entries: 一旦棱镜花环达到高尚的状态，它就会获得以下好处。

items: 你可以用花环影响挑战等级为15级或以下的生物。
花环法术的拯救DC增加到17。

item.name: Writing Kit
entries: 包括。

items: a {@item pouch|PHB|small pouch}
a quill
{@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB|ink}
{@item Parchment (one sheet)|PHB|folded parchment}
a penknife

item.name: Wrought-Iron Tower
entries: Constructed from the same materials as his tower, Dispater's Wrought-Iron Tower is a powerful weapon that marks his rule over Dis. It embodies his ideals, representing defense, authority, and power. Its construction changes hourly, similar to the tower, appearing as either iron, steel, lead, or adamantine.

The Wrought-Iron Tower is a magic staff that functions as a warhammer and you have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. If a creature is vulnerable to a certain type of damage, all damage dealt with the staff is converted to that damage type. When you hit a good aligned creature with it, that creature takes an extra {@damage 3d6} fire damage.

While holding the staff, you can control and navigate through the Iron Tower in Dis. While the staff is on the layer of Dis, Dispater knows the exact location of it, and is capable of teleporting to within 30 feet of it at will.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Wrought-Iron Tower has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} properties.

entries.name: The Best Offense
entries: While attuned to the staff, you have a +2 bonus to AC and a +2 bonus to all saving throws.

Additionally, the staff has 10 charges. When you make an attack, you may spend 1 or more charges. For each charge spent, you deal an additional 2 fire damage on a successful attack. Charges are still consumed if the attack misses. The staff regains all charges each day at dawn.
After dealing damage with the staff, you may use a bonus action and expend 1 charge to replace the damage dealt with your total AC instead.

entries.name: Rulership
entries: The Wrought-Iron Tower also functions as a {@item Rod of Rulership}, with an increased save DC of 18. This property costs 3 charges to use, though a creature that successfully saves against one of its uses is immune to future uses for 24 hours.

entries.name: Slag
entries: You can cast {@spell Searing Smite} at 6th level on yourself, expending 1 charge. Instead of doing fire damage, you may have Searing Smite inflict acid damage. The spell requires no {@status concentration} and lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: Destroying the Staff
entries: The Wrought-Iron Tower can only be destroyed inside the Iron Tower on Dis. Located somewhere within the tower is the forge that Dispater used to create the staff. An attuned creature must place the staff into the forge fires, then cast {@spell Dispel Evil and Good} and touch the staff. They then take {@damage 20d10} fire damage, which ignores resistance and immunities. If the attuned creature survives the fire damage, the staff is destroyed.

item.name: Wukka Nut
entries: These fist-sized nuts grow on wukka trees, which are popular haunts for {@creature jaculi|ToA}, {@creature su-monster|ToA|su-monsters}, and {@creature zorbo|ToA|zorbos}. A wukka nut rattles when shaken, causing its shell to shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. This magical light fades after 1 minute, but shaking the nut again causes the light to reappear. If the shell of the nut is cracked open, it loses its magic.

entries.items: Wyllow's staff is peculiar in that it can't create roses, which the archdruid dislikes. If a rose is chosen, a daisy grows instead.

item.name: Wyrmreaver Gauntlets
entries: Originally crafted for ground-bound giant brawlers to fight against dragons and other enormous predators of the sky, these studded gauntlets are engraved with the dragon rune.

While you are wearing these gauntlets, your unarmed strike deals an additional {@damage 1d6} force damage on a hit. Additionally, whenever you finish a long rest, choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. You have resistance to the chosen damage type until you finish another long rest.

entries.name: Invoking the Runes
entries: As a bonus action, you can invoke the gauntlets' runes and summon two enormous spectral fists that envelop the gauntlets and mimic your hand motions. The fists can also launch themselves to strike distant opponents, returning immediately to your space after they hit or miss.

The fists last for 1 minute or until you are incapacitated. While the spectral fists are active, unarmed strikes you make on your turn have a reach of 30 feet, and when you hit a creature with an opportunity attack made with your unarmed strike, the creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or have the prone condition.
Once the runes have been invoked, they can't be invoked again until the next dawn.

item.name: Wyrmskull Throne
entries: 由矮人之神建造，并被委托给古老的矮人帝国Shanatar的统治者。维尔姆斯库尔王座是矮人权力和骄傲的象征，历久不衰。王座离地面一英尺高，是一个巨大的东西，由抛光的黑曜石制成，有超大的脚--被刺穿的四条古代蓝龙的头骨。符文在雕刻的黑曜石中闪闪发光，当王座的力量被激活时，就会闪烁出蓝色的能量。

在沙纳塔沦陷后，威姆斯库尔王座落入了不太光彩的生物的魔掌中。一群冒险家从水生精灵暴君甘塔-克劳克手中夺取了王座，并以一笔可观的财富将其卖给了{@creature storm giant}内里。奈瑞用魔法扩大了王座，并把它作为礼物送给了她的丈夫赫卡顿国王，同时还有一根沙纳塔的统治权杖，这是她在无轨海底的沉船上发现的。只有与统治权杖相适应并拥有它的生物才能驾驭威姆斯库尔王座的力量，该王座已成为海卡顿国王在漩涡海底城堡的王室的核心。对王座力量的恐惧有助于防止邪恶巨人挑战或威胁赫卡顿的领导地位。
任何没有与统治权杖相配的生物，如果坐在王座上，就会被{@condition paralyzed}并被包裹在一个魔法力场中。当被包裹时，该生物不能被触碰，也不能从王座上移动。触摸统治权杖的力场会驱散力场，但该生物仍会保持{@condition paralyzed}，直到它与王座分离。
任何坐在王座上的生物都能听到微弱的德拉科尼亚语的低语--四条蓝龙的低语，它们的头骨装饰在王座上。虽然无能为力，但这些灵魂试图影响王座主人的决定。

entries.name: Properties of the Throne
entries: 王座有9次充电，每天黎明时分恢复所有消耗的充电。坐在王座上的生物，如果与它所拥有的统治权杖相配合，就可以利用王座的特性，这些特性如下。
王座获得30英尺的飞行速度，并可以盘旋和飞往生物意愿的地方。这个属性不需要消耗任何费用。
宝座和坐在上面的生物都可以在土和石头中移动，而不会干扰他们所移动的材料。这个属性不需要消耗任何费用。

As an action, the creature can expend 1 charge to cast {@spell lightning bolt} (spell save DC 19) from the throne. The spell is cast as though using a 9th-level spell slot and deals 49 ({@damage 14d6}) lightning damage. The bolt discharges from the mouth of one of the throne's blue dragon skulls.
作为一个行动，该生物可以花费2个费用从王座上施放{@spell globe of invulnerability}的法术。球体将生物和王座都包围起来。

As an action, the creature can expend 3 charges to create a spectral image of an {@creature ancient blue dragon} that surrounds both it and the throne. The spectral dragon lasts for 1 minute. At the end of each of the creature's turns, the spectral dragon makes one bite attack and two claw attacks against targets of the creature's choice. These attacks have the same attack bonus, reach, and damage as an {@creature ancient blue dragon||ancient blue dragon's} bite and claw attacks.

entries.name: Destroying the Throne
entries: 维尔姆斯库尔王座可以通过同时击碎上面至少五根沙纳塔的统治权杖而被摧毁。这个事实在矮人或任何吟游诗人或说书人中从未被记录或传唱过，也无法通过能力检查发现。想摧毁王座的角色必须去探险，以了解摧毁王座的方法。王座的毁灭会引发爆炸，黑曜石的碎片会向四面八方飞去。以王座为中心的30英尺半径范围内的每一个生物和物体都必须在DC21的灵巧救赎中成功，救赎失败会受到70({@damage 20d6})的砍伤，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。

item.name: Wyvern Poison
entries: This poison must be harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitated} {@creature wyvern}. A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Yahcha
entries: Yahcha（发音为YAH-chah）是一种无害的肉质甲虫，大小与人的手差不多，以蠕虫和蛆虫为食。它行动缓慢（步行速度为10英尺），很容易捕捉。患有蓝雾热的生物如果吃了生的或熟的亚赫卡，可以立即对该疾病做出有利的拯救动作（见 "疾病"，第40页）。

item.name: Yellow Sapphire
entries: 一种透明的火黄色或黄绿色的宝石。

item.name: Ythryn Mythallar
entries: 一个mythallar看起来像一个巨大的水晶球，放在一个华丽的摇篮里。这个球在半径300英尺的范围内发出亮光，在另外300英尺的范围内发出暗光。球体从编织中汲取魔力，可用于各种用途。例如，尼瑟斯法师使用mythallars来保持他们的城市高耸，并赋予他们的魔法物品力量。mythallar越大，它能容纳的魔法就越多。最大的mythallars的直径为150英尺。
Ythryn mythallar是一个相对较小的装置，直径只有50英尺。一个生物要想与这个神器相合，必须在它的30英尺范围内完成短暂的休息，对神器进行冥想。一次最多可以有八个生物与之调和；否则，Ythryn mythallar将遵循《地下城主指南》中的调和规则。如果第九个生物试图与mythallar调和，则不会发生任何事情。
所有与Ythryn mythallar相适应的生物都能感觉到这个装置正在被使用。与该装置相适应的生物可以使用它的任何属性，但只有在所有其他与该装置相适应的生物同意的情况下。Ythryn mythallar的属性如下。

items: 当你和Ythryn mythallar在同一个平面上时，你可以使用一个动作使它以30英尺的速度向你选择的任何方向飞行。在该装置500英尺范围内的所有物质都会随着它移动。Ythryn mythallar和所有被它高高举起的结构在不运动时都会悬浮在原地。
作为一个行动，你可以使你在Ythryn mythallar的30英尺范围内持有的一件魔法物品立即恢复其所有已消耗的费用或使用。以这种方式充能的魔法物品不能被Ythryn mythallar再次充能，直到该物品自行恢复已消耗的电荷或使用。
你可以使用Ythryn mythallar来施展{@spell control weather}的法术，不需要任何组件，也不需要你在户外。这种施法的半径为50英里。在施法时间内，你必须在Ythryn mythallar的30英尺内，否则施法失败。

entries.name: Touching the Mythallar
entries: 任何触及mythallar球体的生物都必须进行DC 22宪法救赎，救赎失败会受到180({@damage 20d10 + 70})的辐射伤害，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。亡灵在这个蓄力动作上有劣势。除了神器和mythallar的摇篮之外，任何接触到地球的物体都会被瞬间瓦解（无救）。

item.name: Zabou
entries: Zabou mushrooms feed on offal and the rotting wood of dead trees. If handled carefully, a zabou can be picked or uprooted without causing it to release its spores. If crushed or struck, a zabou releases its spores in a 10-foot-radius sphere. A zabou can also be hurled up to 30 feet away or dropped like a grenade, releasing its cloud of spores on impact. Any creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} creature's skin itches for the duration. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Zeal
entries: Distilled from the ichor of demons, {@item zeal|TDCSR} was originally used by Tal'Dorei's ancient berserkers to grant them incredible strength and courage before battles. These days, it's most commonly used by criminal bruisers before a brawl. Most modern warriors stay well away from {@item zeal|TDCSR}, due both to its addictive nature and to the mental and physical degeneration it can cause over long periods of time. When prepared properly, {@item zeal|TDCSR} is a purple, ashy-tasting gel that typically costs 150 gp per dose.

After slathering {@item zeal|TDCSR} across your exposed skin as an action, you must make a {@dc 12} Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}. On a failure, you become {@condition paralyzed} for {@dice 1d4} rounds as your muscles lock up. On a success, your weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} damage for the next minute. After this effect ends, you gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

item.name: Zircon
entries: 一种透明的淡蓝绿色宝石。

entries: 由特殊的针头制作，这种神奇的纹身以强调一种颜色的设计为特色。

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement

如果你对纹身的调和结束，纹身就会消失，而针会重新出现在你的空间。

当你拿着玫瑰的茎时，你会获得对与玫瑰颜色相关类型的伤害的抵抗。如果你从单一来源受到的这种类型的伤害超过10次（应用抗性后），玫瑰会解体，而你则不会受到任何伤害。

As an action, you can blow the petals from the rose to produce a 20-foot cone of acid, lightning, poisonous gas, fire, or cold, as dictated by the rose's damage type. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 3d10} damage of the appropriate type on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. entries: A devastation orb is an elemental bomb that can be created at the site of an elemental node by performing a ritual with an elemental weapon. The type of orb created depends on the node used. For example, an air node creates a {@item devastation orb of air|PotA}. The ritual takes 1 hour to complete and requires 2,000 gp worth of special components, which are consumed.
一个破坏性球体的直径为12英寸，重量为10磅，有一个坚固的外壳。球体在创建后的几个小时内就会被引爆，释放出它所包含的元素能量。球体不会向外透露它还有多少时间才会引爆。诸如{@spell identify}和{@spell divination}的法术可以用来确定球体何时会爆炸。一个球体有AC10，15点命中率，对毒药和精神伤害免疫。将它的命中率降至0会使它立即爆炸。
可以制作一个特殊的容器来容纳一个破坏性的球体，防止它被引爆。容器上必须刻有球体的对立元素的符号。例如，一个刻有土的符号的箱子可以用来装一个{@item devastation orb of air|PotA}，并防止它被引爆。在容器中时，球体会发出颤动。如果它在应该引爆的时间之后被从容器中移出，它将在{@dice 1d6}轮之后爆炸，除非它被放回容器中。
Regardless of the type of orb, its effect is contained within a sphere with a 1 mile radius. The orb is the sphere's point of origin. The orb is destroyed after one use.

itemGroup.name: Prehistoric Figurine of Wondrous Power
entries: Larger and more roughly hewn than typical figurines of wondrous power, these statuettes depict dinosaurs and related creatures from the earliest days of the world.

As an action, you can throw a prehistoric figurine of wondrous power to a point on the ground within 60 feet of yourself while speaking a command word, whereupon the figurine magically transforms into a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.

The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions. See the Monster Manual for the creature's statistics.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its statuette form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.

itemGroup.name: Suude
entries: Exandria's most infamous drug, {@item suude|TDCSR} is a glittering powder made from {@book residuum|TDCSR|3|An Enchanting Export}. It was first developed by power-hungry archmages in the {@book Age of Arcanum|TDCSR|1|Age of Arcanum} as an incense burned to enhance focus during ritual spellcasting. The secret to its refinement has been lost and rediscovered a variety of times since the {@book Calamity|TDCSR|1|The Calamity}, and many different types of {@item suude|TDCSR} have been developed by arcanists in search of ever-greater power. It has terrible addictive and mentally degenerative properties, even when used sparingly.

After burning {@item suude|TDCSR} within a vessel and inhaling its fumes as an action, you take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage and must make a {@dc 10} Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw}. On a failure, you become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour and fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, or until you are shaken awake as an action. During this time, the world seems to move in slow motion, and your vision is twisted in kaleidoscopic colors—yet your focus is never distorted. If one dose of {@item suude|TDCSR}, or more, is used within 1 hour of another, the DC of the Constitution {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} is increased by 5 per additional dose. If you fail this save by 10 or more, you instantly drop to 0 hit points.

On a success, you gain the ability to use one of the following Metamagic options as a sorcerer for the next minute, requiring no sorcery points. The type of Metamagic you gain access to depends on the type of {@item suude|TDCSR}, and once you use it, you can't use it again until you inhale {@item suude|TDCSR} again.

{@item Suude (Brown)|TDCSR|Brown suude} allows you to use the {@optfeature Extended Spell|PHB} Metamagic option, {@item Suude (blue)|TDCSR|blue suude} allows you to use {@optfeature Twinned Spell|PHB}, and {@item Suude (Brown)|TDCSR|red suude} grants {@optfeature Distant Spell|PHB}.

itemGroup.name: True-Ice Shards
entries: Crafted from the very glacier in which he was imprisoned, the True-Ice Shards are a rapier and parrying dagger (main gauche) pair used by Levistus. They exemplify his time spent in the glacier, augmenting telepathy, divination, and defense. Due to his control over ice, Levistus can conjure the True-Ice Shards from anywhere, including if they were destroyed.

You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with the magical rapier and it does {@damage 1d8} cold damage instead of its regular damage. When using the magic dagger, you gain a +3 bonus to your AC, as long as it is used as your offhand weapon, and it does {@damage 1d6} cold damage instead of its regular damage.

Because Levistus conjures the True-Ice Shards at will, he often rewards a copy of the artifact to his most loyal followers. The copies are identical to the original with one exception: Levistus can destroy or retrieve a copy at any time.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The True-Ice Shards have the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} properties
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental}属性
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} 财产

entries.name: Sub-Zero
entries: Cold damage dealt with the shards ignores resistances and immunities. Creatures vulnerable to cold damage take triple damage from the True-Ice Shards, rather than double.

After you damage a creature with the shards, you may use a bonus action to force the creature to make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature that took the damage becomes vulnerable to cold damage for 24 hours. Once you use this feature, you may not use it again until after you have finished a long rest.

entries.name: The Best Defense
entries: As a reaction to being attacked, you use the rapier to increase your defense, adding +3 to your AC until the end of your next turn. If you attack with the rapier before the end of your next turn, you do not have its +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Mental Command
entries: While attuned to the True-Ice Shards, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Detect Thoughts} spell (save DC 20), targeting any creature you have previously met. If the targeted creature is on a different plane of existence, the spell fails.

As long as you maintain {@status concentration}, you can use a bonus action to send a telepathic message to the focused creature. It can reply—using a bonus action to do so—as long as the focus and {@status concentration} continue.

entries.name: Omniscient
entries: You can use the True-Ice Shards to cast a variety of divination spells. {@spell Locate Animals or Plants}, {@spell Locate Creature}, and {@spell Locate Object} may be cast at will, and don't have a maximum range. Other limitations of the spells still apply, and they can't detect subjects on other planes of existence.
Additionally, you may cast {@spell Scrying} (with a spell save DC of 20) and Find the Path. Once either spell is cast, you must finish a long rest before casting either of them again.

entries.name: Destroying the Shards
entries: While Levistus still lives, destroying the True-Ice Shards serves little purpose, as he is capable of recreating them at will. That aside, the shards can be destroyed when subjected to a sufficient source of heat. A few such sources include the inside of an active volcano, a continuous source of Hellfire, or a powerful fire spell cast at 9th level.
